h4.p: [21] milindo ^a^V0.0001^ea^ ^a^P0.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ naama so raajaa, saagalaaya.m puruttame.
[22] upaga~nchi naagasena.m, ga"ngaa ca {ga"ngaava (sii0 pii0)} yathaa saagara.m..
[21] aasajja raajaa citrakathi.m, ukkaadhaara.m tamonuda.m.
[22] apucchi nipu.ne pa~nhe, .thaanaa.t.thaanagate puthuu..
[21] pucchaa visajjanaa {vissajjanaa (sii0 pii0)} ceva, gambhiiratthuupanissitaa.
[22] hadaya"ngamaa ka.n.nasukhaa, abbhutaa lomaha.msanaa..
[21] abhidhammavinayogaa.lhaa, suttajaalasamattitaa.
[22] naagasenakathaa citraa, opammehi nayehi ca..
[21] tattha ^a^V0.0002^ea^ ~naa.na.m pa.nidhaaya, haasayitvaana maanasa.m.
[22] su.naatha nipu.ne pa~nhe, ka"nkhaa.t.thaanavidaalaneti..

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ta.m yathaanusuuyate -- atthi yonakaana.m naanaapu.tabhedana.m saagala.m naama nagara.m nadiipabbatasobhita.m rama.niiyabhuumippadesabhaaga.m aaraamuyyaanopavanata.laakapokkhara.nisampanna.m nadiipabbatavanaraama.neyyaka.m sutavantanimmita.m nihatapaccatthika.m {nippaccatthika.m (ka0)} paccaamittaanupapii.lita.m vividhavicitrada.lhama.t.taalako.t.thaka.m varapavaragopura {pavarapacuragopura (sii0)} tora.na.m gambhiiraparikhaapa.n.darapaakaaraparikkhittantepura.m. suvibhattaviithicaccaracatukkasi"nghaa.taka.m ^a^M0.0002^ea^ suppasaaritaanekavidhavarabha.n.daparipuuritantaraapa.na.m ^a^P0.0002^ea^ vividhadaanaggasatasamupasobhita.m {satasamupasobhita.m (sii0 pii0)} himagirisikharasa"nkaasavarabhavanasatasahassappa.tima.n.dita.m gajahayarathapattisamaakula.m abhiruupanaranaariga.naanucarita.m aaki.n.najanamanussa.m puthukhattiyabraahma.navessasudda.m vividhasama.nabraahma.nasabhaajana {sabhaajana (sii0 pii0), sammaabhaajana (ka0)} sa"ngha.tita.m bahuvidhavijjaavanta {vijjaadhara (ka0)} naracira {naravira (sii0 pii0)} nisevita.m kaasikako.tumbarikaadinaanaavidhavatthaapa.nasampanna.m suppasaaritarucirabahuvidhapupphagandhaapa.na.m gandhagandhita.m aasiisaniiyabahuratanaparipuurita.m disaamukhasuppasaaritaapa.na.m si"ngaaravaa.nijaga.naanucarita.m kahaapa.narajatasuva.n.naka.msapattharaparipuura.m pajjotamaananidhiniketa.m pahuutadhanadha~n~navittuupakara.na.m paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaara.m bahvannapaana.m bahuvidhakhajjabhojjaleyyapeyyasaayaniiya.m uttarakurusa"nkaasa.m sampannasassa.m aa.lakamandaa viya devapura.m.

[03] ettha .thatvaa tesa.m pubbakamma.m kathetabba.m, kathentena ca chadhaa vibhajitvaa kathetabba.m. seyyathiida.m -- pubbayogo milindapa~nha.m lakkha.napa~nha.m me.n.dakapa~nha.m anumaanapa~nha.m opammakathaapa~nhanti.
[03] tattha milindapa~nho lakkha.napa~nho, vimaticchedanapa~nhoti duvidho. me.n.dakapa~nhopi mahaavaggo, yogikathaapa~nhoti duvidho.
[03] ^b^pubbayogo^eb^ti tesa.m pubbakamma.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ atiite ^a^V0.0003^ea^ ^a^M0.0003^ea^ kira kassapassa bhagavato saasane vattamaane ga"ngaaya samiipe ekasmi.m aavaase mahaabhikkhusa"ngho pa.tivasati, tattha vattasiilasampannaa bhikkhuu paatova u.t.thaaya ya.t.thisammajjaniyo {ya.t.thisammu~njaniyo (sii0 pii0)} aadaaya buddhagu.ne aavajjentaa a"nga.na.m sammajjitvaa kacavarabyuuha.m karonti. atheko bhikkhu eka.m saama.nera.m ``ehi saama.nera, ima.m kacavara.m cha.d.dehii''ti aaha, so asu.nanto viya gacchati, so dutiyampi...pe0... tatiyampi aamantiyamaano asu.nanto viya gacchateva. tato so bhikkhu ``dubbaco vataaya.m saama.nero''ti kuddho sammajjanida.n.dena ^a^P0.0003^ea^ pahaara.m adaasi. tato so rodanto bhayena kacavara.m cha.d.dento ``iminaa kacavaracha.d.danapu~n~nakammena yaavaaha.m nibbaana.m paapu.naami {na paapu.naami (syaa0)}, etthantare nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane majjhanhikasuuriyo {suriyo (sii0 pii0)} viya mahesakkho mahaatejo bhaveyya''nti pa.thama.m patthana.m pa.t.thapesi. kacavara.m cha.d.detvaa nahaanatthaaya ga"ngaatittha.m gato ga"ngaaya uumivega.m gaggaraayamaana.m disvaa ``yaavaaha.m nibbaana.m paapu.naami {na paapu.naami (syaa0)}, etthantare nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane aya.m uumivego viya .thaanuppattikapa.tibhaano bhaveyya.m akkhayapa.tibhaano''ti dutiyampi patthana.m pa.t.thapesi.

[03] sopi bhikkhu sammajjanisaalaaya sammajjani.m .thapetvaa nahaanatthaaya ga"ngaatittha.m gacchanto saama.nerassa patthana.m sutvaa ``esa mayaa payojitopi taava eva.m pattheti, mayha.m ki.m na samijjhissatii''ti cintetvaa ``yaavaaha.m nibbaana.m paapu.naami {na paapu.naami (syaa0)}, etthantare nibbattanibbatta.t.thaane aya.m ga"ngaauumivego viya akkhayapa.tibhaano bhaveyya.m, iminaa pucchitapucchita.m sabba.m pa~nhapa.tibhaana.m vija.tetu.m nibbe.thetu.m samattho bhaveyya''nti patthana.m pa.t.thapesi.

[03] te ubhopi devesu ca manussesu ca sa.msarantaa eka.m buddhantara.m khepesu.m. atha amhaaka.m bhagavataapi yathaa moggaliputtatissatthero dissati, evametepi dissanti mama parinibbaanato pa~ncavassasate ^a^V0.0004^ea^ atikkante ete uppajjissanti, ya.m mayaa sukhuma.m katvaa desita.m dhammavinaya.m, ta.m ete pa~nhapucchanaopammayuttivasena nijja.ta.m niggumba.m katvaa vibhajissantiiti niddi.t.thaa.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ tesu ^a^M0.0004^ea^ saama.nero jambudiipe saagalanagare milindo naama raajaa ahosi pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii pa.tibalo atiitaanaagatapaccuppannaana.m mantayogavidhaanakiriyaana.m {samantayoga ... (sii0 pii0)}, kara.nakaale nisammakaarii hoti, bahuuni cassa satthaani uggahitaani honti. seyyathida.m, suti sammuti sa"nkhyaa yogaa niiti visesikaa ga.nikaa gandhabbaa tikicchaa dhanubbedaa {catubbedaa (sii0 pii0)} puraa.naa itihaasaa jotisaa maayaa ketu {hetu (sii0 pii0)} mantanaa yuddhaa chandasaa buddhavacanena ^a^P0.0004^ea^ {chandasaamuddavacanena (sii0 pii0)} ekuunaviisati, vita.n.davaadii {vaadii (sii0 pii0)} duraasado duppasaho puthutitthakaraana.m aggamakkhaayati, sakalajambudiipe milindena ra~n~naa samo koci naahosi yadida.m thaamena javena suurena pa~n~naaya, a.d.dho mahaddhano mahaabhogo anantabalavaahano.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ athekadivasa.m milindo raajaa anantabalavaahana.m catura"ngini.m balaggasenaabyuuha.m dassanakamyataaya nagaraa nikkhamitvaa bahinagare sena"ngadassana.m katvaa {senaaga.nana.m kaaretvaa (sii0 pii0)} saaretvaa so raajaa bhassappavaadako lokaayatavita.n.da {pavatta (sii0 pii0)} janasallaapaplava cittakotuuhalo visaarado vijambhako suuriya.m oloketvaa amacce aamantesi ``bahu bha.ne taava divasaavaseso ki.m karissaama, idaaneva nagara.m pavisitvaa atthi koci pa.n.dito sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa sa"nghii ga.nii ga.naacariyo api arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m pa.tijaanamaano, yo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m sakkoti ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu.m, ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m pucchissaama, ka"nkha.m pa.tivinayissaamaa''ti.

[03] eva.m vutte pa~ncasataa yonakaa raajaana.m milinda.m etadavocu.m ``atthi, mahaaraaja, cha satthaaro puura.no kassapo makkhaligosaalo niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} sa~njayo bela.t.thaputto ajito kesakambalo pakudho kaccaayano, te sa"nghino ga.nino ga.naacariyakaa ~naataa yasassino titthakaraa saadhusammataa bahujanassa, gaccha tva.m mahaaraaja, te pa~nha.m pucchassu, ka"nkha.m pa.tivinayassuu''ti.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ atha kho milindo raajaa pa~ncahi yonakasatehi parivuto bhadravaahana.m rathavaramaaruyha yena puura.no kassapo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M0.0005^ea^ puura.nena kassapena saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa puura.na.m kassapa.m etadavoca ``ko, bhante kassapa, loka.m paaletii''ti? ``pathavii, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0005^ea^, loka.m paaletii''ti. ``yadi, bhante kassapa, pathavii {pa.thavii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} loka.m paaleti, atha kasmaa aviiciniraya.m gacchantaa sattaa pathavi.m atikkamitvaa ^a^P0.0005^ea^ gacchantii''ti? eva.m vutte puura.no kassapo neva sakkhi ogilitu.m, no sakkhi uggilitu.m, adhomukho pattakkhandho tu.nhiibhuuto pajjhaayanto nisiidi.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ atha kho milindo raajaa makkhali.m gosaala.m etadavoca ``atthi, bhante gosaala, kusalaakusalaani kammaani, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako''ti? ``natthi, mahaaraaja, kusalaakusalaani kammaani, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako. ye te, mahaaraaja, idha loke khattiyaa, te paraloka.m gantvaapi puna khattiyaava bhavissanti, ye te braahma.naa vessaa suddaa ca.n.daalaa pukkusaa, te paraloka.m gantvaapi puna braahma.naa vessaa suddaa ca.n.daalaa pukkusaava bhavissanti. ki.m kusalaakusalehi kammehii''ti? ``yadi, bhante gosaala, idha loke khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa ca.n.daalaa pukkusaa, te paraloka.m gantvaapi puna khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa ca.n.daalaa pukkusaava bhavissanti, natthi kusalaakusalehi kammehi kara.niiya.m. tena hi, bhante gosaala, ye te idha loke hatthacchinnaa, te paraloka.m gantvaapi puna hatthacchinnaava bhavissanti. ye paadacchinnaa, te paadacchinnaava bhavissanti. ye hatthapaadacchinnaa, te hatthapaadacchinnaava bhavissanti. ye ka.n.nacchinnaa, te ka.n.nacchinnaava bhavissanti. ye naasacchinnaa, te naasacchinnaava bhavissanti. ye ka.n.nanaasacchinnaa, te ka.n.nanaasacchinnaava bhavissantii''ti. eva.m vutte gosaalo tu.nhii ahosi.

[03] atha kho milindassa ra~n~no etadahosi ``tuccho vata bho jambudiipo, palaapo vata bho jambudiipo, natthi koci sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, yo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m sakkoti ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0006^ea^ kho milindo raajaa amacce aamantesi ``rama.niiyaa vata bho dosinaa ratti, ka.m nu khvajja sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkameyyaama pa~nha.m pucchitu.m, ko mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m sakkoti ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti? eva.m vutte amaccaa tu.nhiibhuutaa ra~n~no mukha.m olokayamaanaa a.t.tha.msu.

[03] tena kho pana samayena saagalanagara.m dvaadasa vassaani su~n~na.m ahosi sama.nabraahma.nagahapatipa.n.ditehi, yattha sama.nabraahma.nagahapatipa.n.ditaa pa.tivasantiiti su.naati, tattha gantvaa ^a^V0.0006^ea^ raajaa te pa~nha.m pucchati, te ^a^P0.0006^ea^ sabbepi pa~nhavisajjanena raajaana.m aaraadhetu.m asakkontaa yena vaa tena vaa pakkamanti. ye a~n~na.m disa.m na pakkamanti, te sabbe tu.nhiibhuutaa acchanti. bhikkhuu pana yebhuyyena himavantameva gacchanti.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ko.tisataa arahanto himavante pabbate rakkhitatale pa.tivasanti. atha kho aayasmaa assagutto dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa milindassa ra~n~no vacana.m sutvaa yugandharamatthake bhikkhusa"ngha.m sannipaatetvaa bhikkhuu pucchi ``atthaavuso koci bhikkhu pa.tibalo milindena ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti?

[03] eva.m vutte ko.tisataa arahanto tu.nhii ahesu.m. dutiyampi tatiyampi pu.t.thaa tu.nhii ahesu.m. atha kho aayasmaa assagutto bhikkhusa"ngha.m etadavoca ``atthaavuso taavati.msabhavane vejayantassa paaciinato ^b^ketumatii^eb^ naama vimaana.m, tattha ^b^mahaaseno^eb^ naama devaputto pa.tivasati, so pa.tibalo tena milindena ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti.

[03] atha kho ko.tisataa arahanto yugandharapabbate antarahitaa taavati.msabhavane paaturahesu.m. addasaa kho sakko devaanamindo te bhikkhuu duuratova aagacchante, disvaana yenaayasmaa assagutto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi, ekamanta.m .thito kho sakko devaanamindo aayasmanta.m assagutta.m etadavoca ``mahaa kho, bhante, bhikkhusa"ngho anuppatto, aha.m sa"nghassa aaraamiko, kenattho, ki.m mayaa kara.niiya''nti?

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto sakka.m devaanaminda.m etadavoca ``aya.m kho, mahaaraaja, jambudiipe saagalanagare ^b^milindo^eb^ naama raajaa vita.n.davaadii duraasado ^a^M0.0007^ea^ duppasaho puthutitthakaraana.m aggamakkhaayati, so bhikkhusa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa di.t.thivaadena pa~nha.m pucchitvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m vihe.thetii''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0007^ea^ kho sakko devaanamindo aayasmanta.m assagutta.m etadavoca ``aya.m kho, bhante, milindo raajaa ito cuto manussesu uppanno, eso kho, bhante, ketumativimaane mahaaseno naama devaputto pa.tivasati, so pa.tibalo tena ^a^P0.0007^ea^ milindena ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu.m, ta.m devaputta.m yaacissaama manussalokuupapattiyaa''ti.

[03] atha kho sakko devaanamindo bhikkhusa"ngha.m purakkhatvaa ketumativimaana.m pavisitvaa mahaasena.m devaputta.m aali"ngitvaa etadavoca ``yaacati ta.m, maarisa, bhikkhusa"ngho manussalokuupapattiyaa''ti. ``na me, bhante, manussalokenattho kammabahulena, tibbo manussaloko, idhevaaha.m, bhante, devaloke uparuuparuupapattiko hutvaa parinibbaayissaamii''ti. dutiyampi...pe0... tatiyampi kho sakkena devaanamindena yaacito mahaaseno devaputto evamaaha ``na me, bhante, manussalokenattho kammabahulena, tibbo manussaloko, idhevaaha.m, bhante, devaloke uparuuparuupapattiko hutvaa parinibbaayissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto mahaasena.m devaputta.m etadavoca ``idha maya.m, maarisa, sadevaka.m loka.m anuvilokayamaanaa a~n~natra tayaa milindassa ra~n~no vaada.m bhinditvaa saasana.m paggahetu.m samattha.m a~n~na.m ka~nci na passaama, yaacati ta.m, maarisa, bhikkhusa"ngho, saadhu sappurisa manussaloke nibbattitvaa dasabalassa saasana.m pagga.nhaahii''ti. eva.m vutte mahaaseno devaputto ``aha.m kira milindassa ra~n~no vaada.m bhinditvaa buddhasaasana.m paggahetu.m samattho bhavissaamii''ti ha.t.thapaha.t.tho udaggudaggo hutvaa ``saadhu, bhante, manussaloke uppajjissaamii''ti pa.ti~n~na.m adaasi.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ atha kho te bhikkhuu devaloke ta.m kara.niiya.m tiiretvaa devesu taavati.msesu antarahitaa himavante pabbate rakkhitatale paaturahesu.m.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto bhikkhusa"ngha.m etadavoca ``atthaavuso, imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe koci bhikkhu sannipaata.m anaagato''ti. eva.m vutte a~n~nataro bhikkhu aayasmanta.m assagutta.m etadavoca ``atthi, bhante ^a^M0.0008^ea^, aayasmaa ^b^roha.no^eb^ ito sattame divase himavanta.m ^a^P0.0008^ea^ pabbata.m pavisitvaa nirodha.m samaapanno, tassa santike duuta.m paahethaa''ti. aayasmaapi roha.no ta"nkha.na~n~neva nirodhaa vu.t.thaaya ``sa"ngho ma.m pa.timaanetii''ti himavante pabbate antarahito rakkhitatale ko.tisataana.m arahantaana.m purato paaturahosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto aayasmanta.m roha.na.m etadavoca ``ki.m nu kho, aavuso, roha.na buddhasaasane bhijjante {palujjante (sii0 pii0)} na passasi sa"nghassa kara.niiyaanii''ti. ``amanasikaaro me, bhante, ahosii''ti.

[03] ``tena ^a^V0.0008^ea^, haavuso roha.na, da.n.dakamma.m karohii''ti. ``ki.m, bhante, karomii''ti? ``atthaavuso roha.na, himavantapabbatapasse ^b^gaja"ngala.m^eb^ {kaja"ngala.m (sii0 pii0)} naama braahma.nagaamo, tattha ^b^so.nuttaro^eb^ naama braahma.no pa.tivasati, tassa putto uppajjissati ^b^naagaseno^eb^ti naama daarako, tena hi tva.m, aavuso roha.na, dasamaasaadhikaani satta vassaani ta.m kula.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa naagasena.m daaraka.m niiharitvaa pabbaajehi, pabbajiteva tasmi.m da.n.dakammato muccissasii''ti. aayasmaapi kho roha.no ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchi.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ mahaasenopi kho devaputto devalokaa cavitvaa so.nuttarabraahma.nassa bhariyaaya kucchismi.m pa.tisandhi.m aggahesi, saha pa.tisandhiggaha.naa tayo acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa paaturahesu.m, aavudhabha.n.daani pajjali.msu, aggasassa.m abhinipphanna.m, mahaamegho abhippavassi. aayasmaapi kho roha.no tassa pa.tisandhiggaha.nato pa.t.thaaya dasamaasaadhikaani satta vassaani ta.m kula.m pi.n.daaya pavisanto ekadivasampi ka.tacchumatta.m bhatta.m vaa u.lu"nkamatta.m yaagu.m vaa abhivaadana.m vaa a~njalikamma.m vaa saamiicikamma.m vaa naalattha, atha kho akkosa~n~neva paribhaasa~n~neva pa.tilabhati ``aticchatha bhante''ti vacanamattampi vattaa naama naahosi, dasamaasaadhikaana.m pana sattanna.m vassaana.m accayena ekadivasa.m ``aticchatha bhante''ti vacanamatta.m alattha. ta.m divasameva braahma.nopi bahi kammantaa ^a^P0.0009^ea^ aagacchanto pa.tipathe thera.m disvaa ``ki.m, bho pabbajita, amhaaka.m geha.m agamitthaa''ti aaha. ``aama, braahma.na, agamamhaa''ti. ``api ki~nci labhitthaa''ti. ``aama, braahma.na, labhimhaa''ti. so anattamano geha.m gantvaa pucchi ``tassa ^a^M0.0009^ea^ pabbajitassa ki~nci adatthaa''ti. ``na ki~nci adamhaa''ti. braahma.no dutiyadivase gharadvaare yeva nisiidi ``ajja pabbajita.m musaavaadena niggahessaamii''ti. thero dutiyadivase braahma.nassa gharadvaara.m sampatto.

[03] braahma.no thera.m disvaava evamaaha ``tumhe hiyyo amhaaka.m gehe ki~nci alabhitvaava ``labhimhaa''ti avocuttha, va.t.tati nu kho tumhaaka.m musaavaado''ti. thero aaha ``maya.m, braahma.na, tumhaaka.m gehe ( ) {(pavisantaa) (ka0)} dasamaasaadhikaani satta vassaani `aticchathaa'ti vacanamattampi alabhitvaa hiyyo `aticchathaa'ti vacanamatta.m labhimhaa, atheta.m vaacaapa.tisandhaara.m {pa.tisantaara.m (sii0 pii0)} upaadaaya evamavocumhaa''ti.

[03] braahma.no cintesi ``ime vaacaapa.tisandhaaramattampi labhitvaa janamajjhe `labhimhaa'ti pasa.msanti, a~n~na.m ki~nci khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa labhitvaa kasmaa nappasa.msantii''ti pasiiditvaa ^a^V0.0009^ea^ attano atthaaya pa.tiyaaditabhattato ka.tacchubhikkha.m, tadupiya~nca bya~njana.m daapetvaa ``ima.m bhikkha.m sabbakaala.m tumhe labhissathaa''ti aaha.

[03] so punadivasato pabhuti upasa"nkamantassa therassa upasama.m disvaa bhiyyoso mattaaya pasiiditvaa thera.m niccakaala.m attano ghare bhattavissaggakara.natthaaya yaaci. thero tu.nhiibhaavena adhivaasetvaa divase divase bhattakicca.m katvaa gacchanto thoka.m thoka.m buddhavacana.m kathetvaa gacchati. saapi kho braahma.nii dasamaasaccayena putta.m vijaayi, ``naagaseno''tissa naamamaka.msu, so anukkamena va.d.dhanto sattavassiko jaato.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ atha kho naagasenassa daarakassa pitaa naagasena.m daaraka.m etadavoca ``imasmi.m kho ^a^P0.0010^ea^, taata naagasena, braahma.nakule sikkhaani sikkheyyaasii''ti. ``katamaani, taata, imasmi.m braahma.nakule sikkhaani naamaa''ti? ``tayo kho, taata naagasena, vedaa ^b^sikkhaani^eb^ naama, avasesaani sippaani ^b^sippa.m^eb^ naamaa''ti. ``tena hi, taata, sikkhissaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho so.nuttaro braahma.no aacariyabraahma.nassa aacariyabhaaga.m sahassa.m datvaa antopaasaade ekasmi.m gabbhe ekato ma~ncaka.m pa~n~napetvaa aacariyabraahma.na.m etadavoca ``sajjhaapehi kho, tva.m braahma.na, ima.m ^a^M0.0010^ea^ daaraka.m mantaaniiti. tena hi `taata daaraka' ugga.nhaahi mantaanii''ti. aacariyabraahma.no sajjhaayati naagasenassa daarakassa ekeneva uddesena tayo vedaa hadaya"ngataa vaacuggataa suupadhaaritaa suvavatthaapitaa sumanasikataa ahesu.m, sakimeva cakkhu.m udapaadi tiisu vedesu sanigha.n.duke.tubhesu {sanigha.n.tuke.tubhesu (ka0)} saakkharappabhedesu itihaasapa~ncamesu padako veyyaakara.no lokaayatamahaapurisalakkha.nesu anavayo ahosi.

[03] atha kho naagaseno daarako pitara.m etadavoca ``atthi nu kho, taata, imasmi.m braahma.nakule ito uttarimpi sikkhitabbaani, udaahu ettakaanevaa''ti. ``natthi, taata naagasena, imasmi.m braahma.nakule ito uttari.m sikkhitabbaani, ettakaaneva sikkhitabbaanii''ti.

[03] atha kho naagaseno daarako aacariyassa anuyoga.m datvaa paasaadaa oruyha pubbavaasanaaya coditahadayo rahogato pa.tisalliino attano sippassa aadimajjhapariyosaana.m olokento aadimhi vaa majjhe vaa pariyosaane vaa appamattakampi saara.m adisvaa ``tucchaa vata ^a^V0.0010^ea^ bho ime vedaa, palaapaa vata bho ime vedaa asaaraa nissaaraa''ti vippa.tisaarii anattamano ahosi.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa roha.no vattaniye senaasane nisinno naagasenassa daarakassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vattaniye senaasane antarahito gaja"ngalabraahma.nagaamassa purato paaturahosi. addasaa kho naagaseno daarako attano dvaarako.t.thake .thito aayasmanta.m roha.na.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana attamano udaggo pamudito piitisomanassajaato ``appeva naamaaya.m pabbajito ka~nci saara.m jaaneyyaa''ti yenaayasmaa roha.no tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P0.0011^ea^ roha.na.m etadavoca ``ko nu kho, tva.m maarisa, ediso bha.n.dukaasaavavasano''ti. ``pabbajito {paapakaana.m malaana.m pabbaajetu.m pabbajito (sii0 pii0)} naamaaha.m daarakaa''ti. ``kena, tva.m maarisa, pabbajito naamaasii''ti? ``paapakaani malaani pabbaajeti, tasmaaha.m, daaraka, pabbajito naamaa''ti. ``ki.mkaara.naa, maarisa, kesaa te na yathaa a~n~nesa''nti ^a^M0.0011^ea^? ``so.lasime, daaraka, palibodhe disvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa pabbajito. ``katame so.lasa''? ``ala"nkaarapalibodho ma.n.danapalibodho telamakkhanapalibodho dhovanapalibodho maalaapalibodho gandhapalibodho vaasanapalibodho harii.takapalibodho aamalakapalibodho ra"ngapalibodho bandhanapalibodho kocchapalibodho kappakapalibodho vija.tanapalibodho uukaapalibodho, kesesu viluunesu socanti kilamanti paridevanti urattaa.li.m kandanti sammoha.m aapajjanti, imesu kho, daaraka, so.lasasu palibodhesu paligu.n.thitaa manussaa sabbaani atisukhumaani sippaani naasentii''ti. ``ki.mkaara.naa, maarisa, vatthaanipi te na yathaa a~n~nesa''nti? ``kaamanissitaani kho, daaraka, vatthaani, kaamanissitaani gihibya~njanabha.n.daani {kamaniiyaani gihibya~njanaani (sii0 pii0)}, yaani kaanici kho bhayaani vatthato uppajjanti, taani kaasaavavasanassa na honti, tasmaa vatthaanipi me na yathaa a~n~nesa''nti. ``jaanaasi kho, tva.m maarisa, sippaani naamaa''ti? ``aama, daaraka, jaanaamaha.m sippaani, ya.m loke uttama.m manta.m, tampi jaanaamii''ti. ``mayhampi ta.m, maarisa, daatu.m sakkaa''ti? ``aama, daaraka, sakkaa''ti. ``tena hi me dehii''ti. ``akaalo kho, daaraka, antaraghara.m pi.n.daaya pavi.t.thamhaa''ti.

[03] atha kho naagaseno daarako aayasmato roha.nassa hatthato patta.m gahetvaa ghara.m pavesetvaa pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa aayasmanta.m roha.na.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m etadavoca ``dehi me daani, maarisa, manta''nti. ``yadaa kho tva.m, daaraka, nippalibodho ^a^V0.0011^ea^ hutvaa maataapitaro anujaanaapetvaa mayaa gahita.m pabbajitavesa.m ga.nhissasi, tadaa dassaamii''ti aaha.

[03] atha kho naagaseno ^a^P0.0012^ea^ daarako maataapitaro upasa"nkamitvaa aaha ``ammataataa, aya.m pabbajito `ya.m loke uttama.m manta.m, ta.m jaanaamii'ti vadati, na ca attano santike apabbajitassa deti, aha.m etassa santike pabbajitvaa ta.m uttama.m manta.m ugga.nhissaamii''ti. athassa maataapitaro ``pabbajitvaapi no putto manta.m ga.nhatu, gahetvaa puna aagacchissatii''ti ma~n~namaanaa ``ga.nha puttaa''ti anujaani.msu.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0012^ea^ kho aayasmaa roha.no naagasena.m daaraka.m aadaaya yena vattaniya.m senaasana.m, yena vijambhavatthu tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa vijambhavatthusmi.m senaasane ekaratta.m vasitvaa yena rakkhitatala.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ko.tisataana.m arahantaana.m majjhe naagasena.m daaraka.m pabbaajesi. pabbajito ca panaayasmaa naagaseno aayasmanta.m roha.na.m etadavoca ``gahito me, bhante, tava veso, detha me daani manta''nti. atha kho aayasmaa roha.no ``kimhi nu khoha.m naagasena.m vineyya.m pa.thama.m vinaye vaa suttante vaa abhidhamme vaa''ti cintetvaa ``pa.n.dito kho aya.m naagaseno, sakkoti sukheneva abhidhamma.m pariyaapu.nitu''nti pa.thama.m abhidhamme vinesi.

[03] aayasmaa ca naagaseno ``kusalaa dhammaa, akusalaa dhammaa, abyaakataa dhammaa''ti tikadukapa.tima.n.dita.m dhammasa"nga.niipakara.na.m, khandhavibha"ngaadi a.t.thaarasa vibha"ngapa.tima.n.dita.m vibha"ngappakara.na.m, ``sa"ngaho asa"ngaho''ti aadinaa cuddasavidhena vibhatta.m dhaatukathaapakara.na.m, ``khandhapa~n~natti aayatanapa~n~nattii''ti aadinaa chabbidhena vibhatta.m puggalapa~n~nattippakara.na.m, sakavaade pa~ncasuttasataani paravaade pa~ncasuttasataaniiti suttasahassa.m samodhaanetvaa vibhatta.m kathaavatthuppakara.na.m, ``muulayamaka.m khandhayamaka''nti aadinaa dasavidhena vibhatta.m yamakappakara.na.m, ``hetupaccayo aaramma.napaccayo''ti aadinaa catuviisatividhena vibhatta.m pa.t.thaanappakara.nanti sabba.m ta.m abhidhammapi.taka.m ekeneva sajjhaayena pagu.na.m katvaa ``ti.t.thatha ^a^P0.0013^ea^ bhante, na puna osaaretha, ettakenevaaha.m sajjhaayissaamii''ti aaha.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno yena ko.tisataa arahanto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa ko.tisate arahante etadavoca ``aha.m kho bhante `kusalaa dhammaa, akusalaa dhammaa ^a^V0.0012^ea^, abyaakataa dhammaa'ti imesu tiisu padesu pakkhipitvaa sabba.m ta.m abhidhammapi.taka.m vitthaarena osaaressaamii''ti. ``saadhu, naagasena, osaarehii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno satta maasaani satta pakara.naani vitthaarena osaaresi, pathavii unnadi, devataa saadhukaaramada.msu, brahmaano appho.tesu.m, dibbaani candanacu.n.naani dibbaani ca mandaaravapupphaani abhippavassi.msu.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M0.0013^ea^ kho ko.tisataa arahanto aayasmanta.m naagasena.m paripu.n.naviisativassa.m rakkhitatale upasampaadesu.m. upasampanno ca panaayasmaa naagaseno tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya upajjhaayena saddhi.m gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisanto evaruupa.m parivitakka.m uppaadesi ``tuccho vata me upajjhaayo, baalo vata me upajjhaayo, .thapetvaa avasesa.m buddhavacana.m pa.thama.m ma.m abhidhamme vinesii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa roha.no aayasmato naagasenassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``ananucchavika.m kho naagasena parivitakka.m vitakkesi, na kho paneta.m naagasena tavaanucchavika''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmato naagasenassa etadahosi ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, yatra hi naama me upajjhaayo cetasaa cetoparivitakka.m jaanissati, pa.n.dito vata me upajjhaayo, ya.mnuunaaha.m upajjhaaya.m khamaapeyya''nti. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno aayasmanta.m roha.na.m etadavoca ``khamatha me, bhante, na puna evaruupa.m vitakkessaamii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa roha.no aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ^a^P0.0014^ea^ ``na kho tyaaha.m naagasena ettaavataa khamaami, atthi kho naagasena saagala.m naama nagara.m, tattha milindo naama raajaa rajja.m kaareti, so di.t.thivaadena pa~nha.m pucchitvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m vihe.theti, sace tva.m tattha gantvaa ta.m raajaana.m dametvaa buddhasaasane pasaadessasi, evaaha.m ta.m khamissaamii''ti.

[03] ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, eko milindo raajaa; sace, bhante, sakalajambudiipe sabbe raajaano aagantvaa ma.m pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m, sabba.m ta.m visajjetvaa sampadaalessaami, `khamatha me bhante'ti vatvaa, `na khamaamii'ti vutte `tena hi, bhante, ima.m temaasa.m kassa santike vasissaamii'ti aaha'' ^a^V0.0013^ea^. aya.m kho, naagasena, aayasmaa assagutto vattaniye senaasane viharati, gaccha tva.m, naagasena, yenaayasmaa assagutto tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena aayasmato assaguttassa paade sirasaa vanda, eva~nca na.m vadehi `upajjhaayo me, bhante, tumhaaka.m paade sirasaa vandati, appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati, upajjhaayo me, bhante, ima.m temaasa.m tumhaaka.m santike vasitu.m ma.m pahi.nii'ti ^a^M0.0014^ea^, `konaamo te upajjhaayo'ti ca vutte `roha.natthero naama bhante''ti vadeyyaasi, `aha.m konaamo'ti vutte eva.m vadeyyaasi `mama upajjhaayo, bhante, tumhaaka.m naama.m jaanaatii'''ti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa naagaseno aayasmanta.m roha.na.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya anupubbena caarika.m caramaano yena vattaniya.m senaasana.m, yenaayasmaa assagutto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi, ekamanta.m .thito kho aayasmaa naagaseno aayasmanta.m assagutta.m etadavoca ``upajjhaayo me, bhante, tumhaaka.m paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchati, upajjhaayo me, bhante, ima.m temaasa.m tumhaaka.m santike vasitu.m ma.m pahi.nii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``tva.m ^a^P0.0015^ea^ kinnaamosii''ti. ``aha.m, bhante, naagaseno naamaa''ti. ``konaamo te upajjhaayo''ti? ``upajjhaayo me, bhante, roha.no naamaa''ti. ``aha.m konaamo''ti. ``upajjhaayo me, bhante, tumhaaka.m naama.m jaanaatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, naagasena, pattaciivara.m pa.tisaamehii''ti. ``saadhu bhante''ti pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa punadivase parive.na.m sammajjitvaa mukhodaka.m dantapo.na.m upa.t.thapesi. thero sammajjita.t.thaana.m pa.tisammajji, ta.m udaka.m cha.d.detvaa a~n~na.m udaka.m aahari, ta~nca dantaka.t.tha.m apanetvaa a~n~na.m dantaka.t.tha.m ga.nhi, na aalaapasallaapa.m akaasi, eva.m satta divasaani katvaa sattame divase puna pucchitvaa puna tena tatheva vutte vassavaasa.m anujaani.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ekaa mahaaupaasikaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m ti.msamattaani vassaani upa.t.thaasi. atha kho saa mahaaupaasikaa temaasaccayena yenaayasmaa assagutto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m etadavoca ``atthi nu kho, taata, tumhaaka.m santike a~n~no bhikkhuu''ti. ``atthi, mahaaupaasike, amhaaka.m santike naagaseno naama bhikkhuu''ti ^a^V0.0014^ea^. ``tena hi, taata assagutta, adhivaasehi naagasenena saddhi.m svaatanaaya bhatta''nti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa assagutto tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0015^ea^ kho aayasmaa assagutto tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya aayasmataa naagasenena saddhi.m pacchaasama.nena yena mahaaupaasikaaya nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho saa mahaaupaasikaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m aayasmanta~nca naagasena.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappesi sampavaaresi. atha kho aayasmaa assagutto bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``tva.m, naagasena, mahaaupaasikaaya anumodana.m karohii''ti ida.m vatvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaami.

[03] atha ^a^P0.0016^ea^ kho saa mahaaupaasikaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``mahallikaa khoha.m, taata naagasena, gambhiiraaya dhammakathaaya mayha.m anumodana.m karohii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno tassaa mahaaupaasikaaya gambhiiraaya dhammakathaaya lokuttaraaya su~n~natappa.tisa.myuttaaya anumodana.m akaasi. atha kho tassaa mahaaupaasikaaya tasmi.myeva aasane viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti. aayasmaapi kho naagaseno tassaa mahaaupaasikaaya anumodana.m katvaa attanaa desita.m dhamma.m paccavekkhanto vipassana.m pa.t.thapetvaa tasmi.myeva aasane nisinno sotaapattiphale pati.t.thaasi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa assagutto ma.n.dalamaa.le nisinno dvinnampi dhammacakkhupa.tilaabha.m ~natvaa saadhukaara.m pavattesi ``saadhu saadhu naagasena, ekena ka.n.dappahaarena dve mahaakaayaa padaalitaa''ti, anekaani ca devataasahassaani saadhukaara.m pavattesu.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno u.t.thaayaasanaa yenaayasmaa assagutto tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m assagutta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m naagasena.m aayasmaa assagutto etadavoca ``gaccha, tva.m naagasena, paa.taliputta.m, paa.taliputtanagare asokaaraame aayasmaa dhammarakkhito pa.tivasati, tassa santike buddhavacana.m pariyaapu.naahii''ti. ``kiiva duuro, bhante, ito paa.taliputtanagara''nti? ``yojanasataani kho naagasenaa''ti. ``duuro kho, bhante, maggo ^a^M0.0016^ea^. antaraamagge bhikkhaa dullabhaa, kathaaha.m gamissaamii''ti? ``gaccha, tva.m naagasena, antaraamagge pi.n.dapaata.m labhissasi saaliina.m odana.m vigatakaa.laka.m ^a^V0.0015^ea^ anekasuupa.m anekabya~njana''nti. ``eva.m bhante''ti kho aayasmaa naagaseno aayasmanta.m assagutta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena paa.taliputta.m tena caarika.m pakkaami.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ tena ^a^P0.0017^ea^ kho pana samayena paa.taliputtako se.t.thi pa~ncahi saka.tasatehi paa.taliputtagaamimagga.m pa.tipanno hoti. addasaa kho paa.taliputtako se.t.thi aayasmanta.m naagasena.m duuratova aagacchanta.m, disvaana yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m abhivaadetvaa ``kuhi.m gacchasi taataa''ti aaha. ``paa.taliputta.m gahapatii''ti. ``saadhu taata, mayampi paa.taliputta.m gacchaama. amhehi saddhi.m sukha.m gacchathaa''ti.

[03] atha kho paa.taliputtako se.t.thi aayasmato naagasenassa iriyaapathe pasiiditvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho paa.taliputtako se.t.thi aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``kinnaamosi tva.m taataa''ti. ``aha.m, gahapati, naagaseno naamaa''ti. ``jaanaasi kho, tva.m taata, buddhavacana.m naamaa''ti? ``jaanaami khoha.m, gahapati, abhidhammapadaanii''ti. ``laabhaa no taata, suladdha.m no taata, ahampi kho, taata, aabhidhammiko, tvampi aabhidhammiko, bha.na, taata, abhidhammapadaanii''ti. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno paa.taliputtakassa se.t.thissa abhidhamma.m desesi, desente yeva paa.taliputtakassa se.t.thissa viraja.m viitamala.m dhammacakkhu.m udapaadi ``ya.m ki~nci samudayadhamma.m, sabba.m ta.m nirodhadhamma''nti.

[03] atha kho paa.taliputtako se.t.thi pa~ncamattaani saka.tasataani purato uyyojetvaa saya.m pacchato gacchanto paa.taliputtassa aviduure dvedhaapathe .thatvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``aya.m kho, taata naagasena, asokaaraamassa maggo, ida.m kho, taata, amhaaka.m kambalaratana.m so.lasahattha.m aayaamena, a.t.thahattha.m vitthaarena, pa.tigga.nhaahi kho, taata, ida.m ^a^M0.0017^ea^ kambalaratana.m ^a^P0.0018^ea^ anukampa.m upaadaayaa''ti. pa.tiggahesi kho aayasmaa naagaseno ta.m kambalaratana.m anukampa.m upaadaaya. atha kho paa.taliputtako se.t.thi attamano udaggo pamudito piitisomanassajaato aayasmanta.m naagasena.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno yena asokaaraamo yenaayasmaa dhammarakkhito tenupasa"nkami ^a^V0.0016^ea^, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m dhammarakkhita.m abhivaadetvaa attano aagatakaara.na.m kathetvaa aayasmato dhammarakkhitassa santike tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m ekeneva uddesena tiihi maasehi bya~njanaso pariyaapu.nitvaa puna tiihi maasehi atthaso manasaakaasi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa dhammarakkhito aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``seyyathaapi, naagasena, gopaalako gaavo rakkhati, a~n~ne gorasa.m paribhu~njanti. evameva kho, tva.m naagasena, tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m dhaarentopi na bhaagii saama~n~nassaa''ti. ``hotu, bhante, ala.m ettakenaa''ti. teneva divasabhaagena tena rattibhaagena saha pa.tisambhidaahi arahatta.m paapu.ni, saha saccappa.tivedhena aayasmato naagasenassa sabbe devaa saadhukaaramada.msu, pathavii unnadi, brahmaano appho.tesu.m, dibbaani candanacu.n.naani dibbaani ca mandaaravapupphaani abhippavassi.msu.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena ko.tisataa arahanto himavante pabbate rakkhitatale sannipatitvaa aayasmato naagasenassa santike duuta.m paahesu.m ``aagacchatu naagaseno, dassanakaamaa maya.m naagasena''nti. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno duutassa vacana.m sutvaa asokaaraame antarahito himavante pabbate rakkhitatale ko.tisataana.m arahantaana.m purato paaturahosi.

[03] atha kho ko.tisataa arahanto aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavocu.m ``eso kho, naagasena, milindo raajaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m vihe.theti vaadappa.tivaadena pa~nhapucchaaya. saadhu, naagasena, gaccha tva.m milinda.m raajaana.m ^a^P0.0019^ea^ damehii''ti. ``ti.t.thatu, bhante, eko milindo raajaa; sace, bhante, sakalajambudiipe raajaano aagantvaa ma.m pa~nha.m puccheyyu.m, sabba.m ta.m visajjetvaa sampadaalessaami, gacchatha ^a^M0.0018^ea^ vo, bhante, acchambhitaa saagalanagara''nti. atha kho theraa bhikkhuu saagalanagara.m kaasaavappajjota.m isivaatapa.tivaata.m aka.msu.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa aayupaalo sa"nkhyeyyaparive.ne pa.tivasati. atha kho milindo raajaa amacce etadavoca ``rama.niiyaa vata bho dosinaa ratti, kannu khvajja sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkameyyaama saakacchaaya pa~nhapucchanaaya, ko mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ussahati ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti. eva.m vutte pa~ncasataa yonakaa raajaana.m milinda.m etadavocu.m ``atthi, mahaaraaja, aayupaalo naama thero tepi.tako bahussuto aagataagamo, so etarahi sa"nkhyeyyaparive.ne pa.tivasati; gaccha, tva.m mahaaraaja, aayasmanta.m aayupaala.m pa~nha.m pucchassuu''ti. ``tena hi, bha.ne, bhadantassa aarocethaa''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0017^ea^ kho nemittiko aayasmato aayupaalassa santike duuta.m paahesi ``raajaa, bhante, milindo aayasmanta.m aayupaala.m dassanakaamo''ti. aayasmaapi kho aayupaalo evamaaha ``tena hi aagacchatuu''ti. atha kho milindo raajaa pa~ncamattehi yonakasatehi parivuto rathavaramaaruyha yena sa"nkhyeyyaparive.na.m yenaayasmaa aayupaalo tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa aayupaalena saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m aayupaala.m etadavoca ``kimatthiyaa, bhante aayupaala, tumhaaka.m pabbajjaa, ko ca tumhaaka.m paramattho''ti. thero aaha ``dhammacariyasamacariyatthaa kho, mahaaraaja, pabbajjaa, saama~n~naphala.m kho pana amhaaka.m paramattho''ti. ``atthi pana, bhante, koci gihiipi dhammacaarii samacaarii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, atthi gihiipi dhammacaarii samacaarii, bhagavati kho, mahaaraaja, baaraa.nasiya.m ^a^P0.0020^ea^ isipatane migadaaye dhammacakka.m pavattente a.t.thaarasanna.m brahmako.tiina.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi, devataana.m pana dhammaabhisamayo ga.nanapatha.m viitivatto, sabbete gihibhuutaa, na pabbajitaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa kho mahaasamayasuttante desiyamaane, mahaama"ngalasuttante desiyamaane, samacittapariyaayasuttante desiyamaane, raahulovaadasuttante desiyamaane, paraabhavasuttante desiyamaane ga.nanapatha.m viitivattaana.m devataana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi, sabbete ^a^M0.0019^ea^ gihibhuutaa, na pabbajitaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante aayupaala, niratthikaa tumhaaka.m pabbajjaa, pubbe katassa paapakammassa nissandena sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa pabbajanti dhuta"ngaani ca pariharanti. ye kho te, bhante aayupaala, bhikkhuu ekaasanikaa, nuuna te pubbe paresa.m bhogahaarakaa coraa, te paresa.m bhoge acchinditvaa tassa kammassa nissandena etarahi ekaasanikaa bhavanti, na labhanti kaalena kaala.m paribhu~njitu.m, natthi tesa.m siila.m, natthi tapo, natthi brahmacariya.m. ye kho pana te, bhante aayupaala, bhikkhuu abbhokaasikaa, nuuna te pubbe gaamaghaatakaa coraa, te paresa.m gehaani vinaasetvaa tassa kammassa nissandena etarahi abbhokaasikaa bhavanti, na labhanti senaasanaani paribhu~njitu.m, natthi tesa.m siila.m, natthi tapo, natthi brahmacariya.m. ye kho pana te, bhante aayupaala, bhikkhuu nesajjikaa, nuuna te pubbe panthaduusakaa coraa, te paresa.m pathike jane gahetvaa bandhitvaa nisiidaapetvaa tassa kammassa nissandena etarahi nesajjikaa bhavanti, na labhanti seyya.m kappetu.m, natthi tesa.m siila.m, natthi tapo, natthi brahmacariya''nti aaha.

[03] eva.m vutte aayasmaa aayupaalo tu.nhii ahosi, na ki~nci pa.tibhaasi. atha kho pa~ncasataa ^a^V0.0018^ea^ yonakaa raajaana.m milinda.m etadavocu.m ``pa.n.dito, mahaaraaja, thero, api ca kho avisaarado na ki~nci pa.tibhaasatii''ti.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m aayupaala.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m disvaa appho.tetvaa ukku.t.thi.m ^a^P0.0021^ea^ katvaa yonake etadavoca ``tuccho vata bho jambudiipo, palaapo vata bho jambudiipo, natthi koci sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa, yo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ussahati ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ atha kho milindassa ra~n~no sabba.m ta.m parisa.m anuvilokentassa abhiite ama"nkubhuute yonake disvaa etadahosi ``nissa.msaya.m atthi ma~n~ne a~n~no koci pa.n.dito bhikkhu, yo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ussahati, yenime yonakaa na ma"nkubhuutaa''ti. atha kho milindo raajaa yonake etadavoca ``atthi, bha.ne, a~n~no koci pa.n.dito bhikkhu, yo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ussahati ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti.

[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagaseno sama.naga.naparivuto sa"nghii ga.nii ga.naacariyo ~naato yasassii saadhusammato bahujanassa ^a^M0.0020^ea^ pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii nipu.no vi~n~nuu vibhaavii viniito visaarado bahussuto tepi.tako vedaguu pabhinnabuddhimaa aagataagamo pabhinnapa.tisambhido nava"ngasatthusaasane pariyattidharo paaramippatto jinavacane dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhakusalo akkhayavicitrapa.tibhaano citrakathii kalyaa.navaakkara.no duraasado duppasaho duruttaro duraavara.no dunnivaarayo, saagaro viya akkhobho, giriraajaa viya niccalo, ra.na~njaho tamonudo pabha"nkaro mahaakathii paraga.niga.namathano paratitthiyamaddano bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m raajuuna.m raajamahaamattaana.m sakkato garukato maanito puujito apacito laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m laabhaggayasaggappatto vuddhaana.m vi~n~nuuna.m sotaavadhaanena samannaagataana.m sandassento nava"nga.m jinasaasanaratana.m, upadisanto dhammamagga.m, dhaarento dhammappajjota.m, ussaapento dhammayuupa.m, yajanto dhammayaaga.m, pagga.nhanto dhammaddhaja.m, ussaapento dhammaketu.m, dhamento {uppa.laasento (sii0 pii0)} dhammasa"nkha.m, aahananto dhammabheri.m, nadanto siihanaada.m ^a^P0.0022^ea^, gajjanto indagajjita.m, madhuragiragajjitena ~naa.navaravijjujaalaparive.thitena karu.naajalabharitena mahataa dhammaamatameghena sakalalokamabhitappayanto gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu caarika.m caramaano anupubbena saagalanagara.m anuppatto hoti. tatra suda.m aayasmaa naagaseno asiitiyaa bhikkhusahassehi saddhi.m sa"nkhyeyyaparive.ne pa.tivasati. tenaahu poraa.naa --
[21] ``bahussuto ^a^V0.0019^ea^ citrakathii, nipu.no ca visaarado.
[22] saamayiko ca kusalo, pa.tibhaane ca kovido..
[21] ``te ca tepi.takaa bhikkhuu, pa~ncanekaayikaapi ca.
[22] catunekaayikaa ceva, naagasena.m purakkharu.m..
[21] ``gambhiirapa~n~no medhaavii, maggaamaggassa kovido.
[22] uttamattha.m anuppatto, naagaseno visaarado..
[21] ``tehi bhikkhuuhi parivuto, nipu.nehi saccavaadibhi.
[22] caranto gaamanigama.m, saagala.m upasa"nkami..
[21] ``sa"nkhyeyyaparive.nasmi.m ^a^M0.0021^ea^, naagaseno tadaa vasi.
[22] katheti so manussehi, pabbate kesarii yathaa''ti..

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ atha kho devamantiyo raajaana.m milinda.m etadavoca ``aagamehi, tva.m mahaaraaja; atthi, mahaaraaja, naagaseno naama thero pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii viniito visaarado bahussuto citrakathii kalyaa.napa.tibhaano atthadhammaniruttipa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaasu paaramippatto, so etarahi sa"nkhyeyyaparive.ne pa.tivasati, gaccha, tva.m mahaaraaja, aayasmanta.m naagasena.m pa~nha.m pucchassu, ussahati so tayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m ka"nkha.m pa.tivinetu''nti. atha kho milindassa ra~n~no sahasaa ``naagaseno''ti sadda.m sutvaava ahudeva bhaya.m, ahudeva chambhitatta.m, ahudeva lomaha.mso. atha kho milindo raajaa devamantiya.m etadavoca ``ussahati bho naagaseno bhikkhu mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu''nti? ``ussahati, mahaaraaja, api indayamavaru.nakuverapajaapati suyaama ^a^P0.0023^ea^ santusitalokapaalehipi pitupitaamahena mahaabrahmunaapi saddhi.m sallapitu.m, kima"nga.m pana manussabhuutenaa''ti.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa devamantiya.m etadavoca ``tena hi, tva.m devamantiya, bhadantassa santike duuta.m pesehii''ti. ``eva.m devaa''ti kho devamantiyo aayasmato naagasenassa santike duuta.m paahesi ``raajaa, bhante, milindo aayasmanta.m dassanakaamo''ti. aayasmaapi kho naagaseno evamaaha ``tena hi aagacchatuu''ti.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0020^ea^ kho milindo raajaa pa~ncamattehi yonakasatehi parivuto rathavaramaaruyha mahataa balakaayena saddhi.m yena sa"nkhyeyyaparive.na.m yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami. tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagaseno asiitiyaa bhikkhusahassehi saddhi.m ma.n.dalamaa.le nisinno hoti. addasaa kho milindo raajaa aayasmato naagasenassa parisa.m duuratova, disvaana devamantiya.m etadavoca ``kassesaa, devamantiya, mahatii parisaa''ti? ``aayasmato kho, mahaaraaja, naagasenassa parisaa''ti.

[03] atha kho milindassa ra~n~no aayasmato naagasenassa parisa.m duuratova disvaa ahudeva bhaya.m, ahudeva chambhitatta.m, ahudeva lomaha.mso. atha kho milindo raajaa khaggaparivaarito viya gajo, garu.laparivaarito ^a^M0.0022^ea^ viya naago, ajagaraparivaarito viya kotthuko {kotthuko (sii0 pii0)}, mahi.msaparivuto viya accho, naagaanubaddho viya ma.n.duuko, sadduulaanubaddho viya migo, ahitu.n.dikasamaagato {abhigu.n.thikasamaagato (sii0 pii0)} viya pannago, majjaarasamaagato viya unduuro, bhuutavejjasamaagato viya pisaaco, raahumakhagato viya cando, pannago viya pe.lantaragato, saku.no viya pa~njarantaragato, maccho viya jaalantaragato, vaa.lavanamanuppavi.t.tho viya puriso, vessava.naaparaadhiko viya yakkho, parikkhii.naayuko viya devaputto bhiito ubbiggo utrasto sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato vimano dummano bhantacitto vipari.natamaanaso ``maa ma.m aya.m parijano paribhavii''ti sati.m {dhiiti.m (sii0 pii0)} upa.t.thapetvaa devamantiya.m etadavoca -- ``maa kho, tva.m devamantiya ^a^P0.0024^ea^, aayasmanta.m naagasena.m mayha.m aacikkheyyaasi, anakkhaata~n~nevaaha.m naagasena.m jaanissaamii''ti. ``saadhu, mahaaraaja, tva~n~neva jaanaahii''ti.
[03] tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa naagaseno tassaa bhikkhuparisaaya purato cattaaliisaaya bhikkhusahassaana.m navakataro hoti pacchato cattaaliisaaya bhikkhusahassaana.m vu.d.dhataro.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa sabba.m ta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m purato ca pacchato ca majjhato ca anuvilokento addasaa kho aayasmanta.m naagasena.m duuratova bhikkhusa"nghassa majjhe nisinna.m kesarasiiha.m viya vigatabhayabherava.m vigatalomaha.msa.m vigatabhayasaarajja.m, disvaana aakaareneva a~n~naasi ``eso kho ettha naagaseno''ti.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa devamantiya.m etadavoca ``eso kho, devamantiya, aayasmaa naagaseno''ti. ``aama, mahaaraaja, eso kho naagaseno, su.t.thu kho, tva.m mahaaraaja, naagasena.m a~n~naasii''ti ^a^V0.0021^ea^. tato raajaa tu.t.tho ahosi ``anakkhaatova mayaa naagaseno a~n~naato''ti. atha kho milindassa ra~n~no aayasmanta.m naagasena.m disvaava ahudeva bhaya.m, ahudeva chambhitatta.m, ahudeva lomaha.mso.
[03] tenaahu --
[21] ``cara.nena ^a^M0.0023^ea^ ca sampanna.m, sudanta.m uttame dame.
[22] disvaa raajaa naagasena.m, ida.m vacanamabravi..
[21] ``kathitaa {kathikaa (sii0 pii0)} mayaa bahuu di.t.thaa, saakacchaa osa.taa bahuu.
[22] na taadisa.m bhaya.m aasi, ajja taaso yathaa mama..
[21] ``nissa.msaya.m paraajayo, mama ajja bhavissati.
[22] jayo ca naagasenassa, yathaa citta.m na sa.n.thita''nti..
[06] baahirakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0022^ea^ ^a^P0.0025^ea^ ^a^M0.0024^ea^ kho milindo raajaa yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa naagasenena saddhi.m sammodi, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. aayasmaapi kho naagaseno pa.tisammodaniiyeneva {pa.tisammodi, teneva (sii0)} milindassa ra~n~no citta.m aaraadhesi. atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``katha.m bhadanto ~naayati, kinnaamosi bhante''ti? ``naagaseno''ti kho aha.m, mahaaraaja, ~naayaami, ``naagaseno''ti kho ma.m, mahaaraaja, sabrahmacaarii samudaacaranti, api ca maataapitaro naama.m karonti ``naagaseno''ti vaa ``suuraseno''ti vaa ``viiraseno''ti vaa ``siihaseno''ti vaa, api ca kho, mahaaraaja, sa"nkhaa sama~n~naa pa~n~natti vohaaro naamamatta.m yadida.m naagasenoti, na hettha puggalo upalabbhatiiti.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa evamaaha ``su.nantu me bhonto pa~ncasataa yonakaa asiitisahassaa ca bhikkhuu, aya.m naagaseno evamaaha `na hettha puggalo upalabbhatii'ti, kalla.m nu kho tadabhinanditu''nti. atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``sace, bhante naagasena, puggalo nuupalabbhati, ko carahi tumhaaka.m ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m deti, ko ta.m paribhu~njati, ko siila.m rakkhati, ko bhaavanamanuyu~njati, ko maggaphalanibbaanaani sacchikaroti, ko paa.na.m hanati, ko adinna.m aadiyati, ko kaamesumicchaacaara.m carati, ko musaa bha.nati, ko majja.m pivati, ko pa~ncaanantariyakamma.m ^a^V0.0023^ea^ karoti, tasmaa natthi kusala.m, natthi akusala.m, natthi kusalaakusalaana.m kammaana.m kattaa vaa kaaretaa vaa, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, sace ^a^P0.0026^ea^, bhante naagasena, yo tumhe maareti, natthi tassaapi paa.naatipaato, tumhaakampi, bhante naagasena, natthi aacariyo, natthi upajjhaayo, natthi upasampadaa. `naagasenoti ma.m, mahaaraaja, sabrahmacaarii samudaacarantii'ti ya.m vadesi, `katamo ettha naagaseno ^a^M0.0025^ea^? kinnu kho, bhante, kesaa naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``lomaa naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``nakhaa...pe0... dantaa...pe0... taco...pe0... ma.msa.m...pe0... nhaaru...pe0... a.t.thi...pe0... a.t.thimi~nja.m...pe0... vakka.m...pe0... hadaya.m...pe0... yakana.m...pe0... kilomaka.m...pe0... pihaka.m...pe0... papphaasa.m...pe0... anta.m...pe0... antagu.na.m...pe0... udariya.m...pe0... kariisa.m...pe0... pitta.m...pe0... semha.m...pe0... pubbo...pe0... lohita.m...pe0... sedo...pe0... medo...pe0... assu...pe0... vasaa...pe0... khe.lo...pe0... si"nghaa.nikaa...pe0... lasikaa...pe0... mutta.m...pe0... matthake matthalu"nga.m naagaseno''ti? ``na himahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, bhante, ruupa.m naagaseno''ti? ``nahi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``vedanaa naagaseno''ti?``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``sa~n~naa naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``sa"nkhaaraa naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``vi~n~naa.na.m naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, ruupavedanaasa~n~naasa"nkhaaravi~n~naa.na.m naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, a~n~natra ruupavedanaasa~n~naasa"nkhaaravi~n~naa.na.m naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``tamaha.m bhante, pucchanto pucchanto na passaami naagasena.m. naagasenasaddo yeva nu kho, bhante, naagaseno''ti? ``na hi mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ko panettha naagaseno, alika.m tva.m, bhante, bhaasasi musaavaada.m, natthi naagaseno''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno milinda.m raajaana.m etadavoca ``tva.m khosi, mahaaraaja, khattiyasukhumaalo accantasukhumaalo, tassa te, mahaaraaja, majjhanhikasamaya.m tattaaya bhuumiyaa u.nhaaya vaalikaaya kharaaya sakkharakathalikaaya {kharaa sakkharaka.thalavaalikaa (sii0 pii0)} madditvaa paadenaagacchantassa paadaa rujjanti, kaayo kilamati, citta.m upaha~n~nati, dukkhasahagata.m kaayavi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, ki.m nu kho tva.m paadenaagatosi, udaahu vaahanenaa''ti? ``naaha.m, bhante, paadenaagacchaami, rathenaaha.m ^a^P0.0027^ea^ aagatosmii''ti. ``sace, tva.m mahaaraaja, rathenaagatosi, ratha.m me aarocehi, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, iisaa ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``akkho ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``cakkaani ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``rathapa~njara.m ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``rathada.n.dako ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yuga.m ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``rasmiyo ^a^V0.0024^ea^ ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``patodala.t.thi ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, iisaaakkhacakkarathapa~njararathada.n.dayugarasmipatodaa ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0026^ea^, a~n~natra iisaaakkhacakkarathapa~njararathada.n.dayugarasmipatodaa ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``tamaha.m, mahaaraaja, pucchanto pucchanto na passaami ratha.m. rathasaddoyeva nu kho, mahaaraaja, ratho''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ko panettha ratho, alika.m, tva.m mahaaraaja, bhaasasi musaavaada.m, natthi ratho, tva.msi, mahaaraaja, sakalajambudiipe aggaraajaa, kassa pana tva.m bhaayitvaa musaavaada.m bhaasasi, su.nantu me bhonto pa~ncasataa yonakaa asiitisahassaa ca bhikkhuu, aya.m milindo raajaa evamaaha `rathenaaha.m aagatosmii'ti, sace tva.m, mahaaraaja, rathenaagato`si, ratha.m me aarocehii'ti vutto samaano ratha.m na sampaadeti, kalla.m nu kho tadabhinanditu''nti. eva.m vutte pa~ncasataa yonakaa aayasmato naagasenassa saadhukaara.m datvaa milinda.m raajaana.m etadavocu.m ``idaani kho tva.m, mahaaraaja, sakkonto bhaasassuu''ti.

[01] atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``naaha.m, bhante naagasena, musaa bha.naami, iisa~nca pa.ticca akkha~nca pa.ticca cakkaani ca pa.ticca rathapa~njara~nca pa.ticca rathada.n.daka~nca pa.ticca `ratho'ti sa"nkhaa sama~n~naa pa~n~natti vohaaro naamamatta.m pavattatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu kho, tva.m mahaaraaja, ratha.m jaanaasi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, mayhampi kese ca pa.ticca lome ca pa.ticca...pe0... matthake matthalu"nga~nca ^a^P0.0028^ea^ pa.ticca ruupa~nca pa.ticca vedana~nca pa.ticca sa~n~na~nca pa.ticca sa"nkhaare ca pa.ticca vi~n~naa.na~nca pa.ticca `naagaseno'ti sa"nkhaa sama~n~naa pa~n~natti vohaaro naamamatta.m pavattati, paramatthato panettha puggalo nuupalabbhati. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, vajiraaya bhikkhuniyaa bhagavato sammukhaa --
[21] ```yathaa hi a"ngasambhaaraa, hoti saddo ratho iti.
[22] eva.m khandhesu santesu, hoti ``satto''ti sammutii'''ti {passa sa.m0 ni0 1.171}..

[03] ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena, aticitraani pa~nhapa.tibhaanaani visajjitaani, yadi buddho ti.t.theyya saadhukaara.m dadeyya, saadhu saadhu naagasena, aticitraani pa~nhapa.tibhaanaani visajjitaanii''ti.
[06] pa~n~nattipa~nho pa.thamo.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``kativassosi ^a^V0.0025^ea^ ^a^M0.0027^ea^ tva.m, bhante naagasenaa''ti? ``sattavassoha.m, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ke te, bhante, satta, tva.m vaa satta, ga.nanaa vaa sattaa''ti?

[03] tena kho pana samayena milindassa ra~n~no sabbaabhara.napa.tima.n.ditassa ala"nkatapa.tiyattassa pathaviya.m chaayaa dissati, udakama.nike ca chaayaa dissati. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno milinda.m raajaana.m etadavoca ``aya.m te, mahaaraaja, chaayaa pathaviya.m udakama.nike ca dissati, ki.m pana, mahaaraaja, tva.m vaa raajaa, chaayaa vaa raajaa''ti? ``aha.m, bhante naagasena, raajaa, naaya.m chaayaa raajaa, ma.m pana nissaaya chaayaa pavattatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, vassaana.m ga.nanaa satta, na panaaha.m satta, ma.m pana nissaaya satta pavattati, chaayuupama.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena, aticitraani pa~nhapa.tibhaanaani visajjitaanii''ti.
[06] vassaga.nanapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, sallapissasi mayaa saddhi''nti? ``sace, tva.m mahaaraaja, pa.n.ditavaada.m {pa.n.ditavaadaa (sii0 pii0)} sallapissasi sallapissaami, sace pana raajavaada.m sallapissasi na sallapissaamii''ti. ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, pa.n.ditaa sallapantii''ti? ``pa.n.ditaana.m kho, mahaaraaja, sallaape aave.thanampi kayirati, nibbe.thanampi kayirati, niggahopi kayirati, pa.tikammampi ^a^P0.0029^ea^ kayirati, vissaasopi {visesopi (sii0 pii0)} kayirati, pa.tivissaasopi kayirati, na ca tena pa.n.ditaa kuppanti, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, pa.n.ditaa sallapantii''ti. ``katha.m pana, bhante, raajaano sallapantii''ti? ``raajaano kho, mahaaraaja, sallaape eka.m vatthu.m pa.tijaananti, yo ta.m vatthu.m vilometi, tassa da.n.da.m aa.naapenti `imassa da.n.da.m pa.nethaa'ti, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, raajaano sallapantii''ti. ``pa.n.ditavaadaaha.m, bhante, sallapissaami, no raajavaada.m, vissa.t.tho bhadanto sallapatu yathaa bhikkhunaa vaa saama.nerena vaa upaasakena vaa aaraamikena ^a^M0.0028^ea^ vaa saddhi.m sallapati ^a^V0.0026^ea^, eva.m vissa.t.tho bhadanto sallapatu maa bhaayatuu''ti. ``su.t.thu mahaaraajaa''ti thero abbhaanumodi.

[03] raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, pucchissaamii''ti. ``puccha mahaaraajaa''ti. ``pucchitosi me bhante''ti. ``visajjita.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, tayaa visajjita''nti? ``ki.m pana, mahaaraaja, tayaa pucchita''nti.
[06] viima.msanapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ atha kho milindassa ra~n~no etadahosi ``pa.n.dito kho aya.m bhikkhu pa.tibalo mayaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m, bahukaani ca me .thaanaani pucchitabbaani bhavissanti, yaava apucchitaani yeva taani .thaanaani bhavissanti, atha suuriyo attha.m gamissati, ya.mnuunaaha.m sve antepure sallapeyya''nti. atha kho raajaa devamantiya.m etadavoca ``tena hi, tva.m devamantiya, bhadantassa aaroceyyaasi `sve antepure ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallaapo bhavissatii'''ti. ida.m vatvaa milindo raajaa u.t.thaayaasanaa thera.m naagasena.m aapucchitvaa ratha.m abhiruuhitvaa ``naagaseno naagaseno''ti sajjhaaya.m karonto pakkaami.

[03] atha kho devamantiyo aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``raajaa, bhante, milindo evamaaha `sve antepure ra~n~naa saddhi.m sallaapo bhavissatii'''ti. ``su.t.thuu''ti thero abbhaanumodi. atha kho tassaa rattiyaa accayena devamantiyo ca anantakaayo ca ma"nkuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindo raajaa tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m milinda.m etadavocu.m ``aagacchatu, mahaaraaja, bhadanto naagaseno''ti ^a^P0.0030^ea^? ``aama aagacchatuu''ti. ``kittakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu''ti? ``yattake bhikkhuu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu''ti.

[03] atha kho sabbadinno aaha ``aagacchatu, mahaaraaja, dasahi bhikkhuuhi saddhi''nti, dutiyampi kho raajaa aaha ``yattake bhikkhuu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu''ti ^a^V0.0027^ea^. dutiyampi kho sabbadinno aaha ``aagacchatu, mahaaraaja, dasahi bhikkhuuhi saddhi''nti. tatiyampi kho raajaa aaha ``yattake ^a^M0.0029^ea^ bhikkhuu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu''ti. tatiyampi kho sabbadinno aaha ``aagacchatu, mahaaraaja, dasahi bhikkhuuhi saddhi''nti. ``sabbo panaaya.m sakkaaro pa.tiyaadito, aha.m bha.naami `yattake bhikkhuu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu'ti. aya.m, bha.ne sabbadinno, a~n~nathaa bha.nati, ki.m nu maya.m nappa.tibalaa bhikkhuuna.m bhojana.m daatu''nti? eva.m vutte sabbadinno ma"nku ahosi.

[03] atha kho devamantiyo ca anantakaayo ca ma"nkuro ca yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami.msu, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavocu.m ``raajaa, bhante, milindo evamaaha `yattake bhikkhuu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m aagacchatuu'''ti. atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya asiitiyaa bhikkhusahassehi saddhi.m saagala.m paavisi.

[03] atha kho anantakaayo aayasmanta.m naagasena.m nissaaya gacchanto aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `naagaseno'ti, katamo ettha, naagaseno''ti? thero aaha ``ko panettha `naagaseno'ti ma~n~nasii''ti? ``yo so, bhante, abbhantare vaato jiivo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca, so `naagaseno'ti ma~n~naamii''ti. ``yadi paneso vaato nikkhamitvaa nappaviseyya, pavisitvaa na nikkhameyya, jiiveyya nu kho so puriso''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti ^a^P0.0031^ea^. ``ye panime sa"nkhadhamakaa sa"nkha.m dhamenti, tesa.m vaato puna pavisatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ye panime va.msadhamakaa va.msa.m dhamenti, tesa.m vaato puna pavisatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ye panime si"ngadhamakaa si"nga.m dhamenti, tesa.m vaato puna pavisatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``atha kissa pana tena na marantii''ti. ``naaha.m pa.tibalo tayaa vaadinaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m, saadhu, bhante, attha.m jappehii''ti. ``neso jiivo, assaasapassaasaa naamete kaayasa"nkhaaraa''ti thero abhidhammakatha.m kathesi. atha anantakaayo upaasakatta.m pa.tivedesiiti.
[06] anantakaayapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0028^ea^ ^a^M0.0030^ea^ kho aayasmaa naagaseno yena milindassa ra~n~no nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m saparisa.m pa.niitena khaadaniiyena bhojaniiyena sahatthaa santappetvaa sampavaaretvaa ekameka.m bhikkhu.m ekamekena dussayugena acchaadetvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m ticiivarena acchaadetvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``bhante naagasena dasahi, bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m idha nisiidatha, avasesaa gacchantuu''ti.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m bhuttaavi.m oniitapattapaa.ni.m viditvaa a~n~natara.m niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``bhante naagasena, kimhi hoti kathaasallaapo''ti? ``atthena maya.m, mahaaraaja, atthikaa, atthe hotu kathaasallaapo''ti.

[03] raajaa aaha ``kimatthiyaa, bhante naagasena, tumhaaka.m pabbajjaa, ko ca tumhaaka.m paramattho''ti. thero aaha ``kinti, mahaaraaja, ida.m dukkha.m nirujjheyya, a~n~na~nca dukkha.m na uppajjeyyaati. etadatthaa, mahaaraaja, amhaaka.m pabbajjaa, anupaadaa parinibbaana.m kho pana amhaaka.m paramattho''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana, bhante naagasena, sabbe etadatthaaya ^a^P0.0032^ea^ pabbajantii''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraaja, keci etadatthaaya pabbajanti, keci raajaabhiniitaa {raajabhiititaa (sii0)} pabbajanti, keci coraabhiniitaa {corabhiititaa (sii0)} pabbajanti, keci i.na.t.taa pabbajanti, keci aajiivikatthaaya pabbajanti, ye pana sammaa pabbajanti, te etadatthaaya pabbajantii''ti.

[03] ``tva.m pana, bhante, etadatthaaya pabbajitosii''ti? ``aha.m kho, mahaaraaja, daharako santo pabbajito, na jaanaami imassa naamatthaaya pabbajaamiiti, api ca kho me eva.m ahosi `pa.n.ditaa ime sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa, te ma.m sikkhaapessantii'ti, svaaha.m tehi sikkhaapito jaanaami ca passaami ca `imassa naamatthaaya pabbajjaa'''ti.
[03] ``kallosi ^a^V0.0029^ea^, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] pabbajjapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0031^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, atthi koci mato na pa.tisandahatii''ti. thero aaha ``koci pa.tisandahati, koci na pa.tisandahatii''ti. ``ko pa.tisandahati, ko na pa.tisandahatii''ti? ``sakileso, mahaaraaja, pa.tisandahati, nikkileso na pa.tisandahatii''ti. ``tva.m pana, bhante naagasena, pa.tisandahissasii''ti? ``sace, mahaaraaja, saupaadaano bhavissaami pa.tisandahissaami, sace anupaadaano bhavissaami na pa.tisandahissaamii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] pa.tisandhipa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo na pa.tisandahati, nanu so yoniso manasikaarena na pa.tisandahatii''ti? ``yoniso ca mahaaraaja, manasikaarena pa~n~naaya ca a~n~nehi ca kusalehi dhammehii''ti. ``nanu, bhante, yoniso manasikaaro yeva pa~n~naa''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraaja, a~n~no manasikaaro, a~n~naa pa~n~naa, imesa.m kho, mahaaraaja, aje.lakago.namahi.msao.t.thagadrabhaanampi manasikaaro atthi, pa~n~naa pana tesa.m natthii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] yonisomanasikaarapa~nho sattamo.
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0030^ea^ aaha ``ki.mlakkha.no, bhante naagasena, manasikaaro, ki.mlakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti? ``uuhanalakkha.no kho, mahaaraaja, manasikaaro, chedanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti.

[03] ``katha.m uuhanalakkha.no manasikaaro, katha.m chedanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa, opamma.m karohii''ti. ``jaanaasi, tva.m mahaaraaja, yavalaavake''ti. ``aama ^a^P0.0033^ea^, bhante, jaanaamii''ti ^a^M0.0032^ea^. ``katha.m, mahaaraaja, yavalaavakaa yava.m lunantii''ti? ``vaamena, bhante, hatthena yavakalaapa.m gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena daatta.m gahetvaa daattena chindantii''ti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, yavalaavako vaamena hatthena yavakalaapa.m gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena daatta.m gahetvaa yava.m chindati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro manasikaarena maanasa.m gahetvaa pa~n~naaya kilese chindati, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, uuhanalakkha.no manasikaaro, eva.m chedanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] manasikaaralakkha.napa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `a~n~nehi ca kusalehi dhammehii'ti, katame te kusalaa dhammaa''ti? ``siila.m, mahaaraaja, saddhaa viiriya.m sati samaadhi, ime te kusalaa dhammaa''ti. ``ki.mlakkha.na.m, bhante, siila''nti? ``pati.t.thaanalakkha.na.m, mahaaraaja, siila.m sabbesa.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m, indriyabalabojjha"ngamagga"ngasatipa.t.thaanasammappadhaanaiddhipaadajhaanavimokkhasa- maadhisamaapattiina.m siila.m pati.t.tha.m, siile pati.t.thito kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya pa~ncindriyaani bhaaveti saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriyanti, sabbe kusalaa dhammaa na parihaayantii''ti. ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0031^ea^, ye keci biijagaamabhuutagaamaa vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya pa~ncindriyaani bhaaveti saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya''nti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ye keci balakara.niiyaa kammantaa kayiranti, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya pathaviya.m pati.t.thaaya kayiranti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya pa~ncindriyaani ^a^M0.0033^ea^ bhaaveti saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya''nti ^a^P0.0034^ea^.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, nagarava.d.dhakii nagara.m maapetukaamo pa.thama.m nagara.t.thaana.m sodhaapetvaa khaa.nuka.n.taka.m apaka.d.dhaapetvaa bhuumi.m sama.m kaaraapetvaa tato aparabhaage viithicatukkasi"nghaa.takaadiparicchedena vibhajitvaa nagara.m maapeti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya pa~ncindriyaani bhaaveti saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya''nti.

[01] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, la"nghako sippa.m dassetukaamo pathavi.m kha.naapetvaa sakkharakathala.m apaka.d.dhaapetvaa bhuumi.m sama.m kaaraapetvaa mudukaaya bhuumiyaa sippa.m dasseti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro siila.m nissaaya siile pati.t.thaaya pa~ncindriyaani bhaaveti saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriyanti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa --
[21] ```siile pati.t.thaaya naro sapa~n~no, citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavaya.m.
[22] aataapii nipako bhikkhu, so ima.m vija.taye ja.ta'nti {passa sa.m0 ni0 1.23}..
[21] ```aya.m pati.t.thaa dhara.niiva paa.nina.m, ida~nca muula.m kusalaabhivu.d.dhiyaa.
[22] mukha~ncida.m sabbajinaanusaasane, yo siilakkhandho varapaatimokkhiyo'''ti..
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] siilalakkha.napa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0032^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.mlakkha.naa saddhaa''ti? ``sampasaadanalakkha.naa ca, mahaaraaja, saddhaa, sampakkhandanalakkha.naa caa''ti. ``katha.m, bhante, sampasaadanalakkha.naa saddhaa''ti? ``saddhaa kho, mahaaraaja, uppajjamaanaa niivara.ne ^a^M0.0034^ea^ vikkhambheti, viniivara.na.m citta.m hoti accha.m ^a^P0.0035^ea^ vippasanna.m anaavila.m. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sampasaadanalakkha.naa saddhaa''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, raajaa cakkavattii catura"nginiyaa senaaya saddhi.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno paritta.m udaka.m tareyya, ta.m udaka.m hatthiihi ca assehi ca rathehi ca pattiihi ca khubhita.m bhaveyya aavila.m lu.lita.m kalaliibhuuta.m. utti.n.no ca raajaa cakkavattii manusse aa.naapeyya `paaniiya.m, bha.ne, aaharatha, pivissaamii'ti, ra~n~no ca udakappasaadako ma.ni bhaveyya. `eva.m devaa'ti kho te manussaa ra~n~no cakkavattissa pa.tissutvaa ta.m udakappasaadaka.m ma.ni.m udake pakkhipeyyu.m, tasmi.m udake pakkhittamatte sa"nkhasevaalapa.naka.m vigaccheyya, kaddamo ca sannisiideyya, accha.m bhaveyya udaka.m vippasanna.m anaavila.m. tato ra~n~no cakkavattissa paaniiya.m upanaameyyu.m `pivatu, deva, paaniiya'nti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, udaka.m, eva.m citta.m da.t.thabba.m, yathaa te manussaa, eva.m yogaavacaro da.t.thabbo, yathaa sa"nkhasevaalapa.naka.m kaddamo ca, eva.m kilesaa da.t.thabbaa. yathaa udakappasaadako ma.ni, eva.m saddhaa da.t.thabbaa, yathaa udakappasaadake ma.nimhi udake pakkhittamatte sa"nkhasevaalapa.naka.m vigaccheyya, kaddamo ca sannisiideyya, accha.m bhaveyya udaka.m vippasanna.m anaavila.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, saddhaa uppajjamaanaa niivara.ne vikkhambheti, viniivara.na.m citta.m hoti accha.m vippasanna.m anaavila.m, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sampasaadanalakkha.naa saddhaa''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] sampasaadanalakkha.nasaddhaapa~nho dasamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``katha.m ^a^V0.0033^ea^, bhante, sampakkhandanalakkha.naa saddhaa''ti,? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro a~n~nesa.m citta.m vimutta.m passitvaa sotaapattiphale vaa sakadaagaamiphale vaa anaagaamiphale vaa arahatte vaa sampakkhandati yoga.m karoti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sampakkhandanalakkha.naa saddhaa''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m ^a^M0.0035^ea^ karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, uparipabbate mahaamegho ^a^P0.0036^ea^ abhippavasseyya, ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuuretvaa nadi.m paripuureyya, saa ubhato kuulaani sa.mvissandantii gaccheyya, atha mahaajanakaayo aagantvaa tassaa nadiyaa uttaanata.m vaa gambhiirata.m vaa ajaananto bhiito vitthato tiire ti.t.theyya, atha~n~nataro puriso aagantvaa attano thaama~nca bala~nca sampassanto gaa.lha.m kaccha.m bandhitvaa pakkhanditvaa tareyya, ta.m ti.n.na.m passitvaa mahaajanakaayopi tareyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogaavacaro a~n~nesa.m citta.m vimutta.m passitvaa sotaapattiphale vaa sakadaagaamiphale vaa anaagaamiphale vaa arahatte vaa sampakkhandati yoga.m karoti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sampakkhandanalakkha.naa saddhaati. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa sa.myuttanikaayavare --
[21] ```saddhaaya taratii ogha.m, appamaadena a.n.nava.m.
[22] viiriyena dukkhamacceti, pa~n~naaya parisujjhatii'''ti {passa sa.m0 ni0 1.246}..
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] sampakkhandanalakkha.nasaddhaapa~nho ekaadasamo.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0034^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.mlakkha.na.m viiriya''nti? ``upatthambhanalakkha.na.m, mahaaraaja, viiriya.m, viiriyuupatthambhitaa sabbe kusalaa dhammaa na parihaayantii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso gehe patante a~n~nena daarunaa upatthambheyya, upatthambhita.m santa.m eva.m ta.m geha.m na pateyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, upatthambhanalakkha.na.m viiriya.m, viiriyuupatthambhitaa sabbe kusalaa dhammaa na parihaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, parittaka.m sena.m mahatii senaa bha~njeyya, tato raajaa a~n~nama~n~na.m anussaareyya anupeseyya attano ^a^M0.0036^ea^ parittakaaya senaaya bala.m anupada.m dadeyya, taaya saddhi.m parittakaa senaa mahati.m sena.m bha~njeyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, upatthambhanalakkha.na.m viiriya.m, viiriyuupatthambhitaa sabbe kusalaa dhammaa na parihaayanti. bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0037^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `viiriyavaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati, kusala.m bhaaveti. saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti. suddhamattaana.m pariharatii'''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] viiriyalakkha.napa~nho dvaadasamo.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.mlakkha.naa satii''ti? ``apilaapanalakkha.naa, mahaaraaja, sati, upagga.nhanalakkha.naa caa''ti. ``katha.m, bhante, apilaapanalakkha.naa satii''ti? ``sati, mahaaraaja, uppajjamaanaa kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajjahiinappa.niitaka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagadhamme apilaapeti `ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, ime cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, ime cattaaro iddhipaadaa, imaani pa~ncindriyaani, imaani pa~nca balaani, ime satta bojjha"ngaa, aya.m ariyo ^a^V0.0035^ea^ a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, aya.m samatho, aya.m vipassanaa, aya.m vijjaa, aya.m vimuttii'ti. tato yogaavacaro sevitabbe dhamme sevati, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati. bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati abhajittabbe dhamme na bhajati. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, apilaapanalakkha.naa satii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no cakkavattissa bha.n.daagaariko raajaana.m cakkavatti.m saaya.m paata.m yasa.m saraapeti `ettakaa, deva, te hatthii, ettakaa assaa, ettakaa rathaa, ettakaa pattii, ettaka.m hira~n~na.m, ettaka.m suva.n.na.m, ettaka.m saapateyya.m, ta.m devo saratuu'ti ra~n~no saapateyya.m apilaapeti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sati uppajjamaanaa kusalaakusalasaavajjaanavajjahiinappa.niitaka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaagadhamme apilaapeti `ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, ime cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, ime cattaaro iddhipaadaa, imaani pa~ncindriyaani, imaani pa~nca balaani, ime satta bojjha"ngaa, aya.m ariyo ^a^M0.0037^ea^ a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, aya.m samatho, aya.m vipassanaa, aya.m vijjaa, aya.m vimuttii'ti. tato yogaavacaro sevitabbe dhamme sevati, asevitabbe dhamme na sevati. bhajitabbe dhamme bhajati, abhajitabbe dhamme na bhajati. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, apilaapanalakkha.naa satii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante, upagga.nhanalakkha.naa satii''ti? ``sati, mahaaraaja, uppajjamaanaa hitaahitaana.m dhammaana.m gatiyo samanveti `ime dhammaa hitaa, ime dhammaa ^a^P0.0038^ea^ ahitaa. ime dhammaa upakaaraa, ime dhammaa anupakaaraa'ti. tato yogaavacaro ahite dhamme apanudeti, hite dhamme upagga.nhaati. anupakaare dhamme apanudeti, upakaare dhamme upagga.nhaati. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, upagga.nhanalakkha.naa satii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no cakkavattissa pari.naayakaratana.m ra~n~no hitaahite jaanaati `ime ra~n~no hitaa, ime ahitaa. ime upakaaraa, ime anupakaaraa'ti. tato ahite apanudeti, hite upagga.nhaati. anupakaare apanudeti, upakaare upagga.nhaati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sati uppajjamaanaa hitaahitaana.m dhammaana.m gatiyo samanveti `ime dhammaa hitaa, ime dhammaa ahitaa. ime dhammaa upakaaraa, ime dhammaa anupakaaraa'ti. tato yogaavacaro ahite dhamme apanudeti, hite dhamme upagga.nhaa'ti. anupakaare dhamme apanudeti, upakaare damme upagga.nhaati. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, upagga.nhanalakkha.naa sati. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `sati~nca khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, sabbatthika.m vadaamii'''ti.
[03] ``kallosi ^a^V0.0036^ea^, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] satilakkha.napa~nho terasamo.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.mlakkha.no samaadhii''ti? ``pamukhalakkha.no, mahaaraaja, samaadhi, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te samaadhipamukhaa honti samaadhininnaa samaadhipo.naa samaadhipabbhaaraa''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m ^a^M0.0038^ea^ karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kuu.taagaarassa yaa yaaci gopaanasiyo, sabbaa taa kuu.ta"ngamaa honti kuu.taninnaa kuu.tasamosara.naa, kuu.ta.m taasa.m aggamakkhaayati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te samaadhipamukhaa honti samaadhininnaa samaadhipo.naa samaadhipabbhaaraati.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, koci raajaa catura"nginiyaa senaaya saddhi.m sa"ngaama.m otareyya, sabbaava senaa hatthii ca assaa ca rathaa ca pattii ca tappamukhaa {tampamukhaa (syaa0 ka0)} bhaveyyu.m tanninnaa tappo.naa tappabbhaaraa ta.m yeva anupariyaayeyyu.m. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci kusalaa dhammaa, sabbe te samaadhipamukhaa honti samaadhininnaa samaadhipo.naa ^a^P0.0039^ea^ samaadhipabbhaaraa. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, pamukhalakkha.no samaadhi. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- ``samaadhi.m, bhikkhave, bhaavetha, samaahito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] samaadhipa~nho cuddasamo.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0037^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.mlakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti? ``pubbeva kho, mahaaraaja, mayaa vutta.m `chedanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa'ti, api ca obhaasanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti. ``katha.m, bhante, obhaasanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti? ``pa~n~naa, mahaaraaja, uppajjamaanaa avijjandhakaara.m vidhameti, vijjobhaasa.m janeti, ~naa.naaloka.m vida.mseti, ariyasaccaani paaka.taani karoti. tato yogaavacaro `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa sammappa~n~naaya passatii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso andhakaare gehe padiipa.m paveseyya, pavi.t.tho padiipo andhakaara.m vidhameti, obhaasa.m janeti, aaloka.m vida.mseti, ruupaani paaka.taani karoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa ^a^M0.0039^ea^ uppajjamaanaa avijjandhakaara.m vidhameti, vijjobhaasa.m janeti, ~naa.naaloka.m vida.mseti, ariyasaccaani paaka.taani karoti. tato yogaavacaro `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, obhaasanalakkha.naa pa~n~naa''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] pa~n~naalakkha.napa~nho pannarasamo.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ime dhammaa naanaa santaa eka.m attha.m abhinipphaadentii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, ime dhammaa naanaa santaa eka.m attha.m abhinipphaadenti, kilese hanantii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante, ime dhammaa naanaa santaa eka.m attha.m abhinipphaadenti, kilese hananti? opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, senaa naanaa santaa hatthii ca assaa ca rathaa ca pattii ^a^V0.0038^ea^ ca eka.m attha.m abhinipphaadenti, sa"ngaame parasena.m abhivijinanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ime dhammaa naanaa santaa eka.m attha.m abhinipphaadenti, kilese hanantii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] naanaadhammaana.m ekakiccaabhinipphaadanapa~nho so.lasamo.
[06] mahaavaggo pa.thamo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge so.lasa pa~nhaa.
[03] 1^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0039^ea^ ^a^P0.0040^ea^ ^a^M0.0040^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo uppajjati, so eva so, udaahu a~n~no''ti? thero aaha ``na ca so, na ca a~n~no''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yadaa tva.m daharo taru.no mando uttaanaseyyako ahosi, so yeva tva.m etarahi mahanto''ti? ``na hi, bhante, a~n~no so daharo taru.no mando uttaanaseyyako ahosi, a~n~no aha.m etarahi mahanto''ti. ``eva.m sante kho, mahaaraaja, maataatipi na bhavissati, pitaatipi na bhavissati, aacariyotipi na bhavissati, sippavaatipi na bhavissati, siilavaatipi na bhavissati, pa~n~navaatipi na bhavissati. ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, a~n~naa eva kalalassa maataa, a~n~naa abbudassa maataa, a~n~naa pesiyaa maataa, a~n~naa ghanassa maataa, a~n~naa khuddakassa maataa, a~n~naa mahantassa maataa, a~n~no sippa.m sikkhati, a~n~no sikkhito bhavati, a~n~no paapakamma.m karoti, a~n~nassa hatthapaadaa chijjantii''ti? ``na hi, bhante. tva.m pana, bhante, eva.m vutte ki.m vadeyyaasii''ti? thero aaha ``aha~n~neva kho, mahaaraaja, daharo ahosi.m taru.no mando uttaanaseyyako, aha~n~neva etarahi mahanto, imameva kaaya.m nissaaya sabbe te ekasa"ngahitaa''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso padiipa.m padiipeyya, ki.m so sabbaratti.m padiipeyyaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, sabbaratti.m padiipeyyaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, yaa purime yaame acci, saa majjhime yaame accii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yaa majjhime yaame acci, saa pacchime yaame accii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, a~n~no so ahosi purime yaame padiipo, a~n~no majjhime yaame padiipo, a~n~no ^a^V0.0040^ea^ pacchime yaame padiipo''ti? ``na hi bhante, ta.m yeva nissaaya sabbaratti.m padiipito''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhammasantati sandahati, a~n~no uppajjati, a~n~no nirujjhati, apubba.m acarima.m viya sandahati, tena na ca so, na ca a~n~no, purimavi~n~naa.ne pacchimavi~n~naa.na.m sa"ngaha.m gacchatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^M0.0041^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, khiira.m ^a^P0.0041^ea^ duyhamaana.m kaalantarena dadhi parivatteyya, dadhito navaniita.m, navaniitato ghata.m parivatteyya, yo nu kho, mahaaraaja, eva.m vadeyya `ya.m yeva khiira.m ta.m yeva dadhi, ya.m yeva dadhi ta.m yeva navaniita.m, ya.m yeva navaniita.m ta.m yeva ghata'nti, sammaa nu kho so, mahaaraaja, vadamaano vadeyyaa''ti? ``na hi bhante, ta.myeva nissaaya sambhuuta''nti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhammasantati sandahati, a~n~no uppajjati, a~n~no nirujjhati, apubba.m acarima.m viya sandahati, tena na ca so, na ca a~n~no, purimavi~n~naa.ne pacchimavi~n~naa.na.m sa"ngaha.m gacchatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] dhammasantatipa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo na pa.tisandahati, jaanaati so `na pa.tisandahissaamii'ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, yo na pa.tisandahati, jaanaati so `na pa.tisandahissaamii'ti. ``katha.m, bhante, jaanaatii''ti? ``yo hetu yo paccayo, mahaaraaja, pa.tisandahanaaya, tassa hetussa tassa paccayassa uparamaa jaanaati so `na pa.tisandahissaamii'''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kassako gahapatiko kasitvaa ca vapitvaa ca dha~n~naagaara.m paripuureyya. so aparena samayena neva kasseyya na vappeyya, yathaasambhata~nca dha~n~na.m paribhu~njeyya vaa visajjeyya vaa yathaa paccaya.m vaa kareyya, jaaneyya so, mahaaraaja, kassako gahapatiko `na me dha~n~naagaara.m paripuuressatii'ti? ``aama, bhante, jaaneyyaa''ti. ``katha.m ^a^V0.0041^ea^ jaaneyyaa''ti? ``yo hetu yo paccayo dha~n~naagaarassa paripuura.naaya, tassa hetussa tassa paccayassa uparamaa jaanaati `na me dha~n~naagaara.m paripuuressatii'''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo hetu yo paccayo pa.tisandahanaaya, tassa hetussa tassa paccayassa uparamaa jaanaati so `na pa.tisandahissaamii'ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] pa.tisandahanapa~nho dutiyo.
