[03] 3^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0042^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, yassa ~naa.na.m uppanna.m, tassa pa~n~naa uppannaa''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, yassa ~naa.na.m uppanna.m, tassa pa~n~naa uppannaa''ti. ``ki.m, bhante, ya~n~neva ^a^P0.0042^ea^ ~naa.na.m saa yeva pa~n~naa''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, ya~n~neva ~naa.na.m saa yeva pa~n~naa''ti. ``yassa pana, bhante, ta~n~neva ~naa.na.m saa yeva pa~n~naa uppannaa, ki.m sammuyheyya so, udaahu na sammuyheyyaa''ti? ``katthaci, mahaaraaja, sammuyheyya, katthaci na sammuyheyyaa''ti. ``kuhi.m, bhante, sammuyheyyaa''ti? ``a~n~naatapubbesu vaa, mahaaraaja, sippa.t.thaanesu, agatapubbaaya vaa disaaya, assutapubbaaya vaa naamapa~n~nattiyaa sammuyheyyaa''ti. ``kuhi.m na sammuyheyyaa''ti? ``ya.m kho pana, mahaaraaja, taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, tahi.m na sammuyheyyaa''ti. ``moho panassa, bhante, kuhi.m gacchatii''ti? ``moho kho, mahaaraaja, ~naa.ne uppannamatte tattheva nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso andhakaaragehe padiipa.m aaropeyya, tato andhakaaro nirujjheyya, aaloko paatubhaveyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ~naa.ne uppannamatte moho tattheva nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``pa~n~naa pana, bhante, kuhi.m gacchatii''ti? ``pa~n~naapi kho, mahaaraaja, sakiccaya.m katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^V0.0042^ea^ naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `pa~n~naa sakiccaya.m katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii'ti, tassa opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, yo koci puriso ratti.m lekha.m pesetukaamo lekhaka.m pakkosaapetvaa padiipa.m aaropetvaa lekha.m likhaapeyya, likhite pana lekhe padiipa.m vijjhaapeyya, vijjhaapitepi padiipe lekha.m na vinasseyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa sakiccaya.m katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^M0.0043^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puratthimesu janapadesu ^a^P0.0043^ea^ manussaa anughara.m pa~nca pa~nca udakagha.takaani .thapenti aalimpana.m vijjhaapetu.m, ghare paditte taani pa~nca udakagha.takaani gharassuupari khipanti, tato aggi vijjhaayati, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m manussaana.m eva.m hoti `puna tehi gha.tehi gha.takicca.m karissaamaa'''ti? ``na hi, bhante, ala.m tehi gha.tehi, ki.m tehi gha.tehii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pa~nca udakagha.takaani, eva.m pa~ncindriyaani da.t.thabbaani saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m. yathaa te manussaa, eva.m yogaavacaro da.t.thabbo. yathaa aggi, eva.m kilesaa da.t.thabbaa. yathaa pa~ncahi udakagha.takehi aggi vijjhaapiiyati, eva.m pa~ncindriyehi kilesaa vijjhaapiyanti, vijjhaapitaapi kilesaa na puna sambhavanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa sakiccaya.m katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vejjo pa~ncamuulabhesajjaani gahetvaa gilaanaka.m upasa"nkamitvaa taani pa~ncamuulabhesajjaani pisitvaa {pi.msitvaa (sii0 pii0)} gilaanaka.m paayeyya, tehi ca dosaa niddhameyyu.m, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa vejjassa eva.m hoti `puna tehi pa~ncamuulabhesajjehi bhesajjakicca.m karissaamii'''ti? ``na hi, bhante, ala.m tehi pa~ncamuulabhesajjehi, ki.m tehi pa~ncamuulabhesajjehii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pa~ncamuulabhesajjaani, eva.m pa~ncindriyaani da.t.thabbaani saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m, yathaa vejjo, eva.m yogaavacaro da.t.thabbo. yathaa byaadhi, eva.m kilesaa da.t.thabbaa. yathaa byaadhito puriso, eva.m puthujjano da.t.thabbo. yathaa pa~ncamuulabhesajjehi gilaanassa dosaa niddhantaa, dose niddhante gilaano arogo hoti, eva.m pa~ncindriyehi kilesaa niddhamiiyanti, niddhamitaa ca kilesaa na puna sambhavanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa sakiccaya.m ^a^V0.0043^ea^ katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa ^a^P0.0044^ea^ `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sa"ngaamaavacaro yodho pa~nca ka.n.daani gahetvaa sa"ngaama.m otareyya parasena.m vijetu.m, so sa"ngaamagato taani pa~nca ka.n.daani khipeyya, tehi ca parasenaa bhijjeyya ^a^M0.0044^ea^, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa sa"ngaamaavacarassa yodhassa eva.m hoti `puna tehi ka.n.dehi ka.n.dakicca.m karissaamii'''ti? ``na hi, bhante, ala.m tehi ka.n.dehi, ki.m tehi ka.n.dehii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pa~nca ka.n.daani, eva.m pa~ncindriyaani da.t.thabbaani saddhindriya.m viiriyindriya.m satindriya.m samaadhindriya.m pa~n~nindriya.m. yathaa, mahaaraaja, sa"ngaamaavacaro yodho, eva.m yogaavacaro da.t.thabbo. yathaa parasenaa, eva.m kilesaa da.t.thabbaa. yathaa pa~ncahi ka.n.dehi parasenaa bhijjati, eva.m pa~ncindriyehi kilesaa bhijjanti, bhaggaa ca kilesaa na puna sambhavanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naa sakiccaya.m katvaa tattheva nirujjhati, ya.m pana taaya pa~n~naaya kata.m `anicca'nti vaa `dukkha'nti vaa `anattaa'ti vaa, ta.m na nirujjhatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] ~naa.napa~n~naapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo na pa.tisandahati, vedeti so ki~nci dukkha.m vedana''nti? thero aaha ``ki~nci vedeti, ki~nci na vedetii''ti. ``ki.m vedeti, ki.m na vedetii''ti? ``kaayika.m, mahaaraaja, vedana.m vedeti, cetasika.m vedana.m na vedetii''ti. ``katha.m, bhante, kaayika.m vedana.m vedeti, katha.m cetasika.m vedana.m na vedetii''ti? ``yo hetu yo paccayo kaayikaaya dukkhavedanaaya uppattiyaa, tassa hetussa tassa paccayassa anuparamaa kaayika.m dukkhavedana.m vedeti, yo hetu yo paccayo cetasikaaya dukkhavedanaaya uppattiyaa, tassa hetussa tassa paccayassa uparamaa cetasika.m dukkhavedana.m na vedeti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `so eka.m vedana.m vedeti kaayika.m na cetasika'''nti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^V0.0044^ea^ naagasena, yo dukkha.m vedana.m vedeti, kasmaa so na parinibbaayatii''ti? ``natthi, mahaaraaja, arahato anunayo vaa pa.tigho vaa, na ca arahanto apakka.m paatenti paripaaka.m aagamenti pa.n.ditaa. bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0045^ea^, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, sukhaa vedanaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaa abyaakataa vaa''ti? ``siyaa, mahaaraaja, kusalaa, siyaa akusalaa, siyaa abyaakataa''ti. ``yadi, bhante, kusalaa na dukkhaa, yadi dukkhaa na kusalaa, kusala.m dukkhanti nuppajjatii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha purisassa hatthe tatta.m ayogu.la.m nikkhipeyya, dutiye hatthe siita.m himapi.n.da.m nikkhipeyya, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, ubhopi te daheyyu''nti? ``aama, bhante, ubhopi te daheyyu''nti. ``ki.m nu kho, te mahaaraaja, ubhopi u.nhaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana te, mahaaraaja, ubhopi siitalaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``aajaanaahi niggaha.m yadi tatta.m dahati, na ca te ubhopi u.nhaa, tena nuppajjati. yadi siitala.m dahati, na ca te ubhopi siitalaa, tena nuppajjati. kissa pana te, mahaaraaja, ubhopi dahanti, na ca te ubhopi u.nhaa, na ca te ubhopi siitalaa? eka.m u.nha.m, eka.m siitala.m, ubhopi te dahanti, tena nuppajjatii''ti. ``naaha.m pa.tibalo tayaa vaadinaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m, saadhu attha.m jappehii''ti. tato thero abhidhammasa.myuttaaya kathaaya raajaana.m milinda.m sa~n~naapesi --

[03] ``chayimaani ^a^V0.0045^ea^, mahaaraaja, gehanissitaani somanassaani, cha nekkhammanissitaani somanassaani, cha gehanissitaani domanassaani, cha nekkhammanissitaani domanassaani, cha gehanissitaa upekkhaa, cha nekkhammanissitaa upekkhaati, imaani cha ^a^P0.0046^ea^ chakkaani, atiitaapi chatti.msavidhaa vedanaa, anaagataapi ^a^M0.0046^ea^ chatti.msavidhaa vedanaa, paccuppannaapi chatti.msavidhaa vedanaa, tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuhitvaa abhisampi.n.detvaa a.t.thasata.m vedanaa hontii''ti.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ko pa.tisandahatii''ti? thero aaha ``naamaruupa.m kho, mahaaraaja, pa.tisandahatii''ti. ``ki.m ima.m yeva naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahatii''ti? ``na kho, mahaaraaja, ima.m yeva naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahati, iminaa pana, mahaaraaja, naamaruupena kamma.m karoti sobhana.m vaa paapaka.m vaa, tena kammena a~n~na.m naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahatii''ti. ``yadi, bhante, na ima.m yeva naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahati, nanu so mutto bhavissati paapakehi kammehii''ti? thero aaha ``yadi na pa.tisandaheyya, mutto bhaveyya paapakehi kammehi. yasmaa ca kho, mahaaraaja, pa.tisandahati, tasmaa na mutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso a~n~natarassa purisassa amba.m avahareyya, tamena.m ambasaamiko gahetvaa ra~n~no dasseyya `iminaa deva purisena mayha.m ambaa avaha.taa'ti, so eva.m vadeyya `naaha.m, deva, imassa ambe avaharaami, a~n~ne te ambaa, ye iminaa ropitaa, a~n~ne te ambaa, ye mayaa avaha.taa, naaha.m da.n.dappatto'ti. ki.m nu kho so, mahaaraaja, puriso da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya, purima.m, bhante, amba.m appaccakkhaaya pacchimena ambena so puriso da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, iminaa naamaruupena kamma.m karoti sobhana.m vaa paapaka.m vaa, tena kammena a~n~na.m naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahati, tasmaa na mutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^V0.0046^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso a~n~natarassa purisassa saali.m avahareyya...pe0... ucchu.m avahareyya...pe0... ^a^P0.0047^ea^ yathaa mahaaraaja koci puriso hemantakaale aggi.m jaaletvaa visibbetvaa ^a^M0.0047^ea^ {visiivetvaa (sii0 pii0)} avijjhaapetvaa pakkameyya, atha kho so aggi a~n~natarassa purisassa khetta.m .daheyya {upa.daheyya (ka0)}, tamena.m khettasaamiko gahetvaa ra~n~no dasseyya `iminaa, deva, purisena mayha.m khetta.m da.d.dha'nti. so eva.m vadeyya `naaha.m, deva, imassa khetta.m jhaapemi, a~n~no so aggi, yo mayaa avijjhaapito, a~n~no so aggi, yenimassa khetta.m da.d.dha.m, naaha.m da.n.dappatto'ti. ki.m nu kho so, mahaaraaja, puriso da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya, purima.m, bhante, aggi.m appaccakkhaaya pacchimena agginaa so puriso da.n.dappatto bhaveyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, iminaa naamaruupena kamma.m karoti sobhana.m vaa paapaka.m vaa, tena kammena a~n~na.m naamaruupa.m pa.tisandahati, tasmaa na mutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso padiipa.m aadaaya paasaada.m abhiruuhitvaa bhu~njeyya, padiipo jhaayamaano ti.na.m jhaapeyya, ti.na.m jhaayamaana.m ghara.m jhaapeyya, ghara.m jhaayamaana.m gaama.m jhaapeyya, gaamajano ta.m purisa.m gahetvaa eva.m vadeyya `kissa tva.m, bho purisa, gaama.m jhaapesii'ti, so eva.m vadeyya `naaha.m, bho, gaama.m jhaapemi, a~n~no so padiipaggi, yassaaha.m aalokena bhu~nji.m, a~n~no so aggi, yena gaamo jhaapito'ti, te vivadamaanaa tava santike aagaccheyyu.m, kassa tva.m, mahaaraaja, a.t.ta.m {attha.m (sii0 pii0)} dhaareyyaasii''ti? ``gaamajanassa bhante''ti. ``ki.m kaara.naa''ti? ``ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya, api ca tato eva so aggi nibbatto''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ki~ncaapi a~n~na.m maara.nantika.m naamaruupa.m, a~n~na.m pa.tisandhismi.m naamaruupa.m, api ca tato yeva ta.m nibbatta.m, tasmaa na mutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso dahari.m daarika.m vaaretvaa su"nka.m datvaa pakkameyya. saa aparena ^a^P0.0048^ea^ samayena mahatii assa vayappattaa, tato a~n~no puriso su"nka.m datvaa vivaaha.m kareyya, itaro aagantvaa eva.m vadeyya `kissa pana me tva.m, ambho purisa, bhariya.m nesii'ti? so eva.m vadeyya `naaha.m tava bhariya.m nemi, a~n~naa saa daarikaa daharii taru.nii, yaa ^a^M0.0048^ea^ tayaa vaaritaa ca dinnasu"nkaa ca, a~n~naaya.m daarikaa mahatii vayappattaa mayaa vaaritaa ca dinnasu"nkaa caa'ti, te vivadamaanaa tava santike aagaccheyyu.m. kassa tva.m, mahaaraaja, a.t.ta.m dhaareyyaasii''ti? ``purimassa bhante''ti. ``ki.m kaara.naa''ti? ``ki~ncaapi ^a^V0.0047^ea^ so eva.m vadeyya, api ca tato yeva saa mahatii nibbattaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ki~ncaapi a~n~na.m maara.nantika.m naamaruupa.m, a~n~na.m pa.tisandhismi.m naamaruupa.m, api ca tato yeva ta.m nibbatta.m, tasmaa naparimutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso gopaalakassa hatthato khiiragha.ta.m ki.nitvaa tasseva hatthe nikkhipitvaa pakkameyya `sve gahetvaa gamissaamii'ti, ta.m aparajju dadhi sampajjeyya. so aagantvaa eva.m vadeyya `dehi me khiiragha.ta'nti. so dadhi.m dasseyya. itaro eva.m vadeyya `naaha.m tava hatthato dadhi.m ki.naami, dehi me khiiragha.ta'nti. so eva.m vadeyya `ajaanato te khiira.m dadhibhuuta'nti te vivadamaanaa tava santike aagaccheyyu.m, kassa tva.m mahaaraaja, a.t.ta.m dhaareyyaasii''ti? ``gopaalakassa bhante''ti. ``ki.m kaara.naa''ti? ``ki~ncaapi so eva.m vadeyya, api ca tato yeva ta.m nibbatta''nti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ki~ncaapi a~n~na.m maara.nantika.m naamaruupa.m, a~n~na.m pa.tisandhismi.m naamaruupa.m, api ca tato yeva ta.m nibbatta.m, tasmaa na parimutto paapakehi kammehii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii'ti, tassa opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso paritta.m {paripakka.m (ka0)} biija.m pathaviya.m nikkhipeyya, tato a"nkuro u.t.thahitvaa anupubbena vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitvaa phala.m dadeyya. tato biija.m ^a^P0.0051^ea^ gahetvaa puna ropeyya, tatopi a"nkuro u.t.thahitvaa anupubbena vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjitvaa ^a^V0.0051^ea^ phala.m dadeyya. evametissaa santatiyaa atthi anto''ti? ``natthi bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, addhaanassaapi purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kukku.tiyaa a.n.da.m bhaveyya, a.n.dato kukku.tii kukku.tiyaa a.n.danti. evametissaa santatiyaa atthi anto''ti? ``natthi bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, addhaanassaapi purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^M0.0052^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. thero pathaviyaa cakka.m likhitvaa milinda.m raajaana.m etadavoca ``atthi, mahaaraaja, imassa cakkassa anto''ti? ``natthi bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, imaani cakkaani vuttaani bhagavataa `cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa kamma.m, kammato puna cakkhu.m jaayatii'ti. evametissaa santatiyaa atthi anto''ti? ``natthi bhante''ti.

[03] ```sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca...pe0... mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ti.n.na.m sa"ngati phasso, phassapaccayaa vedanaa, vedanaapaccayaa ta.nhaa, ta.nhaapaccayaa upaadaana.m, upaadaanapaccayaa kamma.m, kammato puna mano jaayatii'ti. evametissaa santatiyaa atthi anto''ti? ``natthi bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, addhaanassaapi purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] purimako.tipa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii'ti, katamaa ca saa purimaa ko.tii''ti? ``yo kho, mahaaraaja, atiito addhaa, esaa purimaa ko.tii''ti. ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii'ti, ki.m pana, bhante ^a^V0.0052^ea^, sabbaapi purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayatii''ti? ``kaaci, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naayati, kaaci na pa~n~naayatii''ti. ``katamaa, bhante, pa~n~naayati, katamaa na pa~n~naayatii''ti? ``ito pubbe, mahaaraaja, sabbena sabba.m sabbathaa sabba.m avijjaa naahosiiti esaa purimaa ko.ti na pa~n~naayati, ya.m ahutvaa sambhoti, hutvaa pa.tivigacchati, esapa purimaa ko.ti pa~n~naayatii''ti ^a^P0.0052^ea^.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, ya.m ahutvaa sambhoti, hutvaa pa.tivigacchati, nanu ta.m ubhato chinna.m attha.m gacchatii''ti? ``yadi, mahaaraaja, ubhato chinna.m attha.m gacchati, ubhato ^a^M0.0053^ea^ chinnaa sakkaa va.d.dhetu''nti? ``aama, saapi sakkaa va.d.dhetu''nti.''naaha.m, bhante, eta.m pucchaami ko.tito sakkaa va.d.dhetu''nti? ``aama sakkaa va.d.dhetu''nti.
[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. thero tassa rukkhuupama.m akaasi, khandhaa ca kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa biijaanii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] ko.tipa~n~naayanapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, atthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye jaayantii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, atthi sa"nkhaaraa, ye jaayantii''ti. ``katame te, bhante''ti? ``cakkhusmi~nca kho, mahaaraaja, sati ruupesu ca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m hoti, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne sati cakkhusamphasso hoti, cakkhusamphasse sati vedanaa hoti, vedanaaya sati ta.nhaa hoti, ta.nhaaya sati upaadaana.m hoti, upaadaane sati bhavo hoti, bhave sati jaati hoti, jaatiyaa sati jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti. cakkhusmi~nca kho, mahaaraaja, asati ruupesu ca asati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m na hoti, cakkhuvi~n~naa.ne asati cakkhusamphasso na hoti, cakkhusamphasse asati vedanaa na hoti, vedanaaya asati ta.nhaa na hoti, ta.nhaaya asati upaadaana.m na hoti, upaadaane asati ^a^V0.0053^ea^ bhavo na hoti, bhave asati jaati na hoti, jaatiyaa asati jaraamara.na.m sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasaa na honti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] sa"nkhaarajaayamaanapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0054^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, atthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayantii''ti? ``natthi, mahaaraaja, keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva kho, mahaaraaja, sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, ida.m geha.m abhavanta.m jaata.m, yattha tva.m ^a^P0.0053^ea^ nisinnosii''ti? ``natthi ki~nci, bhante, idha abhavanta.m jaata.m, bhavanta.m yeva jaata.m, imaani kho, bhante, daaruuni vane ahesu.m, aya~nca mattikaa pathaviya.m ahosi, itthiina~nca purisaana~nca tajjena vaayaamena evamida.m geha.m nibbatta''nti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ye keci biijagaamabhuutagaamaa pathaviya.m nikkhittaa anupubbena vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjamaanaa pupphaani ca phalaani ca dadeyyu.m, na te rukkhaa abhavantaa jaataa, bhavantaa yeva te rukkhaa jaataa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva te sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro pathaviyaa mattika.m uddharitvaa naanaabhaajanaani karoti, na taani bhaajanaani abhavantaani jaataani, bhavantaani yeva jaataani. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^V0.0054^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vii.naaya patta.m na siyaa, camma.m na siyaa, do.ni na siyaa, da.n.do na siyaa, upavii.no na siyaa, tantiyo na siyu.m, ko.no na siyaa, purisassa ca tajjo vaayaamo na siyaa, jaayeyya saddo''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yato ca kho, mahaaraaja, vii.naaya patta.m siyaa, camma.m siyaa, do.ni siyaa, da.n.do siyaa, upavii.no siyaa, tantiyo siyu.m, ko.no siyaa, purisassa ca tajjo vaayaamo siyaa, jaayeyya saddo''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaayeyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva kho sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ara.ni na siyaa, ara.nipotako na siyaa, ara.niyottaka.m na siyaa, uttaraara.ni na ^a^M0.0055^ea^ siyaa, co.laka.m na siyaa, purisassa ca tajjo vaayaamo na siyaa, jaayeyya so aggii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yato ca kho, mahaaraaja, ara.ni siyaa, ara.nipotako siyaa, ara.niyottaka.m siyaa, uttaraara.ni siyaa, co.laka.m siyaa, purisassa ca tajjo vaayaamo siyaa, jaayeyya so aggii''ti? ``aama, bhante ^a^P0.0054^ea^, jaayeyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva kho sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ma.ni na siyaa, aatapo na siyaa, gomaya.m na siyaa, jaayeyya so aggii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yato ca kho, mahaaraaja, ma.ni siyaa, aatapo siyaa, gomaya.m siyaa, jaayeyya so aggii''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaayeyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva kho sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, aadaaso na siyaa, aabhaa na siyaa, mukha.m na siyaa, jaayeyya attaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``yato ca kho, mahaaraaja, aadaaso siyaa, aabhaa siyaa, mukha.m siyaa, jaayeyya attaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaayeyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi keci sa"nkhaaraa, ye abhavantaa jaayanti, bhavantaa yeva kho sa"nkhaaraa jaayantii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi ^a^V0.0055^ea^, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] bhavantasa"nkhaarajaayamaanapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, vedaguu upalabbhatii''ti? ``ko panesa, mahaaraaja, vedaguu naamaa''ti? ``yo, bhante, abbhantare jiivo cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, sotena sadda.m su.naati, ghaanena gandha.m ghaayati, jivhaaya rasa.m saayati, kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusati, manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaati, yathaa maya.m idha paasaade nisinnaa yena yena vaatapaanena iccheyyaama passitu.m, tena tena vaatapaanena passeyyaama, puratthimenapi vaatapaanena passeyyaama, pacchimenapi ^a^M0.0056^ea^ vaatapaanena passeyyaama, uttarenapi vaatapaanena passeyyaama, dakkhi.nenapi vaatapaanena passeyyaama. evameva kho, bhante, aya.m abbhantare jiivo yena yena dvaarena icchati passitu.m, tena tena dvaarena passatii''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``pa~ncadvaara.m, mahaaraaja, bha.nissaami, ta.m su.nohi, saadhuka.m manasikarohi, yadi abbhantare jiivo cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, yathaa maya.m idha paasaade nisinnaa yena yena vaatapaanena iccheyyaama passitu.m, tena tena vaatapaanena ruupa.m yeva passeyyaama, puratthimenapi vaatapaanena ruupa.m yeva passeyyaama, pacchimenapi ^a^P0.0055^ea^ vaatapaanena ruupa.m yeva passeyyaama, uttarenapi vaatapaanena ruupa.m yeva passeyyaama, dakkhi.nenapi vaatapaanena ruupa.m yeva passeyyaama, evametena abbhantare jiivena sotenapi ruupa.m yeva passitabba.m, ghaanenapi ruupa.m yeva passitabba.m, jivhaayapi ruupa.m yeva passitabba.m, kaayenapi ruupa.m yeva passitabba.m, manasaapi ruupa.m yeva passitabba.m; cakkhunaapi saddo yeva sotabbo, ghaanenapi saddo yeva sotabbo, jivhaayapi saddo yeva sotabbo, kaayenapi saddo yeva sotabbo, manasaapi saddo yeva sotabbo; cakkhunaapi gandho yeva ghaayitabbo, sotenapi gandho yeva ghaayitabbo, jivhaayapi gandho yeva ghaayitabbo, kaayenapi gandho yeva ghaayitabbo, manasaapi gandho yeva ghaayitabbo; cakkhunaapi raso yeva saayitabbo, sotenapi raso yeva saayitabbo, ghaanenapi raso yeva saayitabbo, kaayenapi raso yeva saayitabbo, manasaapi raso yeva saayitabbo; cakkhunaapi pho.t.thabba.m yeva phusitabba.m, sotenapi pho.t.thabba.m yeva phusitabba.m, ghaanenapi pho.t.thabba.m yeva phusitabba.m, jivhaayapi pho.t.thabba.m yeva ^a^V0.0056^ea^ phusitabba.m, manasaapi pho.t.thabba.m yeva phusitabba.m; cakkhunaapi dhamma.m yeva vijaanitabba.m, sotenapi dhamma.m yeva vijaanitabba.m, ghaanenapi dhamma.m yeva vijaanitabba.m, jivhaayapi dhamma.m yeva vijaanitabba.m, kaayenapi dhamma.m yeva vijaanitabba''nti? ``na hi bhante''ti.

[03] ``na kho te, mahaaraaja, yujjati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m, yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, maya.m idha paasaade nisinnaa imesu jaalavaatapaanesu ugghaa.titesu mahantena aakaasena bahimukhaa su.t.thutara.m ruupa.m passaama, evametena abbhantare jiivenaapi cakkhudvaaresu ugghaa.titesu mahantena aakaasena su.t.thutara.m ruupa.m passitabba.m, sotesu ugghaa.titesu...pe0... ghaane ^a^M0.0057^ea^ ugghaa.tite...pe0... jivhaaya ugghaa.titaaya...pe0... kaaye ugghaa.tite mahantena aakaasena su.t.thutara.m saddo sotabbo, gandho ghaayitabbo, raso saayitabbo, pho.t.thabbo phusitabbo''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti ^a^P0.0056^ea^.

[03] ``na kho te, mahaaraaja, yujjati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m, yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, aya.m dinno nikkhamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake ti.t.theyya, jaanaasi tva.m, mahaaraaja, `aya.m dinno nikkhamitvaa bahidvaarako.t.thake .thito'''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaanaamii''ti. ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, aya.m dinno anto pavisitvaa tava purato ti.t.theyya, jaanaasi tva.m, mahaaraaja, `aya.m dinno anto pavisitvaa mama purato .thito'''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaanaamii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, abbhantare so jiivo jivhaaya rase nikkhitte jaaneyya ambilatta.m vaa lava.natta.m vaa tittakatta.m vaa ka.tukatta.m vaa kasaayatta.m vaa madhuratta.m vaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaaneyyaa''ti. ``te rase anto pavi.t.the jaaneyya ambilatta.m vaa lava.natta.m vaa tittakatta.m vaa ka.tukatta.m vaa kasaayatta.m vaa madhuratta.m vaa''ti. ``na hi bhante''ti.

[03] ``na kho te, mahaaraaja, yujjati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima.m, yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso madhugha.tasata.m aaharaapetvaa madhudo.ni.m puuraapetvaa purisassa mukha.m pidahitvaa {pidahitvaava (ka0)} madhudo.niyaa pakkhipeyya, jaaneyya, mahaaraaja, so puriso madhu.m sampanna.m vaa na sampanna.m vaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti. ``na hi tassa, bhante, mukhe madhu pavi.t.tha''nti.

[03] ``na ^a^V0.0057^ea^ kho te, mahaaraaja, yujjati purimena vaa pacchima.m, pacchimena vaa purima''nti. ``naaha.m pa.tibalo tayaa vaadinaa saddhi.m sallapitu.m; saadhu, bhante, attha.m jappehii''ti.

[03] thero abhidhammasa.myuttaaya kathaaya raajaana.m milinda.m sa~n~naapesi -- ``idha, mahaaraaja, cakkhu~nca pa.ticca ruupe ca uppajjati cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, ta.msahajaataa phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa ekaggataa jiivitindriya.m manasikaaroti evamete dhammaa paccayato jaayanti, na hettha vedaguu upalabbhati, sota~nca pa.ticca sadde ca...pe0... mana~nca pa.ticca dhamme ca uppajjati manovi~n~naa.na.m, ta.msahajaataa phasso vedanaa sa~n~naa cetanaa ekaggataa ^a^M0.0058^ea^ jiivitindriya.m manasikaaroti ^a^P0.0057^ea^ evamete dhammaa paccayato jaayanti, na hettha vedaguu upalabbhatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] vedaguupa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjatii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjatii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, pa.thama.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, pacchaa manovi~n~naa.na.m, udaahu manovi~n~naa.na.m pa.thama.m uppajjati, pacchaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na''nti? ``pa.thama.m, mahaaraaja, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, pacchaa manovi~n~naa.na''nti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yatthaaha.m uppajjaami, tvampi tattha uppajjaahii'ti, udaahu manovi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yattha tva.m uppajjissasi, ahampi tattha uppajjissaamii'''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraaja, anaalaapo tesa.m a~n~nama~n~nehii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^V0.0058^ea^, bhante naagasena, yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjatii''ti? ``ninnattaa ca, mahaaraaja, dvaarattaa ca ci.n.nattaa ca samudaacaritattaa caa''ti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, ninnattaa yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjati? opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, deve vassante katamena udaka.m gaccheyyaa''ti? ``yena, bhante, ninna.m, tena gaccheyyaa''ti. ``athaaparena samayena devo vasseyya, katamena ta.m udaka.m gaccheyyaa''ti. ``yena, bhante, purima.m udaka.m gata.m, tampi tena gaccheyyaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu.m kho, mahaaraaja, purima.m udaka.m pacchima.m udaka.m aa.naapeti `yenaaha.m gacchaami, tvampi tena gacchaahii'ti, pacchima.m vaa udaka.m purima.m udaka.m aa.naapeti `yena tva.m gacchissasi, ahampi tena gacchissaamii'''ti. ``na hi, bhante, anaalaapo ^a^M0.0059^ea^ tesa.m a~n~nama~n~nehi, ninnattaa gacchantii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ninnattaa yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjati, na cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m ^a^P0.0058^ea^ manovi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yatthaaha.m uppajjaami, tvampi tattha uppajjaahii'ti, naapi manovi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yattha tva.m uppajjissasi, ahampi tattha uppajjissaamii'ti, anaalaapo tesa.m a~n~nama~n~nehi, ninnattaa uppajjantii'''ti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, dvaarattaa yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjati? apepamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m assa da.lhapaakaaratora.na.m ekadvaara.m, tato puriso nikkhamitukaamo bhaveyya, katamena nikkhameyyaa''ti? ``dvaarena, bhante, nikkhameyyaa''ti. ``athaaparo puriso nikkhamitukaamo bhaveyya, katamena so nikkhameyyaa''ti? ``yena, bhante, purimo puriso nikkhanto, sopi tena nikkhameyyaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, purimo puriso pacchima.m purisa.m aa.naapeti `yenaaha.m gacchaami, tvampi tena gacchaahii'ti, pacchimo vaa puriso purima.m purisa.m aa.naapeti `yena tva.m gacchissasi, ahampi tena gacchissaamii'ti. ``na hi, bhante, anaalaapo tesa.m a~n~nama~n~nehi, dvaarattaa gacchantii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dvaarattaa yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjati, na cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m manovi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yatthaaha.m uppajjaami ^a^V0.0059^ea^, tvampi tattha uppajjaahii'ti, naapi manovi~n~naa.na.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m aa.naapeti `yattha tva.m uppajjissasi, ahampi tattha uppajjissaamii'ti, anaalaapo tesa.m a~n~nama~n~nehi, dvaarattaa uppajjantii''ti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, ci.n.nattaa yattha cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m uppajjati, tattha manovi~n~naa.nampi uppajjati?opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, pa.thama.m eka.m saka.ta.m gaccheyya, atha dutiya.m saka.ta.m katamena gaccheyyaa''ti? ``yena, bhante, purima.m saka.ta.m gata.m, tampi tena gaccheyyaa''ti.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `paakatikaaggito nerayiko aggi mahaabhitaapataro hoti, khuddakopi paasaa.no ^a^M0.0069^ea^ paakatike aggimhi pakkhitto divasampi paccamaano {dhamamaano (sii0 pii0)} na vilaya.m gacchati, kuu.taagaaramattopi paasaa.no nerayikaggimhi pakkhitto kha.nena vilaya.m gacchatii'ti, eta.m vacana.m na saddahaami, eva~nca pana vadetha `ye ca tattha uppannaa sattaa, te anekaanipi vassasahassaani niraye paccamaanaa na vilaya.m gacchantii'ti, tampi vacana.m na saddahaamii''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yaa taa santi makariniyopi susumaariniyopi kacchapiniyopi moriniyopi kapotiniyopi, ki.mnu taa kakkha.laani paasaa.naani sakkharaayo ca khaadantii''ti? ``aama, bhante, khaadantii''ti. ``ki.m pana taani taasa.m kucchiya.m ko.t.thabbhantaragataani vilaya.m gacchantii''ti? ``aama, bhante, vilaya.m gacchantii''ti. ``yo pana taasa.m kucchiya.m gabbho, sopi vilaya.m gacchatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``ma~n~naami, bhante, kammaadhikatena na vilaya.m gacchatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, kammaadhikatena nerayikaa sattaa anekaanipi vassasahassaani niraye paccamaanaa na vilaya.m gacchanti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa -- `so na taava kaala.m karoti, yaava na ta.m paapakamma.m byantiihotii'''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo ^a^V0.0071^ea^ opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yaa taa santi siihiniyopi byagghiniyopi diipiniyopi kukkuriniyopi, ki.mnu taa kakkha.laani a.t.thikaani ma.msaani khaadantiiti? ``aama, bhante, khaadantii''ti. ``ki.m pana taani taasa.m kucchiya.m ^a^P0.0068^ea^ ko.t.thabbhantaragataani vilaya.m gacchantii''ti? ``aama, bhante, vilaya.m gacchantii''ti. ``yo pana taasa.m kucchiya.m gabbho, sopi vilaya.m gacchatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``ma~n~naami, bhante, kammaadhikatena na vilaya.m gacchatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, kammaadhikatena nerayikaa sattaa anekaanipi vassasahassaani niraye paccamaanaa na vilaya.m gacchantii''ti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^P0.0075^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, buddho dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njito suva.n.nava.n.no ka~ncanasannibhattaco byaamappabho''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njito suva.n.nava.n.no ka~ncanasannibhattaco byaamappabho''ti.

[03] ``ki.m panassa, bhante, maataapitaropi dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagataa asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njitaa suva.n.nava.n.naa ka~ncanasannibhattacaa byaamappabhaa''ti? ``no cassa, mahaaraaja, maataapitaro dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagataa asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njitaa suva.n.nava.n.naa ka~ncanasannibhattacaa byaamappabhaa''ti.

[03] ``eva.m sante kho, bhante naagasena, na uppajjati buddho dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njito suva.n.nava.n.no ka~ncanasannibhattaco byaamappabhoti, api ca maatusadiso vaa putto hoti maatupakkho vaa, pitusadiso vaa putto hoti pitupakkho vaa''ti. thero aaha ``atthi pana, mahaaraaja, ki~nci paduma.m satapatta''nti? ``aama, bhante, atthii''ti. ``tassa pana kuhi.m sambhavo''ti? ``kaddame jaayati udake aasiiyatii''ti ^a^V0.0082^ea^. ``ki.mnu kho, mahaaraaja, paduma.m kaddamena sadisa.m va.n.nena vaa gandhena vaa rasena vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``atha udakena vaa ^a^M0.0080^ea^ gandhena vaa rasena vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagato asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njito suva.n.nava.n.no ka~ncanasannibhattaco byaamappabho, no cassa maataapitaro dvatti.msamahaapurisalakkha.nehi samannaagataa asiitiyaa ca anubya~njanehi parira~njitaa suva.n.nava.n.naa ka~ncanasannibhattacaa byaamappabhaa''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] mahaapurisalakkha.napa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, buddho brahmacaarii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa brahmacaarii''ti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, buddho brahmuno sisso''ti? ``atthi pana te, mahaaraaja, hatthipaamokkho''ti? ``atthi ^a^P0.0076^ea^, bhante''ti. ``ki.mnu kho, mahaaraaja, so hatthii kadaaci karahaci ko~ncanaada.m nadatiiti? ``aama, bhante, nadatii''ti ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, so hatthii ko~ncasaku.nassa sisso''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``ki.m pana, mahaaraaja, brahmaa sabuddhiko abuddhiko''ti? ``sabuddhiko, bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, brahmaa bhagavato sisso''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] bhagavato brahmacaaripa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, upasampadaa sundaraa''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, upasampadaa sundaraa''ti. ``atthi pana, bhante, buddhassa upasampadaa, udaahu natthii''ti? ``upasampanno kho, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0083^ea^, bhagavaa bodhirukkhamuule saha sabba~n~nuta~naa.nena, natthi bhagavato upasampadaa a~n~nehi dinnaa, yathaa saavakaana.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiya''nti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] bhagavato upasampadaapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0081^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo ca maatari mataaya rodati, yo ca dhammapemena rodati, ubhinna.m tesa.m rodantaana.m kassa assu bhesajja.m, kassa na bhesajja''nti? ``ekassa kho, mahaaraaja, assu raagadosamohehi samala.m u.nha.m, ekassa piitisomanassena vimala.m siitala.m. ya.m kho, mahaaraaja, siitala.m, ta.m bhesajja.m, ya.m u.nha.m, ta.m na bhesajja''nti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] assubhesajjaabhesajjapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.m naanaakara.na.m saraagassa ca viitaraagassa caa''ti? ``eko kho, mahaaraaja, ajjhosito, eko anajjhosito''ti. ``ki.m eta.m, bhante, ajjhosito anajjhosito naamaa''ti? ``eko kho, mahaaraaja, atthiko, eko anatthiko''ti. ``passaamaha.m, bhante, evaruupa.m yo ca saraago, yo ca viitaraago, sabbopeso sobhana.m yeva icchati khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa, na koci paapaka.m icchatii''ti. ``aviitaraago kho, mahaaraaja, rasapa.tisa.mvedii ca rasaraagapa.tisa.mvedii ca bhojana.m bhu~njati, viitaraago pana rasapa.tisa.mvedii ^a^P0.0077^ea^ bhojana.m bhu~njati, no ca kho rasaraagapa.tisa.mvedii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi ^a^V0.0084^ea^, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] saraagaviitaraaganaanaakara.napa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, pa~n~naa kuhi.m pa.tivasatii''ti? ``na katthaci mahaaraajaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, natthi pa~n~naa''ti. ``vaato, mahaaraaja, kuhi.m pa.tivasatii''ti? ``na katthaci bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, natthi vaato''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] pa~n~naapati.t.thaanapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0082^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, ya.m paneta.m bruusi `sa.msaaro'ti, katamo so sa.msaaro''ti? ``idha, mahaaraaja, jaato idheva marati, idha mato a~n~natra uppajjati, tahi.m jaato tahi.m yeva marati, tahi.m mato a~n~natra uppajjati, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sa.msaaro hotii''ti. ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso pakka.m amba.m khaaditvaa a.t.thi.m ropeyya, tato mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvaa phalaani dadeyya, atha so puriso tatopi pakka.m amba.m khaaditvaa a.t.thi.m ropeyya, tatopi mahanto ambarukkho nibbattitvaa phalaani dadeyya, evametesa.m rukkhaana.m ko.ti na pa~n~naayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, idha jaato idheva marati, idha mato a~n~natra uppajjati, tahi.m jaato tahi.m yeva marati, tahi.m mato a~n~natra uppajjati, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sa.msaaro hotii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] sa.msaarapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0085^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, kena atiita.m cirakata.m saratii''ti? ``satiyaa, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``nanu, bhante naagasena, cittena sarati no satiyaa''ti? ``abhijaanaasi nu, tva.m mahaaraaja, ki~ncideva kara.niiya.m katvaa pamu.t.tha''nti? ``aama bhante''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, tva.m mahaaraaja, tasmi.m samaye acittako ahosii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, sati tasmi.m samaye naahosii''ti. ``atha kasmaa, tva.m mahaaraaja, evamaaha `cittena sarati, no satiyaa'''ti?
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] cirakatasara.napa~nho dasamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0083^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, sabbaa sati abhijaanantii uppajjati ^a^P0.0078^ea^, udaahu ka.tumikaava satii''ti? ``abhijaanantiipi, mahaaraaja, ka.tumikaapi satii''ti. ``eva~nhi kho, bhante naagasena, sabbaa sati abhijaanantii, natthi ka.tumikaa satii''ti? ``yadi natthi, mahaaraaja, ka.tumikaa sati, natthi ki~nci sippikaana.m kammaayatanehi vaa sippaayatanehi vaa vijjaa.t.thaanehi vaa kara.niiya.m, niratthakaa aacariyaa, yasmaa ca kho, mahaaraaja, atthi ka.tumikaa sati, tasmaa atthi kammaayatanehi vaa sippaayatanehi vaa vijjaa.t.thaanehi vaa kara.niiya.m, attho ca aacariyehii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] abhijaanantasatipa~nho ekaadasamo.
[06] sativaggo cha.t.tho.
[06] imasmi.m vagge ekaadasa pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0086^ea^ ^a^M0.0084^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, katihaakaarehi sati uppajjatii''ti? ``sattarasahaakaarehi, mahaaraaja, sati uppajjatii''ti. ``katamehi sattarasahaakaarehii''ti? ``abhijaanatopi, mahaaraaja, sati uppajjati, ka.tumikaayapi sati uppajjati, o.laarikavi~n~naa.natopi sati uppajjati, hitavi~n~naa.natopi sati uppajjati, ahitavi~n~naa.natopi sati uppajjati, sabhaaganimittatopi sati uppajjati, visabhaaganimittatopi sati uppajjati, kathaabhi~n~naa.natopi sati uppajjati, lakkha.natopi sati uppajjati, saara.natopi sati uppajjati, muddaatopi sati uppajjati, ga.nanaatopi sati uppajjati, dhaara.natopi sati uppajjati, bhaavanatopi sati uppajjati, potthakanibandhanatopi sati uppajjati, upanikkhepatopi sati uppajjati, anubhuutatopi sati uppajjatiiti.

[03] ``katha.m abhijaanato sati uppajjati? yathaa, mahaaraaja, aayasmaa ca aanando khujjuttaraa ca upaasikaa, ye vaa pana a~n~nepi ^a^P0.0079^ea^ keci jaatissaraa jaati.m saranti, eva.m abhijaanato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m ka.tumikaaya sati uppajjati? yo pakatiyaa mu.t.thassatiko, pare ca ta.m saraapanattha.m nibandhanti, eva.m ka.tumikaaya sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m o.laarikavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati? yadaa rajje vaa abhisitto hoti, sotaapattiphala.m vaa patto hoti, eva.m o.laarikavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m ^a^V0.0087^ea^ hitavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati? yamhi sukhaapito, `amukasmi.m eva.m sukhaapito'ti sarati, eva.m hitavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m ahitavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati? yamhi dukkhaapito, `amukasmi.m eva.m dukkhaapito'ti sarati, eva.m ahitavi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati.

[03] ``katha.m sabhaaganimittato sati uppajjati? sadisa.m puggala.m disvaa maatara.m vaa pitara.m vaa bhaatara.m vaa bhagini.m vaa sarati, o.t.tha.m vaa go.na.m vaa gadrabha.m vaa disvaa a~n~na.m taadisa.m o.t.tha.m vaa go.na.m vaa gadrabha.m vaa sarati, eva.m sabhaaganimittato sati uppajjati.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^M0.0085^ea^ visabhaaganimattato sati uppajjati? asukassa naama va.n.no ediso, saddo ediso, gandho ediso, raso ediso, pho.t.thabbo edisoti sarati, evampi visabhaaganimittatopi .msati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m kathaabhi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati? yo pakatiyaa mu.t.thassatiko hoti, ta.m pare saraapenti, tena so sarati, eva.m kathaabhi~n~naa.nato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m lakkha.nato sati uppajjati? yo pakatiyaa baliibaddaana.m a"ngena jaanaati, lakkha.nena jaanaati, eva.m lakkha.nato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m saara.nato sati uppajjati? yo pakatiyaa mu.t.thassatiko hoti, yo ta.m `saraahi bho, saraahi bho'ti punappuna.m saraapeti, eva.m saara.nato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m muddaato sati uppajjati? lipiyaa sikkhitattaa jaanaati `imassa akkharassa anantara.m ima.m akkhara.m kaatabba'nti eva.m muddaato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m ga.nanaato sati uppajjati? ga.nanaaya sikkhitattaa ga.nakaa bahumpi ga.nenti, eva.m ga.nanaato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m ^a^V0.0088^ea^ dhaara.nato sati uppajjati? dhaara.naaya sikkhitattaa dhaara.nakaa bahumpi dhaarenti ^a^P0.0080^ea^, eva.m dhaara.nato sati uppajjati.

[03] ``katha.m bhaavanaato sati uppajjati? idha bhikkhu anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathiida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, eva.m bhaavanaato sati uppajjati.

[03] ``katha.m potthakanibandhanato sati uppajjati? raajaano anusaasaniya.m assarantaa {anussarantaa (sabbattha)} eta.m potthaka.m aaharathaati, tena potthakena anussaranti, eva.m potthakanibandhanato sati uppajjati.
[03] ``katha.m upanikkhepato sati uppajjati? upanikkhitta.m bha.n.da.m disvaa sarati, eva.m upanikkhepato sati uppajjati.

[03] ``katha.m anubhuutato sati uppajjati? di.t.thattaa ruupa.m sarati, sutattaa sadda.m sarati, ghaayitattaa gandha.m sarati, saayitattaa rasa.m sarati, phu.t.thattaa pho.t.thabba.m ^a^M0.0086^ea^ sarati, vi~n~naatattaa dhamma.m sarati, eva.m anubhuutato sati uppajjati. imehi kho, mahaaraaja, sattarasahaakaarehi sati uppajjatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] satiuppajjanapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, tumhe eta.m bha.natha `yo vassasata.m akusala.m kareyya, mara.nakaale ca eka.m buddhagu.na.m sati.m pa.tilabheyya, so devesu uppajjeyyaa'ti eta.m na saddahaami, eva~nca pana vadetha `etena paa.naatipaatena niraye uppajjeyyaa'ti etampi na saddahaamii''ti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, khuddakopi paasaa.no vinaa naavaaya udake uppilaveyyaa''ti ^a^V0.0089^ea^. ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, vaahasatampi paasaa.naana.m naavaaya aaropita.m udake uppilaveyyaa''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, naavaa, eva.m kusalaani kammaani da.t.thabbaanii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] buddhagu.nasatipa.tilaabhapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, ki.m tumhe atiitassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya vaayamathaa''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, anaagatassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya vaayamathaa''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana paccuppannassa dukkhassa ^a^P0.0081^ea^ pahaanaaya vaayamathaa''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``yadi tumhe na atiitassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya vaayamatha, na anaagatassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya vaayamatha, na paccuppannassa dukkhassa pahaanaaya vaayamatha, atha kimatthaaya vaayamathaa''ti. thero aaha `kinti, mahaaraaja, ida~nca dukkha.m nirujjheyya, a~n~na~nca dukkha.m nuppajjeyyaa'ti etadatthaaya vaayamaamaa''ti.

[03] ``atthi ^a^M0.0087^ea^ pana te, bhante naagasena, anaagata.m dukkha''nti? ``natthi {kathaa0 828, 829 passitabba.m}, mahaaraajaa''ti ``tumhe kho, bhante naagasena, atipa.n.ditaa, ye tumhe asantaana.m anaagataana.m dukkhaana.m pahaanaaya vaayamathaa''ti? ``atthi pana te, mahaaraaja, keci pa.tiraajaano paccatthikaa paccaamittaa paccupa.t.thitaa hontii''ti? ``aama, bhante, atthii''ti. ``ki.mnu kho, mahaaraaja, tadaa tumhe parikha.m kha.naapeyyaatha, paakaara.m cinaapeyyaatha gopura.m kaaraapeyyaatha, a.t.taalaka.m kaaraapeyyaatha, dha~n~na.m atiharaapeyyaathaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, pa.tikacceva ta.m pa.tiyatta.m hotii''ti. ``ki.m tumhe, mahaaraaja, tadaa hatthismi.m sikkheyyaatha, assasmi.m sikkheyyaatha, rathasmi.m sikkheyyaatha, dhanusmi.m sikkheyyaatha, tharusmi.m sikkheyyaathaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, pa.tikacceva ta.m sikkhita.m hotii''ti. ``kissatthaayaa''ti? ``anaagataana.m, bhante, bhayaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaayaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, atthi anaagata.m bhaya''nti? ``natthi, bhante''ti ^a^V0.0090^ea^. ``tumhe ca kho, mahaaraaja, atipa.n.ditaa, ye tumhe asantaana.m anaagataana.m bhayaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaaya pa.tiyaadethaa''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohiiti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yadaa tva.m pipaasito bhaveyyaasi, tadaa tva.m udapaana.m kha.naapeyyaasi, pokkhara.ni.m kha.naapeyyaasi, ta.laaka.m kha.naapeyyaasi `paaniiya.m pivissaamii'''ti? ``na hi, bhante, pa.tikacceva ta.m pa.tiyatta.m hotii''ti. ``kissatthaayaa''ti? ``anaagataana.m, bhante, pipaasaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaaya pa.tiyatta.m hotii''ti. ``atthi pana, mahaaraaja, anaagataa pipaasaa''ti? ``natthi, bhante''ti. ``tumhe kho, mahaaraaja, atipa.n.ditaa ^a^P0.0082^ea^, ye tumhe asantaana.m anaagataana.m pipaasaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaaya ta.m pa.tiyaadethaa''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, yadaa tva.m bubhukkhito bhaveyyaasi, tadaa tva.m khetta.m kasaapeyyaasi, saali.m vapaapeyyaasi `bhatta.m bhu~njissaamii'''ti? ``na hi, bhante, pa.tikacceva ta.m pa.tiyatta.m hotii''ti. ``kissatthaayaa''ti. ``anaagataana.m, bhante, bubhukkhaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaayaa''ti. ``atthi pana, mahaaraaja, anaagataa bubhukkhaa''ti? ``natthi, bhante''ti. ``tumhe ^a^M0.0088^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, atipa.n.ditaa, ye tumhe asantaana.m anaagataana.m bubhukkhaana.m pa.tibaahanatthaaya pa.tiyaadethaa''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] dukkhappahaanavaayamapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, kiivaduuro ito brahmaloko''ti? ``duuro kho, mahaaraaja, ito brahmaloko kuu.taagaaramattaa silaa tamhaa patitaa ahorattena a.t.thacattaaliisayojanasahassaani bhassamaanaa catuuhi maasehi pathaviya.m pati.t.thaheyyaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, tumhe eva.m bha.natha `seyyathaapi balavaa puriso sami~njita.m vaa baaha.m pasaareyya ^a^V0.0091^ea^, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva iddhimaa bhikkhu cetovasippatto jambudiipe antarahito brahmaloke paatubhaveyyaa'ti eta.m vacana.m na saddahaami, eva.m atisiigha.m taava bahuuni yojanasataani gacchissatii''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``kuhi.m pana, mahaaraaja, tava jaatabhuumii''ti? ``atthi, bhante, alasando naama diipo, tatthaaha.m jaato''ti. ``kiiva duuro, mahaaraaja, ito alasando hotii''ti? ``dvimattaani, bhante, yojanasataanii''ti. ``abhijaanaasi nu tva.m, mahaaraaja, tattha ki~ncideva kara.niiya.m karitvaa saritaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, saraamii''ti. ``lahu.m kho tva.m, mahaaraaja, gatosi dvimattaani yojanasataanii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] brahmalokapa~nho catuttho.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo idha kaala"nkato brahmaloke uppajjeyya, yo ca idha kaala"nkato kasmiire uppajjeyya, ko ciratara.m ko siighatara''nti? ``samaka.m, mahaaraajaa''ti.

[03] ``opamma.m ^a^M0.0089^ea^ karohii''ti. ``kuhi.m pana, mahaaraaja, tava ^a^P0.0083^ea^ jaatanagara''nti? ``atthi, bhante, kalasigaamo naama, tatthaaha.m jaato''ti. ``kiiva duuro, mahaaraaja, ito kalasigaamo hotii''ti. ``dvimattaani, bhante, yojanasataanii''ti. ``kiiva duura.m, mahaaraaja, ito kasmiira.m hotii''ti? ``dvaadasa, bhante, yojanaanii''ti. ``i"ngha, tva.m mahaaraaja, kalasigaama.m cintehii''ti. ``cintito, bhante''ti. ``i"ngha, tva.m mahaaraaja, kasmiira.m cintehii''ti. ``cintita.m bhante''ti. ``katama.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, cirena cintita.m, katama.m siighatara''nti? ``samaka.m bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo idha kaala"nkato brahmaloke uppajjeyya, yo ca idha kaala"nkato kasmiire uppajjeyya, samaka.m yeva uppajjantii''ti.

[03] ``bhiyyo opamma.m karohii''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, dve saku.naa aakaasena gaccheyyu.m ^a^V0.0092^ea^, tesu eko ucce rukkhe nisiideyya, eko niice rukkhe nisiideyya, tesa.m samaka.m pati.t.thitaana.m katamassa chaayaa pa.thamatara.m pathaviya.m pati.t.thaheyya, katamassa chaayaa cirena pathaviya.m pati.t.thaheyyaa''ti? ``samaka.m, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo idha kaala"nkato brahmaloke uppajjeyya, yo ca idha kaala"nkato kasmiire uppajjeyya, samaka.m yeva uppajjantii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] dvinna.m lokuppannaana.m samakabhaavapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``kati nu kho, bhante naagasena, bojjha"ngaa''ti? ``satta kho, mahaaraaja, bojjha"ngaa''ti. ``katihi pana, bhante, bojjha"ngehi bujjhatii''ti? ``ekena kho, mahaaraaja, bojjha"ngena bujjhati dhammavicayasambojjha"ngenaa''ti. ``atha kissa nu kho, bhante, vuccanti `satta bojjha"ngaa'''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, asi kosiyaa pakkhitto aggahito hatthena ussahati chejja.m chinditu''nti. ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngena vinaa chahi bojjha"ngehi na bujjhatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] bojjha"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0090^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, katara.m nu kho bahutara.m pu~n~na.m vaa apu~n~na.m vaa''ti? ``pu~n~na.m kho, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0084^ea^, bahutara.m, apu~n~na.m thoka''nti. ``kena kaara.nenaa''ti? ``apu~n~na.m kho, mahaaraaja, karonto vippa.tisaarii hoti `paapakamma.m mayaa kata'nti, tena paapa.m na ^a^V0.0093^ea^ va.d.dhati. pu~n~na.m kho, mahaaraaja, karonto avippa.tisaarii hoti, avippa.tisaarino paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati, samaahito yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, tena kaara.nena pu~n~na.m va.d.dhati. puriso kho, mahaaraaja, chinnahatthapaado bhagavato eka.m uppalahattha.m datvaa ekanavutikappaani vinipaata.m na gacchissati. iminaapi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena bha.naami `pu~n~na.m bahutara.m, apu~n~na.m thoka'''nti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] paapapu~n~naana.m appaanappabhaavapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, yo jaananto paapakamma.m karoti, yo ajaananto paapakamma.m karoti, kassa bahutara.m apu~n~na''nti? thero aaha ``yo kho, mahaaraaja, ajaananto paapakamma.m karoti, tassa bahutara.m apu~n~na''nti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, yo amhaaka.m raajaputto vaa raajamahaamatto vaa ajaananto paapakamma.m karoti, ta.m maya.m digu.na.m da.n.demaa''ti? ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, tatta.m ayogu.la.m aaditta.m sampajjalita.m sajotibhuuta.m eko jaananto ga.nheyya, eko ajaananto ga.nheyya, katamo {kassa (ka0)} balavatara.m .dayheyyaa''ti. ``yo kho, bhante, ajaananto ga.nheyya, so {tassa (pii0 ka0)} balavatara.m .dayheyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo ajaananto paapakamma.m karoti, tassa bahutara.m apu~n~na''nti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] jaanantaajaanantapaapakara.napa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0094^ea^ ^a^M0.0091^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, atthi koci, yo iminaa sariirena uttarakuru.m vaa gaccheyya, brahmaloka.m vaa, a~n~na.m vaa pana diipa''nti? ``atthi, mahaaraaja, yo iminaa caatummahaabhuutikena kaayena uttarakuru.m vaa gaccheyya, brahmaloka.m vaa, a~n~na.m vaa pana diipa''nti.

[03] ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, iminaa caatummahaabhuutikena kaayena uttarakuru.m vaa gaccheyya, brahmaloka.m vaa, a~n~na.m vaa pana ^a^P0.0085^ea^ diipa''nti? ``abhijaanaasi nu, tva.m mahaaraaja, imissaa pathaviyaa vidatthi.m vaa ratana.m vaa la"nghitaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, abhijaanaami `aha.m, bhante naagasena, a.t.thapi rataniyo la"nghemii'''ti. ``katha.m, tva.m mahaaraaja, a.t.thapi rataniyo la"nghesii''ti? ``aha~nhi, bhante, citta.m uppaademi `ettha nipatissaamii'ti saha cittuppaadena kaayo me lahuko hotii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, iddhimaa bhikkhu cetovasippatto kaaya.m citte samaaropetvaa cittavasena vehaasa.m gacchatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] uttarakurukaadigamanapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, tumhe eva.m bha.natha `a.t.thikaani diighaani yojanasatikaanipii'ti, rukkhopi taava natthi yojanasatiko, kuto pana a.t.thikaani diighaani yojanasatikaani bhavissantii''ti?

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, suta.m te `mahaasamudde pa~ncayojanasatikaapi macchaa atthii'''ti? ``aama, bhante, suta''nti. ``nanu mahaaraaja, pa~ncayojanasatikassa macchassa a.t.thikaani diighaani bhavissanti yojanasatikaanipii''ti?
[03] ``kallosi ^a^V0.0095^ea^, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] diigha.t.thipa~nho dasamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0092^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, tumhe eva.m bha.natha `sakkaa assaasapassaase nirodhetu'''nti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, sakkaa assaasapassaase nirodhetu''nti. ``katha.m, bhante naagasena, sakkaa assaasapassaase nirodhetu''nti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, sutapubbo te koci kaakacchamaano''ti. ``aama, bhante, sutapubbo''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, so saddo kaaye namite virameyyaa''ti. ``aama, bhante, virameyyaa''ti. ``so hi naama, mahaaraaja, saddo abhaavitakaayassa abhaavitasiilassa abhaavitacittassa abhaavitapa~n~nassa kaaye namite viramissati, ki.m pana bhaavitakaayassa bhaavitasiilassa bhaavitacittassa bhaavitapa~n~nassa catutthajjhaana.m samaapannassa assaasapassaasaa na nirujjhissantii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] assaasapassaasanirodhapa~nho ekaadasamo.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, `samuddo samuddo'ti vuccati, kena kaara.nena udaka.m `samuddo'ti vuccatii''ti? thero ^a^P0.0086^ea^ aaha ``yattaka.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m, tattaka.m lo.na.m. yattaka.m lo.na.m, tattaka.m udaka.m. tasmaa `samuddo'ti vuccatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] samuddapa~nho dvaadasamo.
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^V0.0096^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, kena kaara.nena samuddo ekaraso lo.naraso''ti? ``cirasa.n.thitattaa kho, mahaaraaja, udakassa samuddo ekaraso lo.naraso''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] samuddaekarasapa~nho terasamo.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0093^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, sakkaa sabba.m sukhuma.m chinditu''nti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, sakkaa sabba.m sukhuma.m chinditu''nti. ``ki.m pana, bhante, sabba.m sukhuma''nti? ``dhammo kho, mahaaraaja, sabbasukhumo, na kho, mahaaraaja, dhammaa sabbe sukhumaa, `sukhuma'nti vaa `thuula'nti vaa dhammaanametamadhivacana.m. ya.m ki~nci chinditabba.m, sabba.m ta.m pa~n~naaya chindati, natthi dutiya.m pa~n~naaya chedana''nti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] sukhumapa~nho cuddasamo.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, `vi~n~naa.na'nti vaa `pa~n~naa'ti vaa `bhuutasmi.m jiivo'ti vaa ime dhammaa naanatthaa ceva naanaabya~njanaa ca, udaahu ekatthaa bya~njanameva naana''nti ^a^V0.0097^ea^? ``vijaananalakkha.na.m, mahaaraaja, vi~n~naa.na.m, pajaananalakkha.naa pa~n~naa, bhuutasmi.m jiivo nupalabbhatii''ti. ``yadi jiivo nupalabbhati, atha ko carahi cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, sotena sadda.m su.naati, ghaanena gandha.m ghaayati, jivhaaya rasa.m saayati, kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusati, manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaatii''ti? thero aaha ``yadi jiivo cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vijaanaati, so jiivo cakkhudvaaresu uppaa.titesu mahantena aakaasena bahimukho su.t.thutara.m ruupa.m passeyya, sotesu uppaa.titesu, ghaane uppaa.tite, jivhaaya uppaa.titaaya, kaaye uppaa.tite mahantena aakaasena su.t.thutara.m sadda.m su.neyya, gandha.m ghaayeyya, rasa.m saayeyya, pho.t.thabba.m phuseyyaa''ti? ``na hi ^a^P0.0087^ea^, bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, bhuutasmi.m jiivo nupalabbhatii''ti.
[03] ``kallosi, bhante naagasenaa''ti.
[06] vi~n~naa.nanaanatthapa~nho pannarasamo.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ raajaa ^a^M0.0094^ea^ aaha ``bhante naagasena, dukkara.m nu kho bhagavataa kata''nti? thero aaha ``dukkara.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa kata''nti. ``ki.m pana, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa dukkara.m kata''nti. ``dukkara.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa kata.m imesa.m aruupiina.m cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m ekaaramma.ne vattamaanaana.m vavatthaana.m akkhaata.m `aya.m phasso, aya.m vedanaa, aya.m sa~n~naa, aya.m cetanaa, ida.m citta'''nti.

[03] ``opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso naavaaya mahaasamudda.m ajjhogaahetvaa hatthapu.tena udaka.m gahetvaa jivhaaya saayitvaa jaaneyya nu kho, mahaaraaja, so puriso ``ida.m ga"ngaaya udaka.m, ida.m yamunaaya udaka.m, ida.m aciravatiyaa udaka.m, ida.m sarabhuyaa udaka.m, ida.m mahiyaa udaka'''nti? ``dukkara.m, bhante, jaanitu''nti. ``ito dukkaratara.m kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa kata.m imesa.m aruupiina.m cittacetasikaana.m dhammaana.m ekaaramma.ne vattamaanaana.m vavatthaana.m ^a^V0.0098^ea^ akkhaata.m `aya.m phasso, aya.m vedanaa, aya.m sa~n~naa, aya.m cetanaa, ida.m citta'''nti. ``su.t.thu, bhante''ti raajaa abbhaanumodiiti.
[06] aruupadhammavavatthaanadukkarapa~nho so.lasamo.
[06] aruupadhammavavatthaanavaggo sattamo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge so.lasa pa~nhaa.

[03] thero ^a^V0.0099^ea^ ^a^M0.0095^ea^ aaha ``jaanaasi kho, mahaaraaja, sampati kaa velaa''ti? ``aama, bhante, jaanaami `sampati pa.thamo yaamo atikkanto, majjhimo yaamo pavattati, ukkaa padiipiiyanti, cattaari pa.taakaani aa.nattaani gamissanti bha.n.dato raajadeyyaanii'''ti.

[03] yonakaa evamaaha.msu ``kallosi, mahaaraaja, pa.n.dito thero''ti. ``aama, bha.ne, pa.n.dito thero, ediso aacariyo bhaveyya maadiso ca ^a^P0.0088^ea^ antevaasii, nacirasseva pa.n.dito dhamma.m aajaaneyyaa''ti. tassa pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena tu.t.tho raajaa thera.m naagasena.m satasahassagghanakena kambalena acchaadetvaa ``bhante naagasena, ajjatagge te a.t.thasata.m bhatta.m pa~n~napemi, ya.m ki~nci antepure kappiya.m, tena ca pavaaremii''ti aaha. ala.m mahaaraaja jiivaamii''ti. ``jaanaami, bhante naagasena, jiivasi, api ca attaana~nca rakkha, mama~nca rakkhaahii''ti. ``katha.m attaana.m rakkhasi, `naagaseno milinda.m raajaana.m pasaadeti, na ca ki~nci alabhii'ti paraapavaado {parappavaado (ka0)} aagaccheyyaati, eva.m attaana.m rakkha. katha.m mama.m rakkhasi, `milindo raajaa pasanno pasannaakaara.m na karotii'ti paraapavaado aagaccheyyaati, eva.m mama.m rakkhaahii''ti. ``tathaa hotu, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``seyyathaapi, bhante, siiho migaraajaa suva.n.napa~njare pakkhittopi bahimukho yeva hoti, evameva kho aha.m, bhante, ki~ncaapi agaara.m ajjhaavasaami bahimukho yeva pana acchaami. sace aha.m, bhante, agaarasmaa anaagaariya.m pabbajeyya.m, na cira.m jiiveyya.m, bahuu me paccatthikaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno milindassa ra~n~no pa~nha.m visajjetvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa sa"nghaaraama.m agamaasi. acirapakkante ca aayasmante naagasene milindassa ra~n~no etadahosi ``ki.m mayaa pucchita.m, ki.m bhadantena naagasenena visajjita''nti? atha kho milindassa ra~n~no etadahosi ``sabba.m mayaa supucchita.m, sabba.m bhadantena naagasenena suvisajjita''nti. aayasmatopi naagasenassa sa"nghaaraamagatassa etadahosi ``ki.m milindena ^a^M0.0096^ea^ ra~n~naa pucchita.m, ki.m mayaa ^a^V0.0100^ea^ visajjita''nti. atha kho aayasmato naagasenassa etadahosi ``sabba.m milindena ra~n~naa supucchita.m, sabba.m mayaa suvisajjita''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa naagaseno tassaa rattiyaa accayena pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena milindassa ra~n~no nivesana.m tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. atha kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^P0.0089^ea^ nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca --

[03] ``maa kho bhadantassa eva.m ahosi `naagaseno mayaa pa~nha.m pucchito'ti teneva somanassena ta.m rattaavasesa.m viitinaamesiiti na te eva.m da.t.thabba.m. tassa mayha.m, bhante, ta.m rattaavasesa.m etadahosi `ki.m mayaa pucchita.m, ki.m bhadantena visajjita'nti, `sabba.m mayaa supucchita.m, sabba.m bhadantena suvisajjita'''nti.

[03] theropi evamaaha -- ``maa kho mahaaraajassa eva.m ahosi `milindassa ra~n~no mayaa pa~nho visajjito'ti teneva somanassena ta.m rattaavasesa.m viitinaamesiiti na te eva.m da.t.thabba.m. tassa mayha.m, mahaaraaja, ta.m rattaavasesa.m etadahosi `ki.m milindena ra~n~naa pucchita.m, ki.m mayaa visajjita'nti, `sabba.m milindena ra~n~naa supucchita.m, sabba.m mayaa suvisajjita'''nti itiha te mahaanaagaa a~n~nama~n~nassa subhaasita.m samanumodi.msuuti.
[06] milindapa~nhapucchaavisajjanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[22] milindo ~naa.nabhedaaya, naagasenamupaagami..
[21] vasanto tassa chaayaaya, paripuccha.m punappuna.m.

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa pabhaataaya rattiyaa uddhaste {u.t.thite (syaa0), uggate (sii0 pii0)} aru.ne siisa.m nhatvaa sirasi a~njali.m paggahetvaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne sammaasambuddhe anussaritvaa a.t.tha vattapadaani samaadiyi ``ito me anaagataani satta divasaani a.t.tha gu.ne samaadiyitvaa tapo caritabbo bhavissati ^a^V0.0102^ea^, soha.m ci.n.natapo samaano aacariya.m aaraadhetvaa me.n.dake pa~nhe pucchissaamii''ti. atha kho milindo raajaa pakatidussayuga.m apanetvaa aabhara.naani ca omu~ncitvaa kaasaava.m nivaasetvaa mu.n.dakapa.tisiisaka.m siise pa.timu~ncitvaa munibhaavamupagantvaa a.t.tha gu.ne samaadiyi ``ima.m sattaaha.m mayaa na raajattho anusaasitabbo, na raaguupasa~nhita.m citta.m uppaadetabba.m, na dosuupasa~nhita.m citta.m uppaadetabba.m, na mohuupasa~nhita.m citta.m uppaadetabba.m, daasakammakaraporise janepi nivaatavuttinaa bhavitabba.m, kaayika.m ^a^P0.0091^ea^ vaacasika.m ^a^M0.0098^ea^ anurakkhitabba.m, chapi aayatanaani niravasesato anurakkhitabbaani, mettaabhaavanaaya maanasa.m pakkhipitabba''nti. ime a.t.tha gu.ne samaadiyitvaa tesveva a.t.thasu gu.nesu maanasa.m pati.t.thapetvaa bahi anikkhamitvaa sattaaha.m viitinaametvaa a.t.thame divase pabhaataaya rattiyaa pageva paataraasa.m katvaa okkhittacakkhu mitabhaa.nii susa.n.thitena iriyaapathena avikkhittena cittena ha.t.thena udaggena vippasannena thera.m naagasena.m upasa"nkamitvaa therassa paade sirasaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m .thito idamavoca --

[03] ``atthi me, bhante naagasena, koci attho tumhehi saddhi.m mantayitabbo, na tattha a~n~no koci tatiyo icchitabbo, su~n~ne okaase pavivitte ara~n~ne a.t.tha"ngupaagate sama.nasaaruppe. tattha so pa~nho pucchitabbo bhavissati, tattha me guyha.m na kaatabba.m na rahassaka.m, arahaamaha.m rahassaka.m su.nitu.m sumantane upagate, upamaayapi so attho upaparikkhitabbo, yathaa ki.m viya, yathaa naama, bhante naagasena, mahaapathavii nikkhepa.m arahati nikkhepe upagate. evameva kho, bhante naagasena, arahaamaha.m rahassaka.m su.nitu.m sumantane upagate''ti. garunaa saha pavivittapavana.m pavisitvaa idamavoca -- ``bhante naagasena, idha purisena mantayitukaamena a.t.tha .thaanaani parivajjayitabbaani bhavanti, na tesu .thaanesu vi~n~nuu puriso attha.m manteti, mantitopi attho paripatati na sambhavati. katamaani a.t.tha .thaanaani? visama.t.thaana.m parivajjaniiya.m, sabhaya.m parivajjaniiya.m, ativaata.t.thaana.m parivajjaniiya.m, pa.ticchanna.t.thaana.m parivajjaniiya.m, deva.t.thaana.m parivajjaniiya.m, pantho parivajjaniiyo, sa"ngaamo {sa"nkamo (sii0 pii0)} parivajjaniiyo, udakatittha.m parivajjaniiya.m. imaani a.t.tha .thaanaani parivajjaniiyaanii''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``ko doso visama.t.thaane, sabhaye, ativaate, pa.ticchanne, deva.t.thaane, panthe, sa"ngaame, udakatitthe''ti? ``visame, bhante ^a^P0.0092^ea^ naagasena, mantito attho vikirati vidhamati paggharati na sambhavati, sabhaye mano santassati, santassito na sammaa attha.m samanupassati, ativaate saddo avibhuuto hoti, pa.ticchanne upassuti.m ti.t.thanti, deva.t.thaane ^a^M0.0099^ea^ mantito attho garuka.m ^a^V0.0103^ea^ pari.namati, panthe mantito attho tuccho bhavati, sa"ngaame ca~ncalo bhavati, udakatitthe paaka.to bhavati. bhavatiiha --
[21] ```visama.m sabhaya.m ativaato, pa.ticchanna.m devanissita.m.
[22] pantho ca sa"ngaamo tittha.m, a.t.thete parivajjiyaa'''ti..
[06] a.t.tha mantanassa parivajjaniiya.t.thaanaani.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, a.t.thime puggalaa mantiyamaanaa mantita.m attha.m byaapaadenti. katame a.t.tha? raagacarito dosacarito mohacarito maanacarito luddho alaso ekacintii baaloti. ime a.t.tha puggalaa mantita.m attha.m byaapaadentii''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``tesa.m ko doso''ti? ``raagacarito, bhante naagasena, raagavasena mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, dosacarito dosavasena mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, mohacarito mohavasena mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, maanacarito maanavasena mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, luddho lobhavasena mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, alaso alasataaya mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, ekacintii ekacintitaaya mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti, baalo baalataaya mantita.m attha.m byaapaadeti. bhavatiiha --
[21] ```ratto du.t.tho ca muu.lho ca, maanii luddho tathaalaso.
[22] ekacintii ca baalo ca, ete atthavinaasakaa'''ti..
[06] a.t.tha mantavinaasakapuggalaa.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, navime puggalaa mantita.m guyha.m vivaranti na dhaarenti. katame nava? raagacarito ^a^V0.0104^ea^ dosacarito mohacarito bhiiruko aamisagaruko itthii so.n.do pa.n.dako daarako''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``tesa.m ko doso''ti? ``raagacarito, bhante naagasena, raagavasena mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, dosacarito, bhante ^a^M0.0100^ea^, dosavasena mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, muu.lho mohavasena mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na ^a^P0.0093^ea^ dhaareti, bhiiruko bhayavasena mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, aamisagaruko aamisahetu mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, itthii pa~n~naaya ittarataaya mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, so.n.diko suraalolataaya mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, pa.n.dako aneka.msikataaya mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti, daarako capalataaya mantita.m guyha.m vivarati na dhaareti. bhavatiiha --
[21] ```ratto du.t.tho ca muu.lho ca, bhiiru aamisagaruko {aamisacakkhuko (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] itthii so.n.do pa.n.dako ca, navamo bhavati daarako..
[21] ``navete puggalaa loke, ittaraa calitaa calaa.
[22] etehi mantita.m guyha.m, khippa.m bhavati paaka.ta'''nti..
[06] nava guyhamantavidha.msakaa puggalaa.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, a.t.thahi kaara.nehi buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati. katamehi a.t.thahi? vayapari.naamena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, yasapari.naamena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, paripucchaaya buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, titthasa.mvaasena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, yoniso manasikaarena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, saakacchaaya buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, snehuupasevanena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati, patiruupadesavaasena buddhi pari.namati paripaaka.m gacchati. bhavatiiha --
[21] ```vayena ^a^V0.0105^ea^ yasapucchaahi, titthavaasena yoniso.
[22] saakacchaa snehasa.msevaa, patiruupavasena ca..
[21] ``etaani a.t.tha .thaanaani, buddhivisadakaara.naa.
[22] yesa.m etaani sambhonti, tesa.m buddhi pabhijjatii'''ti..
[06] a.t.tha pa~n~naapa.tilaabhakaara.naani.

[03] ``bhante ^a^M0.0101^ea^ naagasena, aya.m bhuumibhaago a.t.tha mantadosavivajjito, aha~nca loke paramo mantisahaayo {mantasahaayo (sii0)}, guyhamanurakkhii caaha.m yaavaaha.m jiivissaami taava guyhamanurakkhissaami, a.t.thahi ca me kaara.nehi buddhi pari.naama.m gataa, dullabho etarahi maadiso antevaasii, sammaa ^a^P0.0094^ea^ pa.tipanne antevaasike ye aacariyaana.m pa~ncaviisati aacariyagu.naa, tehi gu.nehi aacariyena sammaa pa.tipajjitabba.m. katame pa~ncaviisati gu.naa?

[03] ``idha, bhante naagasena, aacariyena antevaasimhi satata.m samita.m aarakkhaa upa.t.thapetabbaa, asevanasevanaa jaanitabbaa, pamattaappamattaa jaanitabbaa, seyyavakaaso jaanitabbo, gela~n~na.m jaanitabba.m, bhojanassa {bhojaniiya.m (syaa0)} laddhaaladdha.m jaanitabba.m, viseso jaanitabbo, pattagata.m sa.mvibhajitabba.m, assaasitabbo `maa bhaayi, attho te abhikkamatii'ti, `iminaa puggalena pa.ticaratii'ti {pa.ticaraahiiti (ka0)} pa.ticaaro jaanitabbo, gaame pa.ticaaro jaanitabbo, vihaare pa.ticaaro jaanitabbo, na tena haaso davo kaatabbo {na tena saha sallaapo kaatabbo (sii0 pii0)}, tena saha aalaapo kaatabbo, chidda.m disvaa adhivaasetabba.m, sakkaccakaarinaa bhavitabba.m, akha.n.dakaarinaa bhavitabba.m, arahassakaarinaa bhavitabba.m, niravasesakaarinaa bhavitabba.m, `janemima.m {jaanemima.m (syaa0)} sippesuu'ti janakacitta.m upa.t.thapetabba.m, `katha.m aya.m na parihaayeyyaa'ti va.d.dhicitta.m upa.t.thapetabba.m, `balava.m ima.m karomi sikkhaabalenaa'ti citta.m upa.t.thapetabba.m, mettacitta.m upa.t.thapetabba.m, aapadaasu na vijahitabba.m, kara.niiye nappamajjitabba.m, khalite dhammena paggahetabboti. ime kho, bhante, pa~ncaviisati aacariyassa aacariyagu.naa, tehi gu.nehi mayi sammaa pa.tipajjassu, sa.msayo me, bhante, uppanno, atthi me.n.dakapa~nhaa jinabhaasitaa ^a^V0.0106^ea^, anaagate addhaane tattha viggaho uppajjissati, anaagate ca addhaane dullabhaa bhavissanti tumhaadisaa buddhimanto, tesu me pa~nhesu cakkhu.m dehi paravaadaana.m niggahaayaa''ti.

[03] thero ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa dasa upaasakassa upaasakagu.ne paridiipesi. ``dasa ime, mahaaraaja, upaasakassa upaasakagu.naa. katame dasa ^a^M0.0102^ea^, idha, mahaaraaja, upaasako sa"nghena samaanasukhadukkho hoti, dhammaadhipateyyo hoti, yathaabala.m sa.mvibhaagarato hoti, jinasaasanaparihaani.m disvaa abhiva.d.dhiyaa vaayamati. sammaadi.t.thiko hoti, apagatakotuuhalama"ngaliko jiivitahetupi na a~n~na.m satthaara.m uddisati, kaayikavaacasika~ncassa rakkhita.m hoti, samaggaaraamo hoti samaggarato, anusuuyako hoti, na ca kuhanavasena ^a^P0.0095^ea^ saasane carati, buddha.m sara.na.m gato hoti, dhamma.m sara.na.m gato hoti, sa"ngha.m sara.na.m gato hoti. ime kho, mahaaraaja, dasa upaasakassa upaasakagu.naa, te sabbe gu.naa tayi sa.mvijjanti, ta.m te yutta.m patta.m anucchavika.m patiruupa.m ya.m tva.m jinasaasanaparihaani.m disvaa abhiva.d.dhi.m icchasi, karomi te okaasa.m, puccha ma.m tva.m yathaasukha''nti.
[06] me.n.dakapa~nhaarambhakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0107^ea^ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ kho milindo raajaa kataavakaaso nipacca garuno paade sirasi a~njali.m katvaa etadavoca ``bhante naagasena, ime titthiyaa eva.m bha.nanti {va~nco bhavati aphalo (sii0 pii0 ka0)} `yadi buddho puuja.m saadiyati, na parinibbuto buddho sa.myutto lokena antobhaviko lokasmi.m lokasaadhaara.no, tasmaa tassa kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphalo. yadi parinibbuto visa.myutto lokena nissa.to sabbabhavehi, tassa puujaa nuppajjati, parinibbuto na ki~nci saadiyati, asaadiyantassa kato adhikaaro va~njho bhavati aphalo'ti ubhato ko.tiko eso pa~nho, neso visayo appattamaanasaana.m, mahantaana.m yeveso visayo, bhindeta.m di.t.thijaala.m eka.mse .thapaya, taveso pa~nho anuppatto, anaagataana.m jinaputtaana.m cakkhu.m dehi paravaadaniggahaayaa''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``parinibbuto, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa, na ca bhagavaa puuja.m saadiyati, bodhimuule yeva tathaagatassa saadiyanaa pahiinaa, ki.m pana anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbutassa. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```puujiyantaa {puujitaa (syaa0)} asamasamaa, sadevamaanusehi te.
[22] na saadiyanti sakkaara.m, buddhaana.m esa dhammataa'''ti..

[03] raajaa aaha ``bhante naagasena, putto vaa pituno va.n.na.m bhaasati, pitaa vaa puttassa va.n.na.m ^a^V0.0108^ea^ bhaasati, na ceta.m kaara.na.m paravaadaana.m niggahaaya, pasaadappakaasana.m naameta.m, i"ngha me tva.m tattha kaara.na.m sammaa bruuhi sakavaadassa ^a^P0.0096^ea^ pati.t.thaapanaaya di.t.thijaalavinive.thanaayaa''ti.

[03] thero aaha ``parinibbuto, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa, na ca bhagavaa puuja.m saadiyati, asaadiyantasseva tathaagatassa devamanussaa dhaaturatana.m vatthu.m karitvaa tathaagatassa ~naa.naratanaaramma.nena sammaapa.tipatti.m sevantaa tisso sampattiyo pa.tilabhanti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0104^ea^, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaaaggikkhandho pajjalitvaa nibbaayeyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, mahaaaggikkhandho saadiyati ti.naka.t.thupaadaana''nti? ``jalamaanopi so, bhante, mahaaaggikkhandho ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m na saadiyati, ki.m pana nibbuto upasanto acetano saadiyati? ``tasmi.m pana, mahaaraaja, aggikkhandhe uparate upasante loke aggi su~n~no hotii''ti. ``na hi, bhante, ka.t.tha.m aggissa vatthu hoti upaadaana.m, ye keci manussaa aggikaamaa, te attano thaamabalaviiriyena paccattapurisakaarena ka.t.tha.m manthayitvaa {madditvaa (ka0)} aggi.m nibbattetvaa tena agginaa aggikara.niiyaani kammaani karontii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, titthiyaana.m vacana.m micchaa bhavati `asaadiyantassa kato adhikaaro va~njho bhavati aphalo'ti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaaaggikkhandho pajjali, evameva bhagavaa dasasahassiyaa {dasasahassimhi (sii0 pii0 ka0)} lokadhaatuyaa buddhasiriyaa pajjali. yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaaaggikkhandho pajjalitvaa nibbuto, evameva bhagavaa dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa buddhasiriyaa pajjalitvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto. yathaa, mahaaraaja, nibbuto aggikkhandho ti.naka.t.thupaadaana.m na saadiyati, evameva kho lokahitassa saadiyanaa pahiinaa upasantaa. yathaa, mahaaraaja, manussaa nibbute aggikkhandhe anupaadaane attano thaamabalaviiriyena paccattapurisakaarena ka.t.tha.m manthayitvaa aggi.m nibbattetvaa tena agginaa aggikara.niiyaani kammaani karonti, evameva kho devamanussaa tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva dhaaturatana.m vatthu.m karitvaa tathaagatassa ~naa.naratanaaramma.nena ^a^P0.0097^ea^ sammaapa.tipatti.m sevantaa tisso sampattiyo pa.tilabhanti, iminaapi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphalo.

[03] ``aparampi, mahaaraaja, uttari.m kaara.na.m su.nohi yena kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva ^a^V0.0109^ea^ kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphalo. yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaavaato vaayitvaa uparameyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, uparato vaato saadiyati puna nibbattaapana''nti? ``na hi, bhante, uparatassa vaatassa aabhogo vaa ^a^M0.0105^ea^ manasikaaro vaa puna nibbattaapanaaya''. ``ki.m kaara.na.m''? ``acetanaa saa vaayodhaatuu''ti. ``api nu tassa, mahaaraaja, uparatassa vaatassa vaatoti sama~n~naa apagacchatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, taalava.n.tavidhuupanaani vaatassa uppattiyaa paccayaa, ye keci manussaa u.nhaabhitattaa pari.laahaparipii.litaa, te taalava.n.tena vaa vidhuupanena vaa attano thaamabalaviiriyena paccattapurisakaarena ta.m nibbattetvaa tena vaatena u.nha.m nibbaapenti pari.laaha.m vuupasamentii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, titthiyaana.m vacana.m micchaa bhavati `asaadiyantassa kato adhikaaro va~njho bhavati aphalo'ti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaavaato vaayi, evameva bhagavaa dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa siitalamadhurasantasukhumamettaavaatena upavaayi. yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaavaato vaayitvaa uparato, evameva bhagavaa siitalamadhurasantasukhumamettaavaatena upavaayitvaa anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto. yathaa, mahaaraaja, uparato vaato puna nibbattaapana.m na saadiyati, evameva lokahitassa saadiyanaa pahiinaa upasantaa. yathaa, mahaaraaja, te manussaa u.nhaabhitattaa pari.laahaparipii.litaa, evameva devamanussaa tividhaggisantaapapari.laahaparipii.litaa. yathaa taalava.n.tavidhuupanaani vaatassa nibbattiyaa paccayaa honti, evameva tathaagatassa dhaatu ca ~naa.naratana~nca paccayo hoti tissanna.m sampattiina.m ^a^P0.0098^ea^ pa.tilaabhaaya. yathaa manussaa u.nhaabhitattaa pari.laahaparipii.litaa taalava.n.tena vaa vidhuupanena vaa vaata.m nibbattetvaa u.nha.m nibbaapenti pari.laaha.m vuupasamenti, evameva devamanussaa tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva dhaatu~nca ~naa.naratana~nca puujetvaa kusala.m nibbattetvaa tena kusalena tividhaggisantaapapari.laaha.m nibbaapenti vuupasamenti. iminaapi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphaloti.

[03] ``aparampi, mahaaraaja, uttari.m kaara.na.m su.nohi paravaadaana.m niggahaaya. yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso bheri.m aako.tetvaa sadda.m nibbatteyya, yo so bherisaddo purisena nibbattito, so saddo antaradhaayeyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, saddo saadiyati puna nibbattaapana''nti? ``na hi, bhante, antarahito so saddo, natthi tassa puna uppaadaaya aabhogo ^a^M0.0106^ea^ vaa manasikaaro vaa, saki.m nibbatte bherisadde antarahite so bherisaddo samucchinno hoti. bherii pana, bhante, paccayo ^a^V0.0110^ea^ hoti saddassa nibbattiyaa, atha puriso paccaye sati attajena vaayaamena bheri.m ako.tetvaa sadda.m nibbattetii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa siilasamaadhipa~n~naavimuttivimutti~naa.nadassanaparibhaavita.m dhaaturatana~nca dhamma~nca vinaya~nca anusi.t.tha~nca {anusatthi~nca (sii0 pii0)} satthaara.m .thapayitvaa saya.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto, na ca parinibbute bhagavati sampattilaabho upacchinno hoti, bhavadukkhapa.tipii.litaa sattaa dhaaturatana~nca dhamma~nca vinaya~nca anusi.t.tha~nca paccaya.m karitvaa sampattikaamaa sampattiyo pa.tilabhanti, iminaapi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphaloti.

[03] ``di.t.tha~nceta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa anaagatamaddhaana.m. kathita~nca bha.nita~nca aacikkhita~nca `siyaa kho panaananda, tumhaaka.m evamassa atiitasatthuka.m ^a^P0.0099^ea^ paavacana.m natthi no satthaati, na kho paneta.m, aananda, eva.m da.t.thabba.m, yo vo, aananda, mayaa dhammo ca vinayo ca desito pa~n~natto, so vo mamaccayena satthaa'ti. parinibbutassa tathaagatassa asaadiyantassa kato adhikaaro va~njho bhavati aphaloti, ta.m tesa.m titthiyaana.m vacana.m micchaa abhuuta.m vitatha.m alika.m viruddha.m vipariita.m dukkhadaayaka.m dukkhavipaaka.m apaayagamaniiyanti.

[03] ``aparampi, mahaaraaja, uttari.m kaara.na.m su.nohi yena kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphalo. saadiyati nu kho, mahaaraaja, aya.m mahaapathavii `sabbabiijaani mayi sa.mviruhantuu'''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``kissa pana taani, mahaaraaja, biijaani asaadiyantiyaa mahaapathaviyaa sa.mviruhitvaa da.lhamuulaja.taapati.t.thitaa khandhasaarasaakhaaparivitthi.n.naa pupphaphaladharaa hontii''ti? ``asaadiyantiipi, bhante, mahaapathavii tesa.m biijaana.m vatthu.m hoti paccaya.m deti viruhanaaya, taani biijaani ta.m vatthu.m nissaaya tena paccayena sa.mviruhitvaa da.lhamuulaja.taapati.t.thitaa khandhasaarasaakhaaparivitthi.n.naa pupphaphaladharaa hontii''ti. ``tena ^a^M0.0107^ea^ hi, mahaaraaja, titthiyaa sake vaade na.t.thaa honti hataa viruddhaa, sace te bha.nanti `asaadiyantassa kato adhikaaro va~njho bhavati aphalo' ti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahaapathavii, eva.m tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho. yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahaapathavii na ki~nci saadiyati, eva.m tathaagato na ki~nci saadiyati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, taani biijaani pathavi.m nissaaya sa.mviruhitvaa da.lhamuulaja.taapati.t.thitaa khandhasaarasaakhaaparivitthi.n.naa pupphaphaladharaa honti, eva.m devamanussaa tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva dhaatu~nca ~naa.naratana~nca nissaaya da.lhakusalamuulapati.t.thitaa samaadhikkhandhadhammasaarasiilasaakhaaparivitthi.n.naa ^a^V0.0111^ea^ vimuttipupphasaama~n~naphaladharaa honti, iminaapi, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0100^ea^, kaara.nena tathaagatassa parinibbutassa asaadiyantasseva kato adhikaaro ava~njho bhavati saphaloti.
