[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0144^ea^ ^a^M0.0145^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `abhi~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi no anabhi~n~naayaa'ti. puna ca vinayapa~n~nattiyaa eva.m bha.nita.m `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanatuu'ti. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani duppa~n~nattaani, udaahu avatthusmi.m ajaanitvaa pa~n~nattaani, ya.m bhagavaa attano accayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanaapeti? yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `abhi~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi no anabhi~n~naayaa'ti, tena hi `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanatuu'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagate vinayapa~n~nattiyaa ^a^P0.0143^ea^ eva.m bha.nita.m `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanatuu'ti tena hi `abhi~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi no anabhi~n~naayaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho sukhumo nipu.no gambhiiro sugambhiiro dunnijjhaapayo, so tavaanuppatto, tattha te ~naa.nabalavipphaara.m dassehii''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `abhi~n~naayaaha.m, bhikkhave, dhamma.m desemi no anabhi~n~naayaa'ti, vinayapa~n~nattiyaapi eva.m bha.nita.m `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanatuu'ti, ta.m pana, mahaaraaja, tathaagato bhikkhuu viima.msamaano aaha `ukkalessanti {ukka.d.dhissanti (sii0), ussakkissanti (syaa0)} nu kho mama saavakaa mayaa vissajjaapiiyamaanaa mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani, udaahu aadiyissantii'ti.

[01] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, cakkavattii raajaa putte eva.m vadeyya `aya.m kho, taataa, mahaajanapado sabbadisaasu saagarapariyanto, dukkaro, taataa, taavatakena balena dhaaretu.m, etha tumhe, taataa, mamaccayena ^a^V0.0145^ea^ paccante paccante dese pajahathaa'ti. api nu kho te, mahaaraaja, kumaaraa pituaccayena ^a^M0.0146^ea^ hatthagate janapade sabbe te paccante paccante dese mu~nceyyu''nti? ``na hi bhante, raajato {raajaano (sii0 pii0)}, bhante, luddhataraa {laddhataraa (ka0)} kumaaraa rajjalobhena taduttari.m digu.natigu.na.m janapada.m parigga.nheyyu.m {parika.d.dheyyu.m (sii0 pii0)}, ki.m pana te hatthagata.m janapada.m mu~nceyyu''nti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato bhikkhuu viima.msamaano evamaaha `aaka"nkhamaano, aananda, sa"ngho mamaccayena khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani samuuhanatuu'ti. dukkhaparimuttiyaa, mahaaraaja, buddhaputtaa dhammalobhena a~n~nampi uttari.m diya.d.dhasikkhaapadasata.m gopeyyu.m, ki.m pana pakatipa~n~natta.m sikkhaapada.m mu~nceyyu''nti?

[03] ``bhante naagasena, ya.m bhagavaa aaha `khuddaanukhuddakaani ^a^P0.0144^ea^ sikkhaapadaanii'ti, etthaaya.m jano sammuu.lho vimatijaato adhikato sa.msayapakkhando. katamaani taani khuddakaani sikkhaapadaani, katamaani anukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaaniiti? dukka.ta.m, mahaaraaja, khuddaka.m sikkhaapada.m, dubbhaasita.m anukhuddaka.m sikkhaapada.m, imaani dve khuddaanukhuddakaani sikkhaapadaani, pubbakehipi, mahaaraaja, mahaatherehi ettha vimati uppaaditaa, tehipi ekajjha.m na kato dhammasa.n.thitipariyaaye bhagavataa eso pa~nho upadi.t.thoti. ciranikkhitta.m, bhante naagasena, jinarahassa.m ajjetarahi loke viva.ta.m paaka.ta.m kata''nti.
[06] khuddaanukhuddakapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `natthaananda tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thii'ti, puna ca therena maalukyaputtena {maalu"nkyaputtena (sii0 syaa0 pii0) sa.m0 ni0 4.95; a0 ni0 1.4.257 passitabba.m} pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakaasi. eso kho, bhante naagasena, pa~nho dvayanto {dvayato (sii0)} ekantanissito bhavissati ajaananena vaa guyhakara.nena vaa. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `natthaananda tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thii'ti, tena hi therassa maalukyaputtassa ajaanantena na ^a^M0.0147^ea^ byaakata.m. yadi jaanantena na byaakata.m, tena hi atthi tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thi. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[01] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `natthaananda tathaagatassa dhammesu aacariyamu.t.thii'ti, abyaakato ^a^V0.0146^ea^ ca therena maalukyaputtena pucchito pa~nho, ta~nca pana na ajaanantena na guyhakara.nena. cattaarimaani, mahaaraaja, pa~nhabyaakara.naani. katamaani cattaari? eka.msabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho .thapaniiyo pa~nhoti.

[03] ``katamo ca, mahaaraaja, eka.msabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho? `ruupa.m anicca'nti eka.msabyaakara.niiyo ^a^P0.0145^ea^ pa~nho, `vedanaa aniccaa'ti...pe0... `sa~n~naa aniccaa'ti...pe0... `sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa'ti...pe0... `vi~n~naa.na.m anicca''nti eka.msabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, aya.m eka.msabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho.

[03] ``katamo vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho? `anicca.m pana ruupa'nti vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, `aniccaa pana vedanaa'ti...pe0... `aniccaa pana sa~n~naa'ti...pe0... `aniccaa pana sa"nkhaaraa'ti...pe0... `anicca.m pana vi~n~naa.na'nti vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, aya.m vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho.
[03] ``katamo pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho? `ki.m nu kho cakkhunaa sabba.m vijaanaatii'ti aya.m pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho.

[03] ``katamo .thapaniiyo pa~nho? `sassato loko'ti .thapaniiyo pa~nho, `asassato loko'ti. `antavaa loko'ti. `anantavaa loko'ti. `antavaa ca anantavaa ca loko'ti. `nevantavaa naanantavaa loko'ti. `ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira'nti. `a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira'nti. `hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti. `na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti. `hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti. `neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa'ti .thapaniiyo pa~nho, aya.m .thapaniiyo pa~nho.

[03] ``bhagavaa, mahaaraaja, therassa maalukyaputtassa ta.m .thapaniiya.m pa~nha.m na byaakaasi. so pana pa~nho ki.m kaara.naa .thapaniiyo? na tassa diipanaaya hetu ^a^M0.0148^ea^ vaa kaara.na.m vaa atthi, tasmaa so pa~nho .thapaniiyo. natthi buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m akaara.namahetuka.m giramudiira.na''nti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] abyaakara.niiyapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0147^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti, puna bha.nita.m `arahaa sabbabhayamatikkanto'ti. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, arahaa da.n.dabhayaa tasati ^a^P0.0146^ea^, niraye vaa nerayikaa sattaa jalitaa kuthitaa tattaa santattaa tamhaa jalitaggijaalakaa mahaanirayaa cavamaanaa maccuno bhaayanti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti, tena hi `arahaa sabbabhayamatikkanto'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi bhagavataa bha.nita.m `arahaa sabbabhayamatikkanto'ti, tena hi `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. aya.m ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``neta.m, mahaaraaja, vacana.m bhagavataa arahante upaadaaya bha.nita.m `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti. .thapito arahaa tasmi.m vatthusmi.m, samuuhato bhayahetu arahato. ye te, mahaaraaja, sattaa sakilesaa, yesa~nca adhimattaa attaanudi.t.thi, ye ca sukhadukkhesu unnataavanataa, te upaadaaya bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti. arahato, mahaaraaja, sabbagati upacchinnaa, yoni viddha.msitaa, pa.tisandhi upahataa, bhaggaa phaasukaa, samuuhataa sabbabhavaalayaa, samucchinnaa sabbasa"nkhaaraa, hata.m kusalaakusala.m, vihataa avijjaa, abiija.m vi~n~naa.na.m kata.m, da.d.dhaa sabbakilesaa, ativattaa lokadhammaa, tasmaa arahaa na tasati sabbabhayehi.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no cattaaro mahaamattaa bhaveyyu.m anurakkhaa laddhayasaa vissaasikaa .thapitaa mahati issariye .thaane. atha raajaa kismi~nci ^a^M0.0149^ea^ deva kara.niiye samuppanne yaavataa sakavijite sabbajanassa aa.naapeyya `sabbeva me bali.m karontu, saadhetha tumhe cattaaro mahaamattaa ta.m kara.niiya'nti. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m catunna.m mahaamattaana.m balibhayaa santaaso uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nena mahaaraajaa''ti. ``.thapitaa te, bhante, ra~n~naa uttama.t.thaane, natthi tesa.m bali, samatikkantabalino te, avasese upaadaaya ra~n~naa aa.naapita.m ^a^P0.0147^ea^ `sabbeva me bali.m karontuu'ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, neta.m vacana.m bhagavataa arahante upaadaaya bha.nita.m, .thapito arahaa tasmi.m vatthusmi.m, samuuhato bhayahetu arahato, ye te, mahaaraaja, sattaa sakilesaa, yesa~nca adhimattaa attaanudi.t.thi, ye ca sukhadukkhesu unnataavanataa ^a^V0.0148^ea^, te upaadaaya bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti. tasmaa arahaa na tasati sabbabhayehii''ti.
[03] ``neta.m, bhante naagasena, vacana.m saavasesa.m, niravasesavacanameta.m `sabbe'ti. tattha me uttari.m kaara.na.m bruuhi ta.m vacana.m pati.t.thaapetu''nti.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, gaame gaamassaamiko aa.naapaka.m aa.naapeyya `ehi, bho aa.naapaka, yaavataa gaame gaamikaa, te sabbe siigha.m mama santike sannipaatehii'ti. so `saadhu saamii'ti sampa.ticchitvaa gaamamajjhe .thatvaa tikkhattu.m saddamanussaaveyya `yaavataa gaame gaamikaa, te sabbe siighasiigha.m saamino santike sannipatantuu'ti. tato te gaamikaa aa.naapakassa vacanena turitaturitaa sannipatitvaa gaamassaamikassa aarocenti `sannipatitaa, saami, sabbe gaamikaa, ya.m te kara.niiya.m ta.m karohii'ti. iti so, mahaaraaja, gaamassaamiko ku.tipurise sannipaatento sabbe gaamike aa.naapeti, te ca aa.nattaa na sabbe sannipatanti, ku.tipurisaa yeva sannipatanti, `ettakaa yeva me gaamikaa'ti gaamassaamiko ca tathaa sampa.ticchati, a~n~ne bahutaraa anaagataa itthipurisaa daasidaasaa bhatakaa kammakaraa gaamikaa gilaanaa gomahi.msaa aje.lakaa suvaanaa, ye anaagataa, sabbe te aga.nitaa, ku.tipurise yeva upaadaaya aa.naapitattaa `sabbe sannipatantuu'ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, neta.m vacana.m bhagavataa arahante upaadaaya bha.nita.m, .thapito arahaa tasmi.m vatthusmi.m, samuuhato bhayahetu arahato, ye te, mahaaraaja, sattaa sakilesaa, yesa~nca adhimattaa attaanudi.t.thi, ye ^a^M0.0150^ea^ ca sukhadukkhesu unnataavanataa, te upaadaaya bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno'ti ^a^P0.0148^ea^. tasmaa arahaa na tasati sabbabhayehi.

[03] ``atthi, mahaaraaja, saavasesa.m vacana.m saavaseso attho, atthi saavasesa.m vacana.m niravaseso attho, atthi niravasesa.m vacana.m saavaseso attho, atthi niravasesa.m vacana.m niravaseso attho. tena tena attho sampa.ticchitabbo.

[03] ``pa~ncavidhehi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nehi attho sampa.ticchitabbo aahaccapadena rasena aacariyava.msena {aacariyava.msataaya (pii0 ka0)} adhippaayaa kaara.nuttariyataaya. ettha hi ^b^aahaccapada^eb^nti sutta.m adhippeta.m. ^b^raso^eb^ti suttaanuloma.m. ^b^aacariyava.mso^eb^ti aacariyavaado. ^b^adhippaayo^eb^ti attano mati. ^b^kaara.nuttariyataa^eb^ti imehi ^a^V0.0149^ea^ catuuhi samenta.m {sameta.m (sii0)} kaara.na.m. imehi kho, mahaaraaja, pa~ncahi kaara.nehi attho sampa.ticchitabbo. evameso pa~nho suvinicchito hotii''ti.

[03] ``hotu, bhante naagasena, tathaa ta.m sampa.ticchaami. .thapito hotu arahaa tasmi.m vatthusmi.m, tasantu avasesaa sattaa, niraye pana nerayikaa sattaa dukkhaa tibbaa ka.tukaa vedanaa vedayamaanaa jalitapajjalitasabba"ngapacca"ngaa ru.n.nakaaru~n~nakanditaparidevitalaalappitamukhaa asayhatibbadukkhaabhibhuutaa ataa.naa asara.naa asara.niibhuutaa anappasokaaturaa antimapacchimagatikaa ekantasokaparaaya.naa u.nhatikhi.naca.n.dakharatapanatejavanto bhiimabhayajanakaninaadamahaasaddaa sa.msibbitachabbidhajaalaamaalaakulaa samantaa satayojanaanuphara.naccivegaa kadariyaa tapanaa mahaanirayaa cavamaanaa maccuno bhaayantii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraajaa''ti.

[03] ``nanu, bhante naagasena, nirayo ekantadukkhavedaniiyo, kissa pana te nerayikaa sattaa ekantadukkhavedaniiyaa nirayaa cavamaanaa maccuno bhaayanti, kissa niraye ramantii''ti? ``na te, mahaaraaja, nerayikaa sattaa niraye ramanti, mu~ncitukaamaava te nirayaa. mara.nasseva so {mara.nasseso (sii0 pii0)}, mahaaraaja, aanubhaavo, yena tesa.m santaaso uppajjatii''ti. ``eta.m kho, bhante naagasena, na saddahaami, ya.m muccitukaamaana.m cutiyaa ^a^P0.0149^ea^ santaaso uppajjatiiti, haasaniiya.m ^a^M0.0151^ea^, bhante naagasena, ta.m .thaana.m, ya.m te patthita.m labhanti, kaara.nena ma.m sa~n~naapehii''ti.

[03] ``mara.nanti kho, mahaaraaja, eta.m adi.t.thasaccaana.m taasaniiya.t.thaana.m, etthaaya.m jano tasati ca ubbijjati ca. yo ca, mahaaraaja, ka.nhasappassa bhaayati, so mara.nassa bhaayanto ka.nhasappassa bhaayati. yo ca hatthissa bhaayati...pe0... siihassa...pe0... byagghassa...pe0... diipissa...pe0... acchassa...pe0... taracchassa...pe0... mahi.msassa...pe0... gavayassa...pe0... aggissa...pe0... udakassa...pe0... khaa.nukassa...pe0... ka.n.takassa bhaayati. yo ca sattiyaa bhaayati, so mara.nassa bhaayanto sattiyaa bhaayati. mara.nasseva so {mara.nasseso (sii0 pii0)}, mahaaraaja, sarasasabhaavatejo {sarasabhaavatejo (sii0 pii0)}, tassa sarasasabhaavatejena sakilesaa sattaa mara.nassa tasanti bhaayanti, muccitukaamaapi, mahaaraaja, nerayikaa sattaa mara.nassa tasanti bhaayanti.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, purisassa kaaye medo ga.n.thi uppajjeyya. so tena rogena dukkhito upaddavaa parimuccitukaamo bhisakka.m sallakatta.m aamantaapeyya. tassa vacana.m so bhisakko sallakatto sampa.ticchitvaa tassa rogassa uddhara.naaya upakara.na.m upa.t.thaapeyya, satthaka.m tikhi.na.m kareyya ^a^V0.0150^ea^, yamakasalaakaa {dahanasalaaka.m (ka0)} aggimhi pakkhipeyya, khaaralava.na.m nisadaaya pisaapeyya, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa aaturassa tikhi.nasatthakacchedanena yamakasalaakaadahanena khaaralo.nappavesanena taaso uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``aama bhante''ti. ``iti, mahaaraaja, tassa aaturassa rogaa muccitukaamassaapi vedanaabhayaa santaaso uppajjati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nirayaa muccitukaamaanampi nerayikaana.m sattaana.m mara.nabhayaa santaaso uppajjati.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, puriso issaraaparaadhiko baddho sa"nkhalikabandhanena gabbhe pakkhitto parimuccitukaamo assa, tamena.m so issaro mocetukaamo pakkosaapeyya. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa issaraaparaadhikassa purisassa `katadoso ^a^P0.0150^ea^ aha'nti jaanantassa issaradassanena santaaso uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``aama bhante''ti. ``iti, mahaaraaja, tassa issaraaparaadhikassa purisassa parimuccitukaamaassaapi issarabhayaa santaaso uppajjati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nirayaa muccitukaamaanampi nerayikaana.m sattaana.m mara.nabhayaa santaaso uppajjatii''ti.

[03] ``aparampi ^a^M0.0152^ea^, bhante, uttari.m kaara.na.m bruuhi, yenaaha.m kaara.nena okappeyya''nti. ``idha, mahaaraaja, puriso da.t.thavisena aasiivisena da.t.tho bhaveyya, so tena visavikaarena pateyya uppateyya va.t.teyya pava.t.teyya, atha~n~nataro puriso balavantena mantapadena ta.m da.t.thavisa.m aasiivisa.m aanetvaa ta.m da.t.thavisa.m paccaacamaapeyya, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa visagatassa purisassa tasmi.m da.t.thavise sappe sotthihetu upagacchante santaaso uppajjeyyaa''ti? ``aama bhante''ti. iti, mahaaraaja, tathaaruupe ahimhi sotthihetupi upagacchante tassa santaaso uppajjati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nirayaa muccitukaamaanampi nerayikaana.m santaana.m mara.nabhayaa santaaso uppajjati. ani.t.tha.m, mahaaraaja, sabbasattaana.m mara.na.m, tasmaa nerayikaa sattaa nirayaa parimuccitukaamaapi maccuno bhaayantii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] maccubhaayanaabhaayanapa~nho tatiyo.
[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ```na ^a^V0.0151^ea^ antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbataana.m vivara.m pavissa.
[22] na vijjatii so jagatippadeso, yattha.t.thito mucceyya maccupaasaa'ti..

[01] ``puna bhagavataa parittaa ca uddi.t.thaa. seyyathida.m, ratanasutta.m mettasutta.m khandhaparitta.m moraparitta.m dhajaggaparitta.m ^a^P0.0151^ea^ aa.taanaa.tiyaparitta.m a"ngulimaalaparitta.m. yadi, bhante naagasena, aakaasagatopi samuddamajjhagatopi paasaadaku.tile.naguhaapabbhaaradaribilagiri vivarapabbatantaragatopi na muccati maccupaasaa, tena hi parittakamma.m micchaa. yadi parittakara.nena maccupaasaa parimutti bhavati, tena hi `na antalikkhe...pe0... maccupaasaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho ga.n.thitopi ga.n.thitaro tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^M0.0153^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `na antalikkhe...pe0... maccupaasaa'ti, parittaa ca bhagavataa uddi.t.thaa, ta~nca pana saavasesaayukassa vayasampannassa apetakammaavara.nassa, natthi, mahaaraaja, khii.naayukassa .thitiyaa kiriyaa vaa upakkamo vaa.

[03] ``yathaa mahaaraaja matassa rukkhassa sukkhassa ko.laapassa nisnehassa uparuddhajiivitassa gataayusa"nkhaarassa kumbhasahassenapi udake aakirante allatta.m vaa pallavitaharitabhaavo vaa na bhaveyya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhesajjaparittakammena natthi khii.naayukassa .thitiyaa kiriyaa vaa upakkamo vaa, yaani taani, mahaaraaja, mahiyaa osadhaani bhesajjaani, taanipi khii.naayukassa akiccakaraani bhavanti. saavasesaayuka.m, mahaaraaja, vayasampanna.m apetakammaavara.na.m paritta.m rakkhati gopeti, tassatthaaya bhagavataa parittaa uddi.t.thaa.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kassako paripakke dha~n~ne mate sassanaa.le udakappavesana.m vaareyya, ya.m pana sassa.m taru.na.m meghasannibha.m vayasampanna.m, ta.m udakava.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, khii.naayukassa bhesajjaparittakiriyaa .thapitaa pa.tikkhittaa ^a^P0.0152^ea^, ye pana te manussaa saavasesaayukaa vayasampannaa, tesa.m atthaaya parittabhesajjaani bha.nitaani, te parittabhesajjehi va.d.dhantii''ti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, khii.naayuko marati, saavasesaayuko jiivati, tena hi parittabhesajjaani niratthakaani hontii''ti? ``di.t.thapubbo pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, koci rogo bhesajjehi pa.tinivattito''ti? ``aama, bhante, anekasataani di.t.thaanii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, `parittabhesajjakiriyaa niratthakaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhavatii''ti.

[03] ``dissanti ^a^V0.0152^ea^, bhante naagasena, vejjaana.m upakkamaa bhesajjapaanaanulepaa, tena tesa.m upakkamena rogo pa.tinivattatii''ti. ``parittaanampi, mahaaraaja, pavattiiyamaanaana.m saddo suyyati, jivhaa sukkhati, hadaya.m byaava.t.tati, ka.n.tho aaturati. tena tesa.m pavattena sabbe byaadhayo vuupasamanti, sabbaa iitiyo apagacchantiiti.

[03] ``di.t.thapubbo pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, koci ahinaa da.t.tho mantapadena visa.m paatiiyamaano visa.m cikkhassanto uddhamadho aacamayamaano''ti? ``aama, bhante ^a^M0.0154^ea^, ajjetarahipi ta.m loke vattatii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, `parittabhesajjakiriyaa niratthakaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhavati. kataparitta~nhi, mahaaraaja, purisa.m .da.msitukaamo ahi na .da.msati, viva.ta.m mukha.m pidahati, coraana.m ukkhittalagu.lampi na sambhavati, te lagu.la.m mu~ncitvaa pema.m karonti, kupitopi hatthinaago samaagantvaa uparamati, pajjalitamahaaaggikkhandhopi upagantvaa nibbaayati, visa.m halaahalampi khaayita.m agada.m sampajjati, aahaarattha.m vaa pharati, vadhakaa hantukaamaa upagantvaa daasabhuutaa sampajjanti, akkantopi paaso na sa.mvarati {na sa.mcarati (sii0)}.

[03] ``sutapubba.m pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, `morassa kataparittassa sattavassasataani luddako naasakkhi paasa.m upanetu.m, akataparittassa ta.m yeva divasa.m paasa.m upanesii''ti ^a^P0.0153^ea^? ``aama, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato so saddo sadevake loke''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja `parittabhesajjakiriyaa niratthakaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhavati.

[03] ``sutapubba.m pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, `daanavo bhariya.m parirakkhanto samugge pakkhipitvaa gilitvaa kucchinaa pariharati, atheko vijjaadharo tassa daanavassa mukhena pavisitvaa taaya saddhi.m abhiramati, yadaa so daanavo a~n~naasi, atha samugga.m vamitvaa vivari, saha samugge viva.te vijjaadharo yathaakaama.m {yena kaama.m (ka0)} pakkaamii''ti? ``aama, bhante, suyyati, abbhuggato sopi saddo sadevake loke''ti. ``nanu so, mahaaraaja, vijjaadharo parittabalena {mantabalena (?)} gaha.naa mutto''ti. ``aama bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, atthi parittabala.m.

[03] ``sutapubba.m pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, `aparopi vijjaadharo baaraa.nasira~n~no antepure mahesiyaa saddhi.m sampadu.t.tho {sa.msa.t.tho (sii0)} gaha.nappatto samaano kha.nena adassana.m gato mantabalenaa''ti. ``aama, bhante, suyyatii''ti. ``nanu so, mahaaraaja, vijjaadharo parittabalena gaha.naa mutto''ti? ``aama bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, atthi parittabala''nti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^V0.0153^ea^ naagasena, `ki.m sabbe yeva paritta.m rakkhatii'ti? ``ekacce, mahaaraaja, rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhatii''ti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, paritta.m na sabbatthika''nti? ``api nu kho, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbesa.m jiivita.m rakkhatii''ti? ``ekacce, bhante ^a^M0.0155^ea^, rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhatii''ti. ``ki.m kaara.naa''ti. ``yato, bhante, ekacce ta.m yeva bhojana.m atibhu~njitvaa visuucikaaya marantii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m na sabbesa.m jiivita.m rakkhatii''ti? ``dviihi, bhante naagasena, kaara.nehi bhojana.m jiivita.m harati atibhuttena vaa usmaadubbalataaya vaa, aayudada.m, bhante naagasena, bhojana.m durupacaarena jiivita.m haratii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, paritta.m ekacce rakkhati, ekacce na rakkhati.

[03] ``tiihi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nehi paritta.m na rakkhati ^a^P0.0154^ea^ kammaavara.nena, kilesaavara.nena, asaddahanataaya. sattaanurakkha.na.m, mahaaraaja, paritta.m attanaa katena aarakkha.m jahati, yathaa, mahaaraaja, maataa putta.m kucchigata.m poseti, hitena upacaarena janeti, janayitvaa asucimalasi"nghaa.nikamapanetvaa uttamavarasugandha.m upalimpati, so aparena samayena paresa.m putte akkosante vaa paharante vaa pahaara.m deti. te tassa kujjhitvaa parisaaya aaka.d.dhitvaa ta.m gahetvaa saamino upanenti, yadi pana tassaa putto aparaddho hoti velaativatto. atha na.m saamino manussaa aaka.d.dhayamaanaa da.n.damuggarajaa.numu.t.thiihi taa.lenti pothenti, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tassa maataa labhati aaka.d.dhanaparika.d.dhana.m gaaha.m saamino upanayana.m kaatu''nti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nena, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``attano, bhante, aparaadhenaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sattaana.m aarakkha.m paritta.m attano aparaadhena va~njha.m karotii''ti {kaaretiiti (sii0)}. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, suvinicchito pa~nho, gahana.m agahana.m kata.m, andhakaaro aaloko kato, vinive.thita.m di.t.thijaala.m, tva.m ga.nivarapavaramaasajjaa''ti.
[06] maccupaasamuttipa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `laabhii tathaagato ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana'nti. puna ca tathaagato pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa ki~ncideva alabhitvaa yathaadhotena ^a^M0.0156^ea^ pattena nikkhantoti. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato ^a^V0.0154^ea^ laabhii ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, tena hi pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa ki~ncideva alabhitvaa yathaadhotena pattena nikkhantoti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi pa~ncasaala.m braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa ki~ncideva alabhitvaa yathaadhotena pattena nikkhanto, tena hi laabhii tathaagato ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraananti ^a^P0.0155^ea^ tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho sumahanto dunnibbe.tho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``laabhii, mahaaraaja, tathaagato ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m, pa~ncasaala~nca braahma.nagaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa ki~ncideva alabhitvaa yathaadhotena pattena nikkhanto, ta~nca pana maarassa paapimato kaara.naa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, bhagavato ga.nanapatha.m viitivattakappe {ga.nanapathaviitivatte kappe (sii0)} abhisa"nkhata.m kusala.m kinti ni.t.thita.m, adhunu.t.thitena maarena paapimataa tassa kusalassa balavega.m {ta.m kusalabalavegavipphaara.m (sii0)} kinti pihita.m, tena hi, bhante naagasena, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m dviisu .thaanesu upavaado aagacchati, kusalatopi akusala.m balavatara.m hoti, buddhabalatopi maarabala.m balavatara.m hotiiti, tena hi rukkhassa muulatopi agga.m bhaaratara.m hoti, gu.nasampariki.n.natopi paapiya.m balavatara.m hotii''ti. ``na, mahaaraaja, taavatakena kusalatopi akusala.m balavatara.m naama hoti, na buddhabalatopi maarabala.m balavatara.m naama hoti. api cettha kaara.na.m icchitabba.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso ra~n~no cakkavattissa madhu.m vaa madhupi.n.dika.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa upaayana.m abhihareyya, tamena.m ra~n~no dvaarapaalo eva.m vadeyya `akaalo, bho, aya.m ra~n~no dassanaaya, tena hi, bho, tava upaayana.m gahetvaa siighasiigha.m pa.tinivatta, pure tava raajaa da.n.da.m dhaaressatii'ti {maa te raajaa da.n.da.m paapeyyaati (sii0)}. tato so puriso da.n.dabhayaa tasito ubbiggo ta.m upaayana.m aadaaya siighasiigha.m pa.tinivatteyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, raajaa cakkavattii taavatakena upaayanavikalamattakena dvaarapaalato dubbalataro naama hoti ^a^M0.0157^ea^, a~n~na.m vaa pana ki~nci upaayana.m na labheyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, issaapakato so, bhante, dvaarapaalo upaayana.m nivaaresi, a~n~nena pana dvaarena satasahassagu.nampi ra~n~no upaayana.m upetii''ti ^a^P0.0156^ea^. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, issaapakato maaro paapimaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi, a~n~naani pana anekaani devataasatasahassaani amata.m dibba.m oja.m gahetvaa upagataani `bhagavato kaaye oja.m odahissaamaa'ti bhagavanta.m namassamaanaani pa~njalikaani .thitaanii''ti.

[03] ``hotu, bhante naagasena, sulabhaa bhagavato cattaaro paccayaa loke uttamapurisassa, yaacitova ^a^V0.0155^ea^ bhagavaa devamanussohi cattaaro paccaye paribhu~njati, api ca kho pana maarassa yo adhippaayo, so taavatakena siddho, ya.m so bhagavato bhojanassa antaraayamakaasi. ettha me, bhante, ka"nkhaa na chijjati, vimatijaatoha.m tattha sa.msayapakkhando. na me tattha maanasa.m pakkhandati, ya.m tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa sadevake loke aggapuggalavarassa kusalavarapu~n~nasambhavassa asamasamassa anupamassa appa.tisamassa chavaka.m laamaka.m paritta.m paapa.m anariya.m vipanna.m maaro laabhantaraayamakaasii''ti.

[03] ``cattaaro kho, mahaaraaja, antaraayaa adi.t.thantaraayo uddissa katantaraayo upakkha.tantaraayo paribhogantaraayoti. tattha katamo adi.t.thantaraayo? anodissa adassanena anabhisa"nkhata.m koci antaraaya.m karoti `ki.m parassa dinnenaa'ti, aya.m adi.t.thantaraayo naama.
[03] ``katamo uddissa katantaraayo? idhekacca.m puggala.m upadisitvaa uddissa bhojana.m pa.tiyatta.m hoti, ta.m koci antaraaya.m karoti, aya.m uddissa katantaraayo naama.
[03] ``katamo upakkha.tantaraayo? idha ya.m ki~nci upakkha.ta.m hoti appa.tiggahita.m, tattha koci antaraaya.m karoti, aya.m upakkha.tantaraayo naama.
[03] ``katamo paribhogantaraayo? idha ya.m ki~nci paribhoga.m, tattha koci antaraaya.m karoti, aya.m paribhogantaraayo naama. ime kho, mahaaraaja, cattaaro antaraayaa.

[03] ``ya.m pana maaro paapimaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi, ta.m neva bhagavato paribhoga.m na upakkha.ta.m na uddissakata.m, anaagata.m ^a^P0.0157^ea^ asampatta.m adassanena ^a^M0.0158^ea^ antaraaya.m kata.m, ta.m pana nekassa bhagavato yeva, atha kho ye te tena samayena nikkhantaa abbhaagataa, sabbepi te ta.m divasa.m bhojana.m na labhi.msu, naaha.m ta.m, mahaaraaja, passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya, yo tassa bhagavato uddissa kata.m upakkha.ta.m paribhoga.m antaraaya.m kareyya. sace koci issaaya uddissa kata.m upakkha.ta.m paribhoga.m antaraaya.m kareyya, phaleyya tassa muddhaa satadhaa vaa sahassadhaa vaa.

[03] ``cattaarome, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa kenaci anaavara.niiyaa gu.naa. katame cattaaro? laabho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato uddissa kato upakkha.to na sakkaa kenaci antaraaya.m kaatu.m; sariiraanugataa ^a^V0.0156^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavato byaamappabhaa na sakkaa kenaci antaraaya.m kaatu.m; sabba~n~nuta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato ~naa.naratana.m na sakkaa kenaci antaraaya.m kaatu.m; jiivita.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato na sakkaa kenaci antaraaya.m kaatu.m. ime kho, mahaaraaja, cattaaro tathaagatassa kenaci anaavara.niiyaa gu.naa, sabbepete, mahaaraaja, gu.naa ekarasaa arogaa akuppaa aparuupakkamaa aphusaani kiriyaani. adassanena, mahaaraaja, maaro paapimaa niliiyitvaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no paccante dese visame adassanena niliiyitvaa coraa pantha.m duusenti. yadi pana raajaa te core passeyya, api nu kho te coraa sotthi.m labheyyu''nti? ``na hi, bhante, pharasunaa phaalaapeyya satadhaa vaa sahassadhaa vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, adassanena maaro paapimaa niliiyitvaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, itthii sapatikaa adassanena niliiyitvaa parapurisa.m sevati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, adassanena maaro paapimaa niliiyitvaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi. yadi, mahaaraaja, ^a^P0.0158^ea^ itthii saamikassa sammukhaa parapurisa.m sevati, api nu kho saa itthii sotthi.m labheyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, haneyyaapi ta.m, bhante, saamiko vadheyyaapi bandheyyaapi daasitta.m vaa upaneyyaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, adassanena maaro paapimaa niliiyitvaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi. yadi, mahaaraaja, maaro paapimaa bhagavato uddissa kata.m upakkha.ta.m paribhoga.m antaraaya.m ^a^M0.0159^ea^ kareyya, phaleyya tassa muddhaa satadhaa vaa sahassadhaa vaa''ti. ``evameta.m, bhante naagasena, corikaaya kata.m maarena paapimataa, niliiyitvaa maaro paapimaa pa~ncasaalake braahma.nagahapatike anvaavisi. sace so, bhante, maaro paapimaa bhagavato uddissa kata.m upakkha.ta.m paribhoga.m antaraaya.m kareyya, muddhaa vaassa phaleyya satadhaa vaa sahassadhaa vaa, kaayo vaassa bhusamu.t.thi viya vikireyya, saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] buddhalaabhantaraayapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0157^ea^ naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `yo ajaananto paa.naatipaata.m karoti, so balavatara.m apu~n~na.m pasavatii'ti. puna ca bhagavataa vinayapa~n~nattiyaa bha.nita.m `anaapatti ajaanantassaa'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, ajaanitvaa paa.naatipaata.m karonto balavatara.m apu~n~na.m pasavati, tena hi `anaapatti ajaanantassaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi anaapatti ajaanantassa, tena hi `ajaanitvaa paa.naatipaata.m karonto balavatara.m apu~n~na.m pasavatii'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho duruttaro duratikkamo tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `yo ajaananto paa.naatipaata.m karoti, so balavatara.m apu~n~na.m pasavatii'ti. puna ca vinayapa~n~nattiyaa bhagavataa bha.nita.m `anaapatti ajaanantassaa'ti. tattha atthantara.m atthi. katama.m atthantara.m ^a^P0.0159^ea^? atthi, mahaaraaja, aapatti sa~n~naavimokkhaa, atthi aapatti nosa~n~naavimokkhaa. yaaya.m, mahaaraaja, aapatti sa~n~naavimokkhaa, ta.m aapatti.m aarabbha bhagavataa bha.nita.m `anaapatti ajaanantassaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] apu~n~napa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0160^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti ``aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'''ti vaa, ``mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho''ti vaa'ti. puna ca metteyyassa bhagavato sabhaavagu.na.m paridiipayamaanena bhagavataa eva.m bha.nita.m ``so anekasahassa.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissati, seyyathaapi aha.m etarahi anekasata.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharaamii''ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti ``aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii''ti vaa, ``mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho''ti vaa'ti, tena hi anekasata.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharaamiiti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `so anekasahassa.m ^a^V0.0158^ea^ bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissati, seyyathaapi aha.m etarahi anekasata.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharaamii'ti, tena hi tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti `aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii'ti vaa, `mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho'ti vaati tampi vacana.m micchaa, ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `tathaagatassa kho, aananda, na eva.m hoti ``aha.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissaamii''ti vaa, ``mamuddesiko bhikkhusa"ngho''ti vaa'ti. puna ca metteyyassaapi bhagavato sabhaavagu.na.m paridiipayamaanena bhagavataa bha.nita.m `so anekasahassa.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharissati, seyyathaapi aha.m etarahi anekasata.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m pariharaamii'ti. etasmi~nca, mahaaraaja, pa~nhe eko attho saavaseso, eko attho niravaseso. na, mahaaraaja, tathaagato parisaaya anugaamiko, parisaa pana tathaagatassa anugaamikaa ^a^P0.0160^ea^. sammuti, mahaaraaja, esaa `aha'nti `mamaa'ti, na paramattho eso, vigata.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa pema.m, vigato sineho, `mayha'ntipi tathaagatassa gaha.na.m natthi, upaadaaya pana avassayo hoti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pathavii bhuuma.t.thaana.m sattaana.m pati.t.thaa hoti upassaya.m, pathavi.t.thaa cete sattaa, na ca mahaapathaviyaa `mayhete'ti apekkhaa hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato sabbasattaana.m pati.t.thaa hoti ^a^M0.0161^ea^ upassaya.m, tathaagata.t.thaa {tathaagatapati.t.thaa eva (sii0)} cete sattaa, na ca tathaagatassa `mayhete'ti apekkhaa hoti. yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaamegho abhivassanto ti.narukkhapasumanussaana.m vu.d.dhi.m deti santati.m anupaaleti. vu.t.thuupajiivino cete sattaa sabbe, na ca mahaameghassa `mayhete'ti apekkhaa hoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato sabbasattaana.m kusaladhamme janeti anupaaleti, satthuupajiivino cete sattaa sabbe, na ca tathaagatassa `mayhete'ti apekkhaa hoti. ta.m kissa hetu? attaanudi.t.thiyaa pahiinattaa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, sunibbe.thito pa~nho bahuvidhehi kaara.nehi, gambhiiro uttaaniikato, ga.n.thi bhinno, gahana.m agahana.m kata.m, andhakaaro aaloko kato, bhaggaa paravaadaa, jinaputtaana.m cakkhu.m uppaadita''nti.
[06] bhikkhusa"nghaparihara.napa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0159^ea^ naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `tathaagato abhejjapariso'ti, puna ca bha.natha `devadattena ekappahaara.m pa~nca bhikkhusataani bhinnaanii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato abhejjapariso, tena hi devadattena ekappahaara.m pa~nca bhikkhusataani bhinnaaniiti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi devadattena ekappahaara.m pa~nca bhikkhusataani ^a^P0.0161^ea^ bhinnaani, tena hi `tathaagato abhejjapariso'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, gambhiiro dunnive.thiyo, ga.n.thitopi ga.n.thitaro, etthaaya.m jano aava.to nivuto ovuto pihito pariyonaddho, ettha tava ~naa.nabala.m dassehi paravaadesuu''ti.

[03] ``abhejjapariso, mahaaraaja, tathaagato, devadattena ca ekappahaara.m pa~nca bhikkhusataani bhinnaani, ta~nca pana bhedakassa balena, bhedake vijjamaane natthi, mahaaraaja, abhejja.m naama. bhedake sati maataapi puttena bhijjati, puttopi maataraa bhijjati, pitaapi puttena bhijjati, puttopi pitaraa bhijjati, bhaataapi bhaginiyaa bhijjati, bhaginiipi bhaataraa bhijjati, sahaayopi ^a^M0.0162^ea^ sahaayena bhijjati, naavaapi naanaadaarusa"ngha.titaa uumivegasampahaarena bhijjati, rukkhopi madhukappasampannaphalo anilabalavegaabhihato bhijjati, suva.n.nampi jaatimanta.m {jaataruupampi (sii0)} lohena bhijjati. api ca, mahaaraaja, neso adhippaayo vi~n~nuuna.m, nesaa buddhaana.m adhimutti, neso pa.n.ditaana.m chando `tathaagato bhejjapariso'ti. api cettha kaara.na.m atthi, yena kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `abhejjapariso'ti. katama.m ettha kaara.na.m? tathaagatassa, mahaaraaja, katena adaanena vaa appiyavacanena vaa anatthacariyaaya vaa asamaanattataaya vaa yato kutoci cariya.m carantassapi parisaa bhinnaati na sutapubba.m, tena kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `abhejjapariso'ti. tayaapeta.m, mahaaraaja, ~naatabba.m `atthi ki~nci nava"nge buddhavacane suttaagata.m, iminaa naama kaara.nena bodhisattassa katena tathaagatassa parisaa bhinnaa'ti? ``natthi bhante, no ceta.m loke dissati nopi suyyati. saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] abhejjaparisapa~nho a.t.thamo.
[06] abhejjavaggo dutiyo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge a.t.tha pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0160^ea^ ^a^P0.0162^ea^ ^a^M0.0163^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaye caa'ti. puna ca `upaasako gihii sotaapanno pihitaapaayo di.t.thippatto vi~n~naatasaasano bhikkhu.m vaa saama.nera.m vaa puthujjana.m abhivaadeti paccu.t.thetii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaye caa'ti, tena hi `upaasako gihii sotaapanno pihitaapaayo di.t.thippatto vi~n~naatasaasano bhikkhu.m vaa saama.nera.m vaa puthujjana.m abhivaadeti paccu.t.thetii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi `upaasako gihii sotaapanno pihitaapaayo di.t.thippatto vi~n~naatasaasano bhikkhu.m vaa saama.nera.m vaa puthujjana.m abhivaadeti paccu.t.theti', tena hi `dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaye caati tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaye caa'ti, `upaasako ca gihii sotaapanno pihitaapaayo di.t.thippatto vi~n~naatasaasano bhikkhu.m vaa saama.nera.m vaa puthujjana.m abhivaadeti paccu.t.theti'. tattha pana kaara.na.m atthi. katama.m ta.m kaara.na.m?

[03] ``viisati kho panime, mahaaraaja, sama.nassa sama.nakara.naa dhammaa dve ca li"ngaani, yehi sama.no abhivaadanapaccu.t.thaanasamaananapuujanaaraho hoti. katame viisati sama.nassa sama.nakara.naa dhammaa dve ca li"ngaani? se.t.tho {se.t.thabhuumisayo (sii0 syaa0), se.t.tho yamo (pii0)} dhammaaraamo, aggo niyamo, caaro vihaaro sa.myamo sa.mvaro khanti soracca.m ekattacariyaa ekattaabhirati pa.tisallaana.m hiriottappa.m viiriya.m appamaado sikkhaasamaadaana.m {sikkhaapadhaana.m (sii0 syaa0), sukkaavadaana.m (ka0)} uddeso paripucchaa siilaadiabhirati niraalayataa sikkhaapadapaaripuuritaa, kaasaavadhaara.na.m ^a^V0.0161^ea^, bha.n.dubhaavo ^a^P0.0163^ea^. ime kho ^a^M0.0164^ea^, mahaaraaja, viisati sama.nassa sama.nakara.naa dhammaa dve ca li"ngaani. ete gu.ne bhikkhu samaadaaya vattati, so tesa.m dhammaana.m anuunattaa paripu.n.nattaa sampannattaa samannaagatattaa asekkhabhuumi.m arahantabhuumi.m okkamati, se.t.tha.m bhuumantara.m okkamati, arahattaasannagatoti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```khii.naasavehi so saama~n~na.m upagato, natthi me so samayo'ti {ta.m saama~n~na''nti (?)} arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```aggaparisa.m so upagato, naaha.m ta.m .thaana.m upagato'ti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```labhati so paatimokkhuddesa.m sotu.m, naaha.m ta.m labhaami sotu'nti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```so a~n~ne pabbaajeti upasampaadeti jinasaasana.m va.d.dheti, ahameta.m na labhaami kaatu'nti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```appamaa.nesu so sikkhaapadesu samattakaarii, naaha.m tesu vattaamii'ti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```upagato so sama.nali"nga.m, buddhaadhippaaye .thito, tenaaha.m li"ngena duuramapagato'ti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.
[03] ```paruu.lhakacchalomo so ana~njitaama.n.dito anulittasiilagandho, aha.m pana ma.n.danavibhuusanaabhirato'ti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, `ye te viisati sama.nakara.naa dhammaa dve ca li"ngaani, sabbepete dhammaa bhikkhussa sa.mvijjanti, so yeva te dhamme dhaareti, a~n~nepi tattha sikkhaapeti, so me aagamo ^a^V0.0162^ea^ sikkhaapana~nca natthii'ti arahati ^a^M0.0165^ea^ upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m ^a^P0.0164^ea^.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, raajakumaaro purohitassa santike vijja.m adhiiyati, khattiyadhamma.m sikkhati, so aparena samayena abhisitto aacariya.m abhivaadeti paccu.t.theti `sikkhaapako me aya'nti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, `bhikkhu sikkhaapako va.msadharo'ti arahati upaasako sotaapanno bhikkhu.m puthujjana.m abhivaadetu.m paccu.t.thaatu.m.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, iminaapeta.m pariyaayena jaanaahi bhikkhubhuumiyaa mahantata.m asamavipulabhaava.m. yadi, mahaaraaja, upaasako sotaapanno arahatta.m sacchikaroti, dveva tassa gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa tasmi.m yeva divase parinibbaayeyya vaa, bhikkhubhaava.m vaa upagaccheyya. acalaa hi saa, mahaaraaja, pabbajjaa, mahatii accuggataa, yadida.m bhikkhubhuumii''ti. ``~naa.nagato, bhante naagasena, pa~nho sunibbe.thito balavataa atibuddhinaa tayaa, na yima.m pa~nha.m samattho a~n~no eva.m vinive.thetu.m a~n~natra tavaadisena buddhimataa''ti.
[06] se.t.thadhammapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `tathaagato sabbasattaana.m ahitamapanetvaa hitamupadahatii'ti. puna ca bha.natha ^b^aggikkhandhuupame^eb^ dhammapariyaaye bha~n~namaane `sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata'nti. aggikkhandhuupama.m, bhante, dhammapariyaaya.m desentena tathaagatena sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m hitamapanetvaa ahitamupadahita.m. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato sabbasattaana.m ahitamapanetvaa hitamupadahati, tena hi aggikkhandhuupame dhammapariyaaye bha~n~namaane sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggatanti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi aggikkhandhuupame dhammapariyaaye bha~n~namaane sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata.m, tena ^a^P0.0165^ea^ hi tathaagato sabbasattaana.m ahitamapanetvaa hitamupadahatiiti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``tathaagato ^a^V0.0163^ea^ ^a^M0.0166^ea^, mahaaraaja, sabbasattaana.m ahitamapanetvaa hitamupadahati, aggikkhandhuupame dhammapariyaaye bha~n~namaane sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata.m, ta~nca pana na tathaagatassa katena, tesa.m yeva attano katenaa''ti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato aggikkhandhuupama.m dhammapariyaaya.m na bhaaseyya, api nu tesa.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggaccheyyaati, na hi, mahaaraaja, micchaapa.tipannaana.m tesa.m bhagavato dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa pari.laaho kaaye uppajji, tena tesa.m pari.laahena u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata''nti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatasseva katena tesa.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata.m, tathaagato yeva tattha adhikaaro tesa.m naasanaaya, yathaa naama, bhante naagasena, ahi vammika.m paviseyya, atha~n~nataro pa.msukaamo puriso vammika.m bhinditvaa pa.msu.m hareyya, tassa pa.msuhara.nena vammikassa susira.m pidaheyya, atha tattheva so assaasa.m alabhamaano mareyya, nanu so, bhante, ahi tassa purisassa katena mara.nappatto''ti. ``aama mahaaraajaa''ti. ``evameva kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagato yeva tattha adhikaaro tesa.m naasanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``tathaagato, mahaaraaja, dhamma.m desayamaano anunayappa.tigha.m na karoti, anunayappa.tighavippamutto dhamma.m deseti, eva.m dhamme desiiyamaane ye tattha sammaapa.tipannaa, te bujjhanti. ye pana micchaapa.tipannaa, te patanti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, purisassa amba.m vaa jambu.m vaa madhuka.m vaa caalayamaanassa yaani tattha phalaani saaraani da.lhabandhanaani, taani tattheva accutaani ti.t.thanti, yaani tattha phalaani puutiva.n.tamuulaani dubbalabandhanaani, taani ^a^P0.0166^ea^ patanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato dhamma.m desayamaano anunayappa.tigha.m na karoti, anunayappa.tighavippamutto dhamma.m deseti, eva.m dhamme desiiyamaane ye tattha sammaapa.tipannaa, te bujjhanti. ye pana micchaapa.tipannaa, te patanti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, kassako dha~n~na.m ropetukaamo khetta.m kasati, tassa kasantassa anekasatasahassaani ti.naani maranti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato paripakkamaanase satte bodhento {bodhetu.m (sii0)} anunayappa.tighavippamutto ^a^M0.0167^ea^ dhamma.m deseti, eva.m dhamme desiiyamaane ye tattha sammaapa.tipannaa, te bujjhanti. ye pana micchaapa.tipannaa, te ti.naani viya maranti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, manussaa rasahetu yantena ucchu.m pii.layanti, tesa.m ucchu.m pii.layamaanaana.m ye tattha yantamukhagataa kimayo, te pii.liyanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato ^a^V0.0164^ea^ paripakkamaanase satte bodhento dhammayantamabhipii.layati {dhammayantamatipii.layati (ka0)}, ye tattha micchaapa.tipannaa, te kimii viya marantii''ti.

[03] ``nanu, bhante naagasena, te bhikkhuu taaya dhammadesanaaya patitaa''ti? ``api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tacchako rukkha.m tacchanto {rakkhanto (sii0 pii0} ujuka.m parisuddha.m karotii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, vajjaniiya.m apanetvaa tacchako rukkha.m ujuka.m parisuddha.m karotii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato parisa.m rakkhanto na sakkoti bodhaneyye {abodhaniiye (syaa0)} satte bodhetu.m, micchaapa.tipanne pana satte apanetvaa bodhaneyye satte bodheti, attakatena pana te, mahaaraaja, micchaapa.tipannaa patanti.
[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kadalii ve.lu assatarii attajena {attajena phalena (sii0)} ha~n~nati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te micchaapa.tipannaa, te attakatena ha~n~nanti patanti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, coraa attakatena cakkhuppaa.tana.m suulaaropana.m siisacchedana.m paapu.nanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te micchaapa.tipannaa, te attakatena ha~n~nanti patanti ^a^P0.0167^ea^ {jinasaasanaa patanti (sii0 pii0)}. yesa.m, mahaaraaja, sa.t.thimattaana.m bhikkhuuna.m u.nha.m lohita.m mukhato uggata.m, tesa.m ta.m neva bhagavato katena, na paresa.m katena, atha kho attano yeva katena.

[01] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso sabbajanassa amata.m dadeyya, te ta.m amata.m asitvaa arogaa diighaayukaa sabbiitito {sabbiitiyaa (sii0)} parimucceyyu.m, atha~n~nataro puriso durupacaarena ta.m asitvaa mara.na.m paapu.neyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, amatadaayako puriso tatonidaana.m ki~nci apu~n~na.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa devamanussaana.m amata.m dhammadaana.m ^a^M0.0168^ea^ deti, ye te sattaa bhabbaa, te dhammaamatena bujjhanti. ye pana te sattaa abhabbaa, te dhammaamatena ha~n~nanti patanti. bhojana.m, mahaaraaja, sabbasattaana.m jiivita.m rakkhati, tamekacce bhu~njitvaa visuucikaaya maranti, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, bhojanadaayako puriso tatonidaana.m ki~nci apu~n~na.m aapajjeyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa devamanussaana.m amata.m dhammadaana.m deti, ye te sattaa bhabbaa, te dhammaamatena bujjhanti. ye pana te sattaa abhabbaa, te dhammaamatena ha~n~nanti patantii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] sabbasattahitaphara.napa~nho dutiyo.
[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0165^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m tathaagatena --
[21] ```kaayena sa.mvaro saadhu {dha0 pa0 361}, saadhu vaacaaya sa.mvaro.
[22] manasaa sa.mvaro saadhu, saadhu sabbattha sa.mvaro'ti..

[03] ``puna ca tathaagato catunna.m parisaana.m majjhe nisiiditvaa purato devamanussaana.m selassa braahma.nassa kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m dassesi. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa ^a^P0.0168^ea^ bha.nita.m `kaayena sa.mvaro saadhuu'ti, tena hi selassa braahma.nassa kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m dassesiiti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi selassa braahma.nassa kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m dasseti, tena hi `kaayena sa.mvaro saadhuu'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `kaayena sa.mvaro saadhuu'ti, selassa ca braahma.nassa kosohita.m vatthaguyha.m dassita.m. yassa kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagate ka"nkhaa uppannaa, tassa bodhanatthaaya bhagavaa iddhiyaa tappa.tibhaaga.m kaaya.m dasseti, so yeva ta.m paa.tihaariya.m passatii''ti.

[01] ``ko ^a^M0.0169^ea^ paneta.m, bhante naagasena, saddahissati, ya.m parisagato eko yeva ta.m guyha.m passati, avasesaa tattheva vasantaa na passantiiti. i"ngha me tva.m tattha kaara.na.m upadisa, kaara.nena ma.m sa~n~naapehii''ti. ``di.t.thapubbo pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, koci byaadhito puriso pariki.n.no ~naatimittehii''ti. ``aama bhante''ti. ``api nu kho saa, mahaaraaja, parisaa passateta.m vedana.m, yaaya so puriso vedanaaya vedayatii''ti. ``na hi bhante, attanaa yeva so, bhante, puriso vedayatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yasseva tathaagate ka"nkhaa uppannaa, tasseva tathaagato bodhanatthaaya iddhiyaa tappa.tibhaaga.m kaaya.m dasseti, so yeva ta.m paa.tihaariya.m passati.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, ka~ncideva purisa.m bhuuto aaviseyya, api nu kho saa, mahaaraaja, parisaa passati ta.m bhuutaagamana''nti? ``na hi, bhante, so yeva aaturo tassa bhuutassa aagamana.m passatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yasseva tathaagate ka"nkhaa uppannaa, tasseva ^a^V0.0166^ea^ tathaagato bodhanatthaaya iddhiyaa tappa.tibhaaga.m kaaya.m dasseti, so yeva ta.m paa.tihaariya.m passatii''ti.

[03] ``dukkara.m, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa kata.m, ya.m ekassapi adassaniiya.m, ta.m dassentenaa''ti. ``na, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa guyha.m dassesi ^a^P0.0169^ea^, iddhiyaa pana chaaya.m dassesii''ti. ``chaayaayapi, bhante, di.t.thaaya di.t.tha.m yeva hoti guyha.m, ya.m disvaa ni.t.tha.m gato''ti. ``dukkara~ncaapi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato karoti bodhaneyye satte bodhetu.m. yadi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato kiriya.m haapeyya, bodhaneyyaa sattaa na bujjheyyu.m. yasmaa ca kho, mahaaraaja, yoga~n~nuu tathaagato bodhaneyye satte bodhetu.m, tasmaa tathaagato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyaa bujjhanti, tena tena yogena bodhaneyye bodheti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhisakko sallakatto yena yena bhesajjena aaturo arogo hoti, tena tena bhesajjena aatura.m upasa"nkamati, vamaniiya.m vameti, virecaniiya.m vireceti, anulepaniiya.m anulimpeti, anuvaasaniiya.m anuvaaseti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato yena yena yogena bodhaneyyaa sattaa bujjhanti, tena tena yogena bodheti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0170^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, itthii muu.lhagabbhaa bhisakkassa adassaniiya.m guyha.m dasseti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato bodhaneyye satte bodhetu.m adassaniiya.m guyha.m iddhiyaa chaaya.m dassesi. natthi, mahaaraaja, adassaniiyo naama okaaso puggala.m upaadaaya. yadi, mahaaraaja, koci bhagavato hadaya.m disvaa bujjheyya, tassapi bhagavaa yogena hadaya.m dasseyya, yoga~n~nuu, mahaaraaja, tathaagato desanaakusalo.

[03] ``nanu, mahaaraaja, tathaagato therassa nandassa adhimutti.m jaanitvaa ta.m devabhavana.m netvaa devaka~n~naayo dassesi `iminaaya.m kulaputto bujjhissatii'ti, tena ca so kulaputto bujjhi. iti kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato anekapariyaayena subhanimitta.m hii.lento garahanto jigucchanto tassa bodhanahetu kaku.tapaadiniyo accharaayo dassesi. evampi tathaagato yoga~n~nuu desanaakusalo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagato therassa cuu.lapanthakassa bhaataraa nikka.d.dhitassa dukkhitassa dummanassa upagantvaa sukhuma.m co.lakha.n.da.m adaasi `iminaaya.m kulaputto bujjhissatii'ti ^a^V0.0167^ea^, so ^a^P0.0170^ea^ ca kulaputto tena kaara.nena jinasaasane vasiibhaava.m paapu.ni. evampi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato yoga~n~nuu desanaakusalo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagato braahma.nassa mogharaajassa yaava tatiya.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na byaakaasi `evamimassa kulaputtassa maano upasamissati, maanuupasamaa abhisamayo bhavissatii'ti, tena ca tassa kulaputtassa maano upasami, maanuupasamaa so braahma.no chasu abhi~n~naasu vasiibhaava.m paapu.ni. evampi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato yoga~n~nuu desanaakusalo''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, sunibbe.thito pa~nho bahuvidhehi kaara.nehi, gahana.m agahana.m kata.m, andhakaaro aaloko kato, ga.n.thi bhinno, bhaggaa paravaadaa, jinaputtaana.m cakkhu.m tayaa uppaadita.m, nippa.tibhaanaa titthiyaa, tva.m ga.nivarapavaramaasajjaa''ti.
[06] vatthaguyhanidassanapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0171^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro aavuso tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccarita.m, ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. puna ca tathaagato therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparaadhe paaraajika.m pa~n~napento pharusaahi vaacaahi moghapurisavaadena samudaacari, tena ca so thero moghapurisavaadena ma"nkucittavasena rundhitattaa vippa.tisaarii naasakkhi ariyamagga.m pa.tivijjhitu.m. yadi, bhante naagasena, parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccarita.m, tena hi tathaagatena therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparaadhe moghapurisavaadena samudaaci.n.nanti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi bhagavataa therassa sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparaadhe moghapurisavaadena ^a^P0.0171^ea^ samudaaci.n.na.m, tena hi parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccaritanti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro aavuso ^a^V0.0168^ea^ tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccarita.m, ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. aayasmato ca sudinnassa kalandaputtassa aparaadhe paaraajika.m pa~n~napentena bhagavataa moghapurisavaadena samudaaci.n.na.m, ta~nca pana adu.t.thacittena asaarambhena yaathaavalakkha.nena. ki~nca tattha yaathaavalakkha.na.m, yassa, mahaaraaja, puggalassa imasmi.m attabhaave catusaccaabhisamayo na hoti, tassa purisattana.m mogha.m a~n~na.m kayiramaana.m a~n~nena sambhavati, tena vuccati `moghapuriso'ti. iti, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa aayasmato sudinnassa kalandaputtassa sataavavacanena samudaaci.n.na.m, no abhuutavaadenaa''ti.

[03] ``sabhaavampi, bhante naagasena, yo akkosanto bha.nati, tassa maya.m kahaapa.na.m da.n.da.m dhaarema, aparaadho yeva so vatthu.m nissaaya visu.m vohaara.m aacaranto akkosatii''ti. ``atthi pana, mahaaraaja, sutapubba.m ^a^M0.0172^ea^ tayaa khalitassa abhivaadana.m vaa paccu.t.thaana.m vaa sakkaara.m vaa upaayanaanuppadaana.m vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, yato kutoci yattha katthaci khalito, so paribhaasanaaraho hoti tajjanaaraho, uttama"ngampissa chindanti hanantipi bandhantipi ghaatentipi jhaapentipii''ti {jaapentipiiti (sii0 pii0)}. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa kiriyaa yeva kataa, no akiriyaa''ti.

[03] ``kiriyampi, bhante naagasena, kurumaanena patiruupena kaatabba.m anucchavikena, savanenapi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatassa sadevako loko ottappati hiriyati bhiyyo dassanena tatuttari.m upasa"nkamanena payirupaasanenaa''ti. ``api ^a^P0.0172^ea^ nu kho, mahaaraaja, tikicchako abhisanne kaaye kupite dose sinehaniiyaani bhesajjaani detii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, ti.nhaani lekhaniiyaani bhesajjaani detii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato sabbakilesabyaadhivuupasamaaya anusi.t.thi.m deti, pharusaapi, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa vaacaa satte sinehayati, muduke karoti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, u.nhampi udaka.m ya.m ki~nci sinehaniiya.m sinehayati, muduka.m karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pharusaapi tathaagatassa vaacaa atthavatii hoti karu.naasahagataa. yathaa, mahaaraaja, pituvacana.m puttaana.m atthavanta.m hoti karu.naasahagata.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pharusaapi tathaagatassa vaacaa atthavatii hoti karu.naasahagataa. pharusaapi, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa vaacaa sattaana.m kilesappahaanaa {kilesappahaanaaya (sii0)} hoti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, duggandhampi gomutta.m piita.m virasampi agada.m khaayita.m sattaana.m byaadhi.m hanati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pharusaapi tathaagatassa vaacaa atthavatii karu.naasahagataa. yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahantopi tuulapu~njo {tuulapicu (sii0 syaa0)} parassa kaaye nipatitvaa ruja.m na karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pharusaapi tathaagatassa ^a^V0.0169^ea^ vaacaa na kassaci dukkha.m uppaadetii''ti. ``suvinicchito, bhante naagasena, pa~nho bahuuhi kaara.nehi, saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] pharusavaacaabhaavapa~nho catuttho.

[21] ```acetana.m braahma.na assu.nanta.m, jaano ajaanantamima.m palaasa.m.
[22] aaraddhaviiriyo dhuva.m appamatto, sukhaseyya.m pucchasi kissa hetuu'ti {jaa0 1.4.25}..

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, rukkho acetano, tena hi phandanena rukkhena bhaaradvaajena saha sallapitanti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi phandanena rukkhena bhaaradvaajena saddhi.m sallapita.m, tena hi rukkho acetanoti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppato, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[01] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `rukkho acetano'ti, phandanena ca rukkhena bhaaradvaajena saddhi.m sallapita.m, ta~nca pana vacana.m lokasama~n~naaya bha.nita.m. natthi, mahaaraaja, acetanassa rukkhassa sallaapo naama, api ca, mahaaraaja, tasmi.m rukkhe adhivatthaaya devataayeta.m adhivacana.m rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatiiti cesaa lokapa.n.natti, yathaa, mahaaraaja, saka.ta.m dha~n~nassa paripuurita.m dha~n~nasaka.tanti jano voharati, na ca ta.m dha~n~namaya.m saka.ta.m, rukkhamaya.m saka.ta.m, tasmi.m saka.te dha~n~nassa pana aakiritattaa dha~n~nasaka.tanti jano voharati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano, yaa pana tasmi.m rukkhe adhivatthaa devataa, tassaa yeva ta.m adhivacana.m rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatiiti cesaa lokapa.n.natti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0170^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, dadhi.m manthayamaano takka.m manthemiiti voharati, na ta.m takka.m, ya.m so mantheti, dadhi.m yeva so manthento takka.m manthemiiti voharati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano ^a^M0.0174^ea^. yaa pana tasmi.m rukkhe adhivatthaa devataa, tassaayeva ta.m adhivacana.m rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatiiti cesaa lokapa.n.natti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, asanta.m saadhetukaamo santa.m saadhemiiti voharati ^a^P0.0174^ea^, asiddha.m siddhanti voharati, evamesaa lokasama~n~naa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na rukkho sallapati, rukkho acetano. yaa pana tasmi.m rukkhe adhivatthaa devataa, tassaayeva ta.m adhivacana.m rukkhoti, rukkho sallapatiiti cesaa lokapa.n.natti, yaaya, mahaaraaja, lokasama~n~naaya jano voharati, tathaagatopi taayeva lokasama~n~naaya sattaana.m dhamma.m desetii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] rukkhaacetanaabhaavapa~nho pa~ncamo.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m dhammasa"ngiitikaarakehi therehi --

[22] aabaadha.m samphusii dhiiro, pabaa.lha.m maara.nantika'nti {dii0 ni0 2.190}..

[01] ``puna ca bhagavataa bha.nita.m `dveme, aananda, pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca. katame dve? ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhi, ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati. ime dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa, ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavato cundassa bhatta.m bhuttaavissa {bhu~njitvaa (sii0)} kharo aabaadho uppanno, pabaa.lhaa ca vedanaa pavattaa maara.nantikaa, tena hi `dveme, aananda, pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi dveme pi.n.dapaataa ^a^V0.0171^ea^ samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca ^a^M0.0175^ea^ mahaanisa.msataraa ca, tena hi bhagavato cundassa bhatta.m bhuttaavissa {bhu~njitvaa (sii0)} kharo aabaadho uppanno, pabaa.lhaa ca vedanaa pavattaa maara.nantikaati tampi vacana.m micchaa. ki.mnu kho, bhante naagasena, so pi.n.dapaato visagatataaya mahapphalo, roguppaadakataaya mahapphalo ^a^P0.0175^ea^, aayuvinaasakataaya mahapphalo, bhagavato jiivitahara.nataaya mahapphalo? tattha me kaara.na.m bruuhi paravaadaana.m niggahaaya, etthaaya.m jano sammuu.lho lobhavasena atibahu.m khaayitena lohitapakkhandikaa uppannaati. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.
[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, dhammasa"ngiitikaarakehi therehi --
[21] ```cundassa bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa, kammaarassaati me suta.m.
[22] aabaadha.m samphusii dhiiro, pabaa.lha.m maara.nantika'nti..

[03] ``bhagavataa ca bha.nita.m `dveme, aananda, pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa ca. katame dve? ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhi, ya~nca pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njitvaa tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati {parinibbaayi (sii0)}, ime dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa, ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa'ti.

[03] ``so pana pi.n.dapaato bahugu.no anekaanisa.mso. devataa, mahaaraaja, ha.t.thaa pasannamaanasaa `aya.m bhagavato pacchimo pi.n.dapaato'ti dibba.m oja.m suukaramaddave aakiri.msu. ta~nca pana sammaapaaka.m lahupaaka.m {bahupaaka.m (sii0)} manu~n~na.m bahurasa.m ja.t.tharaggitejassa hita.m. na, mahaaraaja, tatonidaana.m bhagavato koci anuppanno rogo uppanno, api ca, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pakatidubbale sariire khii.ne aayusa"nkhaare uppanno rogo bhiyyo abhiva.d.dhi.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pakatiyaa jalamaano aggi a~n~nasmi.m upaadaane dinne bhiyyo pajjalati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pakatidubbale sariire khii.ne aayusa"nkhaare uppanno rogo bhiyyo abhiva.d.dhi.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^P0.0176^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, soto ^a^M0.0176^ea^ pakatiyaa sandamaano abhivu.t.the mahaameghe bhiyyo mahogho ^a^V0.0172^ea^ udakavaahako hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pakatidubbale sariire khii.ne aayusa"nkhaare uppanno rogo bhiyyo abhiva.d.dhi.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, pakatiyaa abhisannadhaatu kucchi a~n~nasmi.m ajjhoharite bhiyyo aayameyya {aamayeyya (sii0)}, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pakatidubbale sariire khii.ne aayusa"nkhaare uppanno rogo bhiyyo abhiva.d.dhi, natthi, mahaaraaja, tasmi.m pi.n.dapaate doso, na ca tassa sakkaa dosa.m aaropetu''nti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, kena kaara.nena te dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa''ti? ``dhammaanumajjanasamaapattivasena, mahaaraaja, te dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katamesa.m dhammaana.m anumajjanasamaapattivasena te dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa''ti? ``navanna.m, mahaaraaja, anupubbavihaarasamaapattiina.m anulomappa.tilomasamaapajjanavasena te dve pi.n.dapaataa samasamaphalaa samavipaakaa ativiya a~n~nehi pi.n.dapaatehi mahapphalataraa ca mahaanisa.msataraa caa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, dviisu yeva divasesu adhimatta.m tathaagato navaanupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo anulomappa.tiloma.m samaapajjii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m bhante naagasena. ya.m imasmi.m buddhakkhette asadisa.m paramadaana.m, tampi imehi dviihi pi.n.dapaatehi aga.nita.m. acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena. yaava mahantaa navaanupubbavihaarasamaapattiyo, yatra hi naama navaanupubbavihaarasamaapattivasena ^a^P0.0177^ea^ daana.m mahapphalatara.m hoti mahaanisa.msatara~nca. saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] pi.n.dapaatamahapphalapa~nho cha.t.tho.
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0173^ea^ ^a^M0.0177^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m tathaagatena `abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m --
[21] ```puujetha na.m puujaniyassa dhaatu.m.
[22] eva.m karaa saggamito gamissathaa'ti..

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena bha.nita.m `abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti, tena hi `puujetha na.m puujaniyassa dhaatu.m, eva.m karaa saggamito gamissathaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `puujetha na.m puujaniyassa dhaatu.m, eva.m karaa saggamito gamissathaa'ti, tena hi `abyaava.taa tumhe aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[01] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti, puna ca bha.nita.m `puujetha na.m puujaniyassa dhaatu.m, eva.m karaa saggamito gamissathaa'ti, ta~nca pana na sabbesa.m jinaputtaana.m yeva aarabbha bha.nita.m `abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti. akamma.m heta.m, mahaaraaja, jinaputtaana.m ^a^P0.0178^ea^ yadida.m puujaa, sammasana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m, yoniso manasikaaro, satipa.t.thaanaanupassanaa, aaramma.nasaaraggaaho, kilesayuddha.m, sadatthamanuyu~njanaa, eta.m jinaputtaana.m kara.niiya.m, avasesaana.m devamanussaana.m puujaa kara.niiyaa.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahiyaa raajaputtaana.m hatthiassarathadhanutharulekhamuddaasikkhaakhaggamantasuti- sammutiyuddhayujjhaapanakiriyaa kara.niiyaa, avasesaana.m puthuvessasuddaana.m kasi va.nijjaa gorakkhaa kara.niiyaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, akamma.m heta.m jinaputtaana.m yadida.m puujaa, sammasana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m, yoniso manasikaaro, satipa.t.thaanaanupassanaa, aaramma.nasaaraggaaho, kilesayuddha.m, sadatthamanuyu~njanaa, eta.m jinaputtaana.m kara.niiya.m, avasesaana.m devamanussaana.m puujaa kara.niiyaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, braahma.namaa.navakaana.m iruveda.m yajuveda.m saamaveda.m athabba.naveda.m lakkha.na.m ^a^V0.0174^ea^ itihaasa.m puraa.na.m nigha.n.du ke.tubha.m akkharappabheda.m pada.m veyyaakara.na.m bhaasamagga.m uppaata.m supina.m nimitta.m cha.la"nga.m candaggaaha.m ^a^M0.0178^ea^ suuriyaggaaha.m sukkaraahucarita.m u.luggahayuddha.m {o.luggahayuddha.m (ka0)} devadundubhissara.m okkanti ukkaapaata.m bhuumikamma.m {bhuumikampa.m (sii0 pii0)} disaadaaha.m bhummantalikkha.m jotisa.m lokaayatika.m saacakka.m migacakka.m antaracakka.m missakuppaada.m saku.narutaravita.m {saku.naruta.m (sii0)} sikkhaa kara.niiyaa, avasesaana.m puthuvessasuddaana.m kasi va.nijjaa gorakkhaa kara.niiyaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, akamma.m heta.m jinaputtaana.m yadida.m puujaa, sammasana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m, yoniso manasikaaro, satipa.t.thaanaanupassanaa, aaramma.nasaaraggaaho, kilesayuddha.m, sadatthamanuyu~njanaa, eta.m jinaputtaana.m kara.niiya.m, avasesaana.m devamanussaana.m puujaa kara.niiyaa, tasmaa, mahaaraaja, tathaagato `maa ime akamme yu~njantu, kamme ime ^a^P0.0179^ea^ yu~njantuu'ti aaha `abyaava.taa tumhe, aananda, hotha tathaagatassa sariirapuujaayaa'ti. yadeta.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagato na bha.neyya, pattaciivarampi attano pariyaadaapetvaa bhikkhuu buddhapuuja.m yeva kareyyu''nti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] buddhapuujanapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `bhagavato gacchantassa aya.m acetanaa mahaapathavii ninna.m unnamati, unnata.m onamatii'ti, puna ca bha.natha `bhagavato paado sakalikaaya khato'ti. yaa saa sakalikaa bhagavato paade patitaa, kissa pana saa sakalikaa bhagavato paadaa na nivattaa. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavato gacchantassa aya.m acetanaa mahaapathavii ninna.m unnamati, unnata.m onamati, tena hi `bhagavato paado sakalikaaya khato'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi bhagavato paado sakalikaaya khato, tena hi `bhagavato gacchantassa aya.m acetanaa mahaapathavii ninna.m unnamati unnata.m onamatii'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``sacca.m ^a^M0.0179^ea^, mahaaraaja, attheta.m bhagavato gacchantassa aya.m acetanaa mahaapathavii ninna.m unnamati unnata.m onamati, bhagavato ca paado sakalikaaya khato, na ca pana saa sakalikaa attano dhammataaya patitaa, devadattassa upakkamena patitaa. devadatto, mahaaraaja, bahuuni jaatisatasahassaani bhagavati aaghaata.m bandhi, so tena aaghaatena `mahanta.m kuu.taagaarappamaa.na.m paasaa.na.m ^a^V0.0175^ea^ bhagavato upari paatessaamii'ti mu~nci. atha dve selaa pathavito u.t.thahitvaa ta.m paasaa.na.m sampa.ticchi.msu, atha nesa.m sampahaarena paasaa.nato papa.tikaa bhijjitvaa yena vaa tena vaa ^a^P0.0180^ea^ patantii bhagavato paade patitaa''ti.

[03] ``yathaa ca, bhante naagasena, dve selaa paasaa.na.m sampa.ticchi.msu, tatheva papa.tikaapi sampa.ticchitabbaa''ti? ``sampa.ticchitampi, mahaaraaja, idhekacca.m paggharati pasavati na .thaanamupagacchati, yathaa, mahaaraaja, udaka.m paa.ninaa gahita.m a"ngulantarikaahi paggharati pasavati na .thaanamupagacchati, khiira.m takka.m madhu.m sappi tesa.m maccharasa.m ma.msarasa.m paa.ninaa gahita.m a"ngulantarikaahi paggharati pasavati na .thaanamupagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sampa.ticchanattha.m upagataana.m dvinna.m selaana.m sampahaarena paasaa.nato papa.tikaa bhijjitvaa yena vaa tena vaa patantii bhagavato paade patitaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, sa.nhasukhumaa.nurajasama.m pu.lina.m mu.t.thinaa gahita.m a"ngulantarikaahi paggharati pasavati na .thaanamupagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sampa.ticchanattha.m upagataana.m dvinna.m selaana.m sampahaarena paasaa.nato papa.tikaa bhijjitvaa yena vaa tena vaa patantii bhagavato paade patitaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, kaba.lo mukhena gahito idhekaccassa mukhato muccitvaa paggharati pasavati na .thaanamupagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sampa.ticchanattha.m upagataana.m dvinna.m selaana.m sampahaarena paasaa.nato papa.tikaa bhijjitvaa yena vaa tena vaa patantii bhagavato paade patitaa''ti.

[03] ``hotu, bhante naagasena, selehi paasaa.no sampa.ticchito, atha papa.tikaayapi apaciti kaatabbaa yatheva mahaapathaviyaa''ti? ``dvaadasime, mahaaraaja, apaciti.m na karonti. katame dvaadasa? ratto raagavasena apaciti.m na karoti, du.t.tho dosavasena, muu.lho mohavasena, unnato ^a^M0.0180^ea^ maanavasena, niggu.no avisesataaya, atithaddho anisedhanataaya, hiino hiinasabhaavataaya, vacanakaro anissarataaya, paapo kadariyataaya, dukkhaapito pa.tidukkhaapanataaya, luddho ^a^P0.0181^ea^ lobhaabhibhuutataaya, aayuuhito atthasaadhanataaya {atthasaadhanena (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} apaciti.m na karoti. ime kho mahaaraaja dvaadasa apaciti.m na karonti. saa ca pana papa.tikaa paasaa.nasampahaarena ^a^V0.0176^ea^ bhijjitvaa animittakatadisaa yena vaa tena vaa patamaanaa bhagavato paade patitaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, sa.nhasukhumaa.nurajo anilabalasamaahato animittakatadiso yena vaa tena vaa abhikirati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, saa papa.tikaa paasaa.nasampahaarena bhijjitvaa animittakatadisaa yena vaa tena vaa patamaanaa bhagavato paade patitaa. yadi pana, mahaaraaja, saa papa.tikaa paasaa.nato visu.m na bhaveyya, tampi te selaa paasaa.napapa.tika.m uppatitvaa ga.nheyyu.m. esaa pana, mahaaraaja, papa.tikaa na bhuuma.t.thaa na aakaasa.t.thaa, paasaa.nasampahaaravegena bhijjitvaa animittakatadisaa yena vaa tena vaa patamaanaa bhagavato paade patitaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, vaatama.n.dalikaaya ukkhitta.m puraa.napa.n.na.m animittakatadisa.m yena vaa tena vaa patati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, esaa papa.tikaa paasaa.nasampahaaravegena animittakatadisaa yena vaa tena vaa patamaanaa bhagavato paade patitaa. api ca, mahaaraaja, akata~n~nussa kadariyassa devadattassa dukkhaanubhavanaaya papa.tikaa bhagavato paade patitaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] paadasakalikaahatapa~nho a.t.thamo.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hotii'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m --
[22] ```catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.na.m aahu loke'ti..

[03] tatrime ^a^M0.0181^ea^ cattaaro dhammaa khanti appaahaarataa rativippahaana.m aaki~nca~n~na.m. sabbaani panetaani aparikkhii.naasavassa ^a^P0.0182^ea^ sakilesasseva honti. yadi, bhante naagasena, aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hoti, tena hi `catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.na.m aahu loke'ti ^a^V0.0177^ea^ ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuto sama.no hoti, tena hi `aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hotii'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa, ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hotii'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.na.m aahu loke'ti. tadida.m, mahaaraaja, vacana.m tesa.m tesa.m puggalaana.m gu.navasena bha.nita.m `catubbhi dhammehi sama"ngibhuuta.m, ta.m ve nara.m sama.na.m aahu loke'ti, ida.m pana niravasesavacana.m `aasavaana.m khayaa sama.no hotii'ti.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, ye keci kilesuupasamaaya pa.tipannaa, te sabbe upaadaayupaadaaya sama.no khii.naasavo aggamakkhaayati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, yaani kaanici jalajathalajapupphaani, vassika.m tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, avasesaani yaani kaanici vividhaani pupphajaataani, sabbaani taani pupphaani yeva, upaadaayupaadaaya pana vassika.m yeva puppha.m janassa patthita.m pihayita.m. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci kilesuupasamaaya pa.tipannaa, te sabbe upaadaayupaadaaya sama.no khii.naasavo aggamakkhaayati.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, sabbadha~n~naana.m saali aggamakkhaayati, yaa kaaci avasesaa vividhaa dha~n~najaatiyo, taa sabbaa upaadaayupaadaaya ^a^P0.0183^ea^ bhojanaani sariirayaapanaaya, saali yeva tesa.m aggamakkhaayati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci kilesuupasamaaya pa.tipannaa, te sabbe upaadaayupaadaaya sama.no khii.naasavo aggamakkhaayatii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] aggaggasama.napa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0182^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `mama.m vaa, bhikkhave, pare va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, dhammassa vaa, sa"nghassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando, na somanassa.m, na ^a^V0.0178^ea^ cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya'nti puna ca tathaagato selassa braahma.nassa yathaabhucce va.n.ne bha~n~namaane aanandito sumano uppilaavito bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m pakittesi --
[21] ```raajaahamasmi selaati, dhammaraajaa anuttaro.
[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, cakka.m appa.tivattiya'nti {ma0 ni0 2.399}..

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `mama.m vaa, bhikkhave, pare va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando, na somanassa.m, na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya'nti, tena hi selassa braahma.nassa yathaabhucce va.n.ne bha~n~namaane aanandito sumano uppilaavito bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m pakittesiiti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi selassa braahma.nassa yathaabhucce va.n.ne bha~n~namaane aanandito sumano uppilaavito bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m pakittesi, tena hi `mama.m vaa, bhikkhave, pare va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando, na somanassa.m, na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0184^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `mama.m vaa, bhikkhave, pare va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando, na somanassa.m, na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya'nti. selassa ca braahma.nassa yathaabhucce va.n.ne bha~n~namaane bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m pakittita.m --
[21] ```raajaahamasmi selaati, dhammaraajaa anuttaro.
[22] dhammena cakka.m vattemi, cakka.m appa.tivattiya'nti..

[03] ``pa.thama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa dhammassa sabhaavasarasalakkha.na.m sabhaava.m avitatha.m bhuuta.m taccha.m tathattha.m paridiipayamaanena bha.nita.m `mama.m vaa bhikkhave, pare ^a^M0.0183^ea^ va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, dhammassa vaa sa"nghassa vaa va.n.na.m bhaaseyyu.m, tatra tumhehi na aanando, na somanassa.m, na cetaso uppilaavitatta.m kara.niiya'nti. ya.m pana bhagavataa selassa braahma.nassa yathaabhucce va.n.ne bha~n~namaane bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m pakittita.m `raajaahamasmi selaati, dhammaraajaa anuttaro'ti ta.m na laabhahetu, na yasahetu, na attahetu, na pakkhahetu, na antevaasikamyataaya, atha kho anukampaaya kaaru~n~nena ^a^V0.0179^ea^ hitavasena eva.m imassa dhammaabhisamayo bhavissati ti.n.na~nca maa.navakasataananti, eva.m bhiyyo uttari.m sakagu.na.m bha.nita.m `raajaahamasmi selaati, dhammaraajaa anuttaro'ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] va.n.nabha.nanapa~nho dasamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `ahi.msaya.m para.m loke, piyo hohisi maamako'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `nigga.nhe niggahaaraha.m, pagga.nhe paggahaaraha'nti. niggaho ^a^P0.0185^ea^ naama, bhante naagasena, hatthacchedo paadacchedo vadho bandhana.m kaara.naa maara.na.m santativikopana.m, na eta.m vacana.m bhagavato yutta.m, na ca bhagavaa arahati eta.m vacana.m vattu.m. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `ahi.msaya.m para.m loke, piyo hohisi maamako''ti, tena hi ``nigga.nhe niggahaaraha.m, pagga.nhe paggahaaraha''nti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m ``nigga.nhe niggahaaraha.m, pagga.nhe paggahaaraha''nti, tena hi ``ahi.msaya.m para.m loke, piyo hohisi maamako''ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `ahi.msaya.m para.m loke, piyo hohisi maamako'ti, bha.nita~nca `nigga.nhe niggahaaraha.m, pagga.nhe paggahaaraha'nti ^a^M0.0184^ea^. `ahi.msaya.m para.m loke, piyo hohisi maamako'ti sabbesa.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagataana.m anumata.m eta.m, esaa anusi.t.thi, esaa dhammadesanaa, dhammo hi, mahaaraaja, ahi.msaalakkha.no, sabhaavavacana.m eta.m. ya.m pana, mahaaraaja, tathaagato aaha `nigga.nhe niggahaaraha.m, pagga.nhe paggahaaraha'nti, bhaasaa esaa, uddhata.m, mahaaraaja, citta.m niggahetabba.m, liina.m citta.m paggahetabba.m. akusala.m citta.m niggahetabba.m, kusala.m citta.m paggahetabba.m. ayoniso manasikaaro niggahetabbo, yoniso manasikaaro paggahetabbo. micchaapa.tipanno ^a^P0.0186^ea^ niggahetabbo, sammaapa.tipanno paggahetabbo. anariyo niggahetabbo ariyo paggahetabbo. coro niggahetabbo, acoro paggahetabbo''ti.

[03] ``hotu, bhante naagasena, idaani tva.m paccaagatosi mama visaya.m, yamaha.m pucchaami, so me ^a^V0.0180^ea^ attho upagato. coro pana, bhante naagasena, nigga.nhantena katha.m niggahetabbo''ti? ``coro, mahaaraaja, nigga.nhantena eva.m niggahetabbo, paribhaasaniiyo paribhaasitabbo, da.n.daniiyo da.n.detabbo, pabbaajaniiyo pabbaajetabbo, bandhaniiyo bandhitabbo, ghaataniiyo ghaatetabbo''ti. ``ya.m pana, bhante naagasena, coraana.m ghaatana.m, ta.m tathaagataana.m anumata''nti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kissa pana coro anusaasaniiyo anumato tathaagataana''nti? ``yo so, mahaaraaja, ghaatiiyati, na so tathaagataana.m anumatiyaa ghaatiiyati, saya.mkatena so ghaatiiyati, api ca dhammaanusi.t.thiyaa anusaasiiyati, sakkaa pana, mahaaraaja, tayaa purisa.m akaaraka.m anaparaadha.m viithiya.m caranta.m gahetvaa ghaatayitu''nti? ``na sakkaa, bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nena, mahaaraajaa''ti? ``akaarakattaa, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na coro tathaagataana.m anumatiyaa ha~n~nati, saya.mkatena so ha~n~nati, ki.m panettha anusaasako ki~nci dosa.m aapajjatii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, tathaagataana.m anusi.t.thi sammaanusi.t.thi hotii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] ahi.msaaniggahapa~nho ekaadasamo.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0185^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmii'ti, puna ca tathaagato there saariputtamoggallaane saparise pa.naamesi, ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagato ^a^P0.0187^ea^ kupito parisa.m pa.naamesi, udaahu tu.t.tho pa.naamesi, eta.m taava jaanaahi ima.m naamaati? yadi, bhante naagasena, kupito parisa.m pa.naamesi, tena hi tathaagatassa kodho appa.tivattito, yadi tu.t.tho pa.naamesi, tena hi avatthusmi.m ajaanantena pa.naamitaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.
