[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `akkodhano vigatakhilohamasmii'ti, pa.naamitaa ca theraa saariputtamoggallaanaa saparisaa, ta~nca pana na kopena, idha, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso mahaapathaviyaa muule vaa khaa.nuke vaa paasaa.ne vaa ka.thale vaa visame vaa bhuumibhaage khalitvaa patati, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, mahaapathavii kupitaa ta.m paatetii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, natthi mahaapathaviyaa kopo vaa pasaado vaa, anunayappa.tighavippamuttaa mahaapathavii, sayameva so alaso khalitvaa ^a^V0.0181^ea^ patitoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi tathaagataana.m kopo vaa pasaado vaa, anunayappa.tighavippamuttaa tathaagataa arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, atha kho saya.m kateneva te attano aparaadhena pa.naamitaa.

[03] ``idha pana, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippameva nicchubhati thala.m ussaareti. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo kupito ta.m ku.napa.m nicchubhatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, natthi mahaasamuddassa kopo vaa pasaado vaa, anunayappa.tighavippamutto mahaasamuddo''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi tathaagataana.m kopo vaa pasaado vaa, anunayappa.tighavippamuttaa tathaagataa arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, atha kho saya.m kateneva te attano aparaadhena pa.naamitaa.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa khalito patiiyati, eva.m jinasaasanavare khalito pa.naamiiyati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, samudde mata.m ku.napa.m ^a^P0.0188^ea^ nicchubhiiyati ^a^M0.0186^ea^, eva.m jinasaasanavare khalito pa.naamiiyati. ya.m pana te, mahaaraaja, tathaagato pa.naamesi, tesa.m atthakaamo hitakaamo sukhakaamo visuddhikaamo `eva.m ime jaatijaraabyaadhimara.nehi parimuccissantii'ti pa.naamesii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] bhikkhupa.naamitapa~nho dvaadasamo.
[06] pa.naamitavaggo tatiyo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge dvaadasa pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0182^ea^ ^a^M0.0187^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m iddhimantaana.m yadida.m mahaamoggallaano'ti. puna ca kira so lagu.lehi paripothito bhinnasiiso sa~ncu.n.nita.t.thima.msadhamanichinnaparigatto parinibbuto {dhamanimajjaparikatto (sii0 pii0), dhammanimi~njaparigatto (syaa0)}. yadi, bhante naagasena, thero mahaamoggallaano iddhiyaa ko.ti.m gato, tena hi lagu.lehi pothito parinibbutoti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi lagu.lehi paripothito parinibbuto, tena hi iddhiyaa ko.ti.m gatoti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ki.m na samattho iddhiyaa attano upaghaata.m apanayitu.m, sadevakassapi lokassa pa.tisara.na.m bhavitu.m arahoti? ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m iddhimantaana.m yadida.m mahaamoggallaano'ti. aayasmaa ca mahaamoggallaano lagu.lahato parinibbuto, ta~nca pana kammaadhiggahitenaa''ti.

[03] ``nanu, bhante naagasena, iddhimato iddhivisayopi ^a^P0.0189^ea^ kammavipaakopi dve acintiyaa, acintiyena acintiya.m apanayitabba.m. yathaa naama, bhante, keci phalakaamaa kapitthena kapittha.m pothenti, ambena amba.m pothenti, evameva kho, bhante naagasena, acintiyena acintiya.m pothayitvaa apanetabba''nti? ``acintiyaanampi, mahaaraaja, eka.m adhimatta.m balavatara.m, yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahiyaa raajaano honti samajaccaa, samajaccaanampi tesa.m eko sabbe abhibhavitvaa aa.na.m pavatteti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m acintiyaana.m kammavipaaka.m yeva adhimatta.m balavatara.m, kammavipaaka.m yeva sabbe abhibhaviya aa.na.m pavatteti, kammaadhiggahitassa avasesaa kiriyaa okaasa.m na labhanti.

[03] ``idha ^a^V0.0183^ea^ ^a^M0.0188^ea^ pana, mahaaraaja, koci puriso kismi~ncideva pakara.ne aparajjhati, na tassa maataa vaa pitaa vaa bhaginii vaa bhaataro vaa sakhii vaa sahaayakaa vaa {bhaginibhaataro vaa sakhisahaayakaa vaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} taayanti, atha kho raajaa yeva tattha abhibhaviya aa.na.m pavatteti. ki.m tattha kaara.na.m? aparaadhikataa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m acintiyaana.m kammavipaaka.m yeva adhimatta.m balavatara.m, kammavipaaka.m yeva sabbe abhibhaviya aa.na.m pavatteti, kammaadhiggahitassa avasesaa kiriyaa okaasa.m na labhanti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, mahiyaa dava.daahe samu.t.thite gha.tasahassampi udaka.m na sakkoti nibbaapetu.m, atha kho aggi yeva tattha abhibhaviya aa.na.m pavatteti. ki.m tattha kaara.na.m? balavataa tejassa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m acintiyaana.m kammavipaaka.m yeva adhimatta.m balavatara.m, kammavipaaka.m yeva sabbe abhibhaviya aa.na.m pavatteti, kammaadhiggahitassa avasesaa kiriyaa okaasa.m na labhanti, tasmaa, mahaaraaja, aayasmato mahaamoggallaanassa kammaadhiggahitassa lagu.lehi pothiyamaanassa iddhiyaa samannaahaaro naahosii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] iddhikammavipaakapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0190^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `tathaagatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo viva.to virocati no pa.ticchanno'ti. puna ca paatimokkhuddeso kevala~nca vinayapi.taka.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m. yadi, bhante naagasena, jinasaasane yutta.m vaa patta.m vaa samaya.m labhetha, vinayapa.n.natti viva.taa sobheyya. kena kaara.nena? kevala.m tattha sikkhaa sa.myamo niyamo siilagu.naaacaarapa.n.natti attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `tathaagatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo viva.to virocati no pa.ticchanno'ti, tena hi `paatimokkhuddeso kevala~nca vinayapi.taka.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna'nti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi paatimokkhuddeso kevala~nca vinayapi.taka.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m, tena hi `tathaagatappavedito, ^a^M0.0189^ea^ bhikkhave, dhammavinayo viva.to virocati no pa.ticchanno'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^V0.0184^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `tathaagatappavedito, bhikkhave, dhammavinayo viva.to virocati no pa.ticchanno'ti. puna ca paatimokkhuddeso kevala~nca vinayapi.taka.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m, ta~nca pana na sabbesa.m, siima.m katvaa pihita.m.

[03] ``tividhena, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito, pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m va.msavasena paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito, dhammassa garukattaa pihito, bhikkhubhuumiyaa garukattaa pihito.

[03] ``katha.m pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m va.msavasena paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito, eso va.mso, mahaaraaja, sabbesa.m pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m yadida.m bhikkhumajjhe paatimokkhuddeso avasesaana.m pihito. yathaa, mahaaraaja, khattiyaana.m khattiyamaayaa khattiyesu yeva carati, evameta.m khattiyaana.m lokassa pave.nii avasesaana.m pihitaa. evameva ^a^P0.0191^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, eso va.mso sabbesa.m pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m yadida.m bhikkhumajjhe paatimokkhuddeso avasesaana.m pihito.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, mahiyaa ga.naa vattanti, seyyathida.m, mallaa ato.naa pabbataa dhammagiriyaa brahmagiriyaa na.takaa naccakaa la"nghakaa pisaacaa ma.nibhaddaa pu.n.nabaddhaa candimasuuriyaa siridevataa kaalidevataa, sivaa vasudevaa ghanikaa asipaasaa bhaddiputtaati, tesa.m tesa.m rahassa.m tesu tesu ga.nesu yeva carati, avasesaana.m pihita.m. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, eso va.mso sabbesa.m pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m yadida.m bhikkhumajjhe paatimokkhuddeso avasesaana.m pihito. eva.m pubbakaana.m tathaagataana.m va.msavasena paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito.

[03] ``katha.m dhammassa garukattaa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito? dhammo, mahaaraaja, garuko bhaariyo, tattha sammattakaarii a~n~na.m aaraadheti, ta.m tattha paramparaasammattakaaritaaya paapu.naati, na ta.m tattha paramparaasammattakaaritaaya paapu.naati, maa caaya.m saaradhammo varadhammo ^a^M0.0190^ea^ asammattakaariina.m hatthagato o~n~naato ava~n~naato hii.lito khii.lito garahito bhavatu, maa caaya.m saaradhammo varadhammo dujjanagato o~n~naato ava~n~naato hii.lito khii.lito garahito bhavatuuti. eva.m dhammassa garukattaa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, saaravarapavaraabhijaatajaatimantarattalohitacandana.m naama savarapuramanugata.m o~n~naata.m ava~n~naata.m hii.lita.m khii.lita.m garahita.m bhavati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, maa caaya.m saaradhammo ^a^V0.0185^ea^ varadhammo paramparaaasammattakaariina.m hatthagato o~n~naato ava~n~naato hii.lito khii.lito garahito bhavatu, maa caaya.m saaradhammo varadhammo dujjanagato o~n~naato ava~n~naato hii.lito khii.lito garahito bhavatuuti. eva.m dhammassa garukattaa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito ^a^P0.0192^ea^.

[03] ``katha.m bhikkhubhuumiyaa garukattaa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito, bhikkhubhaavo kho, mahaaraaja, loke atuliyo appamaa.no anagghiyo, na sakkaa kenaci agghaapetu.m tuletu.m parimetu.m, maaya.m evaruupe bhikkhubhaave .thito lokena samasamo bhavatuuti bhikkhuuna.m yeva antare paatimokkhuddeso carati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, loke varapavarabha.n.da.m vattha.m vaa atthara.na.m vaa gajatura"ngarathasuva.n.narajatama.nimuttaaitthiratanaadiini vaa vijitakammasuuraa vaa {nijjitakammasuuraa vaa (sii0 pii0)} sabbe te raajaanamupagacchanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yaavataa loke {loke sikkhaa (sii0 pii0)} sugataagamapariyattiaacaarasa.myamasiilasa.mvaragu.naa, sabbe te bhikkhusa"nghamupagataa bhavanti. eva.m bhikkhubhuumiyaa garukattaa paatimokkhuddeso siima.m katvaa pihito''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampi.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] dhammavinayapa.ticchannaapa.ticchannapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `sampajaanamusaavaade paaraajiko hotii'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `sampajaanamusaavaade lahuka.m aapatti.m ^a^M0.0191^ea^ aapajjati ekassa santike desanaavatthuka'nti. bhante naagasena, ko panettha viseso, ki.m kaara.na.m, ya~ncekena musaavaadena ucchijjati, ya~ncekena musaavaadena satekiccho hoti? yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sampajaanamusaavaade paaraajiko hotii'ti, tena hi `sampajaanamusaavaade lahuka.m aapatti.m aapajjati ekassa santike desanaavatthuka'nti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `sampajaanamusaavaade lahuka.m aapatti.m aapajjati ekassa santike desanaavatthuka'nti, tena hi `sampajaanamusaavaade paaraajiko hotii'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0193^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `sampajaanamusaavaade paaraajiko hotii'ti. bha.nita~nca ^a^V0.0186^ea^ `sampajaanamusaavaade lahuka.m aapatti.m aapajjati ekassa santike desanaavatthuka'nti, ta~nca pana vatthuvasena garukalahuka.m hoti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, mahaaraaja, idha koci puriso parassa paa.ninaa pahaara.m dadeyya, tassa tumhe ki.m da.n.da.m dhaarethaa''ti? ``yadi so, bhante, aaha `nakkhamaamii'ti, tassa maya.m akkhamamaane kahaapa.na.m haraapemaa''ti ``idha pana, mahaaraaja, so yeva puriso tava paa.ninaa pahaara.m dadeyya, tassa pana ko da.n.do''ti? ``hatthampissa, bhante, chedaapeyyaama, paadampi chedaapeyyaama, yaava siisa.m ka.liiracchejja.m chedaapeyyaama, sabbampi ta.m geha.m vilumpaapeyyaama, ubhatopakkhe {ubhatopasse (sii0 pii0 ka0)} yaava sattama.m kula.m samugghaataapeyyaamaa''ti. ``ko panettha, mahaaraaja, viseso, ki.m kaara.na.m, ya.m ekassa paa.nippahaare sukhumo kahaapa.no da.n.do, ya.m tava paa.nippahaare hatthacchejja.m paadacchejja.m yaava ka.liiracchejja.m sabbagehaadaana.m ubhatopakkhe yaava sattamakulaa samugghaato''ti? ``manussantarena, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sampajaanamusaavaado vatthuvasena garukalahuko hotii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] musaavaadagarulahubhaavapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0192^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa ^b^dhammataadhammapariyaaye^eb^ `pubbeva bodhisattaana.m maataapitaro niyataa honti, bodhi niyataa hoti, aggasaavakaa niyataa honti, putto niyato hoti, upa.t.thaako niyato hotii'ti. puna ca tumhe bha.natha `tusite kaaye .thito bodhisatto a.t.tha mahaavilokanaani viloketi, kaala.m viloketi, diipa.m viloketi, desa.m viloketi, kula.m viloketi, janetti.m viloketi, aayu.m viloketi, maasa.m viloketi, nekkhamma.m viloketii'ti. bhante ^a^P0.0194^ea^ naagasena, aparipakke ~naa.ne bujjhana.m natthi, paripakke ~naa.ne na sakkaa nimesantarampi aagametu.m, anatikkamaniiya.m paripakkamaanasa.m. kasmaa bodhisatto kaala.m vilokehi `kamhi kaale uppajjaamii'ti. aparipakke ~naa.ne bujjhana.m natthi, paripakke ~naa.ne na sakkaa nimesantarampi aagametu.m, kasmaa bodhisatto kula.m viloketi `kumhi kule uppajjaamii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, pubbeva bodhisattassa maataapitaro niyataa, tena hi `kula.m viloketii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi kula.m viloketi, tena hi `pubbeva bodhisattassa maataapitaro niyataa'ti ^a^V0.0187^ea^ tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``niyataa, mahaaraaja, pubbeva bodhisattassa maataapitaro, kula~nca bodhisatto viloketi. kinti pana kula.m viloketi `ye me maataapitaro, te khattiyaa udaahu braahma.naa'ti. eva.m kula.m viloketi.

[03] ``a.t.thanna.m, mahaaraaja, pubbeva anaagata.m oloketabba.m hoti. katamesa.m a.t.thanna.m? vaa.nijassa, mahaaraaja, pubbeva vikkayabha.n.da.m oloketabba.m hoti, hatthinaagassa pubbeva so.n.daaya anaagato maggo oloketabbo hoti, saaka.tikassa pubbeva anaagata.m tittha.m oloketabba.m hoti, niyaamakassa pubbeva anaagata.m tiira.m oloketvaa naavaa pesetabbaa hoti, bhisakkassa pubbeva aayu.m oloketvaa aaturo upasa"nkamitabbo hoti, uttarasetussa pubbeva thiraathirabhaava.m jaanitvaa abhiruhitabba.m hoti, bhikkhussa pubbeva anaagata.m kaala.m paccavekkhitvaa bhojana.m bhu~njitabba.m hoti, bodhisattaana.m pubbeva kula.m oloketabba.m hoti ^a^M0.0193^ea^ `khattiyakula.m vaa braahma.nakula.m vaa'ti. imesa.m kho, mahaaraaja, a.t.thanna.m pubbeva anaagata.m oloketabba.m hotii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] bodhisattadhammataapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0195^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `na, bhikkhave, attaana.m paatetabba.m, yo paateyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo'ti. puna ca tumhe bha.natha `yattha katthaci bhagavaa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desayamaano anekapariyaayena jaatiyaa jaraaya byaadhino mara.nassa samucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, yo hi koci jaatijaraabyaadhimara.na.m samatikkamati, ta.m paramaaya pasa.msaaya pasa.msatii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `na, bhikkhave, attaana.m paatetabba.m, yo paateyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo'ti, tena hi `jaatiyaa jaraaya byaadhino mara.nassa samucchedaaya dhamma.m desetii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi jaatiyaa jaraaya byaadhino mara.nassa samucchedaaya dhamma.m deseti, tena hi `na, bhikkhave, attaana.m paatetabba.m, yo paateyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo''ti tampi ^a^V0.0188^ea^ vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `na, bhikkhave, attaana.m paatetabba.m, yo paateyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo'ti. yattha katthaci bhagavataa saavakaana.m dhamma.m desayaamaanena ca anekapariyaayena jaatiyaa jaraaya byaadhino mara.nassa samucchedaaya dhammo desito, tattha pana kaara.na.m atthi, yena bhagavaa kaara.nena pa.tikkhipi samaadapesi caa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m panettha, bhante naagasena, kaara.na.m, yena bhagavaa kaara.nena pa.tikkhipi samaadapesi caa''ti? ``siilavaa, mahaaraaja, siilasampanno agadasamo sattaana.m kilesavisavinaasane, osadhasamo sattaana.m kilesabyaadhivuupasame, udakasamo sattaana.m kilesarajojallaapahara.ne, ma.niratanasamo sattaana.m sabbasampattidaane, naavaasamo sattaana.m caturoghapaaragamane, satthavaahasamo sattaana.m jaatikantaarataara.ne, vaatasamo sattaana.m ^a^M0.0194^ea^ tividhaggisantaapanibbaapane, mahaameghasamo sattaana.m maanasaparipuura.ne, aacariyasamo sattaana.m kusalasikkhaapane, sudesakasamo sattaana.m khemapathamaacikkha.ne. evaruupo, mahaaraaja, bahugu.no anekagu.no appamaa.nagu.no gu.naraasi ^a^P0.0196^ea^ gu.napu~njo sattaana.m va.d.dhikaro siilavaa `maa vinassii'ti sattaana.m anukampaaya bhagavaa sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napesi `na, bhikkhave, attaana.m paatetabba.m, yo paateyya, yathaadhammo kaaretabbo'ti. idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena bhagavaa pa.tikkhipi. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena kumaarakassapena vicitrakathikena paayaasiraaja~n~nassa paraloka.m diipayamaanena `yathaa yathaa kho raaja~n~na sama.nabraahma.naa siilavanto kalyaa.nadhammaa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti, tathaa tathaa bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti, bahujanahitaaya ca pa.tipajjanti bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana'nti.

[03] ``kena pana kaara.nena bhagavaa samaadapesi? jaatipi, mahaaraaja, dukkhaa, jaraapi dukkhaa, byaadhipi dukkho, mara.nampi dukkha.m, sokopi dukkho, paridevopi dukkho, dukkhampi dukkha.m, domanassampi dukkha.m, upaayaasopi dukkho, appiyehi sampayogopi dukkho, piyehi vippayogopi dukkho, maatumara.nampi dukkha.m, pitumara.nampi dukkha.m, bhaatumara.nampi dukkha.m, bhaginimara.nampi dukkha.m, puttamara.nampi dukkha.m, daaramara.nampi dukkha.m, daasamara.nampi dukkha.m {ida.m vaakya.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu natthi}, ~naatimara.nampi dukkha.m, ~naatibyasanampi dukkha.m, rogabyasanampi dukkha.m, bhogabyasanampi dukkha.m, siilabyasanampi dukkha.m, di.t.thibyasanampi dukkha.m, raajabhayampi dukkha.m, corabhayampi dukkha.m, veribhayampi ^a^V0.0189^ea^ dukkha.m, dubbhikkhabhayampi dukkha.m, aggibhayampi dukkha.m, udakabhayampi dukkha.m, uumibhayampi dukkha.m, aava.t.tabhayampi dukkha.m, kumbhiilabhayampi dukkha.m, susukaabhayampi dukkha.m, attaanuvaadabhayampi dukkha.m, paraanuvaadabhayampi dukkha.m, da.n.dabhayampi dukkha.m, duggatibhayampi dukkha.m, parisaasaarajjabhayampi dukkha.m, aajiivakabhayampi dukkha.m, mara.nabhayampi dukkha.m, vettehi taa.lanampi ^a^P0.0197^ea^ dukkha.m, kasaahi taa.lanampi dukkha.m, addhada.n.dakehi taa.lanampi dukkha.m, hatthacchedanampi dukkha.m, paadacchedanampi dukkha.m, hatthapaadacchedanampi dukkha.m, ka.n.nacchedanampi dukkha.m, naasacchedanampi dukkha.m, ka.n.nanaasacchedanampi dukkha.m, bila"ngathaalikampi dukkha.m, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi dukkha.m, raahumukhampi dukkha.m, jotimaalikampi dukkha.m, hatthapajjotikampi dukkha.m, erakavattikampi dukkha.m, ciirakavaasikampi dukkha.m, e.neyyakampi dukkha.m ^a^M0.0195^ea^, ba.lisama.msikampi dukkha.m, kahaapa.nikampi dukkha.m, khaaraapatacchikampi dukkha.m, palighaparivattikampi dukkha.m, palaalapii.thakampi dukkha.m, tattena telena osi~ncanampi dukkha.m, sunakhehi khaadaapanampi dukkha.m, jiivasuulaaropanampi dukkha.m, asinaa siisacchedanampi dukkha.m, evaruupaani, mahaaraaja, bahuvidhaani anekavidhaani dukkhaani sa.msaaragato anubhavati.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, himavantapabbate abhivu.t.tha.m udaka.m ga"ngaaya nadiyaa paasaa.na sakkhara khara marumba aava.t.ta gaggalaka uumikava"nkacadika aavara.naniivara.namuulakasaakhaasu pariyottharati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, evaruupaani bahuvidhaani anekavidhaani dukkhaani sa.msaaragato anubhavati. pavatta.m, mahaaraaja, dukkha.m, appavatta.m sukha.m. appavattassa gu.na.m pavattassa {pavatte (sii0 pii0 ka0)} ca bhaya.m diipayamaano, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa appavattassa sacchikiriyaaya jaatijaraabyaadhimara.nasamatikkamaaya samaadapesi, idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena bhagavaa samaadapesii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, sunibbe.thito pa~nho, sukathita.m kaara.na.m, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] attanipaatanapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0198^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `mettaaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiyaa aasevitaaya bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya ekaadasaanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame ekaadasa? sukha.m supati, sukha.m pa.tibujjhati ^a^V0.0190^ea^, na paapaka.m supina.m passati, manussaana.m piyo hoti, amanussaana.m piyo hoti, devataa rakkhanti, naassa aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati {sattha.m kamati (syaa0) a0 ni0 11.15 passitabba.m}, tuva.ta.m citta.m samaadhiyati, mukhava.n.no vippasiidati, asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, uttari.m appa.tivijjhanto brahmalokuupago hotii'ti. puna ca tumhe bha.natha `saamo kumaaro mettaavihaarii migasa"nghena parivuto pavane vicaranto pii.liyakkhena ra~n~naa viddho visapiitena sallena tattheva mucchito patito'ti.

[03] ``yadi ^a^M0.0196^ea^, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `mettaaya bhikkhave...pe0... brahmalokuupago hotii'ti, tena hi ``saamo kumaaro mettaavihaarii migasa"nghena parivuto pavane vicaranto pii.liyakkhena ra~n~naa viddho visapiitena sallena tattheva mucchito patito'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi saamo kumaaro mettaavihaarii migasa"nghena parivuto pavane vicaranto pii.liyakkhena ra~n~naa viddho visapiitena sallena tattheva mucchito patito, tena hi `mettaaya, bhikkhave...pe0... sattha.m vaa kamatii'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho sunipu.no parisa.nho sukhumo gambhiiro, api sunipu.naana.m manujaana.m gatte seda.m moceyya, so tavaanuppatto, vija.tehi ta.m mahaaja.taaja.tita.m, anaagataana.m jinaputtaana.m cakkhu.m dehi nibbaahanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `mettaaya bhikkhave...pe0.. sattha.m vaa kamatii'ti. saamo ca kumaaro mettaavihaarii migasa"nghena parivuto pavane vicaranto pii.liyakkhena ra~n~naa viddho visapiitena sallena tattheva mucchito patito, tattha pana, ^a^P0.0199^ea^ mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m atthi. katama.m tattha kaara.na.m? nete, mahaaraaja, gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa, saamo, mahaaraaja, kumaaro gha.ta.m ukkhipanto tasmi.m kha.ne mettaabhaavanaaya pamatto ahosi.

[03] ``yasmi.m, mahaaraaja, kha.ne puggalo metta.m samaapanno hoti, na tassa puggalassa tasmi.m kha.ne aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati. tassa ye keci ahitakaamaa upagantvaa ta.m na passanti, na tasmi.m okaasa.m labhanti. nete, mahaaraaja, gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa. idha, mahaaraaja, puriso sa"ngaamasuuro abhejjakavacajaalika.m sannayhitvaa sa"ngaama.m otareyya, tassa saraa khittaa upagantvaa patanti vikiranti, na tasmi.m okaasa.m labhanti, neso, mahaaraaja, gu.no sa"ngaamasuurassa, abhejjakavacajaalikaayeso gu.no, yassa saraa khittaa upagantvaa patanti vikiranti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nete gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa.

[03] ``yasmi.m ^a^V0.0191^ea^, mahaaraaja, kha.ne puggalo metta.m samaapanno hoti, na tassa puggalassa tasmi.m kha.ne aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati. tassa ye keci ahitakaamaa upagantvaa ta.m na passanti, tasmi.m okaasa.m na labhanti, nete ^a^M0.0197^ea^, mahaaraaja, gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa. idha pana, mahaaraaja, puriso dibba.m antaradhaana.m muula.m hatthe kareyya, yaava ta.m muula.m tassa hatthagata.m hoti, taava na a~n~no koci pakatimanusso ta.m purisa.m passati. neso, mahaaraaja, gu.no purisassa, muulasseso gu.no antaradhaanassa, ya.m so pakatimanussaana.m cakkhupathe na dissati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nete gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa.

[03] ``yasmi.m, mahaaraaja, kha.ne puggalo metta.m samaapanno hoti, na tassa puggalassa tasmi.m kha.ne aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati. tassa ye keci ahitakaamaa upagantvaa ta.m na passanti, na tasmi.m okaasa.m labhanti. nete, mahaaraaja, gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa. yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, purisa.m ^a^P0.0200^ea^ sukata.m mahaale.namanuppavi.t.tha.m mahatimahaamegho abhivassanto na sakkoti temayitu.m, neso, mahaaraaja, gu.no purisassa, mahaale.nasseso gu.no, ya.m mahaamegho abhivassamaano na ta.m temeti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nete gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa.

[03] ``yasmi.m, mahaaraaja, kha.ne puggalo metta.m samaapanno hoti, na tassa puggalassa tasmi.m kha.ne aggi vaa visa.m vaa sattha.m vaa kamati. tassa ye keci ahitakaamaa upagantvaa ta.m na passanti, na tassa sakkonti ahita.m kaatu.m nete, mahaaraaja, gu.naa puggalassa, mettaabhaavanaayete gu.naa''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m bhante naagasena, sabbapaapanivaara.naa mettaabhaavanaa''ti. ``sabbakusalagu.naavahaa, mahaaraaja, mettaabhaavanaa hitaanampi ahitaanampi, ye te sattaa vi~n~naa.nabaddhaa, sabbesa.m mahaanisa.msaa mettaabhaavanaa sa.mvibhajitabbaa''ti.
[06] mettaabhaavanaanisa.msapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena `kusalakaarissapi akusalakaarissapi vipaako samasamo, udaahu koci ^a^V0.0192^ea^ viseso atthii'ti? ``atthi, mahaaraaja, kusalassa ^a^M0.0198^ea^ ca akusalassa ca viseso, kusala.m, mahaaraaja, sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m, akusala.m dukkhavipaaka.m nirayasa.mvattanika''nti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `devadatto ekantaka.nho, ekantaka.nhehi dhammehi samannaagato, bodhisatto ekantasukko, ekantasukkehi dhammehi samannaagato'ti. puna ca devadatto bhave bhave yasena ca pakkhena ca bodhisattena samasamo hoti, kadaaci adhikataro vaa. yadaa devadatto nagare baaraa.nasiya.m brahmadattassa ra~n~no purohitaputto ahosi, tadaa bodhisatto chavakaca.n.daalo ahosi vijjaadharo, vijja.m parijappitvaa akaale ambaphalaani nibbattesi, ettha taava bodhisatto devadattato jaatiyaa nihiino yasena ^a^P0.0201^ea^ ca nihiino.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto raajaa ahosi mahaa mahiipati sabbakaamasama"ngii, tadaa bodhisatto tassuupabhogo ahosi hatthinaago sabbalakkha.nasampanno, tassa caarugativilaasa.m asahamaano raajaa vadhamicchanto hatthaacariya.m evamavoca `asikkhito te, aacariya, hatthinaago, tassa aakaasagamana.m naama kaara.na.m karohii'ti, tatthapi taava bodhisatto devadattato jaatiyaa nihiino laamako tiracchaanagato.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi pavane na.t.thaayiko, tadaa bodhisatto mahaapathavii naama makka.to ahosi, etthapi taava dissati viseso manussassa ca tiracchaanagatassa ca, tatthapi taava bodhisatto devadattato jaatiyaa nihiino.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi so.nuttaro naama nesaado balavaa balavataro naagabalo, tadaa bodhisatto chaddanto naama naagaraajaa ahosi. tadaa so luddako ta.m hatthinaaga.m ghaatesi, tatthapi taava devadattova adhikataro.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi vanacarako aniketavaasii, tadaa bodhisatto saku.no ahosi tittiro mantajjhaayii, tadaapi so vanacarako ta.m saku.na.m ghaatesi, tatthapi taava devadattova jaatiyaa adhikataro.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0199^ea^ capara.m yadaa devadatto kalaabu naama kaasiraajaa {kaasikaraajaa (ka0)} ahosi, tadaa bodhisatto taapaso ^a^V0.0193^ea^ ahosi khantivaadii. tadaa so raajaa tassa taapasassa kuddho hatthapaade va.msaka.liire viya chedaapesi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva adhikataro jaatiyaa ca yasena ca.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi vanacaro, tadaa bodhisatto nandiyo naama vaanarindo ahosi, tadaapi so vanacaro ta.m vaanarinda.m ghaatesi saddhi.m maataraa kani.t.thabhaatikena ca, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva adhikataro jaatiyaa.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi acelako kaarambhiyo naama, tadaa bodhisatto pa.n.darako naama naagaraajaa ahosi, tatthapi taava devadatto ^a^P0.0202^ea^ yeva adhikataro jaatiyaa.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi pavane ja.tilako, tadaa bodhisatto tacchako naama mahaasuukaro ahosi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva jaatiyaa adhikataro.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto cetiisu suuraparicaro naama raajaa ahosi upari purisamatte gagane vehaasa"ngamo, tadaa bodhisatto kapilo naama braahma.no ahosi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva adhikataro jaatiyaa ca yasena ca.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi saamo naama, tadaa bodhisatto ruru naama migaraajaa ahosi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva jaatiyaa adhikataro.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto manusso ahosi luddako pavanacaro, tadaa bodhisatto hatthinaago ahosi, so luddako tassa hatthinaagassa sattakkhattu.m dante chinditvaa hari, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva yoniyaa adhikataro.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto si"ngaalo ahosi khattiyadhammo, so yaavataa jambudiipe padesaraajaano te sabbe anuyutte akaasi, tadaa ^a^M0.0200^ea^ bodhisatto vidhuro naama pa.n.dito ahosi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva yasena adhikataro.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0194^ea^ capara.m yadaa devadatto hatthinaago hutvaa la.tukikaaya saku.nikaaya puttake ghaatesi, tadaa bodhisattopi hatthinaago ahosi yuuthapati, tattha taava ubhopi te samasamaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto yakkho ahosi adhammo naama, tadaa bodhisattopi yakkho ahosi dhammo naama, tatthapi taava ubhopi samasamaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto naaviko ahosi pa~ncanna.m kulasataana.m issaro, tadaa bodhisattopi naaviko ahosi pa~ncanna.m kulasataana.m issaro, tatthapi taava ubhopi samasamaa ahesu.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto satthavaaho ahosi pa~ncanna.m saka.tasataana.m issaro, tadaa bodhisattopi satthavaaho ahosi pa~ncanna.m saka.tasataana.m issaro, tatthapi taava ubhopi samasamaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m ^a^P0.0203^ea^ yadaa devadatto saakho naama migaraajaa ahosi, tadaa bodhisattopi nigrodho naama migaraajaa ahosi, tatthapi taava ubhopi samasamaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto saakho naama senaapati ahosi, tadaa bodhisattopi nigrodho naama raajaa ahosi, tatthapi taava ubhopi samasamaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto kha.n.dahaalo naama braahma.no ahosi, tadaa bodhisatto cando naama raajakumaaro ahosi, tadaa so kha.n.dahaalo yeva adhikataro.

[03] ``puna capara.m yadaa devadatto brahmadatto naama raajaa ahosi, tadaa bodhisatto tassa putto mahaapadumo naama kumaaro ahosi, tadaa so raajaa sakaputta.m corapapaate khipaapesi, yato kutoci pitaava puttaana.m adhikataro hoti visi.t.thoti, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva adhikataro.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0201^ea^ capara.m yadaa devadatto mahaapataapo naama raajaa ahosi, tadaa bodhisatto tassa putto ^a^V0.0195^ea^ dhammapaalo naama kumaaro ahosi, tadaa so raajaa sakaputtassa hatthapaade siisa~nca chedaapesi, tatthapi taava devadatto yeva uttaro adhikataro.

[03] ajjetarahi ubhopi sakyakule jaayi.msu. bodhisatto buddho ahosi sabba~n~nuu lokanaayako, devadatto tassa devaatidevassa saasane pabbajitvaa iddhi.m nibbattetvaa buddhaalaya.m akaasi. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, ya.m mayaa bha.nita.m, ta.m sabba.m tatha.m udaahu vitatha''nti?

[03] ``ya.m tva.m, mahaaraaja, bahuvidha.m kaara.na.m osaaresi, sabba.m ta.m tatheva, no a~n~nathaa''ti. ``yadi, bhante naagasena, ka.nhopi sukkopi samasamagatikaa honti, tena hi kusalampi akusalampi samasamavipaaka.m hotii''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraaja, kusalampi akusalampi samasamavipaaka.m hoti, na hi, mahaaraaja, devadatto sabbajanehi pa.tiviruddho, bodhisatteneva pa.tiviruddho. yo tassa bodhisattena pa.tiviruddho, so tasmi.m tasmi.m yeva bhave paccati phala.m deti. devadattopi, mahaaraaja, issariye ^a^P0.0204^ea^ .thito janapadesu aarakkha.m deti, setu.m sabha.m pu~n~nasaala.m kaareti, sama.nabraahma.naana.m kapa.naddhikava.nibbakaana.m naathaanaathaana.m yathaapa.nihita.m daana.m deti. tassa so vipaakena bhave bhave sampattiyo pa.tilabhati. kasseta.m, mahaaraaja, sakkaa vattu.m vinaa daanena damena sa.myamena uposathakammena sampatti.m anubhavissatiiti?

[03] ``ya.m pana tva.m, mahaaraaja, eva.m vadesi `devadatto ca bodhisatto ca ekato anuparivattantii'ti, so na jaatisatassa accayena samaagamo ahosi, na jaatisahassassa accayena, na jaatisatasahassassa accayena, kadaaci karahaci bahuuna.m ahorattaana.m accayena samaagamo ahosi. ya.m paneta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa ^b^kaa.nakacchapopama.m^eb^ upadassita.m manussattappa.tilaabhaaya, tathuupama.m, mahaaraaja, imesa.m samaagama.m dhaarehi.

[03] ``na, mahaaraaja, bodhisattassa devadatteneva saddhi.m samaagamo ahosi, theropi, mahaaraaja, saariputto anekesu jaatisatasahassesu bodhisattassa pitaa ahosi, mahaapitaa ahosi, cuu.lapitaa ahosi ^a^M0.0202^ea^, bhaataa ahosi, putto ahosi, bhaagineyyo ahosi, mitto ahosi.

[03] ``bodhisattopi, mahaaraaja, anekesu jaatisatasahassesu therassa saariputtassa pitaa ahosi, mahaapitaa ahosi, cuu.lapitaa ahosi, bhaataa ahosi, putto ahosi, bhaagineyyo ahosi ^a^V0.0196^ea^, mitto ahosi, sabbepi, mahaaraaja, sattanikaayapariyaapannaa sa.msaarasotamanugataa sa.msaarasotena vuyhantaa appiyehipi piyehipi samaagacchanti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, udaka.m sotena vuyhamaana.m suciasucikalyaa.napaapakena samaagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sabbepi sattanikaayapariyaapannaa sa.msaarasotamanugataa sa.msaarasotena vuyhantaa appiyehipi piyehipi samaagacchanti. devadatto, mahaaraaja, yakkho samaano attanaa adhammo pare adhamme niyojetvaa sattapa~n~naasavassako.tiyo sa.t.thi ca vassasatasahassaani mahaaniraye pacci ^a^P0.0205^ea^, bodhisattopi, mahaaraaja, yakkho samaano attanaa dhammo pare dhamme niyojetvaa sattapa~n~naasavassako.tiyo sa.t.thi ca vassasatasahassaani sagge modi sabbakaamasama"ngii, api ca, mahaaraaja, devadatto imasmi.m bhave buddha.m anaasaadaniiyamaasaadayitvaa samagga~nca sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa pathavi.m paavisi, tathaagato bujjhitvaa sabbadhamme parinibbuto upadhisa"nkhaye''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] kusalaakusalasamavisamapa~nho sattamo.
[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ```sace labhetha kha.na.m vaa raho vaa, nimantaka.m {nivaataka.m (ku.naalajaatake)} vaapi labhetha taadisa.m.
[22] sabbaava {sabbaapi (sii0 pii0)} itthii kayiru.m {kareyyu.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} nu paapa.m, a~n~na.m aladdhaa pii.thasappinaa saddhi'nti..

[03] ``puna ca kathiiyati `mahosadhassa bhariyaa amaraa naama itthii gaamake .thapitaa pavutthapatikaa raho nisinnaa vivittaa raajappa.tisama.m saamika.m karitvaa sahassena ^a^M0.0203^ea^ nimantiiyamaanaa paapa.m naakaasii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `sace...pe0... saddhi'nti tena hi `mahosadhassa bhariyaa...pe0... naakaasii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi mahosadhassa bhariyaa...pe0... ^a^P0.0206^ea^ naakaasi, tena hi `sace...pe0... saddhi'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `sace...pe0... saddhi'nti. kathiiyati ca `mahosadhassa bhariyaa ^a^V0.0197^ea^ ...pe0... naakaasii'ti. kareyya saa, mahaaraaja, itthii sahassa.m labhamaanaa taadisena purisena saddhi.m paapakamma.m, na saa kareyya sace kha.na.m vaa raho vaa nimantaka.m vaapi taadisa.m labheyya, vicinantii saa, mahaaraaja, amaraa itthii na addasa kha.na.m vaa raho vaa nimantaka.m vaapi taadisa.m.

[03] ``idha loke garahabhayaa kha.na.m na passi, paraloke nirayabhayaa kha.na.m na passi, ka.tukavipaaka.m paapanti kha.na.m na passi, piya.m amu~ncitukaamaa kha.na.m na passi, saamikassa garukataaya kha.na.m na passi, dhamma.m apacaayantii kha.na.m na passi, anariya.m garahantii kha.na.m na passi, kiriya.m abhinditukaamaa kha.na.m na passi. evaruupehi bahuuhi kaara.nehi kha.na.m na passi.

[03] ``rahopi saa loke vicinitvaa apassantii paapa.m naakaasi. sace saa manussehi ^a^P0.0207^ea^ raho labheyya, atha amanussehi raho na labheyya. sace amanussehi raho labheyya, atha paracittaviduuhi pabbajitehi raho na labheyya. sace paracittaviduuhi pabbajitehi raho labheyya, atha paracittaviduuniihi devataahi raho na labheyya. sace paracittaviduuniihi devataahi raho labheyya, attanaava paapehi raho na labheyya. sace attanaava paapehi raho labheyya, atha adhammena raho na labheyya. evaruupehi bahuvidhehi kaara.nehi raho alabhitvaa paapa.m naakaasi.

[03] ``nimantakampi saa loke vicinitvaa taadisa.m alabhantii paapa.m naakaasi. mahosadho, mahaaraaja, pa.n.dito a.t.thaviisatiyaa a"ngehi samannaagato. katamehi a.t.thaviisatiyaa a"ngehi samannaagato? mahosadho, mahaaraaja, suuro hirimaa ottappii sapakkho mittasampanno khamo siilavaa saccavaadii soceyyasampanno akkodhano anatimaanii anusuuyako viiriyavaa aayuuhako sa"ngaahako sa.mvibhaagii sakhilo nivaatavutti sa.nho asa.tho amaayaavii atibuddhisampanno kittimaa vijjaasampanno hitesii upanissitaana.m ^a^M0.0204^ea^ patthito sabbajanassa dhanavaa yasavaa. mahosadho, mahaaraaja, pa.n.dito imehi a.t.thaviisatiyaa a"ngehi samannaagato. saa a~n~na.m taadisa.m nimantaka.m alabhitvaa paapa.m naakaasii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] amaraadeviipa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0198^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `vigatabhayasantaasaa arahanto'ti. puna ca nagare raajagahe dhanapaalaka.m hatthi.m bhagavati opatanta.m disvaa pa~nca khii.naasavasataani pariccajitvaa jinavara.m pakkantaani disaavidisa.m eka.m .thapetvaa thera.m aananda.m. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, te arahanto bhayaa pakkantaa, pa~n~naayissati sakena kammenaati dasabala.m paatetukaamaa pakkantaa ^a^P0.0208^ea^, udaahu tathaagatassa atula.m vipulamasama.m paa.tihaariya.m da.t.thukaamaa pakkantaa? yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `vigatabhayasantaasaa arahanto'ti, tena hi `nagare...pe0... aananda'nti ya.m vacana.m ta.m micchaa. yadi nagare raajagahe dhanapaalaka.m hatthi.m bhagavati opatanta.m disvaa pa~nca khii.naasavasataani pariccajitvaa jinavara.m pakkantaani disaavidisa.m eka.m .thapetvaa thera.m aananda.m, tena hi `vigatabhayasantaasaa arahanto'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `vigatabhayasantaasaa arahanto'ti, nagare raajagahe dhanapaalaka.m hatthi.m bhagavati opatanta.m disvaa pa~nca khii.naasavasataani pariccajitvaa jinavara.m pakkantaani disaavidisa.m eka.m .thapetvaa thera.m aananda.m, ta~nca pana na bhayaa, naapi bhagavanta.m paatetukaamataaya.

[03] ``yena pana, mahaaraaja, hetunaa arahanto bhaayeyyu.m vaa taaseyyu.m vaa, so hetu arahantaana.m samucchinno, tasmaa vigatabhayasantaasaa arahanto, bhaayati nu, mahaaraaja, mahaapathavii kha.nantepi bhindantepi dhaarentepi samuddapabbatagirisikhareti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nena mahaaraajaa''ti? ``natthi, bhante, mahaapathaviyaa so hetu, yena hetunaa mahaapathavii ^a^M0.0205^ea^ bhaayeyya vaa taaseyya vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi arahantaana.m so hetu, yena hetunaa arahanto bhaayeyyu.m vaa taaseyyu.m vaa.

[03] ``bhaayati nu, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m chindante vaa bhindante vaa patante vaa agginaa dahante vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``kena kaara.nena mahaaraajaa''ti? ``natthi, bhante, girisikharassa ^a^P0.0209^ea^ so hetu, yena hetunaa girisikhara.m bhaayeyya vaa taaseyya vaa''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, natthi arahantaana.m so hetu, yena hetunaa arahanto bhaayeyyu.m vaa taaseyyu.m vaa.

[03] ``yadipi ^a^V0.0199^ea^, mahaaraaja, lokadhaatusatasahassesu ye keci sattanikaayapariyaapannaa sabbepi te sattihatthaa eka.m arahanta.m upadhaavitvaa taaseyyu.m, na bhaveyya arahato cittassa ki~nci a~n~nathatta.m. ki.m kaara.na.m? a.t.thaanamanavakaasataaya.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, tesa.m khii.naasavaana.m eva.m cetoparivitakko ahosi `ajja naravarapavare jinavaravasabhe nagaravaramanuppavi.t.the viithiyaa dhanapaalako hatthii aapatissati, asa.msayamatidevadeva.m upa.t.thaako na pariccajissati, yadi maya.m sabbepi bhagavanta.m na pariccajissaama, aanandassa gu.no paaka.to na bhavissati, na heva ca tathaagata.m samupagamissati hatthinaago, handa maya.m apagacchaama, evamida.m mahato janakaayassa kilesabandhanamokkho bhavissati, aanandassa ca gu.no paaka.to bhavissatii'ti. eva.m te arahanto aanisa.msa.m disvaa disaavidisa.m pakkantaa''ti. ``suvibhatto, bhante naagasena, pa~nho, evameta.m natthi arahantaana.m bhaya.m vaa santaaso vaa, aanisa.msa.m disvaa arahanto pakkantaa disaavidisa''nti.
[06] arahantaabhaayanapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `tathaagato sabba~n~nuu'ti. puna ca bha.natha `tathaagatena saariputtamoggallaanappamukhe bhikkhusa"nghe pa.naamite ^a^M0.0206^ea^ caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa ca sahampati biijuupama~nca vacchataru.nuupama~nca upadassetvaa bhagavanta.m pasaadesu.m khamaapesu.m nijjhatta.m aka.msuu'ti. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, a~n~naataa taa upamaa tathaagatassa, yaahi tathaagato upamaahi ^a^P0.0210^ea^ orato khamito upasanto nijjhatta.m gato? yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatassa taa upamaa a~n~naataa, tena hi buddho asabba~n~nuu, yadi ~naataa, tena hi okassa pasayha viima.msaapekkho pa.naamesi, tena hi tassa akaaru~n~nataa sambhavati. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``sabba~n~nuu, mahaaraaja, tathaagato, taahi ca upamaahi bhagavaa pasanno orato khamito upasanto ^a^V0.0200^ea^ nijjhatta.m gato. dhammassaamii, mahaaraaja, tathaagato, tathaagatappavediteheva te opammehi tathaagata.m aaraadhesu.m tosesu.m pasaadesu.m, tesa~nca tathaagato pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodi.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, itthii saamikassa santakeneva dhanena saamika.m aaraadheti toseti pasaadeti, ta~nca saamiko `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa ca sahampati tathaagatappavediteheva opammehi tathaagata.m aaraadhesu.m tosesu.m pasaadesu.m, tesa~nca tathaagato pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodi.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, kappako ra~n~no santakeneva suva.n.napha.nakena ra~n~no uttama"nga.m pasaadhayamaano raajaana.m aaraadheti toseti pasaadeti, tassa ca raajaa pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodati, yathicchitamanuppadeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa ca sahampati tathaagatappavediteheva opammehi tathaagata.m aaraadhesu.m tosesu.m pasaadesu.m, tesa~nca tathaagato pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodi.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, saddhivihaariko upajjhaayaabhata.m pi.n.dapaata.m gahetvaa upajjhaayassa upanaamento upajjhaaya.m aaraadheti toseti pasaadeti, ta~nca upajjhaayo pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumodati, evameva ^a^M0.0207^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, caatumeyyakaa ca sakyaa brahmaa ca sahampati tathaagatappavediteheva opammehi tathaagata.m aaraadhesu.m tosesu.m pasaadesu.m, tesa~nca ^a^P0.0211^ea^ tathaagato pasanno `saadhuu'ti abbhaanumoditvaa sabbadukkhaparimuttiyaa dhamma.m desesii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamiiti.
[06] buddhasabba~n~nubhaavapa~nho dasamo.
[06] sabba~n~nuta~naa.navaggo catuttho.
[06] imasmi.m vagge dasa pa~nhaa.
[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0201^ea^ ^a^M0.0208^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ```santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo.
[22] aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti..

[03] ``puna ca bhagavataa bha.nita.m `vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena bha.nita.m `santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo. aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti, tena hi `vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti, tena hi `santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo. aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0212^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo. aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti. bha.nita~nca `vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti. ya.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo. aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti, ta.m sabhaavavacana.m asesavacana.m nissesavacana.m nippariyaayavacana.m sama.naanucchava.m sama.nasaaruppa.m sama.nappatiruupa.m sama.naaraha.m sama.nagocara.m sama.nappa.tipadaa sama.nappa.tipatti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, aara~n~nako migo ara~n~ne pavane caramaano niraalayo aniketo yathicchaka.m sayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhunaa `santhavato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo. aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'nti cintetabba.m.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V0.0202^ea^ pana, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `vihaare kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti, ta.m dve atthavase sampassamaanena bhagavataa bha.nita.m. katame dve? vihaaradaana.m naama sabbabuddhehi va.n.nita.m anumata.m thomita.m ^a^M0.0209^ea^ pasattha.m, ta.m te vihaaradaana.m datvaa jaatijaraamara.naa parimuccissantiiti. aya.m taava pa.thamo aanisa.mso vihaaradaane.

[03] ``puna capara.m vihaare vijjamaane bhikkhuniyo byattasa"nketaa bhavissanti, sulabha.m dassana.m dassanakaamaana.m, anikete duddassanaa bhavissantiiti. aya.m dutiyo aanisa.mso vihaaradaane. ime dve atthavase sampassamaanena bhagavataa bha.nita.m `vihaare ^a^P0.0213^ea^ kaaraye ramme, vaasayettha bahussute'ti, na tattha buddhaputtena aalayo kara.niiyo nikete''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] santhavapa~nho pa.thamo.
[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[22] ```utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti..

[03] ``puna ca bhagavataa bha.nita.m `aha.m kho panudaayi, appekadaa iminaa pattena samatittikampi bhu~njaami, bhiyyopi bhu~njaamii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti, tena hi `aha.m kho panudaayi, appekadaa iminaa pattena samatitthikampi bhu~njaami, bhiyyopi bhu~njaamii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `aha.m kho panudaayi, appekadaa iminaa pattena samatitthikampi bhu~njaami, bhiyyopi bhu~njaamii'ti, tena hi `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti, bha.nita~nca `aha.m kho panudaayi, appekadaa iminaa pattena samatittikampi bhu~njaami, bhiyyopi bhu~njaamii'ti ^a^V0.0203^ea^. ya.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti, ta.m ^a^P0.0214^ea^ sabhaavavacana.m asesavacana.m nissesavacana.m nippariyaayavacana.m bhuutavacana.m tacchavacana.m yaathaavavacana.m avipariitavacana.m isivacana.m munivacana.m bhagavantavacana.m arahantavacana.m ^a^M0.0210^ea^ paccekabuddhavacana.m jinavacana.m sabba~n~nuvacana.m tathaagatassa arahato sammaasambuddhassa vacana.m.

[03] ``udare asa.myato, mahaaraaja, paa.nampi hanati, adinnampi aadiyati, paradaarampi gacchati, musaapi bha.nati, majjampi pivati, maatarampi jiivitaa voropeti, pitarampi jiivitaa voropeti, arahantampi jiivitaa voropeti, sa"nghampi bhindati, du.t.thena cittena tathaagatassa lohitampi uppaadeti. nanu, mahaaraaja, devadatto udare asa.myato sa"ngha.m bhinditvaa kappa.t.thiya.m kamma.m aayuuhi {aayuuhati (ka0)}. evaruupaani, mahaaraaja, a~n~naanipi bahuvidhaani kaara.naani disvaa bhagavataa bha.nita.m `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti.

[01] ``udare sa.myato, mahaaraaja, catusaccaabhisamaya.m abhisameti, cattaari saama~n~naphalaani sacchikaroti, catuusu pa.tisambhidaasu a.t.thasu samaapattiisu chasu abhi~n~naasu vasiibhaava.m paapu.naati, kevala~nca sama.nadhamma.m puureti. nanu, mahaaraaja, sukapotako udare sa.myato hutvaa yaava taavati.msabhavana.m kampetvaa sakka.m devaanaminda.m upa.t.thaanamupanesi, evaruupaani, mahaaraaja, a~n~naanipi bahuvidhaani kaara.naani disvaa bhagavataa bha.nita.m `utti.t.the nappamajjeyya, udare sa.myato siyaa'ti.

[03] ``ya.m pana, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `aha.m kho panudaayi appekadaa iminaa pattena samatittikampi bhu~njaami, bhiyyopi bhu~njaamii'ti, ta.m katakiccena ni.t.thitakiriyena siddhatthena vusitavosaanena niraavara.nena sabba~n~nunaa sayambhunaa tathaagatena attaana.m upaadaaya bha.nita.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vantassa virittassa anuvaasitassa aaturassa ^a^P0.0215^ea^ sappaayakiriyaa icchitabbaa hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sakilesassa adi.t.thasaccassa udare sa.myamo kara.niiyo hoti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa sappabhaasassa jaatimantassa abhijaatiparisuddhassa majjananigha.msanaparisodhanena kara.niiya.m na hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa buddhavisaye paarami.m gatassa kiriyaakara.nesu aavara.na.m na hotii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] udarasa.myatapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0204^ea^ ^a^M0.0211^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `ahamasmi, bhikkhave, braahma.no yaacayogo sadaa payatapaa.ni antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m bhagavataa `etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m appaabaadhaana.m yadida.m baakulo'ti. bhagavato ca sariire bahukkhattu.m aabaadho uppanno dissati. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato anuttaro, tena hi `etadagga.m...pe0... baakulo'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi thero baakulo appaabaadhaana.m aggo, tena hi `ahamasmi...pe0... sallakatto'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `ahamasmi...pe0... sallakatto'ti, bha.nita~nca `etadagga.m...pe0... baakulo'ti, ta~nca pana baahiraana.m aagamaana.m adhigamaana.m pariyattiina.m attani vijjamaanata.m ^a^P0.0216^ea^ sandhaaya bhaasita.m.

[03] ``santi kho pana, mahaaraaja, bhagavato saavakaa .thaanaca"nkamikaa, te .thaanena ca"nkamena divaaratti.m viitinaamenti, bhagavaa pana, mahaaraaja, .thaanena ca"nkamena nisajjaaya sayanena divaaratti.m viitinaameti, ye te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu .thaanaca"nkamikaa, te tena a"ngena atirekaa.

[03] ``santi kho pana, mahaaraaja, bhagavato saavakaa ekaasanikaa, te jiivitahetupi dutiya.m bhojana.m na bhu~njanti, bhagavaa pana, mahaaraaja, dutiyampi yaava tatiyampi bhojana.m bhu~njati, ye te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu ekaasanikaa, te tena a"ngena atirekaa, anekavidhaani, mahaaraaja, taani kaara.naani tesa.m tesa.m ta.m ta.m sandhaaya bha.nitaani. bhagavaa pana, mahaaraaja, anuttaro siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya vimuttiyaa vimutti~naa.nadassanena dasahi ca balehi catuuhi vesaarajjehi a.t.thaarasahi buddhadhammehi chahi asaadhaara.nehi ~naa.nehi, kevale ca buddhavisaye ta.m sandhaaya bha.nita.m `ahamasmi...pe0... sallakatto'ti.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, manussesu eko jaatimaa hoti, eko dhanavaa, eko vijjavaa, eko sippavaa, eko suuro, eko vicakkha.no, sabbepete abhibhaviya raajaa yeva tesa.m uttamo hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa sabbasattaana.m aggo je.t.tho se.t.tho.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V0.0205^ea^ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ pana aayasmaa baakulo appaabaadho ahosi, ta.m abhiniihaaravasena, so hi, mahaaraaja, anomadassissa bhagavato udaravaataabaadhe uppanne vipassissa ca bhagavato a.t.thasa.t.thiyaa ca bhikkhusatasahassaana.m ti.napupphakaroge uppanne saya.m taapaso samaano naanaabhesajjehi ta.m byaadhi.m apanetvaa appaabaadhata.m patto, bha.nito ca `etadagga.m...pe0... baakulo'ti.

[03] ``bhagavato, mahaaraaja, byaadhimhi uppajjantepi anuppajjantepi dhuta"nga.m aadiyantepi anaadiyantepi natthi ^a^P0.0217^ea^ bhagavataa sadiso koci satto. bhaasitampeta.m mahaaraaja bhagavataa devaatidevena ^b^sa.myuttanikaaya^eb^varala~nchake --

[03] ```yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa vaa catuppadaa vaa bahuppadaa vaa ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati araha.m sammaasambuddho'ti. `saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii'''ti.
[06] buddhaappaabaadhapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `tathaagato bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na.m a~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata'nti. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa, tena hi `addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na.m a~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata'nti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na.m a~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata'nti, tena hi `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^M0.0213^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti. bha.nita~nca `addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na.m ^a^V0.0206^ea^ a~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata'nti, ta.m dvayampi sabhaavavacanameva, pubbakaana.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagataana.m antaradhaanena asati anusaasake maggo antaradhaayi, ta.m {so ta.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} tathaagato magga.m lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m ^a^P0.0218^ea^ pa~n~naacakkhunaa sampassamaano {sammasamaano (sii0 pii0)} addasa pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata.m, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `addasa.m khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, puraa.na.m magga.m puraa.na.m a~njasa.m pubbakehi sammaasambuddhehi anuyaata'nti.

[03] ``pubbakaana.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagataana.m antaradhaanena asati anusaasake lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m magga.m ya.m daani tathaagato sa~ncara.na.m akaasi, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti.

[03] ``idha, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no cakkavattissa antaradhaanena ma.niratana.m girisikhantare niliiyati, aparassa cakkavattissa sammaapa.tipattiyaa upagacchati, api nu kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m tassa pakata''nti? ``na hi, bhante, paakatika.m yeva ta.m ma.niratana.m, tena pana nibbattita''nti {nibbattanti (sii0 pii0)}. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, paakatika.m pubbakehi tathaagatehi anuci.n.na.m a.t.tha"ngika.m siva.m magga.m asati anusaasake lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m bhagavaa pa~n~naacakkhunaa sampassamaano uppaadesi, sa~ncara.na.m akaasi, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, santa.m yeva putta.m yoniyaa janayitvaa maataa `janikaa'ti vuccati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato santa.m yeva magga.m lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m pa~n~naacakkhunaa sampassamaano uppaadesi, sa~ncara.na.m akaasi, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, koci puriso ya.m ki~nci na.t.tha.m passati, `tena ta.m bha.n.da.m nibbattita'nti jano voharati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato santa.m yeva magga.m lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m ^a^M0.0214^ea^ pa~n~naacakkhunaa sampassamaano uppaadesi, sa~ncara.na.m ^a^P0.0219^ea^ akaasi, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, koci puriso vana.m sodhetvaa bhuumi.m niiharati, `tassa saa bhuumii'ti ^a^V0.0207^ea^ jano voharati, na cesaa bhuumi tena pavattitaa, ta.m bhuumi.m kaara.na.m katvaa bhuumisaamiko naama hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato santa.m yeva magga.m lugga.m palugga.m guu.lha.m pihita.m pa.ticchanna.m asa~ncara.na.m pa~n~naaya sampassamaano uppaadesi, sa~ncara.na.m akaasi, ta.mkaara.naa aaha `tathaagato, bhikkhave, araha.m sammaasambuddho anuppannassa maggassa uppaadetaa'''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] magguppaadanapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `pubbe vaaha.m manussabhuuto samaano sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko ahosi'nti. puna ca bha.nita.m `lomasakassapo naama isi samaano anekasate paa.ne ghaatayitvaa vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `pubbe vaaha.m manussabhuuto samaano sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko ahosi'nti, tena hi `lomasakassapena isinaa anekasate paa.ne ghaatayitvaa vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajita'nti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi `lomasakassapena isinaa anekasate paa.ne ghaatayitvaa vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajita.m', tena hi `pubbe vaaha.m manussabhuuto samaano sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko ahosi'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `pubbe vaaha.m manussabhuuto samaano sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko ahosi'nti, `lomasakassapena isinaa anekasate paa.ne ghaatayitvaa ^a^P0.0220^ea^ vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yajita.m', ta~nca pana raagavasena visa~n~ninaa, no sacetanenaa''ti.

[03] ``a.t.thime ^a^M0.0215^ea^, bhante naagasena, puggalaa paa.na.m hananti. katame a.t.tha? ratto raagavasena paa.na.m hanati, du.t.tho dosavasena paa.na.m hanati, muu.lho mohavasena paa.na.m hanati, maanii maanavasena paa.na.m hanati, luddho lobhavasena paa.na.m hanati, aki~ncano jiivikatthaaya paa.na.m hanati, baalo hassavasena {a~n~naa.navasena (ka0 sii0)} paa.na.m hanati, raajaa vinayanavasena paa.na.m hanati. ime kho, bhante naagasena, a.t.tha puggalaa paa.na.m hananti. paakatika.m yeva, bhante naagasena, bodhisattena kata''nti ^a^V0.0208^ea^. ``na, mahaaraaja, paakatika.m bodhisattena kata.m, yadi, mahaaraaja, bodhisatto pakatibhaavena onameyya mahaaya~n~na.m yajitu.m, na yima.m gaatha.m bha.neyya --
[21] ```sasamuddapariyaaya.m, mahi.m saagaraku.n.dala.m.
[22] na icche saha nindaaya, eva.m seyha {sayha (sii0 pii0)} vijaanahii'ti..

[03] ``eva.mvaadii, mahaaraaja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyaa raajaka~n~naaya visa~n~nii ahosi khittacitto ratto visa~n~nibhuuto aakulaakulo turitaturito tena vikkhittabhantalu.litacittena mahatimahaapasughaatagalaruhirasa~ncaya.m vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yaji.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ummattako khittacitto jalitampi jaataveda.m akkamati, kupitampi aasiivisa.m ga.nhaati, mattampi hatthi.m upeti, samuddampi atiiradassi.m pakkhandati, candanikampi o.ligallampi omaddati, ka.n.takaadhaanampi abhiruhati, papaatepi patati, asucimpi bhakkheti, naggopi rathiyaa carati, a~n~nampi bahuvidha.m akiriya.m karoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyaa raajaka~n~naaya visa~n~nii ahosi khittacitto ratto visa~n~nibhuuto aakulaakulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantalu.litacittena mahatimahaapasughaatagalaruhirasa~ncaya.m vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m ^a^P0.0221^ea^ yaji.

[03] ``khittacittena, mahaaraaja, kata.m paapa.m di.t.thadhammepi na mahaasaavajja.m hoti, samparaaye vipaakenapi no tathaa. idha, mahaaraaja, koci ummattako vajjhamaapajjeyya, tassa tumhe ki.m da.n.da.m dhaarethaa''ti? ``ko, bhante, ummattakassa da.n.do bhavissati, ta.m maya.m pothaapetvaa niiharaapema, esova tassa da.n.do''ti. ``iti kho, mahaaraaja, ummattakassa aparaadhe da.n.dopi na bhavati ^a^M0.0216^ea^, tasmaa ummattakassa katepi na doso bhavati satekiccho. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, lomasakassapo isi saha dassanena candavatiyaa raajaka~n~naaya visa~n~nii ahosi khittacitto ratto visa~n~nibhuuto visa.tapayaato aakulaakulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantalu.litacittena mahatimahaapasughaatagalaruhirasa~ncaya.m vaajapeyya.m mahaaya~n~na.m yaji. yadaa ca pana pakaticitto ahosi pa.tiladdhassati, tadaa punadeva pabbajitvaa pa~ncaabhi~n~naayo nibbattetvaa brahmalokuupago ahosii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] buddhaavihe.thakapa~nho pa~ncamo.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0209^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa chaddanto naagaraajaa --
[21] ```vadhissametanti paraamasanto, kaasaavamaddakkhi dhaja.m isiina.m.
[22] dukkhena phu.t.thassudapaadi sa~n~naa, arahaddhajo sabbhi avajjharuupo'ti..

[03] ``puna ca bha.nita.m `jotipaalamaa.navo samaano kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m mu.n.dakavaadena sama.nakavaadena asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akkosi paribhaasii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bodhisatto tiracchaanagato samaano kaasaava.m abhipuujayi, tena hi `jotipaalena maa.navena ^a^P0.0222^ea^ kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho mu.n.dakavaadena sama.nakavaadena asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akku.t.tho paribhaasito'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi jotipaalena maa.navena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho mu.n.dakavaadena sama.nakavaadena asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akku.t.tho paribhaasito, tena hi `chaddantena naagaraajena kaasaava.m puujita'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. yadi tiracchaanagatena bodhisattena kakkha.lakharaka.tukavedana.m vedayamaanena luddakena nivattha.m kaasaava.m puujita.m, ki.m manussabhuuto samaano paripakka~naa.no paripakkaaya bodhiyaa kassapa.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m dasabala.m lokanaayaka.m uditodita.m ^a^M0.0217^ea^ jalitabyaamobhaasa.m pavaruttama.m pavararucirakaasikakaasaavamabhipaaruta.m disvaa na puujayi? ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabboti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa chaddanto naagaraajaa `vadhissametanti...pe0... avajjharuupo'ti. jotipaalena ca maa.navena kassapo bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho mu.n.dakavaadena sama.nakavaadena asabbhaahi pharusaahi vaacaahi akku.t.tho paribhaasito, ta~nca pana jaativasena kulavasena. jotipaalo, mahaaraaja, maa.navo assaddhe appasanne kule paccaajaato, tassa maataapitaro bhaginibhaataro daasidaasace.takaparivaarakamanussaa brahmadevataa brahmagarukaa, te `braahma.naa eva uttamaa pavaraa'ti avasese pabbajite garahanti jigucchanti, tesa.m ta.m vacana.m sutvaa jotipaalo maa.navo gha.tikaarena kumbhakaarena satthaara.m dassanaaya pakkosito evamaaha `ki.m pana tena mu.n.dakena sama.nakena di.t.thenaa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0210^ea^, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0223^ea^, amata.m visamaasajja tittaka.m hoti, yathaa ca siitodaka.m aggimaasajja u.nha.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, jotipaalo maa.navo assaddhe appasanne kule paccaajaato, so kulavasena andho hutvaa {so kulajaativasena andho bhavitvaa (syaa0)} tathaagata.m akkosi paribhaasi.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, jalitapajjalito mahaaaggikkhandho sappabhaaso udakamaasajja upahatappabhaatejo siitalo kaa.lako bhavati paripakkaniggu.n.diphalasadiso, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, jotipaalo maa.navo pu~n~navaa saddho ~naa.navipulasappabhaaso assaddhe appasanne kule paccaajaato, so kulavasena andho hutvaa tathaagata.m akkosi paribhaasi, upagantvaa ca buddhagu.nama~n~naaya ce.takabhuuto viya ahosi, jinasaasane pabbajitvaa abhi~n~naa ca samaapattiyo ca nibbattetvaa brahmalokuupago ahosii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] chaddantajotipaalaarabbhapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0218^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m sabba.m temaasa.m aakaasacchadana.m a.t.thaasi, na devotivassii'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `kassapassa tathaagatassa {bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa (ma0 ni0 2.289)} ku.ti ovassatii'ti. kissa pana, bhante naagasena, tathaagatassa evamussannakusalamuulassa {evaruupassa ussannakusalamuulassa (ka0)} ku.ti ovassati, tathaagatassa naama so aanubhaavo icchitabbo? yadi, bhante naagasena, gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m anovassa.m aakaasacchadana.m ahosi, tena hi `tathaagatassa ku.ti ovassatii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatassa ku.ti ovassati, tena hi `gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m anovassaka.m ahosi aakaasacchadana'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `gha.tikaarassa kumbhakaarassa aavesana.m sabba.m temaasa.m aakaasacchadana.m ^a^P0.0224^ea^ a.t.thaasi, na devotivassii'ti. bha.nita~nca `kassapassa tathaagatassa ku.ti ovassatii'ti. gha.tikaaro, mahaaraaja, kumbhakaaro siilavaa kalyaa.nadhammo ussannakusalamuulo andhe ^a^V0.0211^ea^ ji.n.ne maataapitaro poseti, tassa asammukhaa anaapucchaayevassa ghare ti.na.m haritvaa bhagavato ku.ti.m chaadesu.m, so tena ti.nahara.nena akampita.m asa~ncalita.m susa.n.thita.m vipulamasama.m piiti.m pa.tilabhati, bhiyyo somanassa~nca atula.m uppaadesi `aho vata me bhagavaa lokuttamo suvissattho'ti, tena tassa di.t.thadhammiko vipaako nibbatto. na hi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato taavatakena vikaarena calati.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sineru giriraajaa anekasatasahassavaatasampahaarenapi na kampati na calati, mahodadhi varappavarasaagaro anekasatanahutamahaaga"ngaasatasahassehipi na puurati na vikaaramaapajjati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato na taavatakena vikaarena calati.

[03] ``ya.m pana, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa ku.ti ovassati, ta.m mahato janakaayassa anukampaaya. dveme, mahaaraaja, atthavase sampassamaanaa tathaagataa ^a^M0.0219^ea^ saya.m nimmita.m paccaya.m nappa.tisevanti, `aya.m aggadakkhi.neyyo satthaa'ti bhagavato paccaya.m datvaa devamanussaa sabbaduggatito parimuccissantiiti, dassetvaa vutti.m pariyesantiiti `maa a~n~ne upavadeyyu'nti. ime dve atthavase sampassamaanaa tathaagataa saya.m nimmita.m paccaya.m nappa.tisevanti. yadi, mahaaraaja, sakko vaa ta.m ku.ti.m anovassa.m kareyya brahmaa vaa saya.m vaa, saavajja.m bhaveyya ta.m yeva kara.na.m {kaara.na.m (sii0 pii0)} sadosa.m saniggaha.m, ime vibhuuta.m {vibhuusa.m (sii0 pii0)} katvaa loka.m sammohenti adhikata.m karontiiti, tasmaa ta.m kara.na.m vajjaniiya.m. na, mahaaraaja, tathaagataa vatthu.m yaacanti, taaya avatthuyaacanaaya aparibhaasiyaa bhavantii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] gha.tikaarapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0225^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m tathaagatena `ahamasmi, bhikkhave, braahma.no yaacayogo'ti. puna ca bha.nita.m `raajaahamasmi selaa'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `ahamasmi, bhikkhave ^a^V0.0212^ea^, braahma.no yaacayogo'ti, tena hi `raajaahamasmi selaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `raajaahamasmi selaa'ti, tena hi `ahamasmi, bhikkhave, braahma.no yaacayogo'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. khattiyo vaa hi bhaveyya braahma.no vaa, natthi ekaaya jaatiyaa dve va.n.naa naama, ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `ahamasmi, bhikkhave, braahma.no yaacayogo'ti, puna ca bha.nita.m `raajaahamasmi selaa'ti, tattha kaara.na.m atthi, yena kaara.nena tathaagato braahma.no ca raajaa ca hotii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana ta.m, bhante naagasena, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena tathaagato braahma.no ca raajaa ca hoti''? ``sabbe, mahaaraaja, paapakaa ^a^M0.0220^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa tathaagatassa baahitaa pahiinaa apagataa byapagataa ucchinnaa khii.naa khaya.m pattaa nibbutaa upasantaa, tasmaa tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.
[03] ``braahma.no naama sa.msayamaneka.msa.m vimatipatha.m viitivatto, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, sa.msayamaneka.msa.m vimatipatha.m viitivatto, tena kaara.nena tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.

[03] ``braahma.no naama sabbabhavagatiyoninissa.to malarajagatavippamutto asahaayo, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, sabbabhavagatiyoninissa.to malarajagatavippamutto asahaayo, tena kaara.nena tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.
[03] ``braahma.naa naama aggase.t.thavarapavaradibbavihaarabahulo, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, aggase.t.thavarapavaradibbavihaarabahulo, tenaapi kapara.nena tathaagato ``braahma.no''ti vuccati.

[03] ``braahma.no naama ajjhayana ajjhaapana daanappa.tiggaha.na dama sa.myamaniyamapubbamanusi.t.thi pave.ni va.msa dhara.no, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, ajjhayana ajjhaapana daanappa.tiggaha.na dama sa.myama niyama pubbajinaaci.n.na anusi.t.thi ^a^P0.0226^ea^ pave.ni va.msa dhara.no tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.
[03] ``braahma.no naama brahaasukhavihaarajjhaanajhaayii; bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, brahaasukhavihaarajjhaanajhaayii, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.

[03] ``braahma.no ^a^V0.0213^ea^ naama sabbabhavaabhavagatiisu abhijaativattitamanucarita.m jaanaati, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, sabbabhavaabhavagatiisu abhijaativattitamanucarita.m jaanaati, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato `braahma.no'ti vuccati.

[03] ``braahma.noti, mahaaraaja, bhagavato neta.m naama.m maataraa kata.m, na pitaraa kata.m, na bhaataraa kata.m, na bhaginiyaa kata.m, na mittaamaccehi kata.m, na ~naatisaalohitehi kata.m, na sama.nabraahma.nehi kata.m, na devataahi kata.m, vimokkhantikameta.m buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m naama.m bodhiyaa yeva muule maarasena.m vidhamitvaa atiitaanaagatapaccuppanne paapake akusale ^a^M0.0221^ea^ dhamme baahetvaa saha sabba~n~nuta~naa.nassa pa.tilaabhaa pa.tiladdhapaatubhuutasamuppannamatte sacchikaa pa~n~natti yadida.m braahma.noti, tena kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `braahma.no'''ti.

[03] ``kena pana, bhante naagasena, kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'''ti? ``raajaa naama, mahaaraaja, yo koci rajja.m kaareti lokamanusaasati, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa dhammena rajja.m kaareti, sadevaka.m loka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m anusaasati, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti.

[03] ``raajaa naama, mahaaraaja, sabbajanamanusse abhibhavitvaa nandayanto ~naatisa"ngha.m, socayanto amittasa"ngha.m, mahatimahaayasasirihara.m thirasaarada.n.da.m anuunasatasalaakaala"nkata.m ussaapeti pa.n.daravimalasetacchatta.m, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, socayanto maarasena.m micchaapa.tipanna.m, nandayanto devamanusse sammaapa.tipanne dasasahassiyaa ^a^P0.0227^ea^ lokadhaatuyaa mahatimahaayasasirihara.m khantithirasaarada.n.da.m ~naa.navarasatasalaakaala"nkata.m ussaapeti aggavaravimuttipa.n.daravimalasetacchatta.m, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti.

[03] ``raajaa naama upagatasampattajanaana.m bahuunamabhivandaniiyo bhavati, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, upagatasampattadevamanussaana.m bahuunamabhivandaniiyo, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti.

[03] ``raajaa naama yassa kassaci aaraadhakassa pasiiditvaa varita.m vara.m datvaa kaamena tappayati, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, yassa kassaci kaayena vaacaaya manasaa aaraadhakassa pasiiditvaa varita.m varamanuttara.m sabbadukkhaparimutti.m datvaa asesakaamavarena ca tappayati, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti.

[03] ``raajaa ^a^V0.0214^ea^ naama aa.na.m viitikkamanta.m vigarahati jhaapeti {jaapeti (sii0 pii0)} dha.mseti, bhagavatopi, mahaaraaja, saasanavare aa.na.m atikkamanto alajjii ma"nkubhaavena o~n~naato hii.lito garahito bhavitvaa vajjati jinasaasanavaramhaa, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti.

[03] ``raajaa ^a^M0.0222^ea^ naama pubbakaana.m dhammikaana.m raajuuna.m pave.nimanusi.t.thiyaa dhammaadhammamanudiipayitvaa dhammena rajja.m kaarayamaano pihayito piyo patthito bhavati janamanussaana.m, cira.m raajakulava.msa.m .thapayati dhammagu.nabalena, bhagavaapi, mahaaraaja, pubbakaana.m sayambhuuna.m pave.nimanusi.t.thiyaa dhammaadhammamanudiipayitvaa dhammena lokamanusaasamaano pihayito piyo patthito devamanussaana.m cira.m saasana.m pavatteti dhammagu.nabalena, tenaapi kaara.nena tathaagato vuccati `raajaa'ti. evamanekavidha.m, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena tathaagato braahma.nopi bhaveyya raajaapi bhaveyya, sunipu.no bhikkhu kappampi no na.m sampaadeyya, ki.m atibahu.m bha.nitena, sa.mkhitta.m sampa.ticchitabba''nti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] braahma.naraajavaadapa~nho a.t.thamo.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0228^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ```gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya.m {abhojaniiya.m (ka0) su0 ni0 81 passitabba.m}, sampassata.m braahma.na nesa dhammaa.
[22] gaathaabhigiita.m panudanti buddhaa, dhamme satii braahma.na vuttiresaa'ti..

[03] ``puna ca bhagavaa parisaaya dhamma.m desento kathento anupubbikatha.m pa.thama.m taava daanakatha.m katheti, pacchaa siilakatha.m, tassa bhagavato sabbalokissarassa bhaasita.m sutvaa devamanussaa abhisa"nkharitvaa daana.m denti, tassa ta.m uyyojita.m daana.m saavakaa paribhu~njanti. yadi, bhante naagasena, bhagavataa bha.nita.m `gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya'nti, tena hi `bhagavaa daanakatha.m pa.thama.m kathetii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi daanakatha.m pa.thama.m katheti, tena hi `gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya'nti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ki.m kaara.na.m? yo so, bhante, dakkhi.neyyo gihiina.m pi.n.dapaatadaanassa vipaaka.m katheti, tassa te dhammakatha.m sutvaa pasannacittaa aparaapara.m ^a^M0.0223^ea^ daana.m ^a^V0.0215^ea^ denti, ye ta.m daana.m paribhu~njanti, sabbe te gaathaabhigiita.m paribhu~njanti. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho nipu.no gambhiiro tapaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya.m, sampassata.m braahma.na nesa dhammo. gaathaabhigiita.m panudanti buddhaa, dhamme satii braahma.na vuttiresaa'ti, katheti ca bhagavaa pa.thama.m daanakatha.m, ta~nca pana kiriya.m sabbesa.m tathaagataana.m pa.thama.m daanakathaaya, tattha citta.m abhiramaapetvaa pacchaa siile niyojenti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, manussaa taru.nadaarakaana.m pa.thama.m taava ^a^P0.0229^ea^ kii.laabha.n.dakaani denti. seyyathida.m, va"nkaka.m gha.tika.m ci"ngulaka.m pattaa.lhaka.m rathaka.m dhanuka.m, pacchaa te sake sake kamme niyojenti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato pa.thama.m daanakathaaya citta.m abhiramaapetvaa pacchaa siile niyojeti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, bhisakko naama aaturaana.m pa.thama.m taava catuuhapa~ncaaha.m tela.m paayeti balakara.naaya sinehanaaya, pacchaa vireceti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato pa.thama.m taava daanakathaaya citta.m abhiramaapetvaa pacchaa siile niyojeti. daayakaana.m, mahaaraaja, daanapatiina.m citta.m muduka.m hoti maddava.m siniddha.m, tena te daanasetusa"nkamena daananaavaaya sa.msaarasaagarapaaramanugacchanti, tasmaa tesa.m pa.thama.m kammabhuumimanusaasati, na ca kenaci {tena (sii0 pii0)} vi~n~nattimaapajjatii''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, `vi~n~natti'nti ya.m vadesi, kati pana taa vi~n~nattiyo''ti? ``dvemaa, mahaaraaja, vi~n~nattiyo kaayavi~n~natti vaciivi~n~natti caati. tattha atthi kaayavi~n~natti saavajjaa, atthi anavajjaa. atthi vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa, atthi anavajjaa.

[03] ``katamaa kaayavi~n~natti saavajjaa? idhekacco bhikkhu kulaani upagantvaa anokaase .thito .thaana.m bha~njati, aya.m kaayavi~n~natti saavajjaa. taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0224^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, idhekacco bhikkhu kulaani upagantvaa anokaase .thito gala.m pa.naametvaa morapekkhita.m pekkhati `eva.m ime passantii'ti, tena ca te passanti. ayampi kaayavi~n~natti saavajjaa. taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m ^a^V0.0216^ea^ samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, idhekacco bhikkhu hanukaaya vaa ^a^P0.0230^ea^ bhamukaaya vaa a"ngu.t.thena vaa vi~n~naapeti, ayampi kaayavi~n~natti saavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``katamaa kaayavi~n~natti anavajjaa? idha bhikkhu kulaani upagantvaa sato samaahito sampajaano .thaanepi a.t.thaanepi yathaanusi.t.thi.m gantvaa .thaane ti.t.thati, daatukaamesu ti.t.thati, adaatukaamesu pakkamati. aya.m kaayavi~n~natti anavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye va.n.nito hoti thuto pasattho sallekhitaacaaro, parisuddhaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] `na ve yaacanti sappa~n~naa, dhiiro ca veditumarahati {ariyaa garahanti yaacana.m (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] uddissa ariyaa ti.t.thanti, esaa ariyaana yaacanaa'ti..

[03] ``katamaa vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa? idha, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu vaacaaya bahuvidha.m vi~n~naapeti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, aya.m vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, idhekacco bhikkhu paresa.m saavento eva.m bha.nati `iminaa me attho'ti, taaya ca vaacaaya paresa.m saavitaaya tassa laabho uppajjati, ayampi vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa ^a^M0.0225^ea^ na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, idhekacco bhikkhu vaciivipphaarena parisaaya saaveti `eva~nca eva~nca ^a^V0.0217^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m daatabba'nti, ta~nca te vacana.m sutvaa parikittita.m abhiharanti, ayampi vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito ^a^P0.0231^ea^ garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``nanu, mahaaraaja, theropi saariputto attha"ngate suuriye rattibhaage gilaano samaano therena mahaamoggallaanena bhesajja.m pucchiiyamaano vaaca.m bhindi, tassa tena vaciibhedena bhesajja.m uppajji. atha thero saariputto `vaciibhedena me ima.m bhesajja.m uppanna.m, maa me aajiivo bhijjii'ti aajiivabhedabhayaa ta.m bhesajja.m pajahi na upajiivi. evampi vaciivi~n~natti saavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa na paribhu~njanti. so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye o~n~naato hoti hii.lito khii.lito garahito paribhuuto acittiikato, bhinnaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``katamaa vaciivi~n~natti anavajjaa? idha, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu sati paccaye bhesajja.m vi~n~naapeti ~naatipavaaritesu kulesu, aya.m vaciivi~n~natti anavajjaa, taaya ca vi~n~naapita.m ariyaa paribhu~njanti, so ca puggalo ariyaana.m samaye va.n.nito hoti thomito pasattho, parisuddhaajiivotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati, anumato tathaagatehi arahantehi sammaasambuddhehi.

[03] ``ya.m pana, mahaaraaja, tathaagato kasibhaaradvaajassa braahma.nassa bhojana.m pajahi {pajahati (ka0)}, ta.m aave.thanavinive.thanaka.d.dhananiggahappa.tikammena nibbatti, tasmaa tathaagato ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tikkhipi na upajiivii''ti.

[03] ``sabbakaala.m, bhante naagasena, tathaagate bhu~njamaane devataa dibba.m oja.m patte aakiranti, udaahu `suukaramaddave ca madhupaayaase caa'ti dviisu yeva pi.n.dapaatesu aakiri.msuu''ti? ``sabbakaala.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagate bhu~njamaane devataa dibba.m oja.m gahetvaa upati.t.thitvaa uddha.tuddha.te aalope aakiranti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0226^ea^, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no suudo ra~n~no bhu~njantassa suupa.m gahetvaa upati.t.thitvaa kaba.le kaba.le suupa.m aakirati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sabbakaala.m tathaagate bhu~njamaane devataa dibba.m oja.m gahetvaa upati.t.thitvaa uddha.tuddha.te aalope dibba.m oja.m aakiranti. vera~njaayampi, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0218^ea^ ^a^P0.0232^ea^, tathaagatassa sukkhayavapulake {sukkhayavamuulake (ka0)} bhu~njamaanassa devataa dibbena ojena temayitvaa temayitvaa upasa.mhari.msu, tena tathaagatassa kaayo upacito ahosii''ti. ``laabhaa vata, bhante naagasena, taasa.m devataana.m, yaa tathaagatassa sariirappa.tijaggane satata.m samita.m ussukkamaapannaa. saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] gaathaabhigiitabhojanakathaapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyehi kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m paripaacita.m mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naayaa'ti. puna ca `sabba~n~nuta.m pattassa appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa naama, bhante naagasena, issaaso vaa issaasantevaasii vaa bahuke divase sa"ngaamatthaaya upaasana.m sikkhitvaa sampatte mahaayuddhe osakkeyya, evameva kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyehi kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m paripaacetvaa mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naaya sabba~n~nuta.m pattena dhammadesanaaya osakkita.m.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, bhante naagasena, mallo vaa mallantevaasii vaa bahuke divase nibbuddha.m sikkhitvaa sampatte mallayuddhe osakkeyya, evameva kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyehi kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m paripaacetvaa mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naaya sabba~n~nuta.m pattena dhammadesanaaya osakkita.m.
