[03] ``ki.m nu ^a^M0.0227^ea^ kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena bhayaa osakkita.m, udaahu apaaka.tataaya osakkita.m, udaahu dubbalataaya osakkita.m, udaahu asabba~n~nutaaya ^a^P0.0233^ea^ osakkita.m, ki.m tattha kaara.na.m, i"ngha me tva.m kaara.na.m bruuhi ka"nkhaavitara.naaya. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyehi kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m paripaacita.m mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naaya, tena hi `sabba~n~nuta.m pattassa appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaayaa'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi sabba~n~nuta.m pattassa appossukkataaya citta.m nami ^a^V0.0219^ea^ no dhammadesanaaya, tena hi `tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyeti kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m paripaacita.m mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naayaa'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho gambhiiro dunnibbe.tho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``paripaacita~nca, mahaaraaja, tathaagatena catuuhi ca asa"nkhyeyyehi kappaana.m satasahassena ca etthantare sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m mahato janakaayassa samuddhara.naaya, pattasabba~n~nutassa ca appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaaya. ta~nca pana dhammassa gambhiiranipu.naduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppa.tivedhata.m sattaana~nca aalayaaraamata.m sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa da.lhasuggahitata~nca disvaa `ki.m nu kho, katha.m nu kho'ti appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaaya, sattaana.m pa.tivedhacintanamaanasa.m yeveta.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhisakko sallakatto anekabyaadhiparipii.lita.m nara.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m cintayati `kena nu kho upakkamena katamena vaa bhesajjena imassa byaadhi vuupasameyyaa'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa sabbakilesabyaadhiparipii.lita.m jana.m dhammassa ca gambhiiranipu.naduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppa.tivedhata.m disvaa `ki.m nu kho, katha.m nu kho'ti appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaaya, sattaana.m ^a^P0.0234^ea^ pa.tivedhacintanamaanasa.m yeveta.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaavasittassa dovaarikaaniika.t.thapaarisajjanegamabha.tabala {balattha (sii0 pii0)} amaccaraaja~n~naraajuupajiivine jane disvaa eva.m cittamuppajjeyya ^a^M0.0228^ea^ `ki.m nu kho, katha.m nu kho ime sa"nga.nhissaamii'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa dhammassa gambhiiranipu.naduddasaduranubodhasukhumaduppa.tivedhata.m sattaana~nca aalayaaraamata.m sakkaayadi.t.thiyaa da.lhasuggahitata~nca disvaa `ki.m nu kho, katha.m nu kho'ti appossukkataaya citta.m nami, no dhammadesanaaya, sattaana.m pa.tivedhacintanamaanasa.m yeveta.m.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, sabbesa.m tathaagataana.m dhammataa esaa, ya.m brahmunaa aayaacitaa dhamma.m desenti. tattha pana ki.m kaara.na.m? ye tena samayena manussaa taapasaparibbaajakaa sama.nabraahma.naa, sabbete brahmadevataa honti brahmagarukaa brahmaparaaya.naa, tasmaa tassa balavato yasavato ~naatassa pa~n~naatassa uttarassa accuggatassa onamanena sadevako loko onamissati okappessati ^a^V0.0220^ea^ adhimuccissatiiti iminaa ca, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena tathaagataa brahmunaa aayaacitaa dhamma.m desenti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, koci raajaa vaa raajamahaamatto vaa yassa onamati apaciti.m karoti, balavatarassa tassa onamanena avasesaa janataa onamati apaciti.m karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, brahme onamite tathaagataana.m sadevako loko onamissati, puujitapuujako mahaaraaja, loko, tasmaa so brahmaa sabbesa.m tathaagataana.m aayaacati dhammadesanaaya, tena ca kaara.nena tathaagataa brahmunaa aayaacitaa dhamma.m desentii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, sunibbe.thito pa~nho, atibhadraka.m veyyaakara.na.m, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] dhammadesanaaya appossukkapa~nho dasamo.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``bhante, ^a^P0.0235^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa --
[21] ```na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati.
[22] sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo'ti {mahaava0 11}..

[03] ``puna ca bha.nita.m `iti kho, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ^a^M0.0229^ea^ ca ma.m puujaaya puujesii'ti. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagatena bha.nita.m `na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati. sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo'ti, tena hi `iti kho, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesii'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa. yadi tathaagatena bha.nita.m `iti kho, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesii'ti, tena hi `na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati. sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo'ti tampi vacana.m micchaa. ayampi ubhato ko.tiko pa~nho tavaanuppatto, so tayaa nibbaahitabbo''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m ^a^V0.0221^ea^, mahaaraaja, tathaagatena `na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati. sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo'ti, bha.nita~nca `iti kho, bhikkhave, aa.laaro kaalaamo aacariyo me samaano antevaasi.m ma.m samaana.m attanaa samasama.m .thapesi, u.laaraaya ca ma.m puujaaya puujesii'ti.
[03] ``ta~nca pana vacana.m pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato aacariyabhaava.m sandhaaya bhaasita.m.

[03] `pa~ncime, mahaaraaja, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato aacariyaa, yehi anusi.t.tho bodhisatto tattha tattha divasa.m viitinaamesi. katame pa~nca? ye te, mahaaraaja, a.t.tha braahma.naa jaatamatte bodhisatte lakkha.naani ^a^P0.0236^ea^ parigga.nhi.msu, seyyathiida.m, raamo dhajo lakkha.no mantii ya~n~no suyaamo subhojo sudattoti. te tassa sotthi.m pavedayitvaa rakkhaakamma.m aka.msu, te ca pa.thama.m aacariyaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bodhisattassa pitaa suddhodano raajaa ya.m tena samayena abhijaata.m udiccajaatimanta.m padaka.m veyyaakara.na.m cha.la"ngavanta.m sabbamitta.m naama braahma.na.m upanetvaa sova.n.nena bhi"ngaarena {bhi"nkaarena (sii0 pii0)} udaka.m o.nojetvaa `ima.m kumaara.m sikkhaapehii'ti adaasi, aya.m dutiyo aacariyo.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0230^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, yaa saa devataa bodhisatta.m sa.mvejesii, yassaa vacana.m sutvaa bodhisatto sa.mviggo ubbiggo tasmi.m yeva kha.ne nekkhamma.m nikkhamitvaa pabbaji, aya.m tatiyo aacariyo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aa.laaro kaalaamo aaki~nca~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m aacikkhi, aya.m catuttho aacariyo.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, udako raamaputto nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa parikamma.m aacikkhi {aacikkhati (ka0)}, aya.m pa~ncamo aacariyo. ime kho, mahaaraaja, pubbeva sambodhaa anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattassa sato pa~nca aacariyaa. te ca pana aacariyaa lokiye dhamme. imasmi~nca pana, mahaaraaja, lokuttare dhamme sabba~n~nuta~naa.nappa.tivedhaaya natthi tathaagatassa anuttaro anusaasako, sayambhuu ^a^V0.0222^ea^, mahaaraaja, tathaagato anaacariyako, tasmaa kaara.naa tathaagatena bha.nita.m `na me aacariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati. sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi me pa.tipuggalo'ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] aacariyaanaacariyapa~nho ekaadasamo.
[06] santhavavaggo pa~ncamo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge ekaadasa pa~nho.
[06] me.n.dakapa~nho ni.t.thito.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0223^ea^ ^a^M0.0231^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso, ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa dve arahanto sammaasambuddho apubba.m acarima.m ^a^P0.0237^ea^ uppajjeyyu.m, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'ti. desentaa ca, bhante naagasena, sabbepi tathaagataa sattati.msa bodhipakkhiyadhamme desenti, kathayamaanaa ca cattaari ariyasaccaani kathenti, sikkhaapentaa ca tiisu sikkhaasu sikkhaapenti, anusaasamaanaa ca appamaadappa.tipattiya.m anusaasanti. yadi, bhante naagasena, sabbesampi tathaagataana.m ekaa desanaa ekaa kathaa ekaa sikkhaa ekaa anusi.t.thi, kena kaara.nena dve tathaagataa ekakkha.ne nuppajjanti? ekenapi taava buddhuppaadena aya.m loko obhaasajaato, yadi dutiyo buddho bhaveyya, dvinna.m pabhaaya aya.m loko bhiyyosomattaaya obhaasajaato bhaveyya, ovadamaanaa ca dve tathaagataa sukha.m ovadeyyu.m, anusaasamaanaa ca sukha.m anusaaseyyu.m, tattha me kaara.na.m bruuhi, yathaaha.m nissa.msayo bhaveyya''nti.

[03] ``aya.m, mahaaraaja, dasasahassii lokadhaatu ekabuddhadhaara.nii, ekasseva tathaagatassa gu.na.m dhaareti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, naaya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu dhaareyya, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddha.mseyya, na .thaanamupagaccheyya.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, naavaa ekapurisasandhaara.nii {ekapurisasantaara.nii (sii0 pii0)} bhaveyya, ekasmi.m purise abhiruu.lhe saa naavaa samupaadikaa {samudakaa (ka0)} bhaveyya. atha dutiyo puriso aagaccheyya taadiso aayunaa va.n.nena vayena pamaa.nena kisathuulena sabba"ngapacca"ngena, so ta.m naava.m abhiruuheyya, api nu saa, mahaaraaja, naavaa ^a^V0.0224^ea^ dvinnampi dhaareyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddha.mseyya, na .thaanamupagaccheyya, osiideyya udake''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, aya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu ^a^M0.0232^ea^ ekabuddhadhaara.nii, ekasseva tathaagatassa gu.na.m dhaareti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, naaya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu dhaareyya, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddha.mseyya, na .thaanamupagaccheyya.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso ^a^P0.0238^ea^ yaavadattha.m bhojana.m bhu~njeyya chaadenta.m yaava ka.n.thamabhipuurayitvaa, so dhaato pii.nito paripu.n.no nirantaro tandikato anonamitada.n.dajaato punadeva tattaka.m bhojana.m bhu~njeyya, api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, puriso sukhito bhaveyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, saki.m bhuttova mareyyaa''ti {bhutto vameyyaati (ka0)}. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, aya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu ekabuddhadhaara.nii, ekasseva tathaagatassa gu.na.m dhaareti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, naaya.m dasasahassii lokadhaatu dhaareyya, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddha.mseyya, na .thaanamupagaccheyyaa''ti.

[03] ``ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, atidhammabhaarena pathavii calatii''ti? ``idha, mahaaraaja, dve saka.taa ratanaparipuuritaa bhaveyyu.m yaava mukhasamaa, ekasmaa saka.tato ratana.m gahetvaa ekasmi.m saka.te aakireyyu.m, api nu kho ta.m, mahaaraaja, saka.ta.m dvinnampi saka.taana.m ratana.m dhaareyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, naabhipi tassa phaleyya, araapi tassa bhijjeyyu.m, nemipi tassa opateyya, akkhopi tassa bhijjeyyaa''ti. ``ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, atiratanabhaarena saka.ta.m bhijjatii''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, atidhammabhaarena pathavii calati.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, ima.m kaara.na.m buddhabalaparidiipanaaya osaarita.m. a~n~nampi tattha abhiruupa.m kaara.na.m su.nohi, yena kaara.nena dve sammaasambuddho ekakkha.ne nuppajjanti. yadi, mahaaraaja, dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne uppajjeyyu.m, tesa.m parisaaya vivaado uppajjeyya `tumhaaka.m buddho, amhaaka.m buddho'ti, ubhato pakkhajaataa bhaveyyu.m, yathaa, mahaaraaja, dvinna.m balavaamaccaana.m parisaaya vivaado uppajjeyya `tumhaaka.m amacco, amhaaka.m amacco'ti, ubhato pakkhajaataa honti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yadi dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne uppajjeyyu.m, tesa.m parisaaya vivaado uppajjeyya `tumhaaka.m ^a^M0.0233^ea^ buddho, amhaaka.m buddho'ti, ubhato pakkhajaataa ^a^P0.0239^ea^ bhaveyyu.m ^a^V0.0225^ea^. ida.m taava, mahaaraaja, eka.m kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne nuppajjanti.

[03] ``aparampi, mahaaraaja, uttari.m kaara.na.m su.nohi, yena kaara.nena dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne nuppajjanti. yadi, mahaaraaja, dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne uppajjeyyu.m, `aggo buddho'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhaveyya, `je.t.tho buddho'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhaveyya, `se.t.tho buddho'ti, `visi.t.tho buddho'ti, `uttamo buddho'ti, `pavaro buddho'ti, `asamo buddho'ti, `asamasamo buddho'ti, `appa.timo buddho'ti, `appa.tibhaago buddho'ti, `appa.tipuggalo buddho'ti ya.m vacana.m, ta.m micchaa bhaveyya. idampi kho tva.m, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m atthato sampa.ticcha, yena kaara.nena dve sammaasambuddhaa ekakkha.ne nuppajjanti.

[03] ``api ca kho, mahaaraaja, buddhaana.m bhagavantaana.m sabhaavapakati esaaya.m, eko yeva buddho loke uppajjati. kasmaa kaara.naa? mahantataaya sabba~n~nubuddhagu.naana.m. a~n~nampi, mahaaraaja, ya.m loke mahanta.m, ta.m eka.m yeva hoti. pathavii, mahaaraaja, mahantii, saa ekaa yeva. saagaro mahanto, so eko yeva. sineru giriraajaa mahanto, so eko yeva. aakaaso mahanto, so eko yeva. sakko mahanto, so eko yeva. maaro mahanto, so eko yeva. mahaabrahmaa mahanto, so eko yeva. tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho mahanto, so eko yeva lokasmi.m. yattha te uppajjanti, tattha a~n~nassa okaaso na hoti, tasmaa, mahaaraaja, tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho eko yeva lokasmi.m uppajjatii''ti.

[03] ``sukathito, bhante naagasena, pa~nho opammehi kaara.nehi. anipu.nopeta.m sutvaa attamano bhaveyya, ki.m pana maadiso mahaapa~n~no. saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] dvinna.m buddhaana.m anuppajjamaanapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0240^ea^ ^a^M0.0234^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa maatucchaaya mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa vassikasaa.tikaaya diiyamaanaaya `sa"nghe gotami dehi, sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami ^a^V0.0226^ea^ sa"ngho caa'ti. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, tathaagato sa"ngharatanato na bhaariko na garuko na dakkhi.neyyo, ya.m tathaagato sakaaya maatucchaaya saya.m pi~njita.m {picchita.m (sii0 pii0)} saya.m lu~ncita.m saya.m pothita.m saya.m kantita.m saya.m vaayita.m vassikasaa.tika.m attano diiyamaana.m sa"nghassa daapesi. yadi, bhante naagasena, tathaagato sa"ngharatanato uttaro bhaveyya adhiko vaa visi.t.tho vaa, `mayi dinne mahapphala.m bhavissatii'ti na tathaagato maatucchaaya saya.m pi~njita.m saya.m lu~ncita.m saya.m pothita.m vassikasaa.tika.m sa"nghe daapeyya, yasmaa ca kho bhante naagasena tathaagato attaana.m na patthayati {na patthiiyati (sii0 pii0)} na upanissayati, tasmaa tathaagato maatucchaaya ta.m vassikasaa.tika.m sa"nghassa daapesii''ti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa maatucchaaya mahaapajaapatiyaa gotamiyaa vassikasaa.tikaaya diiyamaanaaya `sa"nghe gotami dehi, sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa'ti. ta.m pana na attano patimaananassa avipaakataaya na adakkhi.neyyataaya, api ca kho, mahaaraaja, hitatthaaya anukampaaya anaagatamaddhaana.m sa"ngho mamaccayena cittiikato bhavissatiiti vijjamaane yeva gu.ne parikittayanto evamaaha `sa"nghe gotami dehi, sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa'ti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pitaa dharamaano yeva amaccabha.tabaladovaarikaaniika.t.thapaarisajjajanamajjhe ra~n~no santike puttassa vijjamaana.m yeva gu.na.m pakitteti {parikitteti (ka0)} `idha .thapito anaagatamaddhaana.m janamajjhe puujito bhavissatii'ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato hitatthaaya anukampaaya anaagatamaddhaana.m sa"ngho mamaccayena cittiikato bhavissatiiti vijjamaane yeva gu.ne pakittayanto evamaaha `sa"nghe ^a^P0.0241^ea^ gotami dehi, sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva pujito bhavissaami sa"ngho caa'ti.

[03] ``na ^a^M0.0235^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, taavatakena vassikasaa.tikaanuppadaanamattakena sa"ngho tathaagatato adhiko naama hoti visi.t.tho vaa. yathaa, mahaaraaja, maataapitaro puttaana.m ucchaadenti parimaddanti nahaapenti sambaahenti, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, taavatakena ucchaadanaparimaddananahaapanasambaahanamattakena `putto maataapituuhi adhiko naama hoti visi.t.tho vaa'ti? ``na hi, bhante, akaamakara.niiyaa bhante puttaa maataapituuna.m, tasmaa maataapitaro puttaana.m ucchaadanaparimaddananahaapanasambaahana.m karontii''ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na taavatakena vassikasaa.tikaanuppadaanamattakena ^a^V0.0227^ea^ sa"ngho tathaagatato adhiko naama hoti visi.t.tho vaati. api ca tathaagato akaamakara.niiya.m karonto maatucchaaya ta.m vassikasaa.tika.m sa"nghassa daapesi.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso ra~n~no upaayana.m aahareyya, ta.m raajaa upaayana.m a~n~natarassa bha.tassa vaa balassa vaa senaapatissa vaa purohitassa vaa dadeyya. api nu kho so, mahaaraaja, puriso taavatakena upaayanapa.tilaabhamattakena ra~n~naa adhiko naama hoti visi.t.tho vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, raajabhattiko, bhante, so puriso raajuupajiivii, ta.t.thaane .thapento raajaa upaayana.m detii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, na taavatakena vassikasaa.tikaanuppadaanamattakena sa"ngho tathaagatato adhiko naama hoti visi.t.tho vaa, atha kho tathaagatabhattiko tathaagatuupajiivii. ta.t.thaane .thapento tathaagato sa"nghassa vassikasaa.tika.m daapesi.

[03] ``api ca, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa eva.m ahosi `sabhaavapa.tipuujaniiyo sa"ngho, mama santakena sa"ngha.m pa.tipuujessaamii'ti sa"nghassa vassikasaa.tika.m daapesi, na, mahaaraaja, tathaagato attano yeva pa.tipuujana.m va.n.neti, atha kho ye loke pa.tipuujanaarahaa, tesampi tathaagato pa.tipuujana.m va.n.neti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena majjhimanikaayavarala~nchake ^a^P0.0242^ea^ dhammadaayaadadhammapariyaaye appicchappa.tipatti.m pakittayamaanena `asu yeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca paasa.msataro caa'ti. ``natthi, mahaaraaja, bhavesu koci satto tathaagatato dakkhi.neyyo vaa ^a^M0.0236^ea^ uttaro vaa adhiko vaa visi.t.tho vaa, tathaagatova uttaro adhiko visi.t.tho.
[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, sa.myuttanikaayavare maa.navagaamikena devaputtena bhagavato purato .thatvaa devamanussamajjhe --
[21] ```vipulo raajagahiiyaana.m {raajagahikaana.m (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 1.111 passitabba.m}, giri se.t.tho pavuccati.
[22] seto himavata.m se.t.tho, aadicco aghagaamina.m..
[21] ```samuddo udadhina.m se.t.tho, nakkhattaana~nca candimaa.
[22] sadevakassa lokassa, buddho aggo pavuccatii'ti..

[03] ``taa ^a^V0.0228^ea^ kho panetaa, mahaaraaja, maa.navagaamikena devaputtena gaathaa sugiitaa na duggiitaa, subhaasitaa na dubbhaasitaa, anumataa ca bhagavataa, nanu, mahaaraaja, therenapi saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa bha.nita.m --
[21] ```eko manopasaado. sara.nagamanama~njalipa.naamo vaa.
[22] ussahate taarayitu.m, maarabalanisuudane buddhe'ti..

[03] ``bhagavataa ca bha.nita.m devaatidevena `ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamaano uppajjati bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katamo ekapuggalo? tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho...pe0... devamanussaana'''nti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] gotamivatthadaanapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] [3] ``bhante naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa sammaapa.tipatti.m ^a^P0.0243^ea^ va.n.nemi, gihii vaa bhikkhave pabbajito vaa sammaapa.tipanno sammaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m ^a^M0.0237^ea^ dhamma.m kusala''nti. yadi, bhante naagasena, gihii odaatavasano kaamabhogii puttadaarasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasanto kaasikacandana.m paccanubhonto maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarento jaataruuparajata.m saadiyanto ma.niku.n.dala {ma.nikanaka (sii0 pii0)} vicittamo.libaddho sammaapa.tipanno aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m, pabbajitopi bha.n.dukaasaavavatthavasano parapi.n.damajjhupagato catuusu siilakkhandhesu sammaaparipuurakaarii diya.d.dhesu sikkhaapadasatesu samaadaaya vattanto terasasu dhutagu.nesu anavasesa.m vattanto sammaapa.tipanno aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m. tattha, bhante, ko viseso gihino vaa pabbajitassa vaa? aphala.m hoti tapokamma.m, niratthakaa pabbajjaa. va~njhaa sikkhaapadagopanaa, mogha.m dhutagu.nasamaadaana.m, ki.m tattha dukkhamanuci.n.nena, nanu naama sukheneva sukha.m adhigantabba''nti.

[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa `gihino vaaha.m, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa vaa sammaapa.tipatti.m ^a^V0.0229^ea^ va.n.nemi, gihii vaa, bhikkhave, pabbajito vaa sammaapa.tipanno sammaapa.tipattaadhikara.nahetu aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala''nti. evameta.m, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipannova se.t.tho, pabbajitopi, mahaaraaja, `pabbajitomhii'ti na sammaa pa.tipajjeyya, atha kho so aarakaava saama~n~naa, aarakaava brahma~n~naa, pageva gihii odaatavasano. gihiipi, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m, pabbajitopi, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno aaraadhako hoti ~naaya.m dhamma.m kusala.m.
[03] ``api ca kho, mahaaraaja, pabbajitova saama~n~nassa issaro adhipati; pabbajjaa, mahaaraaja, bahugu.naa anekagu.naa appamaa.nagu.naa, na sakkaa pabbajjaaya gu.na.m parimaa.na.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kaamadadassa ma.niratanassa na sakkaa dhanena aggho ^a^P0.0244^ea^ parimaa.na.m kaatu.m `ettaka.m ma.niratanassa muula'nti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pabbajjaa bahugu.naa anekagu.naa appamaa.nagu.naa, na sakkaa pabbajjaaya gu.na.m parimaa.na.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, mahaasamudde uumiyo na sakkaa parimaa.na.m kaatu.m `ettakaa mahaasamudde uumiyo'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pabbajjaa bahugu.naa ^a^M0.0238^ea^ anekagu.naa appamaa.nagu.naa, na sakkaa pabbajjaaya gu.na.m parimaa.na.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``pabbajitassa, mahaaraaja, ya.m ki~nci kara.niiya.m, sabba.m ta.m khippameva samijjhati no cirarattaaya. ki.m kaara.naa? pabbajito, mahaaraaja, appiccho hoti santu.t.tho pavivitto asa.msa.t.tho aaraddhaviiriyo niraalayo aniketo paripu.n.nasiilo sallekhitaacaaro dhutappa.tipattikusalo hoti, ta.m kaara.naa pabbajitassa ya.m ki~nci kara.niiya.m, sabba.m ta.m khippameva samijjhati no cirarattaaya. yathaa, mahaaraaja, nigga.n.thisamasudhotaujuvimalanaaraaco susajjito sammaa vahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pabbajitassa ya.m ki~nci kara.niiya.m, sabba.m ta.m khippameva samijjhati no cirarattaayaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] gihipabbajitasammaapa.tipattipa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0230^ea^ naagasena, yadaa bodhisatto dukkarakaarika.m akaasi, netaadiso a~n~natra aarambho ahosi nikkamo kilesayuddha.m maccusena.m vidhamana.m aahaarapariggaho dukkarakaarikaa, evaruupe parakkame ki~nci assaada.m alabhitvaa tameva citta.m parihaapetvaa evamavoca `na kho panaaha.m imaaya ka.tukaaya dukkarakaarikaaya adhigacchaami uttarimanussadhamma.m alamariya~naa.nadassanavisesa.m, siyaa nu kho a~n~no maggo bodhaayaa'ti, tato nibbinditvaa a~n~nena magena sabba~n~nuta.m patto, puna taaya pa.tipadaaya saavake anusaasati samaadapeti.
[21] ```aarambhatha ^a^P0.0245^ea^ nikkhamatha, yu~njatha buddhasaasane.
[22] dhunaatha maccuno sena.m, na.laagaara.mva ku~njaro'ti {sa.m0 ni0 1.185}..
[03] ``kena na kho, bhante naagasena, kaara.nena tathaagato yaaya pa.tipadaaya attanaa nibbinno virattaruupo, tattha saavake anusaasati samaadapetii''ti?

[03] ``tadaapi ^a^M0.0239^ea^, mahaaraaja, etarahipi saa yeva pa.tipadaa, ta.m yeva pa.tipada.m pa.tipajjitvaa bodhisatto sabba~n~nuta.m patto. api ca, mahaaraaja, bodhisatto ativiiriya.m karonto niravasesato aahaara.m uparundhi. tassa aahaaruuparodhena cittadubbalya.m uppajji. so tena dubbalyena naasakkhi sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitu.m, so mattamatta.m kaba.liikaaraahaara.m sevanto taayeva pa.tipadaaya nacirasseva sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.ni. so yeva, mahaaraaja, pa.tipadaa sabbesa.m tathaagataana.m sabba~n~nuta~naa.nappa.tilaabhaaya.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sabbesa.m sattaana.m aahaaro upatthambho, aahaaruupanissitaa sabbe sattaa sukha.m anubhavanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, saa yeva pa.tipadaa sabbesa.m tathaagataana.m sabba~n~nuta~naa.nappa.tilaabhaaya, neso, mahaaraaja, doso aarambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena tathaagato tasmi.m samaye na paapu.ni sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m, atha kho aahaaruuparodhasseveso doso, sadaa pa.tiyattaa yevesaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso addhaana.m ativegena gaccheyya, tena so pakkhahato vaa bhaveyya ^a^V0.0231^ea^ pii.thasappii vaa asa~ncaro pathavitale. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, mahaapathaviyaa doso atthi, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosii''ti? ``na hi, bhante; sadaa pa.tiyattaa, bhante, mahaapathavii, kuto tassaa doso? vaayaamasseveso doso, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, neso doso aarambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena tathaagato tasmi.m samaye na paapu.ni sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m, atha kho aahaaruuparodhasseveso doso sadaa pa.tiyattaa ^a^P0.0246^ea^ yevesaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso kili.t.tha.m saa.taka.m nivaaseyya, na so ta.m dhovaapeyya, neso doso udakassa, sadaa pa.tiyatta.m udaka.m. purisasseveso doso. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, neso doso aarambhassa, na nikkamassa, na kilesayuddhassa, yena tathaagato tasmi.m samaye na paapu.ni sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m, atha kho aahaaruuparodhasseveso doso, sadaa pa.tiyattaa yevesaa pa.tipadaa, tasmaa tathaagato taayeva pa.tipadaaya saavake anusaasati samaadapeti, eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, sadaa ^a^M0.0240^ea^ pa.tiyattaa anavajjaa saa pa.tipadaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] pa.tipadaadosapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, mahanta.m ida.m tathaagatasaasana.m saara.m vara.m se.t.tha.m pavara.m anupama.m parisuddha.m vimala.m pa.n.dara.m anavajja.m, na yutta.m gihi.m taavataka.m pabbajetu.m, gihii yeva {gihi.m yeva (sii0 pii0)} ekasmi.m phale vinetvaa yadaa apunaraavattii hoti tadaa so pabbaajetabbo. ki.m kaara.naa? ime dujjanaa taava tattha saasane visuddhe pabbajitvaa pa.tinivattitvaa hiinaayaavattanti, tesa.m paccaagamanena aya.m mahaajano eva.m vicinteti `tucchaka.m vata bho eta.m sama.nassa gotamassa saasana.m bhavissati, ya.m ime pa.tinivattantii'ti, idamettha kaara.na''nti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ta.laako bhaveyya sampu.n.nasucivimalasiitalasalilo, atha yo koci kili.t.tho malakaddamagato ta.m ta.laaka.m gantvaa anahaayitvaa kili.t.thova pa.tinivatteyya, tattha, mahaaraaja, katama.m jano garaheyya kili.t.tha.m vaa ta.laaka.m vaa''ti? ``kili.t.tha.m, bhante, jano garaheyya ^a^V0.0232^ea^ `aya.m ta.laaka.m gantvaa anahaayitvaa kili.t.thova pa.tinivatto, ki.m ima.m anahaayitukaama.m ta.laako saya.m nahaapessati, ko doso ta.laakassaa'ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0247^ea^, tathaagato vimuttivarasalilasampu.n.na.m saddhammavarata.laaka.m maapesi `ye keci kilesamalakili.t.thaa sacetanaa budhaa, te idha nahaayitvaa sabbakilese pavaahayissantii'ti. yadi koci ta.m saddhammavarata.laaka.m gantvaa anahaayitvaa sakilesova pa.tinivattitvaa hiinaayaavattati ta.m yeva jano garahissati `aya.m jinasaasane pabbajitvaa tattha pati.t.tha.m alabhitvaa hiinaayaavatto, ki.m ima.m appa.tipajjanta.m jinasaasana.m saya.m bodhessati, ko doso jinasaasanassaa'ti?

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0241^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso paramabyaadhito roguppattikusala.m amoghadhuvasiddhakamma.m bhisakka.m sallakatta.m disvaa atikicchaapetvaa sabyaadhikova pa.tinivatteyya, tattha katama.m jano garaheyya aatura.m vaa bhisakka.m vaa''ti? ``aatura.m, bhante, jano garaheyya `aya.m roguppattikusala.m amoghadhuvasiddhakamma.m bhisakka.m sallakatta.m disvaa atikicchaapetvaa sabyaadhikova pa.tinivatto, ki.m ima.m atikicchaapenta.m bhisakko saya.m tikicchissati, ko doso bhisakkassaa'''ti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato antosaasanasamugge kevala.m sakalakilesabyaadhivuupasamanasamattha.m amatosadha.m pakkhipi, `ye keci kilesabyaadhipii.litaa sacetanaa budhaa, te ima.m amatosadha.m pivitvaa sabbakilesabyaadhi.m vuupasamessantii'ti. yadi koci ya.m amatosadha.m apivitvaa sakilesova pa.tinivattitvaa hiinaayaavattati, ta.m yeva jano garahissati `aya.m jinasaasane pabbajitvaa tattha pati.t.tha.m alabhitvaa hiinaayaavatto, ki.m ima.m appa.tipajjanta.m jinasaasana.m saya.m bodhessati, ko doso jinasaasanassaa'ti?

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, chaato puriso mahatimahaapu~n~nabhattaparivesana.m gantvaa ta.m bhatta.m abhu~njitvaa chaatova pa.tinivatteyya, tattha katama.m jano garaheyya chaata.m vaa pu~n~nabhatta.m vaa''ti? ``chaata.m, bhante, jano garaheyya ^a^P0.0248^ea^ `aya.m khudaapii.lito pu~n~nabhatta.m pa.tilabhitvaa abhu~njitvaa chaatova pa.tinivatto, ki.m imassa abhu~njantassa bhojana.m saya.m mukha.m pavisissati, ko doso bhojanassaa'''ti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tathaagato antosaasanasamugge paramapavara.m santa.m siva.m pa.niita.m amata.m paramamadhura.m kaayagataasatibhojana.m .thapesi `ye keci kilesachaatajjhattaa ta.nhaaparetamaanasaa sacetanaa budhaa, te ima.m bhojana.m bhu~njitvaa kaamaruupaaruupabhavesu sabba.m ta.nhamapanessantii'ti. yadi koci ta.m bhojana.m abhu~njitvaa ta.nhaasitova pa.tinivattitvaa hiinaayaavattati, ta~n~neva jano garahissati `aya.m jinasaasane pabbajitvaa ^a^V0.0233^ea^ tattha pati.t.tha.m alabhitvaa hiinaayaavatto, ki.m ima.m appa.tipajjanta.m jinasaasana.m saya.m bodhessasi, ko doso jinasaasanassaa'ti.

[03] ``yadi, mahaaraaja, tathaagato gihi.m yeva ekasmi.m phale viniita.m pabbaajeyya, na naamaaya.m pabbajjaa kilesappahaanaaya visuddhiyaa vaa, natthi ^a^M0.0242^ea^ pabbajjaaya kara.niiya.m. yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso anekasatena kammena ta.laaka.m kha.naapetvaa parisaaya evamanussaaveyya `maa me, bhonto, keci sa.mkili.t.thaa ima.m ta.laaka.m otaratha, pavaahitarajojallaa parisuddhaa vimalama.t.thaa ima.m ta.laaka.m otarathaa'ti. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m pavaahitarajojallaana.m parisuddhaana.m vimalama.t.thaana.m tena ta.laakena kara.niiya.m bhaveyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, yassatthaaya te ta.m ta.laaka.m upagaccheyyu.m, ta.m a~n~natreva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m tena ta.laakenaa''ti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yadi tathaagato gihi.m yeva ekasmi.m phale viniita.m pabbaajeyya, tattheva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m pabbajjaaya.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, sabhaavaisibhattiko sutamantapadadharo atakkiko roguppattikusalo amoghadhuvasiddhakammo bhisakko sallakatto sabbaroguupasamabhesajja.m sannipaatetvaa parisaaya evamanussaaveyya `maa kho, bhonto ^a^P0.0249^ea^, keci sabyaadhikaa mama santike upagacchatha, abyaadhikaa arogaa mama santike upagacchathaa'ti. api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m abyaadhikaana.m arogaana.m paripu.n.naana.m udaggaana.m tena bhisakkena kara.niiya.m bhaveyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, yassatthaaya te ta.m bhisakka.m sallakatta.m upagaccheyyu.m, ta.m a~n~natreva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m tena bhisakkenaa''ti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yadi tathaagato gihi.m yeva ekasmi.m phale viniita.m pabbaajeyya, tattheva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m pabbajjaaya?

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, koci puriso anekathaalipaakasata.m bhojana.m pa.tiyaadaapetvaa parisaaya evamanussaaveyya `maa me, bhonto, keci chaataa ima.m parivesana.m upagacchatha, subhuttaa tittaa suhitaa dhaataa pii.nitaa paripu.n.naa ima.m parivesana.m upagacchathaa''ti. api nu kho mahaaraaja, tesa.m bhuttaaviina.m tittaana.m suhitaana.m dhaataana.m pii.nitaana.m paripu.n.naana.m tena bhojanena kara.niiya.m bhaveyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante, yassatthaaya te ta.m parivesana.m upagaccheyyu.m, ta.m a~n~natreva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m taaya parivesanaayaa''ti? ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yadi tathaagato gihi.m yeva ekasmi.m phale viniita.m pabbaajeyya, tattheva tesa.m kata.m kara.niiya.m, ki.m tesa.m pabbajjaaya?

[03] ``api ^a^V0.0234^ea^ ^a^M0.0243^ea^ ca, mahaaraaja, ye hiinaayaavattanti, te jinasaasanassa pa~nca atuliye gu.ne dassenti. katame pa~nca? bhuumimahantabhaava.m dassenti, parisuddhavimalabhaava.m dassenti, paapehi asa.mvaasiyabhaava.m dassenti, duppa.tivedhabhaava.m dassenti, bahusa.mvararakkhiyabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``katha.m bhuumimahantabhaava.m dassenti? yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso adhano hiinajacco nibbiseso buddhiparihiino mahaarajja.m pa.tilabhitvaa na cirasseva paripatati paridha.msati parihaayati yasato, na sakkoti issariya.m sandhaaretu.m. ki.m kaara.na.m ^a^P0.0250^ea^? mahantattaa issariyassa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci nibbisesaa akatapu~n~naa buddhiparihiinaa jinasaasane pabbajanti, te ta.m pabbajja.m pavaruttama.m sandhaaretu.m avisahantaa na cirasseva jinasaasanaa paripatitvaa paridha.msitvaa parihaayitvaa hiinaayaavattanti, na sakkonti jinasaasana.m sandhaaretu.m. ki.m kaara.na.m? mahantattaa jinasaasanabhuumiyaa. eva.m bhuumimahantabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``katha.m parisuddhavimalabhaava.m dassenti? yathaa, mahaaraaja, vaari pokkharapatte vikirati vidhamati vidha.mseti, na .thaanamupagacchati nuupalimpati. ki.m kaara.na.m? parisuddhavimalattaa padumassa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci sa.thaa kuu.taa va"nkaa ku.tilaa visamadi.t.thino jinasaasane pabbajanti, te parisuddhavimalanikka.n.takapa.n.daravarappavarasaasanato na cirasseva vikiritvaa vidhamitvaa vidha.msetvaa asa.n.thahitvaa anupalimpitvaa hiinaayaavattanti. ki.m kaara.na.m? parisuddhavimalattaa jinasaasanassa. eva.m parisuddhavimalabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``katha.m paapehi asa.mvaasiyabhaava.m dassenti? yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo na matena ku.napena sa.mvasati, ya.m hoti mahaasamudde mata.m ku.napa.m, ta.m khippameva tiira.m upaneti thala.m vaa ussaareti. ki.m kaara.na.m? mahaabhuutaana.m bhavanattaa mahaasamuddassa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci paapakaa asa.mvutaa ahirikaa akiriyaa osannaviiriyaa kusiitaa kili.t.thaa dujjanaa manussaa jinasaasane pabbajanti, te na cirasseva jinasaasanato arahantavimalakhii.naasavamahaabhuutabhavanato nikkhamitvaa asa.mvasitvaa hiinaayaavattanti. ki.m kaara.na.m? paapehi asa.mvaasiyattaa jinasaasanassa. eva.m paapehi asa.mvaasiyabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``katha.m ^a^M0.0244^ea^ duppa.tivedhabhaava.m dassenti? yathaa, mahaaraaja, ye keci achekaa asikkhitaa asippino mativippahiinaa issaasaa {issatthaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vaalaggavedha.m avisahantaa viga.lanti pakkamanti. ki.m kaara.na.m? sa.nhasukhumaduppa.tivedhattaa vaalaggassa ^a^P0.0251^ea^. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci duppa~n~naa ja.laa ^a^V0.0235^ea^ e.lamuugaa muu.lhaa dandhagatikaa janaa jinasaasane pabbajanti, te ta.m paramasa.nhasukhumacatusaccappa.tivedha.m pa.tivijjhitu.m avisahantaa jinasaasanaa viga.litvaa pakkamitvaa na cirasseva hiinaayaavattanti. ki.m kaara.na.m? paramasa.nhasukhumaduppa.tivedhataaya saccaana.m. eva.m duppa.tivedhabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``katha.m bahusa.mvararakkhiyabhaava.m dassenti? yathaa, mahaaraaja, kocideva puriso mahatimahaayuddhabhuumimupagato parasenaaya disaavidisaahi samantaa parivaarito sattihattha.m janamupenta.m disvaa bhiito osakkati pa.tinivattati palaayati. ki.m kaara.na.m? bahuvidhayuddhamukharakkha.nabhayaa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye keci paapakaa asa.mvutaa ahirikaa akiriyaa akkhantii capalaa calitaa ittaraa baalajanaa jinasaasane pabbajanti, te bahuvidha.m sikkhaapada.m parirakkhitu.m avisahantaa osakkitvaa pa.tinivattitvaa palaayitvaa na cirasseva hiinaayaavattanti. ki.m kaara.na.m? bahuvidhasa.mvararakkhiyabhaavattaa jinasaasanassa. eva.m bahuvidhasa.mvararakkhiyabhaava.m dassenti.

[03] ``thalajuttamepi, mahaaraaja, vassikaagumbe kimividdhaani pupphaani honti, taani a"nkuraani sa"nku.titaani antaraa yeva paripatanti, na ca tesu paripatitesu vassikaagumbo hii.lito naama hoti. yaani tattha .thitaani pupphaani, taani sammaa gandhena disaavidisa.m abhibyaapenti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te jinasaasane pabbajitvaa hiinaayaavattanti, te jinasaasane kimividdhaani vassikaapupphaani viya va.n.nagandharahitaa nibba.n.naakaarasiilaa abhabbaa vepullaaya, na ca tesa.m hiinaayaavattanena jinasaasana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ye tattha .thitaa bhikkhuu, te sadevaka.m loka.m siilavaragandhena abhibyaapenti.

[03] ``saaliinampi, mahaaraaja, niraata"nkaana.m ^a^P0.0252^ea^ lohitakaana.m antare karumbhaka.m naama saalijaati uppajjitvaa antaraa yeva vinassati, na ca tassaa vina.t.thattaa lohitakasaalii hii.litaa naama honti. ye tattha .thitaa saalii, te raajuupabhogaa honti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te jinasaasane pabbajitvaa ^a^M0.0245^ea^ hiinaayaavattanti, te lohitakasaaliinamantare karumbhakaa viya jinasaasane na va.d.dhitvaa vepullata.m na paapu.nitvaa {va.d.dhitvaa vepullata.m apaapu.nitvaa (sii0 ka0)} antaraa yeva hiinaayaavattanti, na ca tesa.m hiinaayaavattanena jinasaasana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ye tattha .thitaa bhikkhuu te arahattassa anucchavikaa honti.

[03] ``kaamadadassaapi ^a^V0.0236^ea^, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa ekadesa.m {ekadese (ka0)} kakkasa.m uppajjati, na ca tattha kakkasuppannattaa ma.niratana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ya.m tattha parisuddha.m ma.niratanassa, ta.m janassa haasakara.m hoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te jinasaasane pabbajitvaa hiinaayaavattanti, kakkasaa te jinasaasane papa.tikaa, na ca tesa.m hiinaayaavattanena jinasaasana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ye tattha .thitaa bhikkhuu, te devamanussaana.m haasajanakaa honti.

[03] ``jaatisampannassapi, mahaaraaja, lohitacandanassa ekadesa.m puutika.m hoti appagandha.m. na tena lohitacandana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ya.m tattha apuutika.m sugandha.m, ta.m samantaa vidhuupeti abhibyaapeti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te jinasaasane pabbajitvaa hiinaayaavattanti, te lohitacandanasaarantare puutikadesamiva cha.d.daniiyaa jinasaasane, na ca tesa.m hiinaayaavattanena jinasaasana.m hii.lita.m naama hoti. ye tattha .thitaa bhikkhuu, te sadevaka.m loka.m siilavaracandanagandhena anulimpayantii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, tena tena anucchavikena tena tena sadisena kaara.nena niravajjamanupaapita.m jinasaasana.m se.t.thabhaavena paridiipita.m, hiinaayaavattamaanaapi te jinasaasanassa se.t.thabhaava.m yeva paridiipentii''ti.
[06] hiinaayaavattanapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0253^ea^ naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `arahaa eka.m vedana.m vedayati kaayika.m, na cetasika'nti. ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, arahato citta.m ya.m kaaya.m nissaaya pavattati, tattha arahaa anissaro assaamii avasavattii''ti ^a^M0.0246^ea^? ``aama, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``na kho, bhante naagasena, yuttameta.m, ya.m so sakacittassa pavattamaane kaaye anissaro hoti assaamii avasavattii; saku.nopi taava, bhante, yasmi.m kulaavake pa.tivasati, tattha so issaro hoti saamii vasavattii''ti.

[03] ``dasayime, mahaaraaja, kaayaanugataa dhammaa bhave bhave kaaya.m anudhaavanti anuparivattanti. katame ^a^V0.0237^ea^ dasa? siita.m u.nha.m jighacchaa pipaasaa uccaaro passaavo middha.m jaraa byaadhi mara.na.m. ime kho, mahaaraaja, dasa kaayaanugataa dhammaa bhave bhave kaaya.m anudhaavanti anuparivattanti, tattha arahaa anissaro assaamii avasavattii''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, kena kaara.nena arahato kaaye aa.naa nappavattati issariya.m vaa, tattha me kaara.na.m bruuhii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ye keci pathavinissitaa sattaa, sabbe te pathavi.m nissaaya caranti viharanti vutti.m kappenti, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, tesa.m pathaviyaa aa.naa pavattati issariya.m vaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, arahato citta.m kaaya.m nissaaya pavattati, na ca arahato kaaye aa.naa pavattati issariya.m vaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, kena kaara.nena puthujjano kaayikampi cetasikampi vedana.m vedayatii''ti? ``abhaavitattaa, mahaaraaja, cittassa puthujjano kaayikampi cetasikampi vedana.m vedayati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, go.no chaato paritasito abaladubbalaparittakati.nesu vaa lataaya vaa upanibaddho assa, yadaa so go.no parikupito hoti, tadaa saha upanibandhanena pakkamati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, abhaavitacittassa vedanaa uppajjitvaa citta.m parikopeti, citta.m parikupita.m kaaya.m aabhujati nibbhujati samparivattaka.m ^a^P0.0254^ea^ karoti. atha kho so abhaavitacitto tasati ravati bheravaraavamabhiravati, idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena puthujjano kaayikampi cetasikampi vedana.m vedayatii''ti.

[03] ``ki.m pana ta.m kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena arahaa eka.m vedana.m vedayati kaayika.m, na cetasika''nti? ``arahato, mahaaraaja, citta.m bhaavita.m hoti subhaavita.m danta.m sudanta.m assava.m vacanakara.m, so dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano `anicca'nti da.lha.m ga.nhaati, samaadhithambhe citta.m upanibandhati, tassa ^a^M0.0247^ea^ ta.m citta.m samaadhithambhe upanibandhana.m na vedhati na calati, .thita.m hoti avikkhitta.m, tassa vedanaavikaaravipphaarena kaayo aabhujati nibbhujati samparivattati, idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena arahaa eka.m vedana.m vedayati kaayika.m, na cetasika''nti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, ta.m naama loke acchariya.m ya.m kaaye calamaane citta.m na calati, tattha me kaara.na.m bruuhii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahatimahaarukkhe khandhasaakhaapalaasasampanne anilabalasamaahate saakhaa calati, api nu tassa khandhopi calatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti ^a^V0.0238^ea^. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, arahaa dukkhaaya vedanaaya phu.t.tho samaano `anicca'nti da.lha.m ga.nhaati, samaadhithambhe citta.m upanibandhati, tassa ta.m citta.m samaadhithambhe upanibandhana.m na vedhati na calati, .thita.m hoti avikkhitta.m, tassa vedanaavikaaravipphaarena kaayo aabhujati nibbhujati samparivattati, citta.m pana tassa na vedhati na calati khandho viya mahaarukkhassaa''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena, na me evaruupo sabbakaaliko dhammapadiipo di.t.thapubbo''ti.
[06] arahantavedanaavediyanapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0255^ea^ naagasena, idha yo koci gihii paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno bhaveyya, so aparena samayena pabbaajeyya, attanaapi so na jaaneyya `gihipaaraajika.m ajjhaapannosmii'ti, napi tassa a~n~no koci aacikkheyya `gihipaaraajika.m ajjhaapannosii'ti. so ca tathattaaya pa.tipajjeyya, api nu tassa dhammaabhisamayo bhaveyyaa''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kena, bhante, kaara.nenaa''ti? ``yo tassa hetu dhammaabhisamayaaya, so tassa samucchinno, tasmaa dhammaabhisamayo na bhavatii''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `jaanantassa kukkucca.m hoti, kukkucce sati aavara.na.m hoti, aava.te citte dhammaabhisamayo na hotii'ti. imassa pana ajaanantassa akukkuccajaatassa santacittassa viharato kena kaara.nena dhammaabhisamayo na hoti, visamena visameneso pa~nho gacchati, cintetvaa visajjethaa''ti.

[03] ``ruhati ^a^M0.0248^ea^, mahaaraaja, suka.t.the sukalale ma.n.dakhette saarada.m sukhasayita.m biija''nti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``api nu, mahaaraaja, ta~n~neva biija.m ghanaselasilaatale ruheyyaa''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``kissa pana, mahaaraaja, ta~n~neva biija.m kalale ruhati, kissa ghanasele na ruhatii''ti? ``natthi, bhante, tassa biijassa ruhanaaya ghanasele hetu, ahetunaa biija.m na ruhatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yena hetunaa tassa dhammaabhisamayo bhaveyya, so tassa hetu samucchinno, ahetunaa dhammaabhisamayo na hoti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0239^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, da.n.dale.d.dulagu.lamuggaraa pathaviyaa .thaanamupagacchanti, api nu, mahaaraaja, te yeva da.n.dale.d.dulagu.lamuggaraa gagane .thaanamupagacchantii''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ki.m panettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena te yeva da.n.dale.d.dulagu.lamuggaraa pathaviyaa .thaanamupagacchanti, kena kaara.nena gagane na ti.t.thantii''ti? ``natthi, bhante, tesa.m da.n.dale.d.dulagu.lamuggaraana.m pati.t.thaanaaya aakaase hetu, ahetunaa na ti.t.thantii''ti ^a^P0.0256^ea^. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghaate ahetunaa abhisamayo na hotiiti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, thale aggi jalati, api nu kho, mahaaraaja, so yeva aggi udake jalatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``ki.m panettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena so yeva aggi thale jalati, kena kaara.nena udake na jalatii''ti? ``natthi, bhante, aggissa jalanaaya udake hetu, ahetunaa na jalatii''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tassa tena dosena abhisamayahetu samucchinno, hetusamugghaate ahetunaa dhammaabhisamayo na hotii''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, punapeta.m attha.m cintehi, na me tattha cittasa~n~natti bhavati, ajaanantassa asati kukkucce aavara.na.m hotiiti, kaara.nena ma.m sa~n~naapehii''ti. ``api nu, mahaaraaja, visa.m halaahala.m ajaanantena khaayita.m jiivita.m haratii''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ajaanantenapi kata.m paapa.m abhisamayantaraayakara.m hoti.
[03] ``api nu, mahaaraaja, aggi ajaanitvaa akkamanta.m .dahatii''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ajaanantenapi kata.m paapa.m abhisamayantaraayakara.m hoti.

[03] ``api ^a^M0.0249^ea^ nu, mahaaraaja, ajaananta.m aasiiviso .da.msitvaa jiivita.m haratii''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ajaanantenapi kata.m paapa.m abhisamayantaraayakara.m hoti.

[03] ``nanu, mahaaraaja, kaali"ngaraajaa sama.nakola~n~no sattaratanapariki.n.no hatthiratanamabhiruyha kuladassanaaya gacchanto ajaanantopi naasakkhi bodhima.n.dassa uparito gantu.m, idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena ajaanantenapi kata.m paapa.m abhisamayantaraayakara.m hotii''ti? ``jinabhaasita.m ^a^V0.0240^ea^, bhante naagasena, kaara.na.m na sakkaa pa.tikkositu.m, esovetassa attho tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] abhisamayantaraayakarapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0257^ea^ naagasena, gihidussiilassa ca sama.nadussiilassa ca ko viseso, ki.m naanaakara.na.m, ubhopete samasamagatikaa, ubhinnampi samasamo vipaako hoti, udaahu ki~nci naanaakaara.na.m atthii''ti?
[03] ``dasa yime, mahaaraaja, gu.naa sama.nadussiilassa gihidussiilato visesena atirekaa, dasahi ca kaara.nehi uttari.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti.

[03] ``katame dasa gu.naa sama.nadussiilassa gihidussiilato visesena atirekaa? idha, mahaaraaja, sama.nadussiilo buddhe sagaaravo hoti, dhamme sagaaravo hoti, sa"nghe sagaaravo hoti, sabrahmacaariisu sagaaravo hoti, uddesaparipucchaaya vaayamati, savanabahulo hoti, bhinnasiilopi, mahaaraaja, dussiilo parisagato aakappa.m upa.t.thapeti, garahabhayaa kaayika.m vaacasika.m rakkhati, padhaanaabhimukha~ncassa hoti citta.m, bhikkhusaama~n~na.m upagato hoti. karontopi, mahaaraaja, sama.nadussiilo paapa.m pa.ticchanna.m aacarati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, itthii sapatikaa niliiyitvaa rahasseneva paapamaacarati; evameva kho, mahaaraaja, karontopi ^a^M0.0250^ea^ sama.nadussiilo paapa.m pa.ticchanna.m aacarati. ime kho, mahaaraaja, dasa gu.naa sama.nadussiilassa gihidussiilato visesena atirekaa.

[03] ``katamehi dasahi kaara.nehi uttari.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti? anavajjakavacadhaara.nataayapi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, isisaama~n~nabha.n.duli"ngadhaara.natopi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, sa"nghasamayamanuppavi.t.thataayapi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, buddhadhammasa"nghasara.nagatataayapi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, padhaanaasayaniketavaasitaayapi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, jinasaasanadhara {jinasaasanadhana (sii0 pii0)} pariyesanatopi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, pavaradhammadesanatopi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, dhammadiipagatiparaaya.nataayapi dakkhi.na.m ^a^V0.0241^ea^ visodheti, `aggo buddho'ti ekantaujudi.t.thitaayapi dakkhi.na.m visodheti, uposathasamaadaanatopi dakkhi.na.m visodheti. imehi kho, mahaaraaja, dasahi kaara.nehi uttari.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti ^a^P0.0258^ea^.

[03] ``suvipannopi hi, mahaaraaja, sama.nadussiilo daayakaana.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, udaka.m subahalampi kalalakaddamarajojalla.m apaneti; evameva kho, mahaaraaja, suvipannopi sama.nadussiilo daayakaana.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, u.nhodaka.m sukudhitampi {suka.thitampi (sii0 pii), sukhu.thitampi (syaa0)} jjalanta.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m nibbaapeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, suvipannopi sama.nadussiilo daayakaana.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti.
[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m virasampi khudaadubbalya.m apaneti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, suvipannopi sama.nadussiilo daayakaana.m dakkhi.na.m visodheti.
[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagatena devaatidevena majjhimanikaayavarala~nchake dakkhi.navibha"nge veyyaakara.ne --
[21] ```yo siilavaa dussiilesu dadaati daana.m, dhammena laddha.m supasannacitto.
[22] abhisaddaha.m kammaphala.m u.laara.m, saa dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhatii'''ti {ma0 ni0 3.382}..

[03] ``acchariya.m ^a^M0.0251^ea^, bhante naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena, taavataka.m maya.m pa~nha.m apucchimha, ta.m tva.m opammehi kaara.nehi vibhaavento amatamadhura.m savanuupaga.m akaasi. yathaa naama, bhante, suudo vaa suudantevaasii vaa taavataka.m ma.msa.m labhitvaa naanaavidhehi sambhaarehi sampaadetvaa raajuupabhoga.m karoti; evameva kho, bhante naagasena, taavataka.m maya.m pa~nha.m apucchimha, ta.m tva.m opammehi kaara.nehi vibhaavetvaa amatamadhura.m savanuupaga.m akaasii''ti.
[06] dussiilapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0242^ea^ naagasena, ima.m udaka.m aggimhi tappamaana.m cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha.m, ki.m nu kho, bhante naagasena, udaka.m jiivati, ki.m kii.lamaana.m saddaayati, udaahu ^a^P0.0259^ea^ a~n~nena pa.tipii.lita.m saddaayatii''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraaja, udaka.m jiivati, natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, api ca, mahaaraaja, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha''nti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, idhekacce titthiyaa udaka.m jiivatiiti siitodaka.m pa.tikkhipitvaa udaka.m taapetvaa vekatikavekatika.m paribhu~njanti, te tumhe garahanti paribhavanti `ekindriya.m sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa jiiva.m vihe.thentii'ti, ta.m tesa.m garaha.m paribhava.m vinodehi apanehi nicchaarehii''ti. ``na hi, mahaaraaja, udaka.m jiivati, natthi, mahaaraaja, udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, api ca, mahaaraaja, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, udaka.m sobbhasarasaritadahata.laakakandarapadaraudapaananinnapokkhara.nigata.m vaataatapavegassa mahantataaya pariyaadiyati parikkhaya.m gacchati, api nu tattha udaka.m cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha''nti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``yadi, mahaaraaja, udaka.m jiiveyya, tatthaapi udaka.m saddaayeyya, iminaapi, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena jaanaahi `natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha'nti.

[03] ``aparampi ^a^M0.0252^ea^, mahaaraaja, uttari.m kaara.na.m su.nohi `natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayatii'ti. yadaa pana, mahaaraaja, udaka.m ta.n.dulehi sammissita.m bhaajanagata.m hoti pihita.m uddhane a.thapita.m, api nu tattha udaka.m saddaayatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, acala.m hoti santasanta''nti. ``ta.m yeva pana, mahaaraaja, udaka.m bhaajanagata.m aggi.m ujjaaletvaa uddhane .thapita.m hoti, api nu tattha udaka.m acala.m hoti santasanta''nti? ``na hi, bhante, calati khubbhati lu.lati aavilati uumijaata.m hoti, uddhamadho disaavidisa.m gacchati, uttarati ^a^P0.0260^ea^ patarati phe.namaalii hotiiti. kissa pana ta.m, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0243^ea^, paakatika.m udaka.m na calati santasanta.m hoti, kissa pana aggigata.m calati khubbhati lu.lati aavilati uumijaata.m hoti, uddhamadho disaavidisa.m gacchati, uttarati patarati phe.namaalii hotii''ti? ``paakatika.m, bhante, udaka.m na calati, aggikata.m pana udaka.m aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati saddaayati bahuvidha''nti. ``iminaapi mahaaraaja, kaara.nena jaanaahi `natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayatii'ti.

[03] ``aparampi, mahaaraaja, uttara.m kaara.na.m su.nohi, natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayati. hoti ta.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m ghare ghare udakavaarakagata.m pihita''nti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``api nu ta.m, mahaaraaja, udaka.m calati khubbhati lu.lati aavilati uumijaata.m hoti, uddhamadho disaavidisa.m gacchati, uttarati patarati phe.namaalii hotii''ti. ``na hi, bhante, acala.m ta.m hoti paakatika.m udakavaarakagata.m udaka''nti.

[03] ``sutapubba.m pana tayaa, mahaaraaja, `mahaasamudde udaka.m calati khubbhati lu.lati aavilati uumijaata.m hoti, uddhamadho disaavidisa.m gacchati, uttarati patarati phe.namaalii hoti, ussakkitvaa ossakkitvaa {ossakkitvaa''ti pada.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} velaaya paharati saddaayati bahuvidha'''nti? ``aama, bhante, sutapubba.m eta.m mayaa di.t.thapubba~nca `mahaasamudde udaka.m hatthasatampi dvepi hatthasataani gagane ussakkatii'''ti. ``kissa, mahaaraaja, udakavaarakagata.m udaka.m na calati na saddaayati, kissa pana mahaasamudde udaka.m calati saddaayatii''ti? ``vaatavegassa mahantataaya, bhante, mahaasamudde udaka.m calati saddaayati, udakavaarakagata.m udaka.m agha.t.tita.m kehici ^a^M0.0253^ea^ na calati na saddaayatii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vaatavegassa mahantataaya mahaasamudde udaka.m calati saddaayati ^a^P0.0261^ea^ evameva aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayatii''ti.

[03] ``nanu, mahaaraaja, bheripokkhara.m sukkha.m sukkhena gocammena onandhantii''ti? ``aama, bhante''. ``api nu, mahaaraaja, bheriyaa jiivo vaa satto vaa atthii''ti. ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``kissa pana, mahaaraaja, bherii saddaayatii''ti? ``itthiyaa vaa, bhante, purisassa vaa tajjena vaayaamenaa''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, itthiyaa vaa purisassa vaa tajjena vaayaamena bherii saddaayati, evameva aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayati. iminaapi, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0244^ea^, kaara.nena jaanaahi `natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa, aggisantaapavegassa mahantataaya udaka.m saddaayatii'ti.

[03] ``mayhampi taava, mahaaraaja, tava pucchitabba.m atthi, evameso pa~nho suvinicchito hoti, ki.m nu kho, mahaaraaja, sabbehipi bhaajanehi udaka.m tappamaana.m saddaayati, udaahu ekaccehi yeva bhaajanehi tappamaana.m saddaayatii''ti? ``na hi, bhante, sabbehipi bhaajanehi udaka.m tappamaana.m saddaayati, ekaccehi yeva bhaajanehi udaka.m tappamaana.m saddaayatii''ti. ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, jahitosi sakasamaya.m, paccaagatosi mama visaya.m, natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaa. yadi, mahaaraaja, sabbehipi bhaajanehi udaka.m tappamaana.m saddaayeyya, yuttamida.m `udaka.m jiivatii'ti vattu.m. na hi, mahaaraaja, udaka.m dvaya.m hoti, ya.m saddaayati, ta.m jiivati, ya.m na saddaayati, ta.m na jiivatiiti. yadi, mahaaraaja, udaka.m jiiveyya, mahantaana.m hatthinaagaana.m ussannakaayaana.m pabhinnaana.m so.n.daaya ussi~ncitvaa mukhe pakkhipitvaa kucchi.m pavesayantaana.m, tampi udaka.m tesa.m dantantare cippiyamaana.m saddaayeyya. hatthasatikaapi mahaanaavaa garukaa bhaarikaa anekasatasahassabhaaraparipuuraa mahaasamudde vicaranti, taahipi cippiyamaana.m udaka.m saddaayeyya. mahatimahantaapi macchaa ^a^P0.0262^ea^ anekasatayojanikakaayaa timii timi"ngalaa timirapi"ngalaa abbhantare nimuggaa mahaasamudde nivaasa.t.thaanataaya pa.tivasantaa mahaaudakadhaaraa aacamanti dhamanti ca, tesampi ta.m dantantarepi udarantarepi cippiyamaana.m udaka.m saddaayeyya. yasmaa ca kho, mahaaraaja, evaruupehi evaruupehi mahantehi pa.tipii.lanehi pa.tipii.lita.m udaka.m na saddaayati tasmaapi natthi udake jiivo vaa satto vaati, evameta.m, mahaaraaja, dhaarehii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^M0.0254^ea^, bhante naagasena, dosaagato pa~nho anucchavikaaya vibhattiyaa vibhatto, yathaa naama, bhante naagasena, mahaggha.m ma.niratana.m cheka.m aacariya.m kusala.m sikkhita.m ma.nikaara.m paapu.nitvaa kitti.m labheyya thomana.m pasa.msa.m, muttaaratana.m vaa muttika.m dussaratana.m vaa dussika.m, lohitacandana.m vaa gandhika.m paapu.nitvaa kitti.m labheyya thomana.m pasa.msa.m. evameva kho, bhante naagasena, dosaagato {desaagato (sii0 pii0)} pa~nho anucchavikaaya vibhattiyaa vibhatto, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] udakasattajiivapa~nho navamo.
[06] buddhavaggo pa.thamo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge nava pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0245^ea^ ^a^M0.0255^ea^ naagasena, bhaasitampeta.m bhagavataa `nippapa~ncaaraamaa, bhikkhave, viharatha nippapa~ncaratino'ti, katama.m ta.m nippapa~nca''nti? ``sotaapattiphala.m, mahaaraaja, nippapa~nca.m, sakadaagaamiphala.m nippapa~nca.m, anaagaamiphala.m nippapa~nca.m, arahattaphala.m nippapa~nca''nti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, sotaapattiphala.m nippapa~nca.m, sakadaagaamianaagaamiarahattaphala.m nippapa~nca.m ^a^P0.0263^ea^, kissa pana ime bhikkhuu uddisanti paripucchanti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, navakammena palibujjhanti daanena ca puujaaya ca, nanu te jinappa.tikkhitta.m kamma.m karotii''ti?

[03] ``ye te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu uddisanti paripucchanti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m, navakammena palibujjhanti daanena ca puujaaya ca, sabbe te nippapa~ncassa pattiyaa karonti. ye te, mahaaraaja, sabhaavaparisuddhaa pubbe vaasitavaasanaa, te ekacittakkha.nena nippapaca honti. ye pana te bhikkhuu mahaarajakkhaa, te imehi payogehi nippapa~ncaa honti.

[01] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, eko puriso khette biija.m ropetvaa attano yathaabalaviiriyena vinaa paakaaravatiyaa dha~n~na.m uddhareyya, eko puriso khette biija.m ropetvaa vana.m pavisitvaa ka.t.tha~nca saakha~nca chinditvaa vatipaakaara.m katvaa dha~n~na.m uddhareyya. yaa tattha tassa vatipaakaarapariyesanaa, saa dha~n~natthaaya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te sabhaavaparisuddhaa pubbe vaasitavaasanaa, te ekacittakkha.nena nippapa~ncaa honti, vinaa vatipaakaara.m puriso viya dha~n~nuddhaaro. ye pana te bhikkhuu mahaarajakkhaa, te imehi payogehi nippapa~ncaa honti, vatipaakaara.m katvaa puriso viya dha~n~nuddhaaro.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0246^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso mahatimahante ambarukkhamatthake phalapi.n.di bhaveyya, atha tattha yo koci iddhimaa aagantvaa tassa phala.m hareyya, yo pana tattha aniddhimaa, so ka.t.tha~nca valli~nca chinditvaa nisse.ni.m bandhitvaa taaya ta.m rukkha.m abhiruhitvaa phala.m hareyya. yaa tattha ^a^M0.0256^ea^ tassa nisse.nipariyesanaa, saa phalatthaaya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te sabhaavaparisuddhaa pubbe vaasitavaasanaa, te ekacittakkha.nena nippapa~ncaa honti, iddhimaa viya rukkhaphala.m haranto. ye pana te bhikkhuu mahaarajakkhaa, te iminaa payogena saccaani abhisamenti, nisse.niyaa viya puriso rukkhaphala.m haranto ^a^P0.0264^ea^.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, eko puriso atthakara.niko ekako yeva saamika.m upagantvaa attha.m saadheti. eko dhanavaa dhanavasena parisa.m va.d.dhetvaa parisaaya attha.m saadheti. yaa tattha tassa parisapariyesanaa, saa atthatthaaya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te sabhaavaparisuddhaa pubbe vaasitavaasanaa, te ekacittakkha.nena chasu abhi~n~naasu vasibhaava.m paapu.nanti, puriso viya ekako atthasiddhi.m karonto. ye pana te bhikkhuu mahaarajakkhaa, te imehi payogehi saama~n~natthamabhisaadhenti, parisaaya viya puriso atthasiddhi.m karonto.

[03] ``uddesopi, mahaaraaja, bahukaaro, paripucchaapi bahukaaraa, navakammampi bahukaara.m, daanampi bahukaara.m, puujaapi bahukaaraa tesu tesu kara.niiyesu. yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso raajuupasevii kataavii amaccabha.tabaladovaarikaaniika.t.thapaarisajjajanehi, te tassa kara.niiye anuppatte sabbepi upakaaraa honti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, uddesopi bahukaaro, paripucchaapi bahukaaraa, navakammampi bahukaara.m, daanampi bahukaara.m, puujaapi bahukaaraa tesu tesu kara.niiyesu. yadi, mahaaraaja, sabbepi abhijaatiparisuddhaa bhaveyyu.m, anusaasanena {anusaasakena (sii0 pii0)} kara.niiya.m na bhaveyya. yasmaa ca kho, mahaaraaja, savanena kara.niiya.m hoti, thero, mahaaraaja, saariputto aparimitamasa"nkheyyakappa.m upaadaaya upacitakusalamuulo pa~n~naaya ko.ti.m gato, sopi vinaa savanena naasakkhi aasavakkhaya.m paapu.nitu.m. tasmaa, mahaaraaja, bahukaara.m savana.m, tathaa uddesopi paripucchaapi. tasmaa uddesaparipucchaapi nippapa~ncaa sa"nkhataa''ti. ``sunijjhaapito, bhante naagasena, pa~nho, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] nippapa~ncapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0247^ea^ ^a^M0.0257^ea^ naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `yo gihii arahatta.m patto, dve vaassa gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa, tasmi.m yeva divase pabbajati vaa parinibbaayati vaa. na so divaso ^a^P0.0265^ea^ sakkaa atikkametu'nti. sace so, bhante naagasena, tasmi.m divase aacariya.m vaa upajjhaaya.m vaa pattaciivara.m vaa na labhetha, api nu kho so arahaa saya.m vaa pabbajeyya divasa.m vaa atikkameyya, a~n~no koci arahaa iddhimaa aagantvaa ta.m pabbaajeyya vaa parinibbaayeyya vaa''ti? ``na so, mahaaraaja, arahaa saya.m pabbajeyya, saya.m pabbajanto theyya.m aapajjati, na ca divasa.m atikkameyya, a~n~nassa arahantassa aagamana.m bhaveyya vaa na vaa bhaveyya, tasmi.m yeva divase parinibbaayeyyaa''ti. ``tena hi, bhante naagasena, arahattassa santabhaavo vijahito hoti, yena adhigatassa jiivitahaaro bhavatii''ti.

[03] ``visama.m, mahaaraaja, gihili"nga.m, visame li"nge li"ngadubbalataaya arahatta.m patto gihii tasmi.m yeva divase pabbajati vaa parinibbaayati vaa. neso, mahaaraaja, doso arahattassa, gihili"ngasseveso doso yadida.m li"ngadubbalataa.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m aayupaalaka.m jiivitarakkhaka.m visamako.t.thassa mandadubbalagaha.nikassa avipaakena jiivita.m harati. neso, mahaaraaja, doso bhojanassa, ko.t.thasseveso doso yadida.m aggidubbalataa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, visame li"nge li"ngadubbalataaya arahatta.m patto gihii tasmi.m yeva divase pabbajati vaa parinibbaayati vaa. neso, mahaaraaja, doso arahattassa, gihili"ngasseveso doso yadida.m li"ngadubbalataa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, paritta.m ti.nasalaaka.m upari garuke paasaa.ne .thapite dubbalataaya bhijjitvaa patati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, arahatta.m patto gihii tena li"ngena arahatta.m dhaaretu.m asakkonto tasmi.m yeva divase pabbajati vaa parinibbaayati vaa.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso abalo dubbalo nihiinajacco parittapu~n~no mahatimahaarajja.m labhitvaa kha.nena paripatati paridha.msati osakkati, na sakkoti issariya.m dhaaretu.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, arahatta.m ^a^P0.0266^ea^ patto gihii tena li"ngena arahatta.m ^a^M0.0258^ea^ dhaaretu.m na sakkoti ^a^V0.0248^ea^, tena kaara.nena tasmi.m yeva divase pabbajati vaa parinibbaayati vaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] khii.naasavabhaavapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, atthi arahato satisammoso''ti? ``vigatasatisammosaa kho, mahaaraaja, arahanto, natthi arahantaana.m satisammoso''ti. ``aapajjeyya pana, bhante, arahaa aapatti''nti? ``aama, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``ku.tikaare, mahaaraaja, sa~ncaritte, vikaale kaalasa~n~naaya, pavaarite appavaaritasa~n~naaya, anatiritte atirittasa~n~naayaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `ye aapatti.m aapajjanti, te dviihi kaara.nehi aapajjanti anaadariyena vaa ajaananena vaa'ti. api nu kho, bhante, arahato anaadariya.m hoti, ya.m arahaa aapatti.m aapajjatii''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, arahaa aapatti.m aapajjati, natthi ca arahato anaadariya.m, tena hi atthi arahato satisammoso''ti? ``natthi, mahaaraaja, arahato satisammoso, aapatti~nca arahaa aapajjatii''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, bhante, kaara.nena ma.m sa~n~naapehi, ki.m tattha kaara.na''nti? ``dveme, mahaaraaja, kilesaa lokavajja.m pa.n.nattivajja~ncaati. katama.m, mahaaraaja, lokavajja.m? dasa akusalakammapathaa, ida.m vuccati lokavajja.m. katama.m pa.n.nattivajja.m? ya.m loke atthi sama.naana.m ananucchavika.m ananulomika.m, gihiina.m anavajja.m. tattha bhagavaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napeti `yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiya'nti. vikaalabhojana.m, mahaaraaja, lokassa anavajja.m, ta.m jinasaasane vajja.m. bhuutagaamavikopana.m, mahaaraaja, lokassa anavajja.m, ta.m jinasaasane vajja.m. udake hassadhamma.m, mahaaraaja, lokassa anavajja.m, ta.m jinasaasane vajja.m. iti evaruupaani evaruupaani, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0259^ea^, jinasaasane vajjaani, ida.m vuccati pa.n.nattivajja.m.

[03] ``lokavajja.m ^a^V0.0249^ea^ abhabbo khii.naasavo ta.m ajjhaacaritu.m, ya.m kilesa.m pa.n.nattivajja.m, ta.m ^a^P0.0267^ea^ ajaananto aapajjeyya. avisayo, mahaaraaja, ekaccassa arahato sabba.m jaanitu.m, na hi tassa bala.m atthi sabba.m jaanitu.m. ana~n~naata.m, mahaaraaja, arahato itthipurisaana.m naamampi gottampi, maggopi tassa mahiyaa ana~n~naato; vimutti.m yeva, mahaaraaja, ekacco arahaa jaaneyya; cha.labhi~n~no arahaa sakavisaya.m jaaneyya; sabba~n~nuu, mahaaraaja, tathaagatova sabba.m jaanaatii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] khii.naasavasatisammosapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, dissanti loke buddhaa, dissanti paccekabuddhaa, dissanti tathaagatassa saavakaa, dissanti cakkavattiraajaano, dissanti padesaraajaano, dissanti devamanussaa, dissanti sadhanaa, dissanti adhanaa, dissanti sugataa, dissanti duggataa, dissati purisassa itthili"nga.m paatubhuuta.m, dissati itthiyaa purisali"nga.m paatubhuuta.m, dissati sukata.m dukkata.m kamma.m, dissanti kalyaa.napaapakaana.m kammaana.m vipaakuupabhogino sattaa, atthi loke sattaa a.n.dajaa jalaabujaa sa.msedajaa opapaatikaa, atthi sattaa apadaa dvipadaa catuppadaa bahuppadaa, atthi loke yakkhaa rakkhasaa kumbha.n.daa asuraa daanavaa gandhabbaa petaa pisaacaa, atthi kinnaraa mahoragaa naagaa supa.n.naa siddhaa vijjaadharaa, atthi hatthii assaa gaavo mahi.msaa {mahisaa (sii0 pii0)} o.t.thaa gadrabhaa ajaa e.lakaa migaa suukaraa siihaa byagghaa diipii acchaa kokaa taracchaa so.naa si"ngaalaa, atthi bahuvidhaa saku.naa, atthi suva.n.na.m rajata.m muttaa ma.ni sa"nkho silaa pavaa.la.m lohita"nko masaaragalla.m ve.luriyo vajira.m phalika.m kaa.laloha.m tambaloha.m va.t.taloha.m ka.msaloha.m, atthi khoma.m koseyya.m kappaasika.m saa.na.m bha"nga.m kambala.m, atthi saali viihi yavo ka"ngu kudruuso varako godhuumo ^a^M0.0260^ea^ muggo, maaso tila.m kulattha.m, atthi muulagandho saaragandho pheggugandho tacagandho pattagandho ^a^P0.0268^ea^ pupphagandho phalagandho sabbagandho, atthi ti.na lataa gaccha rukkha osadhi vanappati nadii pabbata samudda macchakacchapaa sabba.m loke atthi. ya.m, bhante, loke natthi, ta.m me kathehii''ti.

[03] ``tii.nimaani, mahaaraaja, loke natthi. katamaani tii.ni? sacetanaa vaa acetanaa vaa ajaraamaraa ^a^V0.0250^ea^ loke natthi, sa"nkhaaraana.m niccataa natthi, paramatthena sattuupaladdhi natthi, imaani kho, mahaaraaja, tii.ni loke natthii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] loke natthibhaavapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, dissanti loke kammanibbattaa, dissanti hetunibbattaa, dissanti utunibbattaa, ya.m loke akammaja.m ahetuja.m anutuja.m, ta.m me kathehii''ti. ``dveme, mahaaraaja, lokasmi.m akammajaa ahetujaa anutujaa. katame dve? aakaaso, mahaaraaja, akammajo ahetujo anutujo; nibbaana.m, mahaaraaja, akammaja.m ahetuja.m anutuja.m. ime kho, mahaaraaja, dve akammajaa ahetujaa anutujaa''ti.

[03] ``maa, bhante naagasena, jinavacana.m makkhehi, maa ajaanitvaa pa~nha.m byaakarohii''ti. ``ki.m kho, mahaaraaja, aha.m vadaami, ya.m ma.m tva.m eva.m vadesi `maa, bhante naagasena, jinavacana.m makkhehi, maa ajaanitvaa pa~nha.m byaakarohii'''ti? ``bhante naagasena, yuttamida.m taava vattu.m `aakaaso akammajo ahetujo anutujo'ti. anekasatehi pana, bhante naagasena, kaara.nehi bhagavataa saavakaana.m nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya maggo akkhaato, atha ca pana tva.m eva.m vadesi `ahetuja.m nibbaana'''nti. ``sacca.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa anekasatehi kaara.nehi saavakaana.m nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya maggo akkhaato, na ca pana nibbaanassa uppaadaaya hetu akkhaato''ti.

[03] ``ettha maya.m, bhante naagasena, andhakaarato andhakaaratara.m ^a^P0.0269^ea^ pavisaama, vanato vanatara.m pavisaama, gahanato gahanatara.m {gahanantarato gahanantara.m (ka0)} pavisaama, yatra hi naama ^a^M0.0261^ea^ nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya hetu atthi, tassa pana dhammassa uppaadaaya hetu natthi. yadi, bhante naagasena, nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya hetu atthi, tena hi nibbaanassa uppaadaayapi hetu icchitabbo.

[03] ``yathaa pana, bhante naagasena, puttassa pitaa atthi, tena kaara.nena pitunopi pitaa icchitabbo. yathaa antevaasikassa aacariyo atthi, tena kaara.nena aacariyassapi aacariyo icchitabbo ^a^V0.0251^ea^. yathaa a"nkurassa biija.m atthi, tena kaara.nena biijassapi biija.m icchitabba.m. evameva kho, bhante naagasena, yadi nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya hetu atthi, tena kaara.nena nibbaanassa uppaadaayapi hetu icchitabbo.

[03] ``yathaa rukkhassa vaa lataaya vaa agge sati tena kaara.nena majjhampi atthi, muulampi atthi. evameva kho, bhante naagasena, yadi nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya hetu atthi, tena kaara.nena nibbaanassa uppaadaayapi hetu icchitabbo'''ti.

[03] ``anuppaadaniiya.m, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m, tasmaa na nibbaanassa uppaadaaya hetu akkhaato''ti. ``i"ngha, bhante naagasena, kaara.na.m dassetvaa kaara.nena ma.m sa~n~naapehi, yathaaha.m jaaneyya.m nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya hetu atthi, nibbaanassa uppaadaaya hetu natthii''ti.

[03] ``tena hi, mahaaraaja, sakkacca.m sota.m odaha, saadhuka.m su.nohi, vakkhaami tattha kaara.na.m, sakku.neyya, mahaaraaja, puriso paakatikena balena ito himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m upagantu''nti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``sakku.neyya pana so, mahaaraaja, puriso paakatikena balena himavanta.m pabbataraaja.m idha aaharitu''nti? ``na hi, bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sakkaa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya maggo akkhaatu.m, na sakkaa nibbaanassa uppaadaaya hetu dassetu.m.

[03] ``sakku.neyya, mahaaraaja, puriso paakatikena balena mahaasamudda.m naavaaya uttaritvaa paarimatiira.m gantu''nti? ``aama, bhante''ti? ``sakku.neyya pana so, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0270^ea^, puriso paakatikena balena mahaasamuddassa paarimatiira.m idha aaharitu''nti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sakkaa nibbaanassa sacchikiriyaaya maggo akkhaatu.m, na sakkaa nibbaanassa uppaadaaya hetu dassetu.m. ki.m kaara.naa? asa"nkhatattaa dhammassaa''ti.

[03] ``asa"nkhata.m ^a^M0.0262^ea^, bhante naagasena, nibbaana''nti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, asa"nkhata.m nibbaana.m na kehici kata.m, nibbaana.m, mahaaraaja, na vattabba.m uppannanti vaa anuppannanti vaa uppaadaniiyanti vaa atiitanti vaa anaagatanti vaa paccuppannanti vaa cakkhuvi~n~neyyanti vaa sotavi~n~neyyanti vaa ghaanavi~n~neyyanti vaa jivhaavi~n~neyyanti vaa kaayavi~n~neyyanti vaa''ti. ``yadi, bhante naagasena, nibbaana.m na uppanna.m na anuppanna.m na uppaadaniiya.m na atiita.m na anaagata.m na paccuppanna.m ^a^V0.0252^ea^ na cakkhuvi~n~neyya.m na sotavi~n~neyya.m na ghaanavi~n~neyya.m na jivhaavi~n~neyya.m na kaayavi~n~neyya.m, tena hi, bhante naagasena, tumhe natthidhamma.m nibbaana.m apadisatha `natthi nibbaana'nti. ``atthi, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m, manovi~n~neyya.m nibbaana.m, visuddhena maanasena pa.niitena ujukena anaavara.nena niraamisena sammaapa.tipanno ariyasaavako nibbaana.m passatii''ti.

[03] ``kiidisa.m pana ta.m, bhante, nibbaana.m, ya.m ta.m opammehi aadiipaniiya.m kaara.nehi ma.m sa~n~naapehi, yathaa atthidhamma.m opammehi aadiipaniiya''nti. ``atthi, mahaaraaja, vaato naamaa''ti? ``aama, bhante''ti. ``i"ngha, mahaaraaja, vaata.m dassehi va.n.nato vaa sa.n.thaanato vaa a.nu.m vaa thuula.m vaa diigha.m vaa rassa.m vaa''ti. ``na sakkaa, bhante naagasena, vaato upadassayitu.m, na so vaato hatthaggaha.na.m vaa nimmaddana.m vaa upeti, api ca atthi so vaato''ti. ``yadi, mahaaraaja, na sakkaa vaato upadassayitu.m, tena hi natthi vaato''ti? ``jaanaamaha.m, bhante naagasena, vaato atthiiti me hadaye anupavi.t.tha.m, na ^a^P0.0271^ea^ caaha.m sakkomi vaata.m upadassayitu''nti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, atthi nibbaana.m, na ca sakkaa nibbaana.m upadassayitu.m va.n.nena vaa sa.n.thaanena vaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, suupadassita.m opamma.m, suniddi.t.tha.m kaara.na.m, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaami `atthi nibbaana'''nti.
[06] akammajaadipa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, katame ettha kammajaa, katame hetujaa, katame utujaa, katame na kammajaa, na hetujaa, na utujaa''ti? ``ye keci, mahaaraaja, sattaa sacetanaa, sabbe te kammajaa; aggi ca sabbaani ca ^a^M0.0263^ea^ biijajaataani hetujaani; pathavii ca pabbataa ca udaka~nca vaato ca, sabbe te utujaa; aakaaso ca nibbaana~nca ime dve akammajaa ahetujaa anutujaa. nibbaana.m pana, mahaaraaja, na vattabba.m kammajanti vaa hetujanti vaa utujanti vaa uppannanti vaa anuppannanti vaa uppaadaniiyanti vaa atiitanti vaa anaagatanti vaa paccuppannanti vaa cakkhuvi~n~neyyanti vaa sotavi~n~neyyanti vaa ghaanavi~n~neyyanti vaa jivhaavi~n~neyyanti vaa kaayavi~n~neyyanti vaa, api ca, mahaaraaja, manovi~n~neyya.m nibbaana.m, ya.m ^a^V0.0253^ea^ so sammaapa.tipanno ariyasaavako visuddhena ~naa.nena passatii''ti. ``rama.niiyo, bhante naagasena, pa~nho suvinicchito nissa.msayo ekantagato, vimati uppacchinnaa, tva.m ga.nivarapavaramaasajjaa''ti.
[06] kammajaadipa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, atthi loke yakkhaa naamaa''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, atthi loke yakkhaa naamaa''ti. ``cavanti pana te, bhante, yakkhaa tamhaa yoniyaa''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja, cavanti te yakkhaa tamhaa yoniyaa''ti. ``kissa pana, bhante naagasena, tesa.m mataana.m yakkhaana.m sariira.m na dissati, ku.napagandhopi ^a^P0.0272^ea^ na vaayatii''ti? ``dissati, mahaaraaja, mataana.m yakkhaana.m sariira.m, ku.napagandhopi tesa.m vaayati, mataana.m, mahaaraaja, yakkhaana.m sariira.m kii.tava.n.nena vaa dissati, kimiva.n.nena vaa dissati, kipillikava.n.nena vaa dissati, pa.ta"ngava.n.nena vaa dissati, ahiva.n.nena vaa dissati, vicchikava.n.nena vaa dissati, satapadiva.n.nena vaa dissati, dijava.n.nena vaa dissati, migava.n.nena vaa dissatii''ti. ``ko hi, bhante naagasena, a~n~no ida.m pa~nha.m pu.t.tho visajjeyya a~n~natra tavaadisena buddhimataa''ti.
[06] yakkhapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, ye te ahesu.m tikicchakaana.m pubbakaa aacariyaa seyyathida.m, naarado dhammantarii {dhanvantarii (?)} a"ngiraso kapilo ka.n.daraggi saamo ^a^M0.0264^ea^ atulo pubbakaccaayano, sabbepete aacariyaa saki.m yeva roguppatti~nca nidaana~nca sabhaava~nca samu.t.thaana~nca tikiccha~nca kiriya~nca siddhaasiddha~nca sabba.m ta.m {santa.m (ka0)} niravasesa.m jaanitvaa `imasmi.m kaaye ettakaa rogaa uppajjissantii'ti ekappahaarena kalaapaggaaha.m karitvaa sutta.m bandhi.msu, asabba~n~nuno ete sabbe, kissa pana tathaagato sabba~n~nuu samaano anaagata.m kiriya.m buddha~naa.nena jaanitvaa `ettake naama vatthusmi.m ettaka.m ^a^V0.0254^ea^ naama sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napetabba.m bhavissatii'ti paricchinditvaa anavasesato sikkhaapada.m na pa~n~napesi, uppannuppanne vatthusmi.m ayase paaka.te dose vitthaarike puthugate ujjhaayantesu manussesu tasmi.m tasmi.m kaale saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napesii''ti?

[03] ``~naatameta.m, mahaaraaja, tathaagatassa `imasmi.m samaye imesu manussesu saadhika.m diya.d.dhasikkhaapadasata.m pa~n~napetabba.m bhavissatii'ti, api ca tathaagatassa eva.m ahosi `sace kho aha.m saadhika.m diya.d.dhasikkhaapadasata.m ekappahaara.m pa~n~napessaami, mahaajano santaasamaapajjissati ^a^P0.0273^ea^ `bahuka.m idha rakkhitabba.m, dukkara.m vata bho sama.nassa gotamassa saasane pabbajitu'nti, pabbajitukaamaapi na pabbajissanti, vacana~nca me na saddahissanti, asaddahantaa te manussaa apaayagaamino bhavissann-ti uppannuppanne vatthusmi.m dhammadesanaaya vi~n~naapetvaa paaka.te dose sikkhaapada.m pa~n~napessaamii'''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante naagasena, buddhaana.m, abbhuta.m, bhante naagasena, buddhaana.m, yaava mahanta.m tathaagatassa sabba~n~nuta~naa.na.m, evameta.m, bhante naagasena, suniddi.t.tho eso attho tathaagatena, `bahuka.m idha sikkhitabba'nti sutvaa sattaana.m santaaso uppajjeyya, ekopi jinasaasane na pabbajeyya, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] anavasesasikkhaapadapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, aya.m suuriyo sabbakaala.m ka.thina.m tapati, udaahu ki~ncikaala.m manda.m tapatii''ti? ``sabbakaala.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo ka.thina.m tapati ^a^M0.0265^ea^, na ki~ncikaala.m manda.m tapatii''ti. ``yadi, bhante naagasena, suuriyo sabbakaala.m ka.thina.m tapati, kissa pana appekadaa suuriyo ka.thina.m tapati, appekadaa manda.m tapatii''ti? ``cattaarome, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa rogaa, yesa.m a~n~natarena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapati. katame cattaaro? abbha.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa rogo, tena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapati. mahikaa, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa rogo, tena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapati. megho, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa rogo, tena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapati. raahu, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa rogo, tena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapati. ime kho, mahaaraaja, cattaaro suuriyassa rogaa, yesa.m a~n~natarena rogena pa.tipii.lito suuriyo manda.m tapatii''ti. ``acchariya.m, bhante ^a^V0.0255^ea^ naagasena, abbhuta.m, bhante ^a^P0.0274^ea^ naagasena, suuriyassapi taava tejosampannassa rogo uppajjissati, kima"nga.m pana a~n~nesa.m sattaana.m, natthi, bhante, esaa vibhatti a~n~nassa a~n~natra tavaadisena buddhimataa''ti.
[06] suuriyatapanapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, kissa hemante suuriyo ka.thina.m tapati, no tathaa gimhe''ti? ``gimhe, mahaaraaja, anupahata.m hoti rajojalla.m, vaatakkhubhitaa re.nuu gaganaanugataa honti, aakaasepi abbhaa subahalaa honti, mahaavaato ca adhimatta.m vaayati, te sabbe naanaakulaa samaayutaa suuriyara.msiyo pidahanti, tena gimhe suuriyo manda.m tapati.

[03] ``hemante pana, mahaaraaja, he.t.thaa pathavii nibbutaa hoti, upari mahaamegho upa.t.thito hoti, upasanta.m hoti rajojalla.m, re.nu ca santasanta.m gagane carati, vigatavalaahako ca hoti aakaaso, vaato ^a^M0.0266^ea^ ca mandamanda.m vaayati, etesa.m uparatiyaa visuddhaa {visadaa (sii0 pii0)} honti suuriyara.msiyo, upaghaatavimuttassa suuriyassa taapo ati viya tapati. idamettha, mahaaraaja, kaara.na.m, yena kaara.nena suuriyo hemante ka.thina.m tapati, no tathaa gimhe''ti. ``sabbiitimutto, bhante, suuriyo ka.thina.m tapati, meghaadisahagato ka.thina.m na tapatii''ti.
[06] ka.thinatapanapa~nho dasamo.
[06] nippapa~ncavaggo dutiyo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge dasa pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0256^ea^ ^a^M0.0267^ea^ naagasena, sabbeva bodhisattaa puttadaara.m denti, udaahu vessantareneva ra~n~naa puttadaara.m dinna''nti? ``sabbepi, mahaaraaja, bodhisattaa puttadaara.m denti, na vessantareneva ra~n~naa puttadaara.m dinna''nti. ``api ^a^P0.0275^ea^ ca kho, bhante naagasena, tesa.m anumatena dentii''ti. ``bhariyaa, mahaaraaja, anumataa, daarakaa pana baalataaya vilapi.msu {laalapi.msu (sii0 pii0)}, yadi te atthato jaaneyyu.m, tepi anumodeyyu.m, na te vilapeyyu''nti.
[03] ``dukkara.m, bhante naagasena, bodhisattena kata.m, ya.m so attano orase piye putte braahma.nassa daasatthaaya adaasi.
[03] ``idampi dutiya.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m so attano orase piye putte baalake taru.nake lataaya bandhitvaa tena braahma.nena lataaya anumajjiiyante disvaa ajjhupekkhi.
[03] ``idampi tatiya.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m so sakena balena bandhanaa muccitvaa aagate daarake saarajjamupagate punadeva lataaya bandhitvaa adaasi.
[03] ``idampi catuttha.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m so daarake `aya.m kho, taata, yakkho khaaditu.m neti amhe'ti vilapante `maa bhaayitthaa'ti na assaasesi.

[03] ``idampi pa~ncama.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m so jaalissa kumaarassa rudamaanassa paadesu nipatitvaa `ala.m, taata, ka.nhaajina.m nivattehi, ahameva gacchaami yakkhena saha, khaadatu ma.m yakkho'ti yaacamaanassa eva.m na sampa.ticchi.

[03] ``idampi ^a^V0.0257^ea^ cha.t.tha.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m so jaalissa kumaarassa `paasaa.nasama.m nuuna te, taata, hadaya.m, ya.m tva.m amhaaka.m dukkhitaana.m pekkhamaano nimmanussake brahaara~n~ne yakkhena niiyamaane na nivaaresii'ti vilapamaanassa kaaru~n~na.m naakaasi.

[03] ``idampi ^a^M0.0268^ea^ sattama.m dukkarato dukkaratara.m, ya.m tassa ru.laru.lassa bhiimabhiimassa niite daarake adassana.m gamite na phali hadaya.m satadhaa vaa sahassadhaa vaa, pu~n~nakaamena manujena ki.m paradukkhaapanena, nanu naama sakadaana.m daatabba.m hotii''ti?

[03] ``dukkarassa, mahaaraaja, katattaa bodhisattassa kittisaddo dasasahassiyaa lokadhaatuyaa sadevamanussesu abbhuggato, devaa devabhavane ^a^P0.0276^ea^ pakittenti, asuraa asurabhavane pakittenti, garu.laa garu.labhavane pakittenti, naagaa naagabhavane pakittenti, yakkhaa yakkhabhavane pakittenti, anupubbena tassa kittisaddo paramparaaya ajjetarahi idha amhaaka.m samaya.m anuppatto, ta.m maya.m daana.m pakittentaa vikopentaa nisinnaa sudinna.m, udaahu duddinnanti. so kho panaaya.m, mahaaraaja, kittisaddo nipu.naana.m vi~n~nuuna.m viduuna.m vibhaaviina.m bodhisattaana.m dasa gu.ne anudassati. katame dasa? agedhataa niraalayataa caago pahaana.m apunaraavattitaa sukhumataa mahantataa duranubodhataa dullabhataa asadisataa buddhadhammassa, so kho panaaya.m, mahaaraaja, kittisaddo nipu.naana.m vi~n~nuuna.m viduuna.m vibhaaviina.m bodhisattaana.m ime dasa gu.ne anudassatii''ti.
