[03] ``bhante naagasena, `agadassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame agadassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m ^a^P0.0319^ea^ anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, agado visapii.litaana.m sattaana.m pa.tisara.na.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m kilesavisapii.litaana.m sattaana.m pa.tisara.na.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, agadassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, agado rogaana.m antakaro, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sabbadukkhaana.m antakara.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, agadassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, agado amata.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m amata.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, agadassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, agadassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, `mahaasamuddassa cattaaro gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame mahaasamuddassa cattaaro gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo su~n~no sabbaku.napehi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0306^ea^, nibbaana.m su~n~na.m sabbakilesaku.napehi. aya.m, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0292^ea^, mahaasamuddassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo mahanto anorapaaro, na paripuurati sabbasavantiihi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m mahanta.m anorapaara.m, na puurati sabbasattehi. aya.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo mahantaana.m bhuutaana.m aavaaso, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m mahantaana.m arahantaana.m vimalakhii.naasavabalappattavasiibhuutamahaabhuutaana.m aavaaso. aya.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo aparimitavividhavipulaviicipupphasa.mkusumito, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m aparimitavividhavipulaparisuddhavijjaavimuttipupphasa.mkusumita.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa catuttho gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa cattaaro gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^P0.0320^ea^ naagasena, `bhojanassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame bhojanassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m aayudhaara.na.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sacchikata.m jaraamara.nanaasanato aayudhaara.na.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m balava.d.dhana.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sacchikata.m sabbasattaana.m iddhibalava.d.dhana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m va.n.najanana.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sacchikata.m sabbasattaana.m gu.nava.n.najanana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m darathavuupasamana.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sacchikata.m sabbasattaana.m sabbakilesadarathavuupasamana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa catuttho gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m jighacchaadubbalyapa.tivinodana.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sacchikata.m sabbasattaana.m sabbadukkhajighacchaadubbalyapa.tivinodana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa pa~ncamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^M0.0307^ea^ naagasena, `aakaasassa dasa gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame aakaasassa dasa gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, aakaaso na jaayati, na jiiyati, na miiyati, na cavati, na uppajjati, duppasaho, acoraahara.no, anissito, vihagagamano, niraavara.no, ananto. evameva ^a^P0.0321^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m na jaayati, na jiiyati ^a^V0.0293^ea^, na miiyati, na cavati, na uppajjati, duppasaha.m, acoraahara.na.m, anissita.m, ariyagamana.m, niraavara.na.m, ananta.m. ime kho, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa dasa gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, `ma.niratanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame ma.niratanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m kaamadada.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m kaamadada.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m haasakara.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m haasakara.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m ujjotattakara.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m ujjotattakara.m {ujjotatthakara.m (sii0 pii0), ujjotitatthakara.m (syaa0)}. aya.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, `lohitacandanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame lohitacandanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, lohitacandana.m dullabha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m dullabha.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, lohitacandanassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, lohitacandana.m asamasugandha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m asamasugandha.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, lohitacandanassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, lohitacandana.m sajjanapasattha.m {sabbajanapasattha.m (syaa0)}, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m ariyasajjanapasattha.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, lohitacandanassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, lohitacandanassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante ^a^P0.0322^ea^ ^a^M0.0308^ea^ naagasena, `sappima.n.dassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame sappima.n.dassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.do va.n.nasampanno, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m gu.nava.n.nasampanna.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.dassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.do gandhasampanno, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m siilagandhasampanna.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.dassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.do rasasampanno, evameva kho ^a^V0.0294^ea^, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m rasasampanna.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.dassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. ime kho, mahaaraaja, sappima.n.dassa tayo gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, `girisikharassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa'ti ya.m vadesi, katame girisikharassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m accuggata.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m accugata.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa pa.thamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m acala.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m acala.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa dutiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m duradhiroha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m duradhiroha.m sabbakilesaana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa tatiyo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m sabbabiijaana.m aviruuhana.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m sabbakilesaana.m aviruuhana.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa catuttho gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho. puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, girisikhara.m anunayappa.tighavippamutta.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, nibbaana.m anunayappa.tighavippamutta.m. aya.m, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa pa~ncamo gu.no nibbaana.m anupavi.t.tho ^a^P0.0323^ea^. ime kho, mahaaraaja, girisikharassa pa~nca gu.naa nibbaana.m anupavi.t.thaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] nibbaanaruupasa.n.thaanapa~nho dasamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0309^ea^ naagasena, tumhe bha.natha `nibbaana.m na atiita.m, na anaagata.m, na paccuppanna.m, na uppanna.m na anuppanna.m na uppaadaniiya'nti. idha, bhante naagasena, yo koci sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikaroti, so uppanna.m sacchikaroti, udaahu uppaadetvaa sacchikarotii''ti? ``yo koci, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikaroti, so na uppanna.m sacchikaroti, na uppaadetvaa sacchikaroti, api ca, mahaaraaja, atthesaa nibbaanadhaatu, ya.m so sammaapa.tipanno sacchikarotii''ti.

[03] ``maa, bhante naagasena, ima.m pa~nha.m pa.ticchanna.m katvaa diipehi, viva.ta.m paaka.ta.m katvaa diipehi ^a^V0.0295^ea^ chandajaato ussaahajaato, ya.m te sikkhita.m, ta.m sabba.m etthevaakiraahi, etthaaya.m jano sammuu.lho vimatijaato sa.msayapakkhando, bhindeta.m antodosasalla''nti. ``atthesaa, mahaaraaja, nibbaanadhaatu santaa sukhaa pa.niitaa, ta.m sammaapa.tipanno jinaanusi.t.thiyaa sa"nkhaare sammasanto pa~n~naaya sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, antevaasiko aacariyaanusi.t.thiyaa vijja.m pa~n~naaya sacchikaroti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno jinaanusi.t.thiyaa pa~n~naaya nibbaana.m sacchikaroti.
[03] ``katha.m pana ta.m nibbaana.m da.t.thabbanti? aniitito nirupaddavato abhayato khemato santato sukhato saatato pa.niitato sucito siitalato da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso bahuka.t.thapu~njena jalitaka.t.thitena agginaa dayhamaano vaayaamena tato mu~ncitvaa niraggikokaasa.m ^a^P0.0324^ea^ pavisitvaa tattha paramasukha.m labheyya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo sammaapa.tipanno, so yoniso manasikaarena byapagatatividhaggisantaapa.m paramasukha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, aggi, eva.m tividhaggi da.t.thabbo; yathaa aggigato puriso, eva.m sammaapa.tipanno da.t.thabbo; yathaa niraggikokaaso, eva.m nibbaana.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso ahikukkuramanussaku.napasariirava.la~njako.t.thaasaraasigato ku.napaja.taaja.titantaramanupavi.t.tho vaayaamena tato mu~ncitvaa nikku.napokaasa.m pavisitvaa tattha paramasukha.m labheyya, evameva ^a^M0.0310^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, yo sammaapa.tipanno, so yoniso manasikaarena byapagatakilesaku.napa.m paramasukha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, ku.napa.m, eva.m pa~nca kaamagu.naa da.t.thabbaa; yathaa ku.napagato puriso, eva.m sammaapa.tipanno da.t.thabbo; yathaa nikku.napokaaso, eva.m nibbaana.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso bhiito tasito kampito vipariitavibbhantacitto vaayaamena tato mu~ncitvaa da.lha.m thira.m acala.m abhaya.t.thaana.m pavisitvaa tattha paramasukha.m labheyya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo sammaapa.tipanno, so yoniso manasikaarena byapagatabhayasantaasa.m paramasukha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhaya.m, eva.m jaatijaraabyaadhimara.na.m pa.ticca aparaapara.m pavattabhaya.m da.t.thabba.m; yathaa bhiito puriso, eva.m sammaapa.tipanno da.t.thabbo; yathaa abhaya.t.thaana.m, eva.m nibbaana.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0296^ea^ vaa pana, mahaaraaja, puriso kili.t.thamalinakalalakaddamadese patito vaayaamena ta.m kalalakaddama.m apavaahetvaa parisuddhavimaladesamupagantvaa tattha paramasukha.m labheyya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo sammaapa.tipanno, so yoniso manasikaarena byapagatakilesamalakaddama.m paramasukha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, kalala.m, eva.m laabhasakkaarasiloko ^a^P0.0325^ea^ da.t.thabbo; yathaa kalalagato puriso, eva.m sammaapa.tipanno da.t.thabbo; yathaa parisuddhavimaladeso, eva.m nibbaana.m da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ``ta~nca pana nibbaana.m sammaapa.tipanno kinti sacchikaroti? yo so, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno, so sa"nkhaaraana.m pavatta.m sammasati. pavatta.m sammasamaano tattha jaati.m passati jara.m passati byaadhi.m passati mara.na.m passati, na tattha ki~nci sukha.m saata.m passati aaditopi majjhatopi pariyosaanatopi. so tattha ki~nci na gayhuupaga.m passati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso divasasantatte ayogu.le jalite tatte ka.thite aaditopi majjhatopi pariyosaanatopi na ki~nci gayhuupaga.m padesa.m passati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo sa"nkhaaraana.m pavatta.m sammasati, so pavatta.m sammasamaano tattha jaati.m passati jara.m passati byaadhi.m passati mara.na.m passati, na tattha ki~nci sukha.m saata.m passati aaditopi majjhatopi pariyosaanatopi. so tattha {ida.m padadvaya.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} na ki~nci gayhuupaga.m passati, tassa gayhuupaga.m ^a^M0.0311^ea^ apassantassa citte arati sa.n.thaati, kaayasmi.m .daaho okkamati, so ataa.no asara.no asara.niibhuuto bhavesu nibbindati.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso jalitajaala.m mahanta.m aggikkhandha.m paviseyya, so tattha ataa.no asara.no asara.niibhuuto aggimhi nibbindeyya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, tassa gayhuupaga.m apassantassa citte arati sa.n.thaati, kaayasmi.m .daaho okkamati, so ataa.no asara.no asara.niibhuuto bhavesu nibbindati.

[03] ``tassa pavatte bhayadassaavissa eva.m citta.m uppajjati `santatta.m kho paneta.m pavatta.m sampajjalita.m bahudukkha.m bahuupaayaasa.m, yadi koci labhetha appavatta.m eta.m santa.m eta.m pa.niita.m, yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana'nti. iti heta.m {hita.m (sii0), hi ida.m (pii0)} tassa appavatte citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati ^a^P0.0326^ea^ paha.msayati tusayati {paha.msiiyati kuhiiyati (sii0 pii0)}`pa.tiladdha.m kho me nissara.na'nti.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso vippana.t.tho videsapakkhando nibbaahanamagga.m disvaa tattha pakkhandati ^a^V0.0297^ea^ pasiidati paha.msayati tusayati {paha.msiiyati kuhiiyati (sii0 pii0)} `pa.tiladdho me nibbaahanamaggo'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, pavatte bhayadassaavissa appavatte citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati paha.msayati tusayati {paha.msiiyati kuhiiyati (sii0 pii0)} `pa.tiladdha.m kho me nissara.na'nti.

[03] ``so appavattatthaaya magga.m aayuuhati gavesati bhaaveti bahuliikaroti, tassa tadattha.m sati santi.t.thati, tadattha.m viiriya.m santi.t.thati, tadattha.m piiti santi.t.thati, tassa ta.m citta.m aparaapara.m manasikaroto pavatta.m samatikkamitvaa appavatta.m okkamati, appavattamanuppatto, mahaaraaja, sammaapa.tipanno `nibbaana.m sacchikarotii'ti vuccatii''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, evameta.m tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] nibbaanasacchikara.napa~nho ekaadasamo.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0312^ea^ naagasena, atthi so padeso puratthimaaya vaa disaaya dakkhi.naaya vaa disaaya pacchimaaya vaa disaaya uttaraaya vaa disaaya uddha.m vaa adho vaa tiriya.m vaa, yattha nibbaana.m sannihita''nti? ``natthi, mahaaraaja, so padeso puratthimaaya vaa disaaya dakkhi.naaya vaa disaaya pacchimaaya vaa disaaya uttaraaya vaa disaaya uddha.m vaa adho vaa tiriya.m vaa, yattha nibbaana.m sannihita''nti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, natthi nibbaanassa sannihitokaaso, tena hi natthi nibbaana.m? yesa~nca ta.m nibbaana.m sacchikata.m, tesampi sacchikiriyaa micchaa, kaara.na.m tattha vakkhaami, yathaa, bhante naagasena, mahiyaa dha~n~nu.t.thaana.m khetta.m atthi, gandhu.t.thaana.m puppha.m atthi, pupphu.t.thaana.m gumbo atthi, phalu.t.thaana.m rukkho atthi, ratanu.t.thaana.m aakaro atthi, tattha yo koci ya.m ya.m icchati, so tattha gantvaa ta.m ta.m harati, evameva kho, bhante naagasena, yadi ^a^P0.0327^ea^ nibbaana.m atthi, tassa nibbaanassa u.t.thaanokaasopi icchitabbo, yasmaa ca kho, bhante naagasena, nibbaanassa u.t.thaanokaaso natthi, tasmaa natthi nibbaananti bruumi, yesa~nca nibbaana.m sacchikata.m, tesampi sacchikiriyaa micchaa''ti.

[03] ``natthi ^a^V0.0298^ea^, mahaaraaja, nibbaanassa sannihitokaaso, atthi ceta.m nibbaana.m, sammaapa.tipanno yoniso manasikaarena nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa pana, mahaaraaja, atthi aggi naama, natthi tassa sannihitokaaso, dve ka.t.thaani sa"ngha.t.tento aggi.m adhigacchati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, atthi nibbaana.m, natthi tassa sannihitokaaso, sammaapa.tipanno yoniso manasikaarena nibbaana.m sacchikaroti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, atthi satta ratanaani naama. seyyathida.m, cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratana.m. na ca tesa.m ratanaana.m sannihitokaaso atthi, khattiyassa pana sammaapa.tipannassa pa.tipattibalena taani ratanaani upagacchanti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, atthi nibbaana.m, natthi tassa sannihitokaaso, sammaapa.tipanno yoniso manasikaarena nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, nibbaanassa sannihitokaaso maa hotu, atthi pana ta.m .thaana.m, yattha .thito sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti? ``aama, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0313^ea^, atthi ta.m .thaana.m, yattha .thito sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti.

[03] ``katama.m pana, bhante, ta.m .thaana.m, yattha .thito sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikarotii''ti? ``siila.m, mahaaraaja, .thaana.m, siile pati.t.thito yoniso manasikaronto sakkayavanepi ciinavilaatepi alasandepi nigumbepi {nikumbepi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kaasikosalepi kasmiirepi gandhaarepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi .thito sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikaroti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, yo koci cakkhumaa ^a^P0.0328^ea^ puriso sakayavanepi ciinavilaatepi alasandepi nigumbepi kaasikosalepi kasmiirepi gandhaarepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi .thito aakaasa.m passati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, siile pati.t.thito yoniso manasikaronto sakayavanepi...pe0... yattha katthacipi .thito sammaapa.tipanno nibbaana.m sacchikaroti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, sakayavanepi...pe0... yattha katthacipi .thitassa pubbadisaa atthi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, siile pati.t.thitassa yoniso manasikarontassa sakkayavanepi...pe0... yattha katthacipi .thitassa sammaapa.tipannassa atthi nibbaanasacchikiriyaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante naagasena, desita.m tayaa nibbaana.m, desitaa nibbaanasacchikiriyaa, parikkhataa siilagu.naa, dassitaa sammaapa.tipatti, ussaapito dhammaddhajo, sa.n.thapitaa ^a^V0.0299^ea^ dhammanetti, ava~njho suppayuttaana.m sammaapayogo, evameta.m ga.nivarapavara tathaa sampa.ticchaamii''ti.
[06] nibbaanasannihitapa~nho dvaadasamo.
[06] vessantaravaggo tatiyo.
[06] imasmi.m vagge dvaadasa pa~nhaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V0.0300^ea^ ^a^P0.0329^ea^ ^a^M0.0314^ea^ kho milindo raajaa yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa ~naatukaamo sotukaamo dhaaretukaamo ~naa.naaloka.m da.t.thukaamo a~n~naa.na.m bhinditukaamo ~naa.naaloka.m uppaadetukaamo avijjandhakaara.m naasetukaamo adhimatta.m dhiti~nca ussaaha~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca upa.t.thapetvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``bhante naagasena, ki.m pana buddho tayaa di.t.tho''ti. ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``ki.m pana te aacariyehi buddho di.t.tho''ti? ``na hi, mahaaraajaa''ti. ``bhante naagasena, na kira tayaa buddho di.t.tho, naapi kira te aacariyehi buddho di.t.tho, tena hi, bhante naagasena, natthi buddho, na hettha buddho pa~n~naayatii''ti.

[03] ``atthi pana te, mahaaraaja, pubbakaa khattiyaa, ye te tava khattiyava.msassa pubba"ngamaa''ti? ``aama, bhante. ko sa.msayo, atthi pubbakaa khattiyaa, ye mama khattiyava.msassa pubba"ngamaa''ti. ``di.t.thapubbaa tayaa, mahaaraaja, pubbakaa khattiyaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``ye pana ta.m, mahaaraaja, anusaasanti purohitaa senaapatino akkhadassaa mahaamattaa, tehi pubbakaa khattiyaa di.t.thapubbaa''ti? ``na hi bhante''ti. ``yadi pana te, mahaaraaja, pubbakaa khattiyaa na di.t.thaa, naapi kira te anusaasakehi pubbakaa khattiyaa di.t.thaa, tena hi natthi pubbakaa khattiyaa, na hettha pubbakaa khattiyaa pa~n~naayantii''ti.

[03] ``dissanti, bhante naagasena, pubbakaana.m khattiyaana.m anubhuutaani paribhogabha.n.daani. seyyathida.m, setacchatta.m ^a^P0.0330^ea^ u.nhiisa.m paadukaa vaalabiijanii khaggaratana.m mahaarahaani ca sayanaani. yehi maya.m jaaneyyaama saddaheyyaama `atthi pubbakaa khattiyaa'ti. ``evameva kho, mahaaraaja, mayampeta.m ^a^V0.0301^ea^ bhagavanta.m jaaneyyaama saddaheyyaama. atthi ta.m kaara.na.m, yena maya.m kaara.nena jaaneyyaama saddaheyyaama `atthi so bhagavaa'ti. katama.m ta.m kaara.na.m? atthi kho, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena anubhuutaani paribhogabha.n.daani. seyyathida.m, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa ^a^M0.0315^ea^ cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, yehi sadevako loko jaanaati saddahati `atthi so bhagavaa'ti. iminaa, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena iminaa hetunaa iminaa nayena iminaa anumaanena ~naatabbo `atthi so bhagavaa'ti.
[21] ```bahuu jane taarayitvaa, nibbuto upadhikkhaye.
[22] anumaanena ~naatabba.m, atthi so dvipaduttamo'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, opamma.m karohii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, nagarava.d.dhakii nagara.m maapetukaamo pa.thama.m taava sama.m anunnatamanonata.m asakkharapaasaa.na.m nirupaddavamanavajja.m rama.niiya.m bhuumibhaaga.m anuviloketvaa ya.m tattha visama.m, ta.m sama.m kaaraapetvaa khaa.nuka.n.taka.m visodhaapetvaa tattha nagara.m maapeyya sobhana.m vibhatta.m bhaagaso mita.m ukki.n.naparikhaapaakaara.m da.lhagopura.t.taalako.t.taka.m puthucaccaracatukkasandhisi"nghaa.taka.m sucisamatalaraajamagga.m suvibhattaantaraapa.na.m aaraamuyyaanata.laakapokkhara.niudapaanasampanna.m bahuvidhadeva.t.thaanappa.tima.n.dita.m sabbadosavirahita.m, so tasmi.m nagare sabbathaa vepullatta.m patte a~n~na.m desa.m upagaccheyya, atha ta.m nagara.m aparena samayena iddha.m bhaveyya phiita.m subhikkha.m ^a^P0.0331^ea^ khema.m samiddha.m siva.m aniitika.m nirupaddava.m naanaajanasamaakula.m, puthuu khattiyaa braahma.naa vessaa suddaa hatthaarohaa assaarohaa rathikaa pattikaa dhanuggahaa tharuggahaa celakaa calakaa pi.n.dadaayakaa uggaa raajaputtaa pakkhandino mahaanaagaa suuraa vammino yodhino daasikaputtaa bha.tiputtaa {daasaputtaa bha.t.tiputtaa (sii0 pii0)} mallakaa ga.nakaa aa.laarikaa suudaa kappakaa nahaapakaa cundaa maalaakaaraa suva.n.nakaaraa sajjhukaaraa siisakaaraa tipukaaraa lohakaaraa va.t.takaaraa ayokaaraa ma.nikaaraa pesakaaraa kumbhakaaraa ve.nukaaraa lo.nakaaraa cammakaaraa rathakaaraa dantakaaraa rajjukaaraa kocchakaaraa suttakaaraa viliivakaaraa dhanukaaraa jiyakaaraa usukaaraa cittakaaraa ra"ngakaaraa rajakaa tantavaayaa tunnavaayaa hera~n~nikaa dussikaa gandhikaa ti.nahaarakaa ka.t.thahaarakaa bhatakaa pa.n.nikaa phalikaa {phallikaa (sii0 pii0)} muulikaa odanikaa puuvikaa macchikaa ma.msikaa majjikaa na.takaa naccakaa la"nghakaa indajaalikaa vetaalikaa mallaa ^a^M0.0316^ea^ chava.daahakaa pupphacha.d.dakaa venaa nesaadaa ga.nikaa laasikaa kumbhadaasiyo sakkayavanaciinavilaataa ujjenakaa bhaarukacchakaa kaasikosalaa parantakaa maagadhakaa saaketakaa soreyyakaa {sora.t.thakaa (sii0 pii0)} paaveyyakaa ko.tumbaramaathurakaa alasandakasmiiragandhaaraa ta.m nagara.m vaasaaya ^a^V0.0302^ea^ upagataa naanaavisayino janaa nava.m suvibhatta.m adosamanavajja.m rama.niiya.m ta.m nagara.m passitvaa anumaanena jaananti `cheko vata bho so nagarava.d.dhakii, yo imassa nagarassa maapetaa'ti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, so bhagavaa asamo asamasamo appa.tisamo asadiso atulo asa"nkhyeyo appameyyo aparimeyyo amitagu.no gu.napaaramippatto anantadhiti anantatejo anantaviiriyo anantabalo buddhabalapaarami.m gato ^a^P0.0332^ea^ sasenamaara.m paraajetvaa di.t.thijaala.m padaaletvaa avijja.m khepetvaa vijja.m uppaadetvaa dhammukka.m dhaarayitvaa sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.nitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo dhammanagara.m maapesi.

[03] ``bhagavato kho, mahaaraaja, dhammanagara.m siilapaakaara.m hiriparikha.m ~naa.nadvaarako.t.thaka.m viiriyaa.t.taalaka.m saddhaaesika.m satidovaarika.m pa~n~naapaasaada.m suttantacaccara.m abhidhammasi"nghaa.taka.m vinayavinicchaya.m satipa.t.thaanaviithika.m, tassa kho pana, mahaaraaja, satipa.t.thaanaviithiya.m evaruupaa aapa.naa pasaaritaa honti. seyyathiida.m, pupphaapa.na.m gandhaapa.na.m phalaapa.na.m agadaapa.na.m osadhaapa.na.m amataapa.na.m ratanaapa.na.m sabbaapa.na''nti.

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato pupphaapa.na''nti? ``atthi kho pana, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena aaramma.navibhattiyo akkhaataa. seyyathiida.m, aniccasa~n~naa dukkhasa~n~naa anattasa~n~naa asubhasa~n~naa aadiinavasa~n~naa pahaanasa~n~naa viraagasa~n~naa nirodhasa~n~naa sabbaloke anabhiratisa~n~naa sabbasa"nkhaaresu aniccasa~n~naa aanaapaanassati uddhumaatakasa~n~naa viniilakasa~n~naa vipubbakasa~n~naa vicchiddakasa~n~naa vikkhaayitakasa~n~naa vikkhittakasa~n~naa hatavikkhittakasa~n~naa lohitakasa~n~naa pu.lavakasa~n~naa a.t.thikasa~n~naa mettaasa~n~naa karu.naasa~n~naa muditaasa~n~naa upekkhaasa~n~naa mara.naanussati kaayagataasati, ime kho, mahaaraaja, buddhena bhagavataa aaramma.navibhattiyo akkhaataa. tattha yo koci jaraamara.naa muccitukaamo, so tesu a~n~natara.m ^a^M0.0317^ea^ aaramma.na.m ga.nhaati, tena aaramma.nena raagaa vimuccati, dosaa vimuccati, mohaa vimuccati, maanato vimuccati, di.t.thito vimuccati, sa.msaara.m tarati, ta.nhaasota.m nivaareti, tividha.m mala.m visodheti, sabbakilese upahantvaa amala.m viraja.m suddha.m pa.n.dara.m ajaati.m ^a^P0.0333^ea^ ajara.m amara.m sukha.m siitibhuuta.m abhaya.m nagaruttama.m nibbaananagara.m pavisitvaa arahatte citta.m vimoceti, ida.m vuccati mahaaraaja `bhagavato pupphaapa.na'nti.
[21] ```kammamuula.m ^a^V0.0303^ea^ gahetvaana, aapa.na.m upagacchatha.
[22] aaramma.na.m ki.nitvaana, tato muccatha muttiyaa'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato gandhaapa.na''nti? ``atthi kho pana, mahaaraaja, tena bhagavataa siilavibhattiyo akkhaataa, yena siilagandhena anulittaa bhagavato puttaa sadevaka.m loka.m siilagandhena dhuupenti sampadhuupenti, disampi anudisampi anuvaatampi pa.tivaatampi vaayanti ativaayanti, pharitvaa ti.t.thanti. katamaa taa siilavibhattiyo? sara.nasiila.m pa~nca"ngasiila.m a.t.tha"ngasiila.m dasa"ngasiila.m pa~ncuddesapariyaapanna.m paatimokkhasa.mvarasiila.m. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato gandhaapa.na'nti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```na pupphagandho pa.tivaatameti, na candana.m taggaramallikaa vaa.
[22] sata~nca gandho pa.tivaatameti, sabbaa disaa sappuriso pavaayati {pavaati (sii0 pii0) dha0 pa0 54 passitabba.m}..
[21] ```candana.m tagara.m vaapi, uppala.m atha vassikii.
[22] etesa.m gandhajaataana.m, siilagandho anuttaro..
[21] ```appamatto aya.m gandho, yvaaya.m tagaracandana.m.
[22] yo ca siilavata.m gandho, vaati devesu uttamo'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato phalaapa.na''nti? ``phalaani kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa akkhaataani. seyyathiida.m, sotaapattiphala.m sakadaagaamiphala.m anaagaamiphala.m arahattaphala.m su~n~nataphalasamaapatti animittaphalasamaapatti appa.nihitaphalasamaapatti ^a^P0.0334^ea^. tattha yo koci ya.m ^a^M0.0318^ea^ phala.m icchati, so kammamuula.m datvaa patthita.m phala.m ki.naati. yadi sotaapattiphala.m, yadi sakadaagaamiphala.m, yadi anaagaamiphala.m, yadi arahattaphala.m, yadi su~n~nataphalasamaapatti.m, yadi animittaphalasamaapatti.m, yadi appa.nihitaphalasamaapatti.m. yathaa, mahaaraaja, kassaci purisassa dhuvaphalo ambo bhaveyya, so na taava tato phalaani paateti, yaava kayikaa na aagacchanti, anuppatte pana kayike muula.m gahetvaa eva.m aacikkhati `ambho purisa eso kho dhuvaphalo ambo, tato ya.m icchasi, ettaka.m phala.m ga.nhaahi salaa.tuka.m vaa dovila.m vaa kesika.m vaa aama.m vaa pakka.m vaa'ti, so tena attanaa dinnamuulena yadi salaa.tuka.m icchati, salaa.tuka.m ga.nhaati, yadi dovila.m icchati, dovila.m ga.nhaati, yadi kesika.m icchati, kesika.m ga.nhaati, yadi ^a^V0.0304^ea^ aamaka.m icchati, aamaka.m ga.nhaati, yadi pakka.m icchati, pakka.m ga.nhaati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo ya.m phala.m icchati, so kammamuula.m datvaa patthita.m phala.m ga.nhaati, yadi sotaapattiphala.m...pe0... yadi appa.nihitaphalasamaapatti.m, ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato phalaapa.na'nti.
[21] ```kammamuula.m janaa datvaa, ga.nhanti amatamphala.m.
[22] tena te sukhitaa honti, ye kiitaa amatapphala'''nti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato agadaapa.na''nti? ``agadaani kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa akkhaataani, yehi agadehi so bhagavaa sadevaka.m loka.m kilesavisato parimoceti. katamaani pana taani agadaani? yaanimaani, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa cattaari ariyasaccaani akkhaataani. seyyathiida.m, dukkha.m ariyasacca.m dukkhasamudaya.m ariyasacca.m dukkhanirodha.m ariyasacca.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa ariyasacca.m, tattha ye keci a~n~naapekkhaa catusacca.m dhamma.m su.nanti, te jaatiyaa parimuccanti ^a^P0.0335^ea^, jaraaya parimuccanti, mara.naa parimuccanti, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccanti, ida.m vuccati mahaaraaja `bhagavato agadaapa.na'nti.
[21] ```ye keci agadaa loke {loke agadaa (pii0)}, visaana.m pa.tibaahakaa.
[22] dhammaagadasama.m natthi, eta.m pivatha bhikkhavo'''ti..

[03] ``bhante ^a^M0.0319^ea^ naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato osadhaapa.na''nti? ``osadhaani kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa akkhaataani, yehi osadhehi so bhagavaa devamanusse tikicchati. seyyathiida.m, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo, etehi osadhehi bhagavaa micchaadi.t.thi.m vireceti, micchaasa"nkappa.m vireceti, micchaavaaca.m vireceti, micchaakammanta.m vireceti, micchaaaajiiva.m vireceti, micchaavaayaama.m vireceti, micchaasati.m vireceti, micchaasamaadhi.m vireceti, lobhavamana.m kaareti, dosavamana.m kaareti, mohavamana.m kaareti, maanavamana.m kaareti, di.t.thivamana.m kaareti, vicikicchaavamana.m kaareti, uddhaccavamana.m kaareti, thinamiddhavamana.m kaareti, ahirikaanottappavamana.m kaareti, sabbakilesavamana.m kaareti, ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato osadhaapa.na'nti.
[21] ```ye ^a^V0.0305^ea^ keci osadhaa loke, vijjanti vividhaa bahuu.
[22] dhammosadhasama.m natthi, eta.m pivatha bhikkhavo..
[21] ```dhammosadha.m pivitvaana, ajaraamara.naa siyu.m.
[22] bhaavayitvaa ca passitvaa, nibbutaa upadhikkhaye'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato amataapa.na''nti? ``amata.m kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa akkhaata.m, yena amatena so bhagavaa sadevaka.m loka.m abhisi~nci ^a^P0.0336^ea^, yena amatena abhisittaa devamanussaa jaatijaraabyaadhimara.nasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimucci.msu. katama.m ta.m amata.m? yadida.m kaayagataasati. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena `amata.m te, bhikkhave, paribhu~njanti, ye kaayagataasati.m paribhu~njantii'ti. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato amataapa.na'nti.
[21] ```byaadhita.m janata.m disvaa, amataapa.na.m pasaarayi.
[22] kammena ta.m ki.nitvaana, amata.m aadetha bhikkhavo'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato ratanaapa.na''nti? ``ratanaani kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa akkhaataani, yehi ratanehi vibhuusitaa bhagavato puttaa sadevaka.m loka.m virocanti obhaasenti pabhaasenti jalanti pajjalanti uddha.m adho tiriya.m aaloka.m dassenti. katamaani taani ^a^M0.0320^ea^ ratanaani? siilaratana.m samaadhiratana.m pa~n~naaratana.m vimuttiratana.m vimutti~naa.nadassanaratana.m pa.tisambhidaaratana.m bojjha"ngaratana.m.

[03] ``katama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato siilaratana.m? paatimokkhasa.mvarasiila.m indriyasa.mvarasiila.m aajiivapaarisuddhisiila.m paccayasannissitasiila.m cuu.lasiila.m majjhimasiila.m mahaasiila.m maggasiila.m phalasiila.m. siilaratanena kho, mahaaraaja, vibhuusitassa puggalassa sadevako loko samaarako sabrahmako sassama.nabraahma.nii pajaa pihayati pattheti, siilaratanapi.landho kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu disampi anudisampi uddhampi adhopi tiriyampi virocati ativirocati {atirocati (sii0 pii0)}, he.t.thato aviici.m uparito bhavagga.m upaadaaya etthantare sabbaratanaani atikkamitvaa {atisayitvaa (sii0 pii0)} abhibhavitvaa ajjhottharitvaa ti.t.thati, evaruupaani kho, mahaaraaja, siilaratanaani bhagavato ratanaapa.ne pasaaritaani, ida.m vuccati mahaaraaja `bhagavato siilaratana'nti.
[21] ```evaruupaani ^a^V0.0306^ea^ ^a^P0.0337^ea^ siilaani, santi buddhassa aapa.ne.
[22] kammena ta.m ki.nitvaana, ratana.m vo pi.landhathaa'ti..

[03] ``katama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato samaadhiratana.m? savitakkasavicaaro samaadhi, avitakkavicaaramatto samaadhi, avitakkaavicaaro samaadhi, su~n~nato samaadhi, animitto samaadhi, appa.nihito samaadhi. samaadhiratana.m kho, mahaaraaja, pi.landhassa bhikkhuno ye te kaamavitakkabyaapaadavitakkavihi.msaavitakkamaanuddhaccadi.t.thivicikicchaakilesavatthuuni vividhaani ca kuvitakkaani, te sabbe samaadhi.m aasajja vikiranti vidhamanti viddha.msanti na sa.n.thanti {na sa.n.thahanti (sii0)} na upalimpanti {na upalippanti (sii0 pii0)}. yathaa, mahaaraaja, vaari pokkharapatte vikirati vidhamati viddha.msati na sa.n.thaati na upalimpati. ta.m kissa hetu? parisuddhattaa padumassa. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, samaadhiratana.m pi.landhassa bhikkhuno ye te kaamavitakkabyaapaadavitakkavihi.msaavitakkamaanuddhacca di.t.thivicikicchaakilesavatthuuni vividhaani ca kuvitakkaani, te sabbe samaadhi.m aasajja vikiranti vidhamanti viddha.msanti na sa.n.thanti na upalimpanti. ta.m kissa hetu? parisuddhattaa samaadhissa. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato samaadhiratana'nti, evaruupaani kho, mahaaraaja, samaadhiratanaani bhagavato ratanaapa.ne pasaaritaani.
[21] ```samaadhiratanamaalassa ^a^M0.0321^ea^, kuvitakkaa na jaayare.
[22] na ca vikkhipate citta.m, eta.m tumhe pi.landhathaa'ti..

[03] ``katama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pa~n~naaratana.m? yaaya, mahaaraaja, pa~n~naaya ariyasaavako `ida.m kusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ida.m akusala'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ida.m saavajja.m, ida.m anavajja.m, ida.m sevitabba.m, ida.m na sevitabba.m, ida.m hiina.m, ida.m pa.niita.m, ida.m ka.nha.m, ida.m ^a^P0.0338^ea^ sukka.m, ida.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. ida.m vuccati mahaaraaja `bhagavato pa~n~naaratana'nti.
[21] ```pa~n~naaratanamaalassa, na cira.m vattate bhavo.
[22] khippa.m phasseti {phusseti (syaa0), passati (ka0)} amata.m, na ca so rocate bhave'ti..

[03] ``katama.m ^a^V0.0307^ea^, mahaaraaja, bhagavato vimuttiratana.m''? ``vimuttiratana.m {vimuttiratananti (sii0 pii0)} kho, mahaaraaja, arahatta.m vuccati, arahatta.m patto kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhu `vimuttiratana.m pi.landho'ti vuccati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, puriso muttaakalaapama.nikalaapapavaa.lakalaapaabhara.nappa.tima.n.dito {pavaa.laabhara.napa.tipa.n.dito (sii0 pii0)} agalutagarataaliisakalohitacandanaanulittagatto naagapunnaagasaalasala.lacampakayuuthikaatimuttakapaa.taluppalavassikamallikaavicitto sesajane atikkamitvaa virocati ativirocati obhaasati pabhaasati sampabhaasati jalati pajjalati abhibhavati ajjhottharati maalaagandharatanaabhara.nehi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, arahatta.m patto khii.naasavo vimuttiratanapi.landho upaadaayupaadaaya vimuttaana.m bhikkhuuna.m atikkamitvaa samatikkamitvaa virocati ativirocati obhaasati pabhaasati sampabhaasati jalati pajjalati abhibhavati ajjhottharati vimuttiyaa. ta.m kissa hetu? agga.m, mahaaraaja, eta.m pi.landhana.m sabbapi.landhanaana.m, yadida.m vimuttipi.landhana.m. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato vimuttiratana'nti.
[21] ```ma.nimaalaadhara.m geha, jano {geha.m, jano (ka0)} saami.m udikkhati.
[22] vimuttiratanamaalantu, udikkhanti sadevakaa'ti..

[03] ``katama.m ^a^M0.0322^ea^ mahaaraaja, bhagavato vimutti~naa.nadassanaratana.m? paccavekkha.na~naa.na.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato vimutti~naa.nadassanaratananti ^a^P0.0339^ea^ vuccati, yena ~naa.nena ariyasaavako maggaphalanibbaanaani pahiinakilesaavasi.t.thakilese ca paccavekkhati.
[21] ```ye ~naa.nena bujjhanti, ariyaa katakiccata.m.
[22] ta.m ~naa.naratana.m laddhu.m, vaayametha jinorasaa'ti..

[03] ``katama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato pa.tisambhidaaratana.m? catasso kho, mahaaraaja, pa.tisambhidaayo atthapa.tisambhidaa dhammapa.tisambhidaa niruttipa.tisambhidaa pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaati. imehi kho, mahaaraaja, catuuhi pa.tisambhidaaratanehi samala"nkato bhikkhu ya.m ya.m parisa.m upasa"nkamati, yadi khattiyaparisa.m, yadi braahma.naparisa.m, yadi gahapatiparisa.m, yadi sama.naparisa.m, visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto abhiiru acchambhii anutraasii vigatalomaha.mso parisa.m upasa"nkamati.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, yodho sa"ngaamasuuro sannaddhapa~ncaavudho acchambhito {asambhiito (sii0 pii0)} sa"ngaama.m otarati, `sace ^a^V0.0308^ea^ amittaa duure bhavissanti usunaa paatayissaami, tato orato bhavissanti sattiyaa paharissaami, tato orato bhavissanti ka.nayena paharissaami, upagata.m santa.m ma.n.dalaggena dvidhaa chindissaami, kaayuupagata.m churikaaya vinivijjhissaamii'ti {vijjhissaamiiti (sii0)}, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, catupa.tisambhidaaratanama.n.dito bhikkhu acchambhito parisa.m upasa"nkamati. yo koci ma.m atthapa.tisambhide pa~nha.m pucchissati, tassa atthena attha.m kathayissaami, kaara.nena kaara.na.m kathayissaami, hetunaa hetu.m kathayissaami, nayena naya.m kathayissaami, nissa.msaya.m karissaami, vimati.m vivecessaami, tosayissaami pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena.

[03] ``yo koci ma.m dhammapa.tisambhide pa~nha.m pucchissati, tassa dhammena dhamma.m kathayissaami, amatena amata.m kathayissaami, asa"nkhatena asa"nkhata.m kathayissaami, nibbaanena nibbaana.m kathayissaami, su~n~natena su~n~nata.m kathayissaami ^a^P0.0340^ea^, animittena animitta.m kathayissaami, appa.nihitena appa.nihita.m kathayissaami, anejena aneja.m kathayissaami, nissa.msaya.m karissaami, vimati.m vivecessaami, tosayissaami pa~nhaaveyyaakara.nena.

[03] ``yo ^a^M0.0323^ea^ koci ma.m niruttipa.tisambhide pa~nha.m pucchissati, tassa niruttiyaa nirutti.m kathayissaami, padena pada.m kathayissaami, anupadena anupada.m kathayissaami, akkharena akkhara.m kathayissaami, sandhiyaa sandhi.m kathayissaami, bya~njanena bya~njana.m kathayissaami, anubya~njanena anubya~njana.m kathayissaami, va.n.nena va.n.na.m kathayissaami, sarena sara.m kathayissaami, pa~n~nattiyaa pa~n~natti.m kathayissaami, vohaarena vohaara.m kathayissaami, nissa.msaya.m karissaami, vimati.m vivecessaami, tosayissaami pa~nhaveyyaakara.nena.

[03] ``yo koci ma.m pa.tibhaanapa.tisambhide pa~nha.m pucchissati, tassa pa.tibhaanena pa.tibhaana.m kathayissaami, opammena opamma.m kathayissaami, lakkha.nena lakkha.na.m kathayissaami, rasena rasa.m kathayissaami, nissa.msaya.m karissaami, vimati.m vivecessaami, tosayissaami pa~nhaveyyaakara.nenaati, ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato pa.tisambhidaaratana'nti.
[21] ```pa.tisambhidaa ki.nitvaana, ~naa.nena phassayeyya yo.
[22] acchambhito anubbiggo, atirocati sadevake'ti..

[03] ``katama.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavato bojjha"ngaratana.m? sattime, mahaaraaja, bojjha"ngaa, satisambojjha"ngo ^a^V0.0309^ea^ dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo viiriyasambojjha"ngo piitisambojjha"ngo passaddhisambojjha"ngo samaadhisambojjha"ngo upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. imehi kho, mahaaraaja, sattahi bojjha"ngaratanehi pa.tima.n.dito bhikkhu sabba.m tama.m abhibhuyya sadevaka.m loka.m obhaaseti pabhaaseti aaloka.m janeti. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato bojjha"ngaratana'nti.
[21] ```bojjha"ngaratanamaalassa ^a^P0.0341^ea^, u.t.thahanti {upa.t.thahanti (ka0), udikkhanti (syaa0)} sadevakaa.
[22] kammena ta.m ki.nitvaana, ratana.m vo pi.landhathaa'''ti..

[03] ``bhante naagasena, katama.m buddhassa bhagavato sabbaapa.na''nti? ``sabbaapa.na.m kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato nava"nga.m buddhavacana.m saariirikaani paaribhogikaani cetiyaani sa"ngharatana~nca. sabbaapa.ne, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa jaatisampatti pasaaritaa, bhogasampatti pasaaritaa, aayusampatti pasaaritaa, aarogyasampatti pasaaritaa, va.n.nasampatti pasaaritaa, pa~n~naasampatti pasaaritaa, maanusikasampatti pasaaritaa, dibbasampatti pasaaritaa, nibbaanasampatti ^a^M0.0324^ea^ pasaaritaa. tattha ye ta.m ta.m sampatti.m icchanti, te kammamuula.m datvaa patthitapatthita.m sampatti.m ki.nanti, keci siilasamaadaanena ki.nanti, keci uposathakammena ki.nanti, appamattakenapi kammamuulena upaadaayupaadaaya sampattiyo pa.tilabhanti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, aapa.nikassa aapa.ne tilamuggamaase parittakenapi ta.n.dulamuggamaasena appakenapi muulena upaadaayupaadaaya ga.nhanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato sabbaapa.ne appamattakenapi kammamuulena upaadaayupaadaaya sampattiyo pa.tilabhanti. ida.m vuccati, mahaaraaja, `bhagavato sabbaapa.na'nti.
[21] ```aayu arogataa va.n.na.m, sagga.m uccaakuliinataa.
[22] asa"nkhata~nca amata.m, atthi sabbaapa.ne jine..
[21] ```appena bahukenaapi, kammamuulena gayhati.
[22] ki.nitvaa saddhaamuulena, samiddhaa hotha bhikkhavo'ti..

[03] ``bhagavato kho, mahaaraaja, dhammanagare evaruupaa janaa pa.tivasanti, suttantikaa venayikaa aabhidhammikaa dhammakathikaa jaatakabhaa.nakaa diighabhaa.nakaa majjhimabhaa.nakaa sa.myuttabhaa.nakaa ^a^P0.0342^ea^ a"nguttarabhaa.nakaa khuddakabhaa.nakaa siilasampannaa samaadhisampannaa pa~n~naasampannaa bojjha"ngabhaavanaarataa vipassakaa sadatthamanuyuttaa aara~n~nikaa rukkhamuulikaa abbhokaasikaa palaalapu~njikaa sosaanikaa ^a^V0.0310^ea^ nesajjikaa pa.tipannakaa phala.t.thaa sekkhaa phalasama"ngino sotaapannaa sakadaagaamino anaagaamino arahanto tevijjaa cha.labhi~n~naa iddhimanto pa~n~naaya paarami.mgataa satipa.t.thaanasammappadhaanaiddhipaadaindriyabalabojjha"ngamaggavarajhaanavimokkharuu paaruupasantasukhasamaapattikusalaa, tehi arahantehi aakula.m samaakula.m aaki.n.na.m samaaki.n.na.m na.lavanasaravanamiva dhammanagara.m ahosi. bhavatiiha --
[21] ```viitaraagaa viitadosaa, viitamohaa anaasavaa.
[22] viitata.nhaa anaadaanaa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```aara~n~nikaa dhutadharaa, jhaayino luukhaciivaraa.
[22] vivekaabhirataa dhiiraa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```nesajjikaa santhatikaa, athopi .thaanaca"nkamaa.
[22] pa.msukuuladharaa sabbe, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```ticiivaradharaa ^a^M0.0325^ea^ santaa, cammakha.n.dacatutthakaa.
[22] rataa ekaasane vi~n~nuu, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```appicchaa nipakaa dhiiraa, appaahaaraa alolupaa.
[22] laabhaalaabhena santu.t.thaa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```jhaayii jhaanarataa dhiiraa, santacittaa samaahitaa.
[22] aaki~nca~n~na.m patthayaanaa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```pa.tipannaa phala.t.thaa ca, sekkhaa phalasama"ngino.
[22] aasiisakaa {aasi.msakaa (sii0 pii0)} uttamattha.m, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```sotaapannaa ca vimalaa, sakadaagaamino ca ye.
[22] anaagaamii ca arahanto, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```satipa.t.thaanakusalaa ^a^V0.0311^ea^, bojjha"ngabhaavanaarataa.
[22] vipassakaa dhammadharaa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```iddhipaadesu ^a^P0.0343^ea^ kusalaa, samaadhibhaavanaarataa.
[22] sammappadhaanaanuyuttaa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```abhi~n~naapaaramippattaa, pettike gocare rataa.
[22] antalikkhamhi cara.naa, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```okkhittacakkhuu mitabhaa.nii, guttadvaaraa susa.mvutaa.
[22] sudantaa uttame damme {dhamme (sii0 pii0)}, dhammanagare vasanti te..
[21] ```tevijjaa cha.labhi~n~naa ca, iddhiyaa paarami.m gataa.
[22] pa~n~naaya paaramippattaa, dhammanagare vasanti te'ti..

[03] ``ye kho te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu aparimita~naa.navaradharaa asa"ngaa atulagu.naa {atuliyagu.naa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} atulayasaa atulabalaa atulatejaa dhammacakkaanuppavattakaa pa~n~naapaarami.m gataa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`dhammasenaapatino'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu iddhimanto adhigatappa.tisambhidaapattavesaarajjaa gaganacaraa duraasadaa duppasahaa anaalambacaraa sasaagaramahidharapathavikampako candasuuriyaparimajjakaa vikubbanaadhi.t.thaanaabhiniihaarakusalaa iddhiyaa ^a^M0.0326^ea^ paarami.m gataa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`purohitaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu dhuta"ngamanugataa appicchaa santu.t.thaa vi~n~nattimanesanajigucchakaa pi.n.daaya sapadaanacaarino bhamaraava gandhamanughaayitvaa pavisanti vivittakaanana.m, kaaye ca jiivite ca nirapekkhaa arahattamanuppattaa dhuta"ngagu.ne agganikkhittaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`akkhadassaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu parisuddhaa vimalaa nikkilesaa cutuupapaatakusalaa dibbacakkhumhi ^a^V0.0312^ea^ paarami.m gataa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`nagarajotakaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bahussutaa ^a^P0.0344^ea^ aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa sithiladhanitadiigharassagarukalahukakkharaparicchedakusalaa nava"ngasaasanadharaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`dhammarakkhaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu vinaya~n~nuu vinayakovidaa .thaanaa.t.thaanakusalaa {nidaanapa.thanakusalaa (sii0 pii0), nidaanavatthukusalaa (syaa0)} aapattaanaapattigarukalahukasatekicchaatekicchavu.t.thaanadesanaaniggaha- pa.tikammaosaara.nanissaara.napa.tisaara.nakusalaa vinaye paarami.m gataa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`ruuparakkhaa'^eb^ti {ruupadakkhaati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu vimuttivarakusumamaalabaddhaa varapavaramahagghase.t.thabhaavamanuppattaa bahujanakantamabhipatthitaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`pupphaapa.nikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu catusaccaabhisamayappa.tividdhaa di.t.thasaccaa vi~n~naatasaasanaa catuusu saama~n~naphalesu ti.n.navicikicchaa pa.tiladdhaphalasukhaa a~n~nesampi pa.tipannaana.m te phale sa.mvibhajanti, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`phalaapa.nikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye ^a^M0.0327^ea^ pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu siilasa.mvaragandhamanulittaa {siilavarasugandhamanulittaa (sii0 pii0)} anekavidhabahugu.nadharaa kilesamaladuggandhavidhamakaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`gandhaapa.nikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu dhammakaamaa piyasamudaahaaraa abhidhamme abhivinaye u.laarapaamojjaa ara~n~nagataapi rukkhamuulagataapi su~n~naagaaragataapi dhammavararasa.m pivanti, kaayena vaacaaya manasaa dhammavararasamogaa.lhaa adhimattapa.tibhaanaa dhammesu dhammesanappa.tipannaa ito vaa tato vaa yattha yattha appicchakathaa santu.t.thikathaa pavivekakathaa asa.msaggakathaa viiriyaarambhakathaa siilakathaa samaadhikathaa ^a^V0.0313^ea^ pa~n~naakathaa vimuttikathaa vimutti~naa.nadassanakathaa ^a^P0.0345^ea^, tattha tattha gantvaa ta.m ta.m kathaarasa.m pivanti, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`so.n.daa pipaasaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyuttaa nisajja.t.thaanaca"nkamehi rattindiva.m viitinaamenti, bhaavanaanuyogamanuyuttaa kilesapa.tibaahanaaya sadatthappasutaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`nagaraguttikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu nava"nga.m buddhavacana.m atthato ca bya~njanato ca nayato ca kaara.nato ca hetuto ca udaahara.nato ca vaacenti anuvaacenti bhaasanti anubhaasanti, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`dhammaapa.nikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu dhammaratanabhogena aagamapariyattisutabhogena bhogino dhanino niddi.t.thasarabya~njanalakkha.nappa.tivedhaa vi~n~nuu phara.naa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`dhammase.t.thino'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``ye pana te, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu u.laaradesanaapa.tivedhaa parici.n.naaramma.navibhattiniddesaa sikkhaagu.napaaramippattaa, evaruupaa kho, mahaaraaja, bhikkhuu bhagavato dhammanagare ^b^`vissutadhammikaa'^eb^ti vuccanti.

[03] ``eva.m suvibhatta.m kho, mahaaraaja, bhagavato dhammanagara.m eva.m sumaapita.m eva.m suvihita.m eva.m suparipuurita.m eva.m suvavatthaapita.m eva.m surakkhita.m eva.m sugopita.m eva.m ^a^M0.0328^ea^ duppasayha.m paccatthikehi paccaamittehi, iminaa, mahaaraaja, kaara.nena iminaa hetunaa iminaa nayena iminaa anumaanena ~naatabba.m atthi so bhagavaati.
[21] ```yathaapi nagara.m disvaa, suvibhatta.m manorama.m.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, va.d.dhakissa mahattana.m..
[21] ```tatheva lokanaathassa, disvaa dhammapura.m vara.m.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, atthi so bhagavaa iti..
[21] ```anumaanena ^a^V0.0314^ea^ ^a^P0.0346^ea^ jaananti, uumi.m disvaana saagare.
[22] yathaaya.m dissate uumi, mahanto so bhavissati..
[21] ```tathaa buddha.m sokanuda.m, sabbatthamaparaajita.m.
[22] ta.nhakkhayamanuppatta.m, bhavasa.msaaramocana.m..
[21] ```anumaanena ~naatabba.m, uumi.m disvaa sadevake.
[22] yathaa dhammuumivipphaaro, aggo buddho bhavissati..
[21] ```anumaanena jaananti, disvaa accuggata.m giri.m.
[22] yathaa accuggato eso, himavaa so bhavissati..
[21] ```tathaa disvaa dhammagiri.m, siitiibhuuta.m niruupadhi.m.
[22] accuggata.m bhagavato, acala.m suppati.t.thita.m..
[21] ```anumaanena ~naatabba.m, disvaana dhammapabbata.m.
[22] tathaa hi so mahaaviiro, aggo buddho bhavissati..
[21] ```yathaapi gajaraajassa, pada.m disvaana maanusaa.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, mahaa eso gajo iti..
[21] ```tatheva buddhanaagassa, pada.m disvaa vibhaavino.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, u.laaro so bhavissati..
[21] ```anumaanena jaananti, bhiite disvaana kummige.
[22] migaraajassa saddena, bhiitaame kummigaa iti..
[21] ```tatheva titthiye disvaa, vitthate bhiitamaanase.
[22] anumaanena ~naatabba.m, dhammaraajena gajjita.m..
[21] ```nibbuta.m ^a^V0.0315^ea^ ^a^M0.0329^ea^ pathavi.m disvaa, haritapatta.m mahodika.m.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, mahaameghena nibbuta.m..
[21] ```tathevima.m jana.m disvaa, aamoditapamodita.m.
[22] anumaanena ~naatabba.m, dhammameghena tappita.m..
[21] ```lagga.m disvaa bhusa.m pa"nka.m, kalaladdagata.m mahi.m.
[22] anumaanena jaananti, vaarikkhandho mahaa gato..
[21] ```tathevima.m jana.m disvaa, rajapa"nkasamohita.m.
[22] vahita.m dhammanadiyaa, visa.t.tha.m dhammasaagare..
[21] ```dhammaamatagata.m disvaa, sadevakamima.m mahi.m.
[22] anumaanena ~naatabba.m, dhammakkhandho mahaa gato..
[21] ```anumaanena ^a^P0.0347^ea^ jaananti, ghaayitvaa gandhamuttama.m.
[22] yathaaya.m vaayate gandho, hessanti pupphitaa dumaa..
[21] ```tathevaaya.m siilagandho, pavaayati sadevake.
[22] anumaanena ~naatabba.m, atthi buddho anuttaro'ti..

[03] ``evaruupena kho, mahaaraaja, kaara.nasatena kaara.nasahassena hetusatena hetusahassena nayasatena nayasahassena opammasatena opammasahassena sakkaa buddhabala.m upadassayitu.m. yathaa, mahaaraaja, dakkho maalaakaaro naanaapuppharaasimhaa aacariyaanusi.t.thiyaa paccattapurisakaarena vicitta.m maalaagu.naraasi.m kareyya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, so bhagavaa vicittapuppharaasi viya anantagu.no appameyyagu.no, ahametarahi jinasaasane maalaakaaro viya pupphaganthako pubbakaana.m aacariyaana.m maggenapi mayha.m buddhibalenapi asa"nkhyeyyenapi kaara.nena anumaanena buddhabala.m diipayissaami, tva.m panettha chanda.m janehi savanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``dukkara.m ^a^V0.0316^ea^, bhante naagasena, a~n~nesa.m evaruupena kaara.nena anumaanena buddhabala.m upadassayitu.m, nibbutosmi, bhante naagasena, tumhaaka.m paramavicittena pa~nhaveyyaakara.nenaa''ti.
[06] anumaanapa~nho pa.thamo.
[21] ``passataara~n~nake ^a^P0.0348^ea^ ^a^M0.0330^ea^ bhikkhuu, ajjhogaa.lhe dhute gu.ne.
[22] puna passati gihii raajaa, anaagaamiphale .thite..
[21] ``ubhopi te viloketvaa, uppajji sa.msayo mahaa.
[22] bujjheyya ce gihii dhamme, dhuta"nga.m nipphala.m siyaa..
[21] ``paravaadivaadamathana.m, nipu.na.m pi.takattaye.
[22] handa pucche kathise.t.tha.m, so me ka"nkha.m vinessatii''ti..

[03] atha kho milindo raajaa yenaayasmaa naagaseno tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, ekamanta.m nisinno kho milindo raajaa aayasmanta.m naagasena.m etadavoca ``bhante naagasena, atthi koci gihii agaariko kaamabhogii puttadaarasambaadhasayana.m ajjhaavasanto kaasikacandana.m paccanubhonto maalaagandhavilepana.m dhaarayanto jaataruuparajata.m saadiyanto ma.nimuttaaka~ncanavicittamo.libaddho yena santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikata''nti?

[03] ``na, mahaaraaja, eka~n~neva sata.m na dve sataani na tii.ni cattaari pa~nca sataani na sahassa.m na satasahassa.m na ko.tisata.m na ko.tisahassa.m na ko.tisatasahassa.m, ti.t.thatu mahaaraaja dasanna.m viisatiyaa satassa sahassassa abhisamayo, katamena te pariyaayena anuyoga.m dammii''ti.

[03] ``tvameveta.m bruuhii''ti. ``tenahi te, mahaaraaja, kathayissaami satena vaa sahassena vaa satasahassena ^a^V0.0317^ea^ vaa ko.tiyaa vaa ko.tisatena vaa ko.tisahassena vaa ko.tisatasahassena vaa, yaa kaaci nava"nge buddhavacane sallekhitaacaarappa.tipattidhutavara"ngagu.nanissitaa ^a^P0.0349^ea^ {dhutavara"ngagu.nanissitaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} thaa, taa sabbaa idha samosarissanti. yathaa, mahaaraaja, ninnunnatasamavisamathalaathaladesabhaage abhivu.t.tha.m udaka.m, sabba.m ta.m tato viniga.litvaa mahodadhi.m saagara.m samosarati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sampaadake sati yaa kaaci nava"nge buddhavacane sallekhitaacaarappa.tipattidhuta"ngagu.nadharanissitaa kathaa, taa sabbaa idha samosarissanti.

[03] ``mayhampettha ^a^M0.0331^ea^, mahaaraaja, paribyattataaya buddhiyaa kaara.naparidiipana.m samosarissati, teneso attho suvibhatto vicitto paripu.n.no parisuddho samaaniito bhavissati. yathaa, mahaaraaja, kusalo lekhaacariyo anusi.t.tho lekha.m osaarento attano byattataaya buddhiyaa kaara.naparidiipanena lekha.m paripuureti, eva.m saa lekhaa samattaa paripu.n.naa anuunikaa bhavissati. evameva mayhampettha paribyattataaya buddhiyaa kaara.naparidiipana.m samosarissati, teneso attho suvibhatto vicitto paripu.n.no parisuddho samaaniito bhavissati.

[03] ``nagare, mahaaraaja, saavatthiyaa pa~ncako.timattaa ariyasaavakaa bhagavato upaasakaupaasikaayo sattapa.n.naasasahassaani tii.ni ca satasahassaani anaagaamiphale pati.t.thitaa, te sabbepi gihii yeva, na pabbajitaa. puna tattheva ka.n.dambamuule yamakapaa.tihaariye viisati paa.nako.tiyo abhisami.msu, puna cuu.laraahulovaade {mahaaraahulovaade (sii0 pii0)}, mahaama"ngalasuttante, samacittapariyaaye, paraabhavasuttante, puraabhedasuttante, kalahavivaadasuttante, cuu.labyuuhasuttante, mahaabyuuhasuttante, tuva.takasuttante, saariputtasuttante ga.nanapathamatiitaana.m devataana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi.

[03] ``nagare raajagahe pa~n~naasasahassaani tii.ni ca satasahassaani ariyasaavakaa bhagavato upaasakaupaasikaayo, puna tattheva dhanapaalahatthinaagadamane navuti paa.nako.tiyo, paaraayanasamaagame paasaa.nakacetiye cuddasa paa.nako.tiyo, puna indasaalaguhaaya.m asiiti devataako.tiyo, puna baaraa.nasiya.m isipatane ^a^P0.0350^ea^ migadaaye pa.thame dhammadesane a.t.thaarasa brahmako.tiyo aparimaa.naa ca devataayo, puna taavati.msabhavane pa.n.dukambalasilaaya.m abhidhammadesanaaya asiiti devataako.tiyo, devoroha.ne sa"nkassanagaradvaare lokavivara.napaa.tihaariye pasannaana.m naramaruuna.m ti.msa ko.tiyo abhisami.msu.

[03] puna sakkesu kapilavatthusmi.m nigrodhaaraame buddhava.msadesanaaya mahaasamayasuttantadesanaaya ca ga.nanapathamatiitaana.m ^a^V0.0318^ea^ devataana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi ^a^M0.0332^ea^. puna sumanamaalaakaarasamaagame, garahadinnasamaagame, aanandase.t.thisamaagame, jambukaajiivakasamaagame, ma.n.dukadevaputtasamaagame, ma.t.thaku.n.dalidevaputtasamaagame, sulasaanagarasobhinisamaagame, sirimaanagarasobhinisamaagame, pesakaaradhiitusamaagame, cuu.lasubhaddaasamaagame, saaketabraahma.nassa aa.laahanadassanasamaagame, suunaaparantakasamaagame, sakkapa~nhasamaagame, tiroku.t.tasamaagame {tiroku.d.dasamaagame (sii0 pii0)}, ratanasuttasamaagame pacceka.m caturaasiitiyaa paa.nasahassaana.m dhammaabhisamayo ahosi, yaavataa, mahaaraaja, bhagavaa loke a.t.thaasi, taava tiisu ma.n.dalesu so.lasasu mahaajanapadesu yattha yattha bhagavaa vihaasi, tattha tattha yebhuyyena dve tayo cattaaro pa~nca sata.m sahassa.m satasahassa.m devaa ca manussaa ca santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikari.msu. ye te, mahaaraaja, devaa gihii yeva, na te pabbajitaa, etaani ceva, mahaaraaja, a~n~naani ca anekaani devataako.tisatasahassaani gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikari.msuu''ti.

[03] ``yadi, bhante naagasena, gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, atha imaani dhuta"ngaani kimattha.m saadhenti, tena kaara.nena dhuta"ngaani ^a^P0.0351^ea^ akiccakaraani honti. yadi, bhante naagasena, vinaa mantosadhehi byaadhayo vuupasamanti, ki.m vamanavirecanaadinaa sariiradubbalakara.nena? yadi mu.t.thiihi pa.tisattuniggaho bhavati, ki.m asisattisaradhanukoda.n.dalagu.lamuggarehi? yadi ga.n.thiku.tilasusiraka.n.talataasaakhaa aalambitvaa rukkhamabhiruuhana.m bhavati, ki.m diighada.lhanisse.nipariyesanena? yadi tha.n.dilaseyyaaya dhaatusamataa bhavati, ki.m sukhasamphassamahatimahaasirisayanapariyesanena? yadi ekako saasa"nkasappa.tibhayavisamakantaaratara.nasamattho bhavati, ki.m sannaddhasajjamahatimahaasatthapariyesanena? yadi nadisara.m baahunaa taritu.m samattho bhavati, ki.m dhuvasetunaavaapariyesanena? yadi sakasantakena ghaasacchaadana.m kaatu.m pahoti, ki.m paruupasevanapiyasamullaapapacchaapuredhaavanena? yadi akhaatata.laake udaka.m labhati, ki.m udapaanata.laakapokkhara.nikha.nanena? evameva kho, bhante naagasena, yadi gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, ki.m dhutagu.navarasamaadiyanenaa''ti?

[03] ``a.t.thaviisati ^a^M0.0333^ea^ kho panime, mahaaraaja, dhuta"ngagu.naa yathaabhuccagu.naa, yehi gu.nehi dhuta"ngaani sabbabuddhaana.m pihayitaani patthitaani. katame a.t.thaviisati? idha, mahaaraaja, dhuta"nga.m suddhaajiiva.m sukhaphala.m anavajja.m na paradukkhaapana.m abhaya.m asampii.lana.m ekantava.d.dhika.m aparihaaniya.m amaaya.m aarakkhaa patthitadada.m sabbasattadamana.m sa.mvarahita.m patiruupa.m anissita.m vippamutta.m raagakkhaya.m dosakkhaya.m ^a^V0.0319^ea^ mohakkhaya.m maanappahaana.m kuvitakkacchedana.m ka"nkhaavitara.na.m kosajjaviddha.msana.m aratippahaana.m khamana.m atula.m appamaa.na.m sabbadukkhakkhayagamana.m, ime kho, mahaaraaja, a.t.thaviisati dhuta"ngagu.naa yathaabhuccagu.naa yehi gu.nehi ^a^P0.0352^ea^ dhuta"ngaani sabbabuddhaana.m pihayitaani patthitaani.

[03] ``ye kho te, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.ne sammaa upasevanti, te a.t.thaarasahi gu.nehi samupetaa bhavanti. katamehi a.t.thaarasahi? aacaaro tesa.m suvisuddho hoti, pa.tipadaa supuuritaa hoti, kaayika.m vaacasika.m surakkhita.m hoti, manosamaacaaro suvisuddho hoti, viiriya.m supaggahita.m hoti, bhaya.m vuupasammati, attaanudi.t.thibyapagataa hoti, aaghaato uparato hoti, mettaa upa.t.thitaa hoti, aahaaro pari~n~naato hoti, sabbasattaana.m garukato hoti, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, jaagariyamanuyutto hoti, aniketo hoti, yattha phaasu tattha vihaarii hoti, paapajegucchii hoti, vivekaaraamo hoti, satata.m appamatto hoti, ye te, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.ne sammaa upasevanti, te imehi a.t.thaarasahi gu.nehi samupetaa bhavanti.

[03] ``dasa ime, mahaaraaja, puggalaa dhutagu.naarahaa. katame dasa? saddho hoti hirimaa dhitimaa akuho atthavasii alolo sikkhaakaamo da.lhasamaadaano anujjhaanabahulo mettaavihaarii, ime kho, mahaaraaja, dasa puggalaa dhutagu.naarahaa.

[03] ``ye te, mahaaraaja, gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, sabbe te purimaasu jaatiisu terasasu dhutagu.nesu katuupaasanaa katabhuumikammaa, te tattha caara~nca pa.tipatti~nca sodhayitvaa ajjetarahi gihii yeva santaa santa.m paramatta.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0334^ea^, mahaaraaja, kusalo issaaso antevaasike pa.thama.m taava upaasanasaalaaya.m caapabhedacaapaaropanaggaha.namu.t.thippa.tipii.lanaa"ngulivinaamanapaada.thapanasaraggaha.nasannahanaaaka.d.dhana saddhaara.nalakkhaniyamanakhipane ti.napurisakachaka.na {kha.naka (sii0 pii0)} ti.napalaalamattikaapu~njaphalakalakkhavedhe anusikkhaapetvaa ra~n~no santike upaasana.m aaraadhayitvaa aaja~n~narathagajatura"ngadhanadha~n~nahira~n~nasuva.n.nadaasidaasabhariyagaamavara.m labhati ^a^P0.0353^ea^, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, te sabbe purimaasu jaatiisu terasasu dhutagu.nesu katuupaasanaa katabhuumikammaa, te tattheva caara~nca pa.tipatti~nca sodhayitvaa ajjetarahi gihii yeva santaa santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti. na, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.nesu pubbaasevana.m vinaa ^a^V0.0320^ea^ ekissaa yeva jaatiyaa arahatta.m sacchikiriyaa hoti, uttamena pana viiriyena uttamaaya pa.tipattiyaa tathaaruupena aacariyena kalyaa.namittena arahatta.m sacchikiriyaa hoti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, bhisakko sallakatto aacariya.m dhanena vaa vattappa.tipattiyaa vaa aaraadhetvaa sattaggaha.nachedanalekhanavedhanasalluddhara.nava.nadhovanasosanabhesajjaanulimpanavamana virecanaanuvaasanakiriyamanusikkhitvaa vijjaasu katasikkho katuupaasano katahattho aature upasa"nkamati tikicchaaya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ye te gihii agaarikaa kaamabhogino santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, te sabbe purimaasu jaatiisu terasasu dhutagu.nesu katuupaasanaa katabhuumikammaa, te tattheva caara~nca pa.tipatti~nca sodhayitvaa ajjetarahi gihii yeva santaa santa.m paramattha.m nibbaana.m sacchikaronti, na, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.nehi avisuddhaana.m dhammaabhisamayo hoti.
[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, udakassa asecanena biijaana.m aviruuhana.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.nehi avisuddhaana.m dhammaabhisamayo na hoti.
[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, akatakusalaana.m akatakalyaa.naana.m sugatigamana.m na hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.nehi avisuddhaana.m dhammaabhisamayo na hoti.

[03] ``pathavisama.m ^a^M0.0335^ea^, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m pati.t.thaana.t.thena. aaposama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbakilesamaladhovana.t.thena. tejosama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbakilesavanajjhaapana.t.thena ^a^P0.0354^ea^. vaayosama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbakilesamalarajopavaahana.t.thena. agadasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbakilesabyaadhivuupasamana.t.thena. amatasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbakilesavisanaasana.t.thena. khettasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbasaama~n~nagu.nasassaviruuhana.t.thena. manoharasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m patthiticchitasabbasampattivaradada.t.thena. naavaasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sa.msaaramaha.n.navapaaragamana.t.thena. bhiiruttaa.nasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m jaraamara.nabhiitaana.m assaasakara.na.t.thena. maatusama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kilesadukkhappa.tipii.litaana.m anuggaahaka.t.thena. pitusama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kusalava.d.dhikaamaana.m sabbasaama~n~nagu.najanaka.t.thena. mittasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbasaama~n~nagu.napariyesanaavisa.mvaadaka.t.thena. padumasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m ^a^V0.0321^ea^ sabbakilesamalehi anupalitta.t.thena. catujjaatiyavaragandhasama.m ^a^M0.0336^ea^, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kilesaduggandhapa.tivinodana.t.thena. giriraajavarasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m a.t.thalokadhammavaatehi akampiya.t.thena. aakaasasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbattha gaha.naapagatauruvisa.tavitthatamahanta.t.thena. nadiisama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kilesamalapavaahana.t.thena. sudesakasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m jaatikantaarakilesavanagahananitthara.na.t.thena. mahaasatthavaahasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sabbabhayasu~n~nakhemaabhayavarapavaranibbaananagarasampaapana.t.thena ^a^P0.0355^ea^. sumajjitavimalaadaasasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m sa"nkhaaraana.m sabhaavadassana.t.thena. phalakasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kilesalagu.lasarasattipa.tibaahana.t.thena. chattasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m kilesavassatividhaggisantaapaatapapa.tibaahana.t.thena. candasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m pihayitapatthita.t.thena. suuriyasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m mohatamatimiranaasana.t.thena. saagarasama.m, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m anekavidhasaama~n~nagu.navararatanu.t.thaana.t.thena, aparimitaasa"nkhyeyyaappameyya.t.thena ca. eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m visuddhikaamaana.m bahuupakaara.m sabbadarathapari.laahanuda.m aratinuda.m bhayanuda.m bhavanuda.m khiilanuda.m malanuda.m sokanuda.m dukkhanuda.m raaganuda.m dosanuda.m mohanuda.m maananuda.m di.t.thinuda.m sabbaakusaladhammanuda.m yasaavaha.m hitaavaha.m sukhaavaha.m phaasukara.m piitikara.m yogakkhemakara.m anavajja.m i.t.thasukhavipaaka.m gu.naraasigu.napu~nja.m aparimitaasa"nkhyeyya appameyyagu.na.m vara.m pavara.m agga.m.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^M0.0337^ea^, mahaaraaja, manussaa upatthambhavasena bhojana.m upasevanti, hitavasena bhesajja.m upasevanti, upakaaravasena mitta.m upasevanti, taara.navasena naava.m upasevanti, sugandhavasena maalaagandha.m upasevanti, abhayavasena bhiiruttaa.na.m upasevanti, pati.t.thaavasena {pati.t.thaanavasena (ka0)} pathavi.m upasevanti, sippavasena aacariya.m upasevanti, yasavasena raajaana.m upasevanti, kaamadadavasena ma.niratana.m upasevanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, sabbasaama~n~nagu.nadadavasena ariyaa dhutagu.na.m upasevanti.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, udaka.m biijaviruuhanaaya, aggi ^a^P0.0356^ea^ jhaapanaaya, aahaaro balaahara.naaya, lataa bandhanaaya, sattha.m chedanaaya, paaniiya.m pipaasaavinayanaaya, nidhi assaasakara.naaya, naavaa tiirasampaapanaaya, bhesajja.m byaadhivuupasamanaaya, yaana.m sukhagamanaaya, bhiiruttaa.na.m bhayavinodanaaya, raajaa aarakkhatthaaya, phalaka.m da.n.dale.d.dulagu.lasarasattipa.tibaahanaaya, aacariyo anusaasanaaya, maataa posanaaya, aadaaso olokanaaya, ala"nkaaro sobhanaaya, vattha.m pa.ticchaadanaaya, nisse.nii aarohanaaya, tulaa visamavikkhepanaaya {nikkhepanaaya (sii0 pii0)}, manta.m parijappanaaya, aavudha.m tajjaniiyapa.tibaahanaaya ^a^V0.0322^ea^, padiipo andhakaaravidhamanaaya, vaato pari.laahanibbaapanaaya, sippa.m vuttinipphaadanaaya, agada.m jiivitarakkha.naaya, aakaro ratanuppaadanaaya, ratana.m ala"nkaraaya, aa.naa anatikkamanaaya, issariya.m vasavattanaaya, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.na.m saama~n~nabiijaviruuhanaaya, kilesamalajhaapanaaya, iddhibalaahara.naaya, satisa.mvaranibandhanaaya, vimativicikicchaasamucchedanaaya, ta.nhaapipaasaavinayanaaya, abhisamayaassaasakara.naaya, caturoghanitthara.naaya, kilesabyaadhivuupasamaaya, nibbaanasukhappa.tilaabhaaya, jaatijaraabyaadhimara.nasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasabhayavinodanaaya, saama~n~nagu.naparirakkha.naaya, aratikuvitakkapa.tibaahanaaya, sakalasaama~n~natthaanusaasanaaya, sabbasaama~n~nagu.naposanaaya, samathavipassanaamaggaphalanibbaanadassanaaya, sakalalokathutathomitamahatimahaasobhanakara.naaya, sabbaapaayapidahanaaya, saama~n~natthaselasikharamuddhani abhiruuhanaaya, va"nkaku.tilavisamacittavikkhepanaaya {cittanikkhepanaaya (sii0 pii0)}, sevitabbaasevitabbadhamme saadhusajjhaayakara.naaya, sabbakilesapa.tisattutajjanaaya ^a^M0.0338^ea^, avijjandhakaaravidhamanaaya, tividhaggisantaapapari.laahanibbaapanaaya, sa.nhasukhumasantasamaapattinipphaadanaaya, sakalasaama~n~nagu.naparirakkha.naaya, bojjha"ngavararatanuppaadanaaya, yogijanaala"nkara.naaya, anavajjanipu.nasukhumasantisukhamanatikkamanaaya ^a^P0.0357^ea^, sakalasaama~n~naariyadhammavasavattanaaya. iti, mahaaraaja, imesa.m gu.naana.m adhigamaaya yadida.m ekameka.m dhutagu.na.m, eva.m, mahaaraaja, atuliya.m dhutagu.na.m appameyya.m asama.m appa.tisama.m appa.tibhaaga.m appa.tise.t.tha.m uttara.m se.t.tha.m visi.t.tha.m adhika.m aayata.m puthula.m visa.ta.m vitthata.m garuka.m bhaariya.m mahanta.m.

[03] ``yo kho, mahaaraaja, puggalo paapiccho icchaapakato kuhako luddho odariko laabhakaamo yasakaamo kittikaamo ayutto appatto ananucchaviko anaraho appatiruupo dhuta"nga.m {tadhugu.na.m (ka0) evamuparipi} samaadiyati, so digu.na.m da.n.damaapajjati, sabbagu.naghaatamaapajjati, di.t.thadhammika.m hii.lana.m khii.lana.m garahana.m uppa.n.dana.m khipana.m asambhoga.m nissaara.na.m nicchubhana.m pavaahana.m pabbaajana.m pa.tilabhati, samparaayepi satayojanike aviicimahaaniraye u.nhaka.thitatattasantattaaccijaalaamaalake anekavassako.tisatasahassaani uddhamadho tiriya.m phe.nuddehaka.m samparivattaka.m paccati, tato muccitvaa {muccitvaa (sii0 pii0)} kisapharusakaa.la"ngapacca"ngo suunuddhumaatasusiruttama"ngo {suunuddhumaatasuucimukhapamaa.nasusiruttama"ngo (sii0 pii0)} chaato pipaasito visamabhiimaruupava.n.no bhaggaka.n.nasoto ummiilitanimiilitanettanayano arugattapakkagatto pu.lavaaki.n.nasabbakaayo vaatamukhe jalamaano viya aggikkhandho anto jalamaano pajjalamaano ataa.no asara.no aaru.n.naru.n.nakaaru~n~narava.m paridevamaano nijjhaamata.nhiko sama.namahaapeto hutvaa aahi.n.damaano mahiyaa a.t.tassara.m karoti.

[03] ``yathaa ^a^V0.0323^ea^, mahaaraaja, koci ayutto appatto ananucchaviko anaraho appatiruupo hiino kujaatiko khattiyaabhisekena abhisi~ncati, so labhati hatthaccheda.m paadaccheda.m hatthapaadaccheda.m ka.n.naccheda.m naasaccheda.m ka.n.nanaasaccheda.m ^a^P0.0358^ea^ bila"ngathaalika.m sa"nkhamu.n.dika.m raahumukha.m jotimaalika.m hatthapajjotika.m erakavattika.m ciirakavaasika.m e.neyyaka.m ba.lisama.msika.m kahaapa.naka.m khaaraapatacchika.m palighaparivattika.m palaalapii.thaka.m tattena telena ^a^M0.0339^ea^ osi~ncana.m sunakhehi khaadaapana.m jiivasuulaaropana.m asinaa siisaccheda.m anekavihitampi kammakaara.na.m anubhavati. ki.m kaara.naa? ayutto appatto ananucchaviko anaraho appatiruupo hiino kujaatiko mahante issariye .thaane attaana.m .thapesi, vela.m ghaatesi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yo koci puggalo paapiccho...pe0... mahiyaa a.t.tassara.m karoti.

[03] ``yo pana, mahaaraaja, puggalo yutto patto anucchaviko araho patiruupo appiccho santu.t.tho pavivitto asa.msa.t.tho aaraddhaviiriyo pahitatto asa.tho amaayo anodariko alaabhakaamo ayasakaamo akittikaamo saddho saddhaapabbajito jaraamara.naa muccitukaamo `saasana.m pagga.nhissaamii'ti dhuta"nga.m samaadiyati, so digu.na.m puuja.m arahati devaana~nca piyo hoti manaapo pihayito patthito, jaatisumanamallikaadiina.m viya puppha.m nahaataanulittassa, jighacchitassa viya pa.niitabhojana.m, pipaasitassa viya siitalavimalasurabhipaaniiya.m, visagatassa viya osadhavara.m, siighagamanakaamassa viya aaja~n~narathavaruttama.m, atthakaamassa viya manoharama.niratana.m, abhisi~ncitukaamassa viya pa.n.daravimalasetacchatta.m, dhammakaamassa viya arahattaphalaadhigamamanuttara.m. tassa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchanti, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa cattaaro iddhipaadaa pa~ncindriyaani pa~nca balaani satta bojjha"ngaa ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchati, samathavipassanaa adhigacchati, adhigamappa.tipatti pari.namati, cattaari saama~n~naphalaani ^a^P0.0359^ea^ catasso pa.tisambhidaa tisso vijjaa cha.labhi~n~naa kevalo ca sama.nadhammo sabbe tassaadheyyaa honti, vimuttipa.n.daravimalasetacchattena abhisi~ncati.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ra~n~no khattiyassa abhijaatakulakuliinassa khattiyaabhisekena abhisittassa paricaranti sara.t.thanegamajaanapadabha.tabalaa {balatthaa (sii0 pii0)} a.t.thatti.msaa ca raajaparisaa na.tanaccakaa mukhama"ngalikaa sotthivaacakaa sama.nabraahma.nasabbapaasa.n.daga.naa abhigacchanti, ya.m ki~nci pathaviyaa pa.t.tanaratanaakaranagarasu"nka.t.thaanaverajjakachejjabhejjajanamanusaasana.m sabbattha saamiko bhavati, evameva kho ^a^V0.0324^ea^, mahaaraaja, yo koci puggalo yutto patto...pe0... vimuttipa.n.daravimalasetacchattena abhisi~ncati.

[03] ``terasimaani ^a^M0.0340^ea^, mahaaraaja, dhuta"ngaani, yehi suddhikato nibbaanamahaasamudda.m pavisitvaa bahuvidha.m dhammakii.lamabhikii.lati, ruupaaruupaa.t.thasamaapattiyo va.la~njeti, iddhividha.m dibbasotadhaatu.m paracittavijaanana.m pubbenivaasaanussati.m dibbacakkhu.m sabbaasavakkhaya~nca paapu.naati. katame terasa? pa.msukuulika"nga.m teciivarika"nga.m pi.n.dapaatika"nga.m sapadaanacaarika"nga.m ekaasanika"nga.m pattapi.n.dika"nga.m khalupacchaabhattika"nga.m aara~n~nika"nga.m rukkhamuulika"nga.m abbhokaasika"nga.m sosaanika"nga.m yathaasanthatika"nga.m nesajjika"nga.m, imehi kho, mahaaraaja, terasahi dhutagu.nehi pubbe aasevitehi nisevitehi ci.n.nehi parici.n.nehi caritehi upacaritehi paripuuritehi kevala.m saama~n~na.m pa.tilabhati, tassaadheyyaa honti kevalaa santaa sukhaa samaapattiyo.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sadhano naaviko pa.t.tane su.t.thu katasu"nko mahaasamudda.m pavisitvaa va"nga.m takkola.m ciina.m soviira.m sura.t.tha.m alasanda.m kolapa.t.tana.m suva.n.nabhuumi.m gacchati a~n~nampi ya.m ki~nci naavaasa~ncara.na.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, imehi terasahi dhutagu.nehi ^a^P0.0360^ea^ pubbe aasevitehi nisevitehi ci.n.nehi parici.n.nehi caritehi upacaritehi paripuuritehi kevala.m saama~n~na.m pa.tilabhati, tassaadheyyaa honti kevalaa santaa sukhaa samaapattiyo.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kassako pa.thama.m khettadosa.m ti.naka.t.thapaasaa.na.m apanetvaa kasitvaa vapitvaa sammaa udaka.m pavesetvaa rakkhitvaa gopetvaa lavanamaddanena bahudha~n~nako hoti, tassaadheyyaa bhavanti ye keci adhanaa kapa.naa daliddaa duggatajanaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, imehi terasahi dhutagu.nehi pubbe aasevitehi...pe0... kevalaa santaa sukhaa samaapattiyo.

[03] ``yathaa vaa pana, mahaaraaja, khattiyo muddhaavasitto abhijaatakuliino chejjabhejjajanamanusaasane issaro hoti vasavattii saamiko icchaakara.no, kevalaa ca mahaapathavii tassaadheyyaa hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, imehi terasahi dhutagu.nehi pubbe aasevitehi nisevitehi ci.n.nehi parici.n.nehi caritehi upacaritehi paripuuritehi jinasaasanavare issaro hoti vasavattii saamiko icchaakara.no, kevalaa ca sama.nagu.naa tassaadheyyaa honti.

[03] ``nanu ^a^M0.0341^ea^, mahaaraaja, thero upaseno va"ngantaputto sallekhadhutagu.ne paripuurakaaritaaya anaadiyitvaa ^a^V0.0325^ea^ saavatthiyaa sa"nghassa katika.m sapariso naradammasaarathi.m pa.tisallaanagata.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavato paade sirasaa vanditvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi, bhagavaa ca ta.m suviniita.m parisa.m oloketvaa ha.t.thatu.t.tho pamudito udaggo parisaaya saddhi.m sallaapa.m sallapitvaa asambhinnena brahmassarena etadavoca `paasaadikaa kho pana tyaaya.m upasena parisaa, kata.m tva.m upasena parisa.m vinesii'ti. sopi sabba~n~nunaa dasabalena devaatidevena pu.t.tho yathaabhuutasabhaavagu.navasena bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``yo koci ma.m, bhante, upasa"nkamitvaa pabbajja.m vaa nissaya.m vaa yaacati, tamaha.m ^a^P0.0361^ea^ eva.m vadaami ``aha.m kho aavuso aara~n~niko pi.n.dapaatiko pa.msukuuliko teciivariko. sace tvampi aara~n~niko bhavissasi pi.n.dapaatiko pa.msukuuliko teciivariko, evaaha.m ta.m pabbaajessaami nissaya.m dassaamii''ti, sace so me, bhante, pa.tissu.nitvaa nandati oramati, evaaha.m ta.m pabbaajemi nissaya.m demi, sace na nandati na oramati, na ta.m pabbaajemi, na nissaya.m demi, evaaha.m, bhante, parisa.m vinemii''ti. eva.m kho {evampi (ka0)}, mahaaraaja, dhutagu.navarasamaadi.n.no jinasaasanavare issaro hoti. vasavattii saamiko icchaakara.no, tassaadheyyaa honti kevalaa santaa sukhaa samaapattiyo.

[03] ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, paduma.m abhivuddhaparisuddhaudiccajaatippabhava.m siniddha.m mudu lobhaniiya.m sugandha.m piya.m patthita.m pasattha.m jalakaddamamanupalitta.m a.nupattakesaraka.n.nikaabhima.n.dita.m bhamaraga.nasevita.m siitalasalilasa.mvaddha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, imehi terasahi dhutagu.nehi pubbe aasevitehi nisevitehi ci.n.nehi parici.n.nehi caritehi upacaritehi paripuuritehi ariyasaavako ti.msagu.navarehi samupeto hoti.

[03] ``katamehi ti.msagu.navarehi? siniddhamudumaddavamettacitto hoti, ghaatitahatavihatakileso hoti, hatanihatamaanadabbo hoti, acalada.lhanivi.t.thanibbematikasaddho hoti, paripu.n.napii.nitapaha.t.thalobhaniiyasantasukhasamaapattilaabhii hoti, siilavarapavaraasamasucigandhaparibhaavito hoti, devamanussaana.m piyo hoti manaapo, khii.naasavaariyavarapuggalapatthito, devamanussaana.m vanditapuujito, budhavibudhapa.n.ditajanaana.m thutathavitathomitapasattho ^a^M0.0342^ea^, idha vaa hura.m vaa lokena anupalitto, appathokavajjepi {appasaavajjepi (ka0)} bhayadassaavii, vipulavarasampattikaamaana.m maggaphalavaratthasaadhano, aayaacitavipulapa.niitapaccayabhaagii, aniketasayano, jhaanajjhositatappavaravihaarii ^a^P0.0362^ea^, vija.titakilesajaalavatthu, bhinnabhaggasa"nku.titasa~nchinnagatiniivara.no, akuppadhammo, abhiniitavaaso, anavajjabhogii ^a^V0.0326^ea^, gativimutto, utti.n.nasabbavicikiccho, vimuttijjhositattho {vimuttijjhaasitatto (sii0 pii0)}, di.t.thadhammo, acalada.lhabhiiruttaa.namupagato, samucchinnaanusayo, sabbaasavakkhaya.m patto, santasukhasamaapattivihaarabahulo, sabbasama.nagu.nasamupeto, imehi ti.msagu.navarehi samupeto hoti.

[03] ``nanu, mahaaraaja, thero saariputto dasasahassilokadhaatuyaa aggapuriso .thapetvaa dasabala.m lokaacariya.m, sopi aparimitamasa"nkhyeyyakappe samaacitakusalamuulo {samaaci.n.nakusalamuulo (ka0)} braahma.nakulakuliino manaapika.m kaamarati.m anekasatasa"nkha.m dhanavara~nca ohaaya jinasaasane pabbajitvaa imehi terasahi dhutagu.nehi kaayavaciicitta.m damayitvaa ajjetarahi anantagu.nasamannaagato gotamassa bhagavato saasanavare dhammacakkamanuppavattako jaato. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena eka"nguttaranikaayavarala~nchake --

[03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekapuggalampi samanupassaami, yo eva.m tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavatteti, yathayida.m bhikkhave, saariputto, saariputto. bhikkhave, tathaagatena anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattita.m sammadeva anuppavattetii'''ti.

[03] ekanayanassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] kassakassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] jambukasi"ngaaliyaa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] ca"ngavaarakassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] dabbiyaa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] i.nasaadhakassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] anuvicinakassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] saarathissa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] bhojakassa ^a^M0.0348^ea^ dve a"ngaani gahetabbaani.
[03] tunnavaayassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] naavikassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] bhamarassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaaniiti.
[06] maatikaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0332^ea^ naagasena, `gadrabhassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, gadrabho naama sa"nkaarakuu.tepi catukkepi si"nghaa.takepi gaamadvaarepi thusaraasimhipi yattha katthaci sayati, na sayanabahulo hoti, evameva ^a^P0.0366^ea^ kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ti.nasanthaarepi pa.n.nasanthaarepi ka.t.thama~ncakepi chamaayapi yattha katthaci cammakha.n.da.m pattharitvaa yattha katthaci sayitabba.m, na sayanabahulena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, gadrabhassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena `kali"ngaruupadhaanaa, bhikkhave, etarahi mama saavakaa viharanti appamattaa aataapino padhaanasmi'nti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaapi --
[21] ```palla"nkena nisinnassa, ja.n.nukenaabhivassati.
[22] ala.m phaasuvihaaraaya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno'''ti..
[06] gadrabha"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `kukku.tassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kukku.to ^a^M0.0349^ea^ kaalena samayena pa.tisalliiyati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kaalena samayeneva cetiya"nga.na.m sammajjitvaa paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thapetvaa sariira.m pa.tijaggitvaa nahaayitvaa cetiya.m vanditvaa vu.d.dhaana.m bhikkhuuna.m dassanaaya gantvaa kaalena samayena su~n~naagaara.m pavisitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.tassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0333^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.to kaalena samayeneva vu.t.thaati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kaalena samayeneva vu.t.thahitvaa cetiya"nga.na.m sammajjitvaa paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thapetvaa sariira.m pa.tijaggitvaa cetiya.m vanditvaa punadeva su~n~naagaara.m pavisitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.tassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
