[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.to pathavi.m kha.nitvaa kha.nitvaa ajjhohaara.m ajjhoharati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena paccavekkhitvaa paccavekkhitvaa ajjhohaara.m ajjhoharitabba.m `neva davaaya na madaaya ^a^P0.0367^ea^ na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.tassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```kantaare puttama.msa.mva, akkhassabbha~njana.m yathaa.
[22] eva.m aahari aahaara.m, yaapanatthamamucchito'ti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.to sacakkhukopi ratti.m andho hoti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena anandheneva andhena viya bhavitabba.m, ara~n~nepi gocaragaame pi.n.daaya carantenapi rajaniiyesu ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbadhammesu andhena badhirena muugena viya bhavitabba.m, na nimitta.m gahetabba.m, naanubya~njana.m gahetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.tassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena mahaakaccaayanena --
[21] `cakkhumaassa yathaa andho, sotavaa badhiro yathaa.
[27] pa~n~navaassa {jivhaavassa (sii0 pii0)} yathaa muugo, balavaa dubbaloriva.
[22] attaatthe {atha atthe (sii0 pii0)} samuppanne, sayetha matasaayika'nti..

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0350^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.to le.d.duda.n.dalagu.lamuggarehi paripaatiyantopi saka.m geha.m na vijahati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ciivarakamma.m karontenapi navakamma.m karontenapi vattappa.tivatta.m karontenapi uddisantenapi uddisaapentenapi yoniso manasikaaro na vijahitabbo, saka.m kho paneta.m, mahaaraaja, yogino geha.m, yadida.m yoniso manasikaaro ^a^V0.0334^ea^. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kukku.tassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m ^a^P0.0368^ea^. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena `ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo? yadida.m cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa'ti. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaapi --
[21] ```yathaa sudanto maata"ngo, saka.m so.n.da.m na maddati.
[22] bhakkhaabhakkha.m vijaanaati, attano vuttikappana.m..
[21] ```tatheva buddhaputtena, appamattena vaa pana.
[22] jinavacana.m na madditabba.m, manasikaaravaruttama'''nti..
[06] kukku.ta"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `kalandakassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kalandako pa.tisattumhi opatante na"ngu.t.tha.m pappho.tetvaa mahanta.m katvaa teneva na"ngu.t.thalagu.lena pa.tisattu.m pa.tibaahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kilesasattumhi opatante satipa.t.thaanalagu.la.m pappho.tetvaa mahanta.m katvaa teneva satipa.t.thaanalagu.lena sabbakilesaa pa.tibaahitabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kalandakassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena cuu.lapanthakena --
[21] `yadaa kilesaa opatanti, saama~n~nagu.nadha.msanaa.
[22] satipa.t.thaanalagu.lena, hantabbaa te punappuna'''nti..
[06] kalandaka"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0335^ea^ ^a^M0.0351^ea^ naagasena, `diipiniyaa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, diipinii saki.m yeva gabbha.m ga.nhaati, na punappuna.m purisa.m upeti? evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aayati.m pa.tisandhi.m uppatti.m gabbhaseyya.m cuti.m bheda.m khaya.m vinaasa.m sa.msaarabhaya.m duggati.m visama.m sampii.lita.m disvaa `punabbhave ^a^P0.0369^ea^ nappa.tisandahissaamii'ti yoniso manasikaaro kara.niiyo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, diipiniyaa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena suttanipaate dhaniyagopaalakasutte --
[21] ```usabhoriva chetva bandhanaani, naago puutilata.mva daalayitvaa.
[22] naaha.m punupessa.m gabbhaseyya.m, atha ce patthayasii pavassa devaa'''ti..
[06] diipiniya"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `diipikassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, diipiko ara~n~ne ti.nagahana.m vaa vanagahana.m vaa pabbatagahana.m vaa nissaaya niliiyitvaa mige ga.nhaati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena viveka.m sevitabba.m ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m vijanavaata.m manussaraahaseyyaka.m pa.tisallaanasaaruppa.m; viveka.m sevamaano hi, mahaaraaja, yogii yogaavacaro nacirasseva cha.labhi~n~naasu ca vasibhaava.m paapu.naati. ida.m, mahaaraaja, diipikassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therehi dhammasa"ngaahakehi --
[21] ```yathaapi ^a^V0.0336^ea^ ^a^M0.0352^ea^ diipiko naama, niliiyitvaa ga.nhate {ga.nhatii (sii0 pii0)} mige.
[27] tathevaaya.m buddhaputto, yuttayogo vipassako.
[22] ara~n~na.m pavisitvaana, ga.nhaati phalamuttama'nti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, diipiko ya.m ki~nci pasu.m vadhitvaa vaamena passena patita.m na bhakkheti. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ve.ludaanena vaa pattadaanena vaa pupphadaanena vaa phaladaanena vaa sinaanadaanena vaa mattikaadaanena vaa cu.n.nadaanena vaa dantaka.t.thadaanena ^a^P0.0370^ea^ vaa mukhodakadaanena vaa caatukamyataaya vaa muggasupyataaya {muggasuppataaya (sii0 pii0)} vaa paaribha.ta {paaribha.t.tataaya (sii0 pii0)} yataaya vaa ja"nghapesaniiyena vaa vejjakammena vaa duutakammena vaa pahi.nagamanena vaa pi.n.dapa.tipi.n.dena vaa daanaanuppadaanena vaa vatthuvijjaaya vaa nakkhattavijjaaya vaa a"ngavijjaaya {nagavijjaaya (ka0)} vaa a~n~natara~n~natarena vaa buddhappa.tiku.t.thena micchaajiivena nipphaadita.m bhojana.m na bhu~njitabba.m {paribhu~njitabba.m (sii0 pii0)} vaamena passena patita.m pasu.m viya diipiko. ida.m, mahaaraaja, diipikassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```vaciivi~n~nattivipphaaraa, uppanna.m madhupaayasa.m.
[22] sace bhutto bhaveyyaaha.m, saajiivo garahito mama..
[21] ```yadipi me antagu.na.m, nikkhamitvaa bahii care.
[22] neva bhindeyyamaajiiva.m, cajamaanopi jiivita'''nti..
[06] diipika"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `kummassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kummo udakacaro udakeyeva vaasa.m kappeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbapaa.nabhuutapuggalaana.m hitaanukampinaa mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena sabbaavanta.m loka.m pharitvaa viharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kummassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[01] ``puna ^a^V0.0337^ea^ ^a^M0.0353^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, kummo udake uppilavanto siisa.m ukkhipitvaa yadi koci passati, tattheva nimujjati gaa.lhamogaahati `maa ma.m te puna passeyyu'nti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kilesesu opatantesu aaramma.nasare nimujjitabba.m gaa.lhamogaahitabba.m `maa ma.m kilesaa puna passeyyu'nti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kummassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m ^a^P0.0371^ea^, mahaaraaja, kummo udakato nikkhamitvaa kaaya.m otaapeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena nisajja.t.thaanasayanaca"nkamato maanasa.m niiharitvaa sammappadhaane maanasa.m otaapetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kummassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, kummo pathavi.m kha.nitvaa vivitte vaasa.m kappeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena laabhasakkaarasiloka.m pajahitvaa su~n~na.m vivitta.m kaanana.m vanapattha.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m appasadda.m appanigghosa.m pavivittamogaahitvaa vivitte yeva vaasa.m upagantabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kummassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upasenena va"ngantaputtena --
[21] ```vivitta.m appanigghosa.m, vaa.lamiganisevita.m.
[22] seve senaasana.m bhikkhu, pa.tisallaanakaara.naa'ti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, kummo caarika.m caramaano yadi ka~nci passati vaa, sadda.m su.naati vaa, so.n.dipa~ncamaani a"ngaani sake kapaale nidahitvaa appossukko tu.nhiibhuuto ti.t.thati kaayamanurakkhanto, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbattha ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbadhammesu aapatantesu chasu dvaaresu sa.mvarakavaa.ta.m anugghaa.tetvaa maanasa.m samodahitvaa sa.mvara.m katvaa satena sampajaanena vihaatabba.m sama.nadhamma.m anurakkhamaanena. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kummassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare kummuupamasuttante --
[21] ```kummova ^a^M0.0354^ea^ a"ngaani sake kapaale, samodaha.m bhikkhu manovitakke.
[22] anissito ^a^P0.0372^ea^ a~n~namahe.thayaano, parinibbutonuupavadeyya ka~ncii'''ti..
[06] kumma"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0338^ea^ naagasena, `va.msassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, va.mso yattha vaato, tattha anulometi, naa~n~natthamanudhaavati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ya.m buddhena bhagavataa bhaasita.m nava"nga.m satthu saasana.m, ta.m anulomayitvaa kappiye anavajje .thatvaa sama.nadhamma.m yeva pariyesitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, va.msassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m mahaaraaja therena raahulena --
[21] ```nava"nga.m buddhavacana.m, anulometvaana sabbadaa.
[22] kappiye anavajjasmi.m, .thatvaapaaya.m samuttari'''nti..
[06] va.msa"ngapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `caapassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, caapo sutacchito namito {mito (sii0 pii0 ka0)} yaavaggamuula.m samakameva anunamati nappa.titthambhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena theranavamajjhimasamakesu anunamitabba.m nappa.tipharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, caapassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena vidhura [pu.n.naka] jaatake --
[21] ```caapovuunudaro ^a^M0.0355^ea^ dhiiro, va.mso vaapi pakampaye {caapo vaa nuna me dhiiro, va.msova anulomaya.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}.
[22] pa.tiloma.m na vatteyya, sa raajavasati.m vase'''ti..
[06] caapa"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0339^ea^ naagasena, `vaayasassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vaayaso aasa"nkitaparisa"nkito yattappayatto ^a^P0.0373^ea^ carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aasa"nkitaparisa"nkitena yattapayattena upa.t.thitaaya satiyaa sa.mvutehi indriyehi caritabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayasassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vaayaso ya.m ki~nci bhojana.m disvaa ~naatiihi sa.mvibhajitvaa bhu~njati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi, tathaaruupehi laabhehi pa.tivibhattabhoginaa bhavitabba.m siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayasassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```sace me upanaamenti, yathaaladdha.m tapassino.
[22] sabbe sa.mvibhajitvaana, tato bhu~njaami bhojana'''nti..
[06] vaayasa"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `makka.tassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, makka.to vaasamupagacchanto tathaaruupe okaase mahatimahaarukkhe pavivitte sabba.t.thakasaakhe {sabbatthakasaakhe (syaa0), sabba.t.thasaakhe (ka0)} bhiiruttaa.ne vaasamupagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0356^ea^, yoginaa yogaavacarena lajji.m pesala.m siilavanta.m kalyaa.nadhamma.m bahussuta.m dhammadhara.m vinayadhara.m piya.m garubhaavaniiya.m vattaara.m vacanakkhama.m ovaadaka.m vi~n~naapaka.m sandassaka.m samaadapaka.m samuttejaka.m sampaha.msaka.m evaruupa.m kalyaa.namitta.m aacariya.m nissaaya viharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, makka.tassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0340^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, makka.to rukkhe yeva carati ti.t.thati nisiidati, yadi nidda.m okkamati, tattheva ratti.m vaasamanubhavati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pavanaabhimukhena bhavitabba.m, pavane yeva .thaanaca"nkamanisajjaasayana.m ^a^P0.0374^ea^ nidda.m okkamitabba.m, tattheva satipa.t.thaanamanubhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, makka.tassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```ca"nkamantopi ti.t.thanto, nisajjaasayanena vaa.
[22] pavane sobhate bhikkhu, pavananta.mva va.n.nita'''nti..
[06] makka.ta"ngapa~nho dasamo.
[06] gadrabhavaggo pa.thamo.
[03] tassuddaana.m --
[21] gadrabho ceva {ghorassaro ca (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kukku.to, kalando diipini diipiko.
[22] kummo va.mso ca caapo ca, vaayaso atha makka.toti..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0341^ea^ ^a^M0.0357^ea^ naagasena, `laabulataaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, laabulataa ti.ne vaa ka.t.the vaa lataaya vaa so.n.dikaahi aalambitvaa tassuupari va.d.dhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena arahatte abhiva.d.dhitukaamena manasaa aaramma.na.m aalambitvaa arahatte abhiva.d.dhitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, laabulataaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```yathaa laabulataa naama, ti.ne ka.t.the lataaya vaa.
[22] aalambitvaa so.n.dikaahi, tato va.d.dhati uppari..
[21] ```tatheva buddhaputtena, arahattaphalakaaminaa.
[22] aaramma.na.m aalambitvaa, va.d.dhitabba.m asekkhaphale'''ti..
[06] laabulata"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `padumassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti ^a^P0.0375^ea^? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, paduma.m udake jaata.m udake sa.mvaddha.m anupalitta.m udakena, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kule ga.ne laabhe yase ^a^V0.0342^ea^ sakkaare sammaananaaya paribhogapaccayesu ca sabbattha anupalittena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, padumassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, paduma.m udakaa accuggamma .thaati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbaloka.m abhibhavitvaa accuggamma lokuttaradhamme .thaatabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, padumassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0358^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, paduma.m appamattakenapi anilena erita.m calati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena appamattakesupi kilesesu sa.myamo kara.niiyo, bhayadassaavinaa viharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, padumassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena `a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesuu'ti.
[06] paduma"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `biijassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, biija.m appakampi samaana.m bhaddake khette vutta.m deve sammaa dhaara.m pavecchante subahuuni phalaani anudassati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yathaa pa.tipaadita.m siila.m kevala.m saama~n~naphalamanudassati. eva.m sammaa pa.tipajjitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, biijassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, biija.m suparisodhite khette ropita.m khippameva sa.mviruuhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena maanasa.m supariggahita.m su~n~naagaare parisodhita.m satipa.t.thaanakhettavare khitta.m khippameva viruuhati. ida.m, mahaaraaja, biijassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m ^a^P0.0376^ea^. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena anuruddhena --
[21] ```yathaapi ^a^V0.0343^ea^ khette {yathaa khette (sii0)} parisuddhe, biija~ncassa pati.t.thita.m.
[22] vipula.m tassa phala.m hoti, api toseti kassaka.m..
[21] ```tatheva yogino citta.m, su~n~naagaare visodhita.m.
[22] satipa.t.thaanakhettamhi, khippameva viruuhatii'''ti..
[06] biija"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0359^ea^ naagasena, `saalakalyaa.nikaaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, saalakalyaa.nikaa naama antopathaviya.m yeva abhiva.d.dhati hatthasatampi bhiyyopi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena cattaari saama~n~naphalaani catasso pa.tisambhidaa cha.labhi~n~naayo kevala~nca sama.nadhamma.m su~n~naagaare yeva paripuurayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, saalakalyaa.nikaaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena raahulena --
[21] ```saalakalyaa.nikaa naama, paadapo dhara.niiruho.
[22] antopathaviya.m yeva, satahatthopi va.d.dhati..
[21] ```yathaa kaalamhi sampatte, paripaakena so dumo.
[22] ugga~nchitvaana ekaaha.m, satahatthopi va.d.dhati..
[21] ```evamevaaha.m mahaaviira, saalakalyaa.nikaa viya.
[22] abbhantare su~n~naagaare, dhammato abhiva.d.dhayi'''nti..
[06] saalakalyaa.nika"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0344^ea^ naagasena, `naavaaya tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, naavaa bahuvidhadaarusa"nghaa.tasamavaayena bahumpi jana.m taarayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aacaarasiilagu.navattappa.tivattabahuvidhadhammasa"nghaa.tasamavaayena sadevako loko taarayitabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, naavaaya pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, naavaa bahuvidhauumitthanitavegavisa.tamaava.t.tavega.m ^a^P0.0377^ea^ sahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena bahuvidhakilesauumivega.m laabhasakkaarayasasilokapuujanavandanaa parakulesu nindaapasa.msaasukhadukkhasammaananavimaananabahuvidhadosauumivega~nca sahitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, naavaaya dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0360^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, naavaa aparimitamanantamapaaramakkhobhitagambhiire mahatimahaaghose timitimi"ngalamakaramacchaga.naakule mahatimahaasamudde carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena tipariva.t.ta dvaadasaakaara catusaccaabhisamayappa.tivedhe maanasa.m sa~ncaarayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, naavaaya tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare saccasa.myutte --

[03] ```vitakkentaa ca kho tumhe, bhikkhave, ``ida.m dukkha''nti vitakkeyyaatha, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti vitakkeyyaatha, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti vitakkeyyaatha, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti vitakkeyyaathaa'''ti.
[06] naava"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `naavaalagganakassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani ^a^V0.0345^ea^ taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, naavaalagganaka.m bahuuumijaalaakulavikkhobhitasalilatale mahatimahaasamudde naava.m laggeti .thapeti, na deti disaavidisa.m haritu.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena raagadosamohuumijaale mahatimahaavitakkasampahaare citta.m laggetabba.m, na daatabba.m disaavidisa.m haritu.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, naavaalagganakassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, naavaalagganaka.m na plavati {na pilavati (sii0 pii0)} visiidati, hatthasatepi udake naava.m laggeti .thaanamupaneti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena laabhayasasakkaaramaananavandanapuujanaapacitiisu laabhaggayasaggepi ^a^P0.0378^ea^ na plavitabba.m, sariirayaapanamattake yeva citta.m .thapetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, naavaalagganakassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```yathaa ^a^M0.0361^ea^ samudde lagganaka.m, na plavati visiidati.
[22] tatheva laabhasakkaare, maa plavatha visiidathaa'''ti..
[06] naavaalagganaka"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `kuupassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kuupo rajju~nca varatta~nca la"nkaara~nca dhaareti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena satisampaja~n~nasamannaagatena bhavitabba.m, abhikkante pa.tikkante aalokite vilokite sami~njite pasaarite sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne asite piite khaayite saayite uccaarapassaavakamme gate .thite nisinne sutte jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kuupassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena `sato, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sampajaano, aya.m vo amhaaka.m anusaasanii'''ti.
[06] kuupa"ngapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0346^ea^ naagasena, `niyaamakassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, niyaamako rattindiva.m satata.m samita.m appamatto yattappayatto naava.m saareti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena citta.m niyaamayamaanena rattindiva.m satata.m samita.m appamattena yattappayattena yoniso manasikaarena citta.m niyaametabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, niyaamakassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena dhammapade --
[21] ```appamaadarataa ^a^P0.0379^ea^ hotha, sacittamanurakkhatha.
[22] duggaa uddharathattaana.m, pa"nke sannova {sattova (sii0 pii0)} ku~njaro'ti..

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0362^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, niyaamakassa ya.m ki~nci mahaasamudde kalyaa.na.m vaa paapaka.m vaa, sabba.m ta.m vidita.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kusalaakusala.m saavajjaanavajja.m hiinappa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m vijaanitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, niyaamakassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, niyaamako yante muddika.m deti `maa koci yanta.m aamasitthaa'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena citte sa.mvaramuddikaa daatabbaa `maa ki~nci paapaka.m akusalavitakka.m vitakkesii'ti, ida.m, mahaaraaja, niyaamakassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare `maa, bhikkhave, paapake akusale vitakke vitakkeyyaatha, seyyathiida.m, kaamavitakka.m byaapaadavitakka.m vihi.msaavitakka'''nti.
[06] niyaamaka"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0347^ea^ naagasena, `kammakaarassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kammakaaro eva.m cintayati `bhatako aha.m imaaya naavaaya kamma.m karomi, imaayaaha.m naavaaya vaahasaa bhattavetana.m labhaami, na me pamaado kara.niiyo, appamaadena me aya.m naavaa vaahetabbaa'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena eva.m cintayitabba.m `ima.m kho aha.m caatumahaabhuutika.m kaaya.m sammasanto satata.m samita.m appamatto upa.t.thitassati sato sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto jaatijaraabyaadhimara.nasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupaayaasehi parimuccissaamiiti appamaado me kara.niiyo'ti, ida.m, mahaaraaja, kammakaarassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```kaaya.m ^a^P0.0380^ea^ ima.m sammasatha, parijaanaatha punappuna.m.
[22] kaaye sabhaava.m disvaana, dukkhassanta.m karissathaa'ti..
[06] kammakaara"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0363^ea^ naagasena, `samuddassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo matena ku.napena saddhi.m na sa.mvasati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thimakkhapa.laasaissaamacchariyamaayaasaa.theyyaku.tilavisamaduccaritakilesamalehi saddhi.m na sa.mvasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, samuddassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo muttaama.nive.luriyasa"nkhasilaapavaa.laphalikama.nivividharatananicaya.m dhaarento pidahati, na bahi vikirati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena maggaphalajhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattivipassanaabhi~n~naavividhagu.naratanaani adhigantvaa ^a^V0.0348^ea^ pidahitabbaani, na bahi niiharitabbaani. ida.m, mahaaraaja, samuddassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo mahantehi mahaabhuutehi saddhi.m sa.mvasati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena appiccha.m santu.t.tha.m dhutavaada.m sallekhavutti.m aacaarasampanna.m lajji.m pesala.m garu.m bhaavaniiya.m vattaara.m vacanakkhama.m codaka.m paapagarahi.m ovaadaka.m anusaasaka.m vi~n~naapaka.m sandassaka.m samaadapaka.m samuttejaka.m sampaha.msaka.m kalyaa.namitta.m sabrahmacaari.m nissaaya vasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo navasalilasampu.n.naahi ga"ngaayamunaaaciravatiisarabhuumahiiaadiihi nadiisatasahassehi antalikkhe saliladhaaraahi ca puuritopi saka.m vela.m naativattati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena laabhasakkaarasilokavandanamaananapuujanakaara.naa jiivitahetupi sa~ncicca sikkhaapadaviitikkamo na kara.niiyo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa ^a^P0.0381^ea^ catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --

[03] `seyyathaapi, mahaaraaja {pahaaraadha (sii0 pii0)}, mahaasamuddo .thitadhammo vela.m naatikkamati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, ya.m mahaa saavakaana.m sikkhaapada.m pa~n~natta.m, ta.m mama saavakaa jiivitahetupi naatikkamantii'ti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0364^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddo sabbasavantiihi ga"ngaayamunaaaciravatiisarabhuumahiihi antalikkhe udakadhaaraahipi na paripuurati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena uddesaparipucchaasavanadhaara.navinicchayaabhidhammavinayagaa.lhasuttantaviggahapadanikkhepapadasandhi padavibhattinava"ngajinasaasanavara.m su.nantenaapi na tappitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, mahaasamuddassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sutasomajaatake --
[21] ```aggi yathaa ti.naka.t.tha.m dahanto, na tappati saagaro vaa nadiihi.
[22] evampi ce {evampi ve (syaa0), eva.m hi me (ka0) jaa0 1 asiitinipaate} pa.n.ditaa raajase.t.tha, sutvaa na tappanti subhaasitenaa'''ti..
[06] samudda"ngapa~nho dasamo.samuddavaggo dutiyo.
[03] tassuddaana.m ^a^V0.0349^ea^ --
[21] laabulataa ca paduma.m, biija.m saalakalyaa.nikaa.
[21] naavaa ca naavaalaggana.m, kuupo niyaamako tathaa.
[22] kammakaaro samuddo ca, vaggo tena pavuccatiiti..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0350^ea^ ^a^P0.0382^ea^ ^a^M0.0365^ea^ naagasena, `pathaviyaa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pathavii i.t.thaani.t.thaani kappuuraagarutagaracandanaku"nkumaadiini aakirantepi pittasemhapubbaruhirasedamedakhe.lasi"nghaa.nikalasika- muttakariisaadiini aakirantepi taadisaa yeva, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena i.t.thaani.t.the laabhaalaabhe yasaayase nindaapasa.msaaya sukhadukkhe sabbattha taadinaa yeva bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pathavii ma.n.danavibhuusanaapagataa sakagandhaparibhaavitaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena vibhuusanaapagatena sakasiilagandhaparibhaavitena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pathavii nirantaraa akha.n.dacchiddaa asusiraa bahalaa ghanaa vitthi.n.naa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena nirantaramakha.n.dacchiddamasusirabahalaghanavitthi.n.nasiilena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pathavii gaamanigamanagarajanapadarukkhapabbatanadiita.laakapokkhara.niimigapakkhimanujanaranaariga.na.m dhaarentiipi akilaasu hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ovadantenapi anusaasantenapi vi~n~naapentenapi sandassentenapi samaadapentenapi samuttejentenapi sampaha.msentenapi dhammadesanaasu akilaasunaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0351^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, pathavii anunayappa.tighavippamuttaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena anunayappa.tighavippamuttena pathavisamena cetasaa viharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pathaviyaa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m ^a^P0.0383^ea^, mahaaraaja, upaasikaaya cuu.lasubhaddaaya sakasama.ne parikittayamaanaaya --
[21] ```eka~nce ^a^M0.0366^ea^ baaha.m vaasiyaa, tacche kupitamaanasaa {kupitamaanaso (ka0)}.
[22] eka~ncebaaha.m gandhena, aalimpeyya pamoditaa {pamodito (ka0)}..
[21] ```amusmi.m pa.tigho natthi, raago asmi.m na vijjati.
[22] pathaviisamacittaa te, taadisaa sama.naa mamaa'''ti..
[06] pathaviia"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `aapassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, aapo susa.n.thitamakampitamalu.litasabhaavaparisuddho, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kuhanalapananemittakanippesikata.m apanetvaa susa.n.thitamakampitamalu.litasabhaavaparisuddhaacaarena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aapassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aapo siitalasabhaavasa.n.thito, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbasattesu khantimettaanuddayasampannena hitesinaa anukampakena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aapassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aapo asuci.m suci.m karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena gaame vaa ara~n~ne vaa upajjhaaye upajjhaayamattesu aacariye aacariyamattesu sabbattha anadhikara.nena bhavitabba.m anavasesakaarinaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aapassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0352^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, aapo bahujanapatthito, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena appicchasantu.t.thapavivittapa.tisallaanena satata.m sabbalokamabhipatthitena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aapassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0367^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, aapo na kassaci ahitamupadahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena parabha.n.danakalahaviggahavivaadarittajjhaanaaratijanana.m kaayavaciicittehi ^a^P0.0384^ea^ paapaka.m na kara.niiya.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aapassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m mahaaraaja, bhagavataa, devaatidevena ka.nhajaatake --
[21] ```vara~nce me ado sakka, sabbabhuutaanamissara.
[27] na mano vaa sariira.m vaa, ma.m-kate sakka kassaci.
[22] kadaaci upaha~n~netha, eta.m sakka vara.m vare'''ti..
[06] aapa"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `tejassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, tejo ti.naka.t.thasaakhaapalaasa.m .dahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ye te abbhantaraa vaa baahiraa vaa kilesaa i.t.thaani.t.thaaramma.naanubhavanaa, sabbe te ~naa.nagginaa .dahitabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tejassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tejo niddayo akaaru.niko, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbakilesesu kaaru~n~naanuddayaa na kaatabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tejassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tejo siita.m pa.tihanati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^V0.0353^ea^ viiriyasantaapateja.m abhijanetvaa kilesaa pa.tihantabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tejassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tejo anunayappa.tighavippamutto u.nhamabhijaneti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena anunayappa.tighavippamuttena tejosamena cetasaa viharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tejassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0368^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, tejo andhakaara.m vidhamitvaa {vidhamati (sii0 pii0 ka0)} aaloka.m dassayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena avijjandhakaara.m vidhamitvaa ~naa.naaloka.m dassayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tejassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena saka.m putta.m raahula.m ovadantena ^a^P0.0385^ea^ --
[03] `tejosama.m {ma0 ni0 2.119}, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavehi, tejosama.m hi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa? manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m na pariyaadaaya .thassantii'''ti.
[06] teja"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `vaayussa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vaayu supupphitavanasa.n.dantara.m abhivaayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena vimuttivarakusumapupphitaaramma.navanantare ramitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayussa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vaayu dhara.niiruhapaadapaga.ne mathayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena vanantaragatena sa"nkhaare vicinantena kilesaa mathayitabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayussa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vaayu aakaase carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^V0.0354^ea^ lokuttaradhammesu maanasa.m sa~ncaarayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayussa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vaayu gandha.m anubhavati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena attano siilavarasurabhigandho {siilasurabhigando (sii0 pii0)} anubhavitabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayussa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vaayu niraalayo aniketavaasii, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena niraalayamaniketamasanthavena sabbattha ^a^M0.0369^ea^ vimuttena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaayussa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena suttanipaate --
[21] ```santhavaato bhaya.m jaata.m, niketaa jaayate rajo.
[22] aniketamasanthava.m, eta.m ve munidassana'''nti..
[06] vaayu"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `pabbatassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti ^a^P0.0386^ea^? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pabbato acalo akampito {akampiyo (sii0 pii0)} asampavedhii, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sammaanane vimaanane sakkaare asakkaare garukaare agarukaare yase ayase nindaaya pasa.msaaya sukhe dukkhe i.t.thaani.t.thesu sabbattha ruupasaddagandharasapho.t.thabbadhammesu rajaniiyesu na rajjitabba.m, dussaniiyesu na dussitabba.m, muyhaniiyesu na muyhitabba.m, na kampitabba.m na calitabba.m, pabbatena viya acalena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pabbatassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```selo ^a^V0.0355^ea^ yathaa ekaghano {ekagghano (ka0) dha0 pa0 81 dhammapade}, vaatena na samiirati.
[22] eva.m nindaapasa.msaasu, na sami~njanti pa.n.ditaa'ti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pabbato thaddho na kenaci sa.msa.t.tho, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena thaddhena asa.msa.t.thena bhavitabba.m, na kenaci sa.msaggo kara.niiyo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pabbatassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```asa.msa.t.tha.m gaha.t.thehi, anaagaarehi cuubhaya.m.
[22] anokasaarimappiccha.m, tamaha.m bruumi braahma.na'nti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pabbate biija.m na viruuhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sakamaanase kilesaa na viruuhaapetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pabbatassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena subhuutinaa --
[21] ```raaguupasa.mhita.m ^a^M0.0370^ea^ citta.m, yadaa uppajjate mama.
[22] saya.mva paccavekkhaami {paccavekkhitvaa (sabbattha)}, ekaggo {ekako (sabbattha)} ta.m damemaha.m..
[21] ```rajjase {rajjasi (sii0), ra~njasi (pii0)} rajaniiye ca, dussaniiye ca dussase.
[22] muyhase {muyhasi (sii0)} mohaniiye ca, nikkhamassu vanaa tuva.m..
[21] ```visuddhaana.m ^a^P0.0387^ea^ aya.m vaaso, nimmalaana.m tapassina.m.
[22] maa kho visuddha.m duusesi, nikkhamassu vanaa tuva'nti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pabbato accuggato, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ~naa.naccuggatena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pabbatassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```pamaada.m appamaadena, yadaa nudati pa.n.dito.
[27] pa~n~naapaasaadamaaruyha, asoko sokini.m paja.m.
[22] pabbata.t.thova bhuuma.t.the {bhumma.t.the (sii0 pii0)}, dhiiro baale avekkhatii'ti..

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0356^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, pabbato anunnato anonato, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena unnataavanati na kara.niiyaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pabbatassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, upaasikaaya cuu.lasubhaddaaya sakasama.ne parikittayamaanaaya --
[21] ```laabhena unnato loko, alaabhena ca onato.
[22] laabhaalaabhena ekatthaa {eka.t.thaa (sii0 pii0)}, taadisaa sama.naa mamaa'''ti..
[06] pabbata"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `aakaasassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, aakaaso sabbaso agayho, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^M0.0371^ea^ sabbaso kilesehi agayhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aakaaso isitaapasabhuutadijaga.naanusa~ncarito, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena `anicca.m dukkha.m anattaa'ti sa"nkhaaresu maanasa.m sa~ncaarayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aakaaso santaasaniiyo, evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0388^ea^, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbabhavapa.tisandhiisu maanasa.m ubbejayitabba.m, assaado na kaatabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aakaaso ananto appamaa.no aparimeyyo, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena anantasiilena aparimita~naa.nena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, aakaaso alaggo asatto appati.t.thito apalibuddho, evameva kho ^a^V0.0357^ea^, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kule ga.ne laabhe aavaase palibodhe paccaye sabbakilesesu ca sabbattha alaggena bhavitabba.m, anaasattena appati.t.thitena apalibuddhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, aakaasassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena saka.m putta.m raahula.m ovadantena -- `seyyathaapi, raahula {ma0 ni0 2.119}, aakaaso na katthaci pati.t.thito, evameva kho tva.m, raahula, aakaasasama.m bhaavana.m bhaavehi, aakaasasama.m hi te, raahula, bhaavana.m bhaavayato uppannaa manaapaamanaapaa phassaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassantii'''ti.
[06] aakaasa"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `candassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, cando sukkapakkhe ^a^M0.0372^ea^ udayanto uttaruttari.m va.d.dhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aacaarasiilagu.navattappa.tipattiyaa aagamaadhigame pa.tisallaane satipa.t.thaane indriyesu guttadvaarataaya bhojane matta~n~nutaaya jaagariyaanuyoge uttaruttari.m va.d.dhitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, candassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cando u.laaraadhipati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena u.laarena chandaadhipatinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, candassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cando nisaaya carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pavivittena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, candassa tatiya.m ^a^P0.0389^ea^ a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cando vimaanaketu, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena siilaketunaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, candassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cando aayaacitapatthito udeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa ^a^V0.0358^ea^ yogaavacarena aayaacitapatthitena kulaani upasa"nkamitabbaani. ida.m, mahaaraaja, candassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare `canduupamaa, bhikkhave, kulaani upasa"nkamatha, apakasseva kaaya.m apakassa citta.m niccanavakaa kulesu appagabbhaa'''ti {appagabbaati (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 2.146}.
[06] canda"ngapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `suuriyassa {suriyassa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} satta a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani satta a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, suuriyo sabba.m udaka.m parisoseti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbakilesaa anavasesa.m parisosetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0373^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo tamandhakaara.m vidhamati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabba.m raagatama.m dosatama.m mohatama.m maanatama.m di.t.thitama.m kilesatama.m sabba.m duccaritatama.m vidhamayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo abhikkha.na.m carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena abhikkha.na.m yoniso manasikaaro kaatabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo ra.msimaalii, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aaramma.namaalinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo mahaajanakaaya.m santaapento carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aacaarasiilagu.navattappa.tipattiyaa ^a^P0.0390^ea^ jhaanavimokkhasamaadhisamaapattiindriyabalabojjha"ngasatipa.t.thaanasammappadhaanaiddhipaadehi sadevako loko santaapayitabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0359^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo raahubhayaa bhiito carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena duccaritaduggativisamakantaaravipaakavinipaatakilesajaalaja.tite di.t.thisa"nghaa.tapa.timukke kupathapakkhande kummaggapa.tipanne {kumaggapa.tipanne (syaa0 ka0)} satte disvaa mahataa sa.mvegabhayena maanasa.m sa.mvejetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa cha.t.tha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyo kalyaa.napaapake dasseti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena indriyabalabojjha"ngasatipa.t.thaanasammappadhaanaiddhipaadalokiyalokuttaradhammaa dassetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, suuriyassa sattama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena va"ngiisena --
[21] ```yathaapi suuriyo udayanto, ruupa.m dasseti paa.nina.m.
[22] suci~nca asuci~ncaapi, kalyaa.na~ncaapi paapaka.m..
[21] ```tathaa ^a^M0.0374^ea^ bhikkhu dhammadharo, avijjaapihita.m jana.m.
[22] patha.m dasseti vividha.m, aadiccovudaya.m yathaa'''ti..
[06] suuriya"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `sakkassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sakko ekantasukhasamappito, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ekantapavivekasukhaabhiratena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, sakkassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, sakko deve disvaa pagga.nhaati, haasamabhijaneti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kusalesu dhammesu aliinamatandita.m santa.m maanasa.m paggahetabba.m, haasamabhijanetabba.m, u.t.thahitabba.m gha.titabba.m vaayamitabba.m ^a^P0.0391^ea^. ida.m, mahaaraaja, sakkassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0360^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, sakkassa anabhirati nuppajjati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena su~n~naagaare anabhirati na uppaadetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, sakkassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena subhuutinaa --
[21] ```saasane te mahaaviira, yato pabbajito aha.m.
[22] naabhijaanaami uppanna.m, maanasa.m kaamasa.mhita'''nti..
[06] sakka"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `cakkavattissa cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja ^a^M0.0375^ea^, cakkavattii catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi jana.m sa"nga.nhaati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena catassanna.m parisaana.m maanasa.m sa"ngahetabba.m anuggahetabba.m sampaha.msetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa vijite coraa na u.t.thahanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kaamaraagabyaapaadavihi.msaavitakkaa na uppaadetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```vitakkuupasame ca yo rato, asubha.m bhaavayate {bhaavayatii (syaa0) dha0 pa0 350 dhammapade} sadaa sato.
[22] esa kho byantikaahiti, esa checchati maarabandhana'nti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattii divase divase samuddapariyanta.m mahaapathavi.m anuyaayati kalyaa.napaapakaani vicinamaano, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m manokamma.m divase divase paccavekkhitabba.m `ki.m nu kho me imehi tiihi .thaanehi ^a^V0.0361^ea^ anupavajjassa divaso viitivattatii'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa ^a^P0.0392^ea^ tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena a"nguttaranikaayavare --
[03] `kathambhuutassa me rattindivaa viitivattantiiti {viitipatantiiti (sii0 pii0)} pabbajitena abhi.nha.m paccavekkhitabba'nti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa abbhantarabaahiraarakkhaa susa.mvihitaa hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena abbhantaraana.m baahiraana.m kilesaana.m aarakkhaaya satidovaariko .thapetabbo. ida.m ^a^M0.0376^ea^, mahaaraaja, cakkavattissa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[03] `satidovaariko, bhikkhave, ariyasaavako akusala.m pajahati kusala.m bhaaveti, saavajja.m pajahati, anavajja.m bhaaveti, suddhamattaana.m pariharatii'''ti.
[06] cakkavatti"ngapa~nho dasamo.
[06] pathaviivaggo tatiyo.
[03] tassuddaana.m --
[21] pathavii aapo ca tejo ca, vaayo ca pabbatena ca.
[22] aakaaso candasuuriyo ca, sakko ca cakkavattinaati..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0362^ea^ ^a^M0.0377^ea^ naagasena, `upacikaaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, upacikaa upari chadana.m katvaa attaana.m pidahitvaa gocaraaya carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena siilasa.mvarachadana.m katvaa maanasa.m pidahitvaa pi.n.daaya caritabba.m, siilasa.mvarachadanena kho, mahaaraaja, yogii yogaavacaro sabbabhayasamatikkanto hoti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, upacikaaya eka.m a"nga.m ^a^P0.0393^ea^ gahetabba.m, bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upasenena va"ngantaputtena --
[21] ```siilasa.mvarachadana.m, yogii katvaana maanasa.m.
[22] anupalitto lokena, bhayaa ca parimuccatii'''ti..
[06] upacika"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `bi.laarassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bi.laaro guhaagatopi susiragatopi hammiyantaragatopi unduura.m yeva pariyesati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena gaamagatenaapi ara~n~nagatenaapi rukkhamuulagatenaapi su~n~naagaaragatenaapi satata.m samita.m appamattena kaayagataasatibhojana.m yeva pariyesitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, bi.laarassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0363^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, bi.laaro aasanne yeva gocara.m pariyesati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena imesu yeva pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassinaa viharitabba.m `iti ruupa.m iti ruupassa samudayo iti ruupassa attha"ngamo, iti vedanaa iti vedanaaya samudayo iti vedanaaya attha"ngamo, iti sa~n~naa iti sa~n~naaya samudayo ^a^M0.0378^ea^ iti sa~n~naaya attha"ngamo, iti sa"nkhaaraa iti sa"nkhaaraana.m samudayo iti sa"nkhaaraana.m attha"ngamo, iti vi~n~naa.na.m iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, bi.laarassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```na ito duure bhavitabba.m, bhavagga.m ki.m karissati.
[22] paccuppannamhi vohaare, sake kaayamhi vindathaa'''ti..
[06] bi.laara"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `unduurassa {undurassa (syaa0 ka0)} eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, unduuro itocito ca vicaranto aahaaruupaasiisako yeva carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0394^ea^, yoginaa yogaavacarena itocito ca vicarantena yoniso manasikaaruupaasiisakeneva bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, unduurassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upasenena va"ngantaputtena --
[21] ```dhammaasiisa.m {dhammasiisa.m (sii0 pii0)} karitvaana, viharanto vipassako.
[22] anoliino viharati, upasanto sadaa sato'''ti..
[06] unduura"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0364^ea^ naagasena, `vicchikassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vicchiko na"ngulaavudho na"ngula.m ussaapetvaa carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ~naa.naavudhena bhavitabba.m, ~naa.na.m ussaapetvaa viharitabba.m ^a^M0.0379^ea^. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vicchikassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upasenena va"ngantaputtena --
[21] ```~naa.nakhagga.m gahetvaana, viharanto vipassako.
[22] parimuccati sabbabhayaa, duppasaho ca so bhave'''ti..
[06] vicchika"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `nakulassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kaaya.m paribhaavetvaa uragamupagacchati gahetu.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kodhaaghaatabahula.m kalahaviggahavivaadavirodhaabhibhuuta.m lokamupagacchantena mettaabhesajjena maanasa.m anulimpitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, nakulassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```tasmaa saka.m paresampi, kaatabbaa mettabhaavanaa.
[22] mettacittena pharitabba.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana'''nti..
[06] nakula"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0365^ea^ ^a^P0.0395^ea^ naagasena, `jarasi"ngaalassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, jarasi"ngaalo bhojana.m pa.tilabhitvaa ajigucchamaano yaavadattha.m aaharayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena bhojana.m pa.tilabhitvaa ajigucchamaanena sariirayaapanamattameva paribhu~njitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, jarasi"ngaalassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena mahaakassapena --
[21] ```senaasanamhaa oruyha, gaama.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m.
[22] bhu~njanta.m purisa.m ku.t.thi.m, sakkacca na.m upa.t.thahi.m..
[21] ```so ^a^M0.0380^ea^ me pakkena hatthena, aalopa.m upanaamayi.
[22] aalopa.m pakkhipantassa, a"ngulipettha chijjatha..
[21] ```ku.t.tamuula~nca nissaaya, aalopa.m ta.m abhu~njisa.m.
[22] bhu~njamaane vaa bhutte vaa, jeguccha.m me na vijjatii'ti..

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, jarasi"ngaalo bhojana.m pa.tilabhitvaa na vicinaati luukha.m vaa pa.niita.m vaati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena bhojana.m pa.tilabhitvaa na vicinitabba.m `luukha.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa sampanna.m vaa asampanna.m vaa'ti, yathaaladdhena santussitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, jarasi"ngaalassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upasenena va"ngantaputtena --
[21] ```luukhenapi ca santusse, naa~n~na.m patthe rasa.m bahu.m.
[27] rasesu anugiddhassa, jhaane na ramate {ramatii (sii0 pii0)} mano.
[22] itariitarena santu.t.tho {santu.t.the (sii0 pii0)}, saama~n~na.m paripuuratii'''ti..
[06] jarasi"ngaala"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0366^ea^ naagasena, `migassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, migo divaa ara~n~ne carati, ratti.m abbhokaase, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena divaa ara~n~ne viharitabba.m, ratti.m abbhokaase. ida.m, mahaaraaja, migassa ^a^P0.0396^ea^ pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
[03] ``bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena lomaha.msanapariyaaye --

[03] `so kho aha.m, saariputta, yaa taa rattiyo siitaa hemantikaa antara.t.thakaa himapaatasamayaa {antara.t.thake himapaatasamaye (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, tathaaruupaasu rattiisu ratti.m abbhokaase viharaami, divaa vanasa.n.de. gimhaana.m pacchime maase divaa abbhokaase viharaami, ratti.m vanasa.n.de'ti.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0381^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, migo sattimhi vaa sare vaa opatante va~nceti {vajjeti (ka0)} palaayati, na kaayamupaneti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kilesesu opatantesu va~ncayitabba.m {vajjayitabba.m (ka0)} palaayitabba.m, na cittamupanetabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, migassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, migo manusse disvaa yena vaa tena vaa palaayati `maa ma.m te addasa.msuu'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena bha.n.danakalahaviggahavivaadasiile dussiile kusiite sa"nga.nikaaraame disvaa yena vaa tena vaa palaayitabba.m `maa ma.m te addasa.msu, aha~nca te maa addasa'nti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, migassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```maa me kadaaci paapiccho, kusiito hiinaviiriyo.
[22] appassuto anaacaaro, sammato {sameto (sii0 pii0)} ahu katthacii'''ti..
[06] miga"ngapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0367^ea^ naagasena, `goruupassa cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, goruupo saka.m geha.m na vijahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sako kaayo na vijahitabbo `aniccucchaadanaparimaddanabhedanavikira.naviddha.msanadhammo aya.m kaayo'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, goruupassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, goruupo aadinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhura.m vahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aadinnabrahmacariyena ^a^P0.0397^ea^ sukhadukkhena yaava jiivitapariyaadaanaa aapaa.nako.tika.m brahmacariya.m caritabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, goruupassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, goruupo chandena ghaayamaano paaniiya.m pivati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aacariyupajjhaayaana.m anusi.t.thi ^a^M0.0382^ea^ chandena pemena pasaadena ghaayamaanena pa.tiggahetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, goruupassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, goruupo yena kenaci vaahiyamaano vahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhuunampi gihiupaasakassaapi ovaadaanusaasanii sirasaa sampa.ticchitabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, goruupassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```tadahu pabbajito santo, jaatiyaa sattavassiko.
[22] sopi ma.m anusaaseyya, sampa.ticchaami matthake {muddhanaa (sii0)}..
[21] ```tibba.m chanda~nca pema~nca, tasmi.m disvaa upa.t.thape.
[22] .thapeyyaacariya.t.thaane, sakkacca na.m punappuna'''nti..
[06] goruupa"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0368^ea^ naagasena, `varaahassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, varaaho santattaka.thite {santattaka.thine (sii0 pii0)} gimhasamaye sampatte udaka.m upagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena dosena citte aalu.litakhalitavibbhantasantatte siitalaamatapa.niitamettaabhaavana.m upagantabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, varaahassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, varaaho cikkhallamudakamupagantvaa naasikaaya pathavi.m kha.nitvaa do.ni.m katvaa do.nikaaya sayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^P0.0398^ea^ maanase kaaya.m nikkhipitvaa aaramma.nantaragatena sayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, varaahassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena --
[21] ```kaaye {kaayena (ka0)} sabhaava.m disvaana, vicinitvaa vipassako.
[22] ekaakiyo adutiyo, seti aaramma.nantare'''ti..
[06] varaaha"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0383^ea^ naagasena, `hatthissa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, hatthii naama caranto yeva pathavi.m daaleti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kaaya.m sammasamaaneneva sabbe kilesaa daaletabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, hatthissa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, hatthii sabbakaayeneva apaloketi, ujuka.m yeva pekkhati, na disaavidisaa viloketi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbakaayena apalokinaa ^a^V0.0369^ea^ bhavitabba.m, na disaavidisaa viloketabbaa, na uddha.m ulloketabba.m, na adho oloketabba.m, yugamattapekkhinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, hatthissa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, hatthii anibaddhasayano gocaraayamanugantvaa na tameva desa.m vaasatthamupagacchati, na dhuvappati.t.thaalayo, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena anibaddhasayanena bhavitabba.m, niraalayena pi.n.daaya gantabba.m, yadi passati vipassako manu~n~na.m patiruupa.m ruciradese bhava.m ma.n.dapa.m vaa rukkhamuula.m vaa guha.m vaa pabbhaara.m vaa, tattheva vaasamupagantabba.m, dhuvappati.t.thaalayo na kaatabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, hatthissa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, hatthii udaka.m ogaahitvaa sucivimalasiitalasalilaparipu.n.na.m kumuduppalapadumapu.n.dariikasa~nchanna.m mahatimahanta.m ^a^P0.0399^ea^ padumasara.m ogaahitvaa kii.lati gajavarakii.la.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sucivimalavippasannamanaaviladhammavaravaaripu.n.na.m vimuttikusumasa~nchanna.m mahaasatipa.t.thaanapokkhara.ni.m ogaahitvaa ~naa.nena sa"nkhaaraa odhunitabbaa vidhunitabbaa, yogaavacarakii.laa kii.litabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, hatthissa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, hatthii sato paada.m uddharati, sato paada.m nikkhipati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena satena sampajaanena paada.m uddharitabba.m, satena sampajaanena paada.m nikkhipitabba.m, abhikkamapa.tikkame sami~njanapasaara.ne sabbattha satena sampajaanena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, hatthissa ^a^M0.0384^ea^ pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare --
[21] ```kaayena sa.mvaro saadhu, saadhu vaacaaya sa.mvaro.
[27] manasaa sa.mvaro saadhu, saadhu sabbattha sa.mvaro.
[22] sabbattha sa.mvuto lajjii, rakkhitoti pavuccatii'''ti..
[06] hatthi"ngapa~nho dasamo.upacikaavaggo catuttho.
[03] tassuddaana.m ^a^V0.0370^ea^ --
[21] upacikaa bi.laaro ca, unduuro vicchikena ca.
[27] nakulo si"ngaalo migo,
[22] goruupo varaaho hatthinaa dasaati..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0371^ea^ ^a^P0.0400^ea^ ^a^M0.0385^ea^ naagasena, `siihassa satta a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani satta a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, siiho naama setavimalaparisuddhapa.n.daro, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena setavimalaparisuddhapa.n.daracittena byapagatakukkuccena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, siiho catucara.no vikkantacaarii, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena caturiddhipaadacara.nena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, siiho abhiruuparucirakesarii, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena abhiruuparucirasiilakesarinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, siiho jiivitapariyaadaanepi na kassaci onamati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarapariyaadaanepi na kassaci onamitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, siiho sapadaanabhakkho yasmi.m okaase nipatati, tattheva yaavadattha.m bhakkhayati, na varama.msa.m vicinaati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sapadaanabhakkhena bhavitabba.m, na kulaani vicinitabbaani, na pubbageha.m hitvaa kulaani upasa"nkamitabbaani, na bhojana.m vicinitabba.m, yasmi.m okaase kaba.la.m aadiiyati, tasmi.m yeva okaase ^a^V0.0372^ea^ bhu~njitabba.m sariirayaapanattha.m {sariirayaapanamatta.m (sii0 pii0)}, na varabhojana.m vicinitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, siiho asannidhibhakkho, saki.m gocara.m bhakkhayitvaa na puna ta.m upagacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena asannidhikaaraparibhoginaa ^a^M0.0386^ea^ bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa cha.t.tha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m ^a^P0.0401^ea^, mahaaraaja, siiho bhojana.m aladdhaa na paritassati, laddhaapi bhojana.m agadhito {agathito (sii0)} amucchito anajjhosanno paribhu~njati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena bhojana.m aladdhaa na paritassitabba.m, laddhaapi bhojana.m agadhitena amucchitena anajjhosannena aadiinavadassaavinaa nissara.napa~n~nena paribhu~njitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, siihassa sattama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare thera.m mahaakassapa.m parikittayamaanena --

[03] `santu.t.thoya.m, bhikkhave, kassapo itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca pi.n.dapaatahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati, aladdhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njatii'''ti.
[06] siiha"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `cakkavaakassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaaniiti''? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, cakkavaako yaava jiivitapariyaadaanaa dutiyika.m na vijahati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yaava jiivitapariyaadaanaa yoniso manasikaaro na vijahitabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavaakassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0373^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavaako sevaalapa.nakabhakkho, tena ca santu.t.thi.m aapajjati, taaya ca santu.t.thiyaa balena ca va.n.nena ca na parihaayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yathaalaabhasantoso kara.niiyo, yathaalaabhasantu.t.tho kho, mahaaraaja, yogii yogaavacaro na parihaayati siilena, na parihaayati samaadhinaa, na ^a^M0.0387^ea^ parihaayati pa~n~naaya, na parihaayati vimuttiyaa, na parihaayati vimutti~naa.nadassanena, na parihaayati sabbehi kusalehi dhammehi. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavaakassa ^a^P0.0402^ea^ dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavaako paa.ne na vihe.thayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena nihitada.n.dena nihitasatthena lajjinaa dayaapannena sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cakkavaakassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasatampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena cakkavaakajaatake --
[21] ```yo na hanti na ghaateti, na jinaati na jaapaye.
[22] metta.mso {ahi.msaa (sii0 pii0)} sabbabhuutesu, vera.m tassa na kenacii'''ti..
[06] cakkavaaka"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `pe.naahikaaya dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pe.naahikaa sakapatimhi usuuyaaya chaapake na posayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sakamane {sakamano (ka0)} kilese uppanne usuuyaayitabba.m, satipa.t.thaanena sammaasa.mvarasusire pakkhipitvaa manodvaare kaayagataasati bhaavetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pe.naahikaaya pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pe.naahikaa pavane divasa.m gocara.m caritvaa saaya.m pakkhiga.na.m upeti attano guttiyaa, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ekakena paviveka.m sevitabba.m sa.myojanaparimuttiyaa, tatra rati.m alabhamaanena upavaadabhayaparirakkha.naaya sa"ngha.m osaritvaa ^a^V0.0374^ea^ sa"ngharakkhitena vasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pe.naahikaaya dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, brahmunaa sahampatinaa bhagavato santike --
[21] ```sevetha ^a^M0.0388^ea^ pantaani senaasanaani, careyya sa.myojanavippamokkhaa.
[22] sace rati.m naadhigaccheyya tattha, sa"nghe vase rakkhitatto satiimaa'''ti..
[06] pe.naahika"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0403^ea^ naagasena, `gharakapotassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, gharakapoto paragehe vasamaano na tesa.m ki~nci bha.n.dassa nimitta.m ga.nhaati, majjhatto vasati sa~n~naabahulo, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena parakula.m upagatena tasmi.m kule itthiina.m vaa purisaana.m vaa ma~nce vaa pii.the vaa vatthe vaa ala"nkaare vaa upabhoge vaa paribhoge vaa bhojanavikatiisu vaa na nimitta.m gahetabba.m, majjhattena bhavitabba.m, sama.nasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thapetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, gharakapotassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena cuu.lanaaradajaatake --
[21] ```pavisitvaa parakula.m, paanattha.m bhojanaaya vaa {paanesu bhojanesu vaa (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] mita.m khaade mita.m bhu~nje, na ca ruupe mana.m kare'''ti..
[06] gharakapota"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `uluukassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, uluuko kaakehi pa.tiviruddho, ratti.m kaakasa"ngha.m gantvaa bahuupi kaake hanati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena a~n~naa.nena ^a^V0.0375^ea^ pa.tiviruddho kaatabbo, ekena raho nisiiditvaa a~n~naa.na.m sampamadditabba.m, muulato chinditabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, uluukassa pa.thama.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0389^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, uluuko suppa.tisalliino hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pa.tisallaanaaraamena bhavitabba.m pa.tisallaanaratena. ida.m, mahaaraaja, uluukassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare --

[03] ```idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisallaanaaraamo pa.tisallaanarato ``ida.m dukkha''nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti yathaa bhuutha.m pajaanaati ^a^P0.0404^ea^, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaatii'''ti.
[06] uluuka"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `satapattassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, satapatto ravitvaa paresa.m khema.m vaa bhaya.m vaa aacikkhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena paresa.m dhamma.m desayamaanena vinipaata.m bhayato dassayitabba.m, nibbaana.m khemato dassayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, satapattassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena pi.n.dolabhaaradvaajena --
[21] ```niraye bhayasantaasa.m, nibbaane vipula.m sukha.m.
[22] ubhayaanetaanatthaani dassetabbaani yoginaa'''ti..
[06] satapatta"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0376^ea^ naagasena, `vaggulissa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, vagguli geha.m pavisitvaa vicaritvaa nikkhamati, na tattha palibuddhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena gaama.m pi.n.daaya pavisitvaa sapadaana.m vicaritvaa ^a^M0.0390^ea^ pa.tiladdhalaabhena khippameva nikkhamitabba.m, na tattha palibuddhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaggulissa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, vagguli paragehe vasamaano na tesa.m parihaani.m karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kulaani upasa"nkamitvaa atiyaacanaaya vaa vi~n~nattibahulataaya vaa kaayadosabahulataaya vaa atibhaa.nitaaya vaa samaanasukhadukkhataaya vaa na tesa.m koci vippa.tisaaro kara.niiyo, napi tesa.m muulakamma.m parihaapetabba.m, sabbathaa va.d.dhi yeva icchitabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, vaggulissa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa ^a^P0.0405^ea^ devaatidevena diighanikaayavare lakkha.nasuttante --
[21] ```suddhaaya siilena sutena buddhiyaa, caagena dhammena bahuuhi saadhuhi.
[22] dhanena dha~n~nena ca khettavatthunaa, puttehi daarehi catuppadehi ca..
[21] ```~naatiihi mittehi ca bandhavehi, balena va.n.nena sukhena cuubhaya.m.
[22] katha.m na haayeyyu.m pareti icchati, atthasamiddhi~nca panaabhika"nkhatii'''ti..
[06] vagguli"ngapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `jaluukaaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, jaluukaa yattha alliiyati, tattheva da.lha.m alliiyitvaa ruhira.m pivati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yasmi.m aaramma.ne ^a^V0.0377^ea^ citta.m alliiyati, ta.m aaramma.na.m va.n.nato ca sa.n.thaanato ca disato ca okaasato ca paricchedato ca li"ngato ca nimittato ca da.lha.m pati.t.thaapetvaa tenevaaramma.nena vimuttirasamasecanaka.m paatabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, jaluukaaya eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena anuruddhena --
[21] ```parisuddhena ^a^M0.0391^ea^ cittena, aaramma.ne pati.t.thaaya.
[22] tena cittena paatabba.m, vimuttirasamasecana'''nti..
[06] jaluuka"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `sappassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, sappo urena gacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pa~n~naaya caritabba.m, pa~n~naaya caramaanassa kho, mahaaraaja, yogino citta.m ~naaye carati, vilakkha.na.m vivajjeti, salakkha.na.m bhaaveti. ida.m, mahaaraaja ^a^P0.0406^ea^, sappassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, sappo caramaano osadha.m parivajjento carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena duccarita.m parivajjentena caritabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, sappassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, sappo manusse disvaa tappati {manussa.m disvaa kampati (ka0)} socati cintayati, evameva kho mahaaraaja yoginaa yogaavacarena kuvitakke, vitakketvaa arati.m uppaadayitvaa tappitabba.m socitabba.m cintayitabba.m `pamaadena me divaso viitinaamito, na so puna sakkaa laddhu'nti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, sappassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa bhallaa.tiyajaatake dvinna.m kinnaraana.m --
[21] ```mayekaratta.m ^a^V0.0378^ea^ {yamekaratti.m (sii0 pii0)} vippavasimha ludda, akaamakaa a~n~nama~n~na.m sarantaa.
[22] tamekaratta.m {tamekaratti.m (sii0 pii0)} anutappamaanaa, socaama `saa ratti puna nahessatii'''ti..
[06] sappa"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0392^ea^ naagasena, `ajagarassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ajagaro mahatimahaakaayo bahuupi divase uunuudaro diinataro kucchipuura.m aahaara.m na labhati, aparipu.n.no yeva yaavadeva sariirayaapanamattakena yaapeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogino yogaavacarassa bhikkhaacariyappasutassa parapi.n.damupagatassa paradinnappaa.tika"nkhissa saya.mgaahappa.tiviratassa dullabha.m udaraparipuura.m aahaara.m, api ca atthavasikena kulaputtena cattaaro pa~nca aalope abhu~njitvaa avasesa.m udakena paripuuretabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, ajagarassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```alla.m ^a^P0.0407^ea^ sukkha.m vaa bhu~njanto, na baa.lha.m suhito siyaa.
[22] uunuudaro mitaahaaro, sato bhikkhu paribbaje..
[21] ```cattaaro pa~nca aalope, abhutvaa udaka.m pive.
[22] ala.m phaasu vihaaraaya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno'''ti..
[06] ajagara"ngapa~nho dasamo.
[06] siihavaggo pa~ncamo.
[03] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kesarii cakkavaako ca, pe.naahi gharakapotako.
[27] uluuko satapatto ca, vagguli ca jaluupikaa.
[22] sappo ajagaro ceva, vaggo tena pavuccatiiti..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0379^ea^ ^a^M0.0393^ea^ naagasena, `panthamakka.takassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, panthamakka.tako panthe makka.tajaalavitaana.m katvaa yadi tattha jaalake laggati kimi vaa makkhikaa vaa pa.ta"ngo vaa, ta.m gahetvaa bhakkhayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena chasu dvaaresu satipa.t.thaanajaalavitaana.m katvaa yadi tattha kilesamakkhikaa bajjhanti, tattheva ghaatetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, panthamakka.takassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena anuruddhena --
[21] ```citta.m niyame chasu dvaaresu, satipa.t.thaanavaruttame.
[22] kilesaa tattha laggaa ce, hantabbaa te vipassinaa'''ti..
[06] panthamakka.taka"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `thanassitadaarakassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti ^a^P0.0408^ea^? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, thanassitadaarako sadatthe laggati, khiiratthiko rodati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sadatthe laggitabba.m, sabbattha dhamma~naa.nena bhavitabba.m, uddese paripucchaaya sammappayoge paviveke garusa.mvaase kalyaa.namittasevane. ida.m, mahaaraaja, thanassitadaarakassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena diighanikaayavare parinibbaanasuttante --
[21] ```i"ngha.m ^a^V0.0380^ea^ tumhe, aananda, saaratthe {sadatthe (sii0 pii0)} gha.tatha, saaratthe anuyu~njatha.
[22] saaratthe appamattaa aataapino pahitattaa viharathaa'''ti..
[06] thanassitadaaraka"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0394^ea^ naagasena, `cittakadharakummassa {cittakathalakummassa (sii0 pii0)} eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, cittakadharakummo udakabhayaa udaka.m parivajjetvaa vicarati, taaya ca pana udaka.m parivajjanaaya aayunaa na parihaayati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pamaade bhayadassaavinaa bhavitabba.m, appamaade gu.navisesadassaavinaa. taaya ca pana bhayadassaavitaaya na parihaayati saama~n~naa, nibbaanassa santike upeti {.thapeti (ka0)}. ida.m, mahaaraaja, cittakadharakummassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena dhammapade --
[21] ```appamaadarato bhikkhu, pamaade bhayadassi vaa.
[22] abhabbo parihaanaaya, nibbaanasseva santike'''ti..
[06] cittakadharakumma"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `pavanassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, pavana.m naama asucijana.m pa.ticchaadeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena paresa.m aparaddha.m khalita.m pa.ticchaadetabba.m na vivaritabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pavanassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pavana.m su~n~na.m pacurajanehi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^V0.0381^ea^ ^a^P0.0409^ea^ raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thijaalehi sabbehi ca kilesehi su~n~nena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pavanassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pavana.m vivitta.m janasambaadharahita.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena paapakehi akusalehi dhammehi anariyehi pavivittena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pavanassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0395^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, pavana.m santa.m parisuddha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena santena parisuddhena bhavitabba.m, nibbutena pahiinamaanena pahiinamakkhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pavanassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, pavana.m ariyajanasa.msevita.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ariyajanasa.msevitena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, pavanassa pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena sa.myuttanikaayavare --
[21] ```pavivittehi ariyehi, pahitattehi jhaayibhi.
[22] nicca.m aaraddhaviiriyehi, pa.n.ditehi sahaavase'''ti..
[06] pavana"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `rukkhassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, rukkho naama pupphaphaladharo, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena vimuttipupphasaama~n~naphaladhaarinaa bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, rukkhassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, rukkho upagataanamanuppavi.t.thaana.m janaana.m chaaya.m deti, evameva kho ^a^V0.0382^ea^, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena upagataanamanuppavi.t.thaana.m puggalaana.m aamisappa.tisandhaarena vaa dhammappa.tisanthaarena vaa pa.tisantharitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, rukkhassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, rukkho chaayaavematta.m ^a^P0.0410^ea^ na karoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbasattesu vemattataa na kaatabbaa, coravadhakapaccatthikesupi attanipi samasamaa mettaabhaavanaa kaatabbaa, `kinti ime sattaa averaa abyaapajjaa {abyaapajjhaa (sii0)} aniighaa sukhii attaana.m parihareyyu'nti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, rukkhassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```vadhake ^a^M0.0396^ea^ devadattamhi, core a"ngulimaalake.
[22] dhanapaale raahule ca, sabbattha samako munii'''ti..
[06] rukkha"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `meghassa pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani pa~nca a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, megho uppanna.m rajojalla.m vuupasameti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena uppanna.m kilesarajojalla.m vuupasametabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, meghassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, megho pathaviyaa u.nha.m nibbaapeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena mettaabhaavanaaya sadevako loko nibbaapetabbo. ida.m, mahaaraaja, meghassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, megho sabbabiijaani viruhaapeti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbasattaana.m saddha.m uppaadetvaa ta.m saddhaabiija.m tiisu sampattiisu ropetabba.m, dibbamaanusikaasu sukhasampattiisu yaavaparamatthanibbaanasukhasampatti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, meghassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0383^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, megho ututo samu.t.thahitvaa dhara.nitalaruhe ti.narukkhalataagumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yoniso manasikaara.m nibbattetvaa tena yoniso manasikaarena sama.nadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikaaramuulakaa sabbe kusalaa dhammaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, meghassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m ^a^P0.0411^ea^, mahaaraaja, megho vassamaano nadita.laakapokkhara.niyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapaanaani ca paripuureti udakadhaaraahi, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aagamapariyattiyaa dhammameghamabhivassayitvaa adhigamakaamaana.m maanasa.m paripuurayitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, meghassa ^a^M0.0397^ea^ pa~ncama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```bodhaneyya.m jana.m disvaa, satasahassepi yojane.
[22] kha.nena upagantvaana, bodheti ta.m mahaamunii'''ti..
[06] megha"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `ma.niratanassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m ekantaparisuddha.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ekantaparisuddhaajiivena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.
