[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m na kenaci saddhi.m missiiyati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena paapehi paapasahaayehi saddhi.m na missitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratana.m jaatiratanehi yojiiyati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa ^a^V0.0384^ea^ yogaavacarena uttamavarajaatimantehi saddhi.m sa.mvasitabba.m, pa.tipannakaphala.t.thasekkhaphalasama"ngiihi sotaapannasakadaagaamianaagaamiarahantatevijjacha.labhi~n~nasama.nama.niratanehi saddhi.m sa.mvasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, ma.niratanassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena suttanipaate --
[21] ```suddhaa suddhehi sa.mvaasa.m, kappayavho patissataa.
[22] tato samaggaa nipakaa, dukkhassanta.m karissathaa'''ti..
[06] ma.niratanapa~nho sattamo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^P0.0412^ea^ naagasena, `maagavikassa cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, maagaviko ^a^M0.0398^ea^ appamiddho hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena appamiddhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, maagavikassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, maagaviko migesu yeva citta.m upanibandhati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aaramma.nesu yeva citta.m upanibandhitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, maagavikassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, maagaviko kaala.m kammassa jaanaati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pa.tisallaanassa kaalo jaanitabbo `aya.m kaalo pa.tisallaanassa, aya.m kaalo nikkhamanaayaa'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, maagavikassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, maagaviko miga.m disvaa haasamabhijaneti `ima.m lacchaamii'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aaramma.ne abhiramitabba.m, haasamabhijanetabba.m `uttari.m visesamadhigacchissaamii'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, maagavikassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m mahaaraaja therena mogharaajena --
[21] ```aaramma.ne ^a^V0.0385^ea^ labhitvaana, pahitattena bhikkhunaa.
[22] bhiyyo haaso janetabbo, adhigacchissaami uttari'''nti..
[06] maagavika"ngapa~nho a.t.thamo.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `baa.lisikassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, baa.lisiko ba.lisena macche uddharati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ~naa.nena uttari.m saama~n~naphalaani uddharitabbaani. ida.m, mahaaraaja, baa.lisikassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0399^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, baa.lisiko parittaka.m vadhitvaa vipula.m laabhamadhigacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa ^a^P0.0413^ea^ yogaavacarena parittalokaamisamatta.m pariccajitabba.m. lokaamisamatta.m, mahaaraaja, pariccajitvaa yogii yogaavacaro vipula.m saama~n~naphala.m adhigacchati. ida.m, mahaaraaja, baa.lisikassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena raahulena --
[21] ```su~n~nata~ncaanimitta~nca, vimokkha~ncaappa.nihita.m.
[22] caturo phale cha.labhi~n~naa, cajitvaa lokaamisa.m labhe'''ti..
[06] baa.lisika"ngapa~nho navamo.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `tacchakassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, tacchako kaa.lasutta.m anulometvaa rukkha.m tacchati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena jinasaasanamanulomayitvaa siilapathaviya.m ^a^V0.0386^ea^ pati.t.thahitvaa saddhaahatthena pa~n~naavaasi.m gahetvaa kilesaa tacchetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tacchakassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, tacchako pheggu.m apaharitvaa saaramaadiyati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sassata.m uccheda.m ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariira.m a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariira.m taduttama.m a~n~naduttama.m akatamabhabba.m apurisakaara.m abrahmacariyavaasa.m sattavinaasa.m navasattapaatubhaava.m sa"nkhaarasassatabhaava.m yo karoti, so pa.tisa.mvedeti, a~n~no karoti, a~n~no pa.tisa.mvedeti, kammaphaladassanaa ca kiriyaphaladi.t.thi ca iti evaruupaani ceva a~n~naani ca vivaadapathaani apanetvaa sa"nkhaaraana.m sabhaava.m paramasu~n~nata.m niriihanijjiivata.m {nisattanijiivata.m (ka0)} accanta.m su~n~nata.m aadiyitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, tacchakassa dutiya.m ^a^M0.0400^ea^ a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena suttanipaate --
[21] ```kaara.n.dava.m ^a^P0.0414^ea^ niddhamatha, kasambu.m apakassatha.
[22] tato palaape vaahetha, assama.ne sama.namaanine..
[21] ```niddhamitvaana paapicche, paapaaacaaragocare.
[27] suddhaa suddhehi sa.mvaasa.m, kappayavho patissataa.
[22] tato samaggaa nipakaa, dukkhassanta.m karissathaa'''ti..
[06] tacchaka"ngapa~nho dasamo.
[06] makka.takavaggo cha.t.tho.
[03] tassuddaana.m --
[21] makka.to daarako kummo, vana.m rukkho ca pa~ncamo.
[22] megho ma.ni maagaviko, baa.lisii tacchakena caati..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0387^ea^ ^a^M0.0401^ea^ naagasena, `kumbhassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba'nti ya.m vadesi, katama.m ta.m eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba''nti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kumbho sampu.n.no na sa.nati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena aagame adhigame pariyattiya.m saama~n~ne paarami.m patvaa na sa.nitabba.m, na tena maano kara.niiyo, na dabbo {dappo (sii0)} dassetabbo, nihatamaanena nihatadabbena bhavitabba.m, ujukena amukharena avikatthinaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kumbhassa eka.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena suttanipaate --
[21] ```yaduunaka.m ta.m sa.nati, ya.m puura.m santameva ta.m.
[22] a.d.dhakumbhuupamo {rittakumbhuupamo (sii0)} baalo, rahado puurova pa.n.dito'''ti..
[06] kumbha"ngapa~nho pa.thamo.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `kaa.laayasassa {kaa.laha.msassa (ka0)} dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti ^a^P0.0415^ea^? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, kaa.laayaso supiito {suthito (ka0)} vamati {vahati (syaa0 ka0)}, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yogino yogaavacarassa maanasa.m yoniso manasikaarena {yoniso manasikaare (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} apiita.m vamati. ida.m, mahaaraaja, kaa.laayasassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, kaa.laayaso saki.m piita.m udaka.m na vamati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja ^a^V0.0388^ea^, yoginaa yogaavacarena yo saki.m uppanno pasaado, na puna so vamitabbo `u.laaro so bhagavaa sammaasambuddho, svaakkhaato dhammo, suppa.tipanno sa"ngho'ti. `ruupa.m anicca.m, vedanaa aniccaa, sa~n~naa aniccaa, sa"nkhaaraa aniccaa, vi~n~naa.na.m aniccanti ya.m saki.m uppanna.m ~naa.na.m, na puna ta.m vamitabba.m. ida.m ^a^M0.0402^ea^, mahaaraaja, kaa.laayasassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```dassanamhi parisodhito {parisodhike (sii0 ka0)} naro, ariyadhamme niyato visesaguu.
[22] nappavedhati anekabhaagaso, sabbaso ca mukhabhaavameva so'''ti..
[06] kaa.laayasa"ngapa~nho dutiyo.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `chattassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, chatta.m upari muddhani carati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena kilesaana.m upari muddhani carena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, chattassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, chatta.m muddhanupatthambha.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena yoniso manasikaarupatthambhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, chattassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, chatta.m vaataatapameghavu.t.thiyo pa.tihanati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena naanaavidhadi.t.thiputhusama.nabraahma.naana.m {mahaavaata (ka0)} matavaatatividhaggisantaapakilesavu.t.thiyo pa.tihantabbaa ^a^P0.0416^ea^. ida.m, mahaaraaja, chattassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```yathaapi chatta.m vipula.m, acchidda.m thirasa.mhita.m.
[22] vaataatapa.m nivaareti, mahatii meghavu.t.thiyo..
[21] ```tatheva ^a^V0.0389^ea^ buddhaputtopi, siilachattadharo suci.
[22] kilesavu.t.thi.m vaareti, santaapatividhaggayo'''ti..
[06] chatta"ngapa~nho tatiyo.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0403^ea^ naagasena, `khettassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, khetta.m maatikaasampanna.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sucaritavattappa.tivattamaatikaasampannena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, khettassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, khetta.m mariyaadaasampanna.m hoti, taaya ca mariyaadaaya udaka.m rakkhitvaa dha~n~na.m paripaaceti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena siilahirimariyaadaasampannena bhavitabba.m, taaya ca siilahirimariyaadaaya saama~n~na.m rakkhitvaa cattaari saama~n~naphalaani gahetabbaani. ida.m, mahaaraaja, khettassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, khetta.m u.t.thaanasampanna.m hoti, kassakassa haasajanaka.m appampi biija.m vutta.m bahu hoti, bahu vutta.m bahutara.m hoti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena u.t.thaanasampannena vipulaphaladaayinaa bhavitabba.m, daayakaana.m haasajanakena bhavitabba.m, yathaa appa.m dinna.m bahu hoti, bahu dinna.m bahutara.m hoti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, khettassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena upaalinaa vinayadharena --
[21] ```khettuupamena bhavitabba.m, u.t.thaanavipuladaayinaa.
[22] esa khettavaro naama, yo dadaati vipula.m phala'''nti..
[06] khetta"ngapa~nho catuttho.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^V0.0390^ea^ ^a^P0.0417^ea^ naagasena, `agadassa dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani dve a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti. ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, agade kimii na sa.n.thahanti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena maanase kilesaa na sa.n.thapetabbaa. ida.m, mahaaraaja, agadassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0404^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, agado da.t.thaphu.t.thadi.t.thaasitapiitakhaayitasaayita.m sabba.m visa.m pa.tihanati, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena raagadosamohamaanadi.t.thivisa.m sabba.m pa.tihanitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, agadassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, bhagavataa devaatidevena --
[21] ```sa"nkhaaraana.m sabhaavattha.m, da.t.thukaamena yoginaa.
[22] agadeneva hotabba.m, kilesavisanaasane'''ti..
[06] agada"ngapa~nho pa~ncamo.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``bhante naagasena, `bhojanassa tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani tii.ni a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m upatthambho, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbasattaana.m maggupatthambhena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m bala.m va.d.dheti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena pu~n~nava.d.dhiyaa va.d.dhitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0391^ea^ capara.m, mahaaraaja, bhojana.m sabbasattaana.m abhipatthita.m, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena sabbalokaabhipatthitena bhavitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, bhojanassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena mahaamoggallaanena --
[21] ```sa.myamena ^a^P0.0418^ea^ niyamena, siilena pa.tipattiyaa.
[22] patthitena bhavitabba.m, sabbalokassa yoginaa'''ti..
[06] bhojana"ngapa~nho cha.t.tho.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``bhante ^a^M0.0405^ea^ naagasena, `issaasassa cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii'ti ya.m vadesi, katamaani taani cattaari a"ngaani gahetabbaanii''ti? ``yathaa, mahaaraaja, issaaso sare paatayanto ubho paade pathaviya.m da.lha.m pati.t.thaapeti, ja.n.nuavekalla.m karoti, sarakalaapa.m ka.tisandhimhi .thapeti, kaaya.m upatthaddha.m karoti, dve hatthe sandhi.t.thaana.m aaropeti, mu.t.thi.m pii.layati, a"nguliyo nirantara.m karoti, giiva.m pagga.nhaati, cakkhuuni mukha~nca pidahati, nimitta.m uju.m karoti, haasamuppaadeti `vijjhissaamii'ti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena siilapathaviya.m viiriyapaade pati.t.thaapetabba.m, khantisoracca.m avekalla.m kaatabba.m, sa.mvare citta.m .thapetabba.m, sa.myamaniyame attaa upanetabbo, icchaa mucchaa pii.layitabbaa, yoniso manasikaare citta.m nirantara.m kaatabba.m, viiriya.m paggahetabba.m, cha dvaaraa pidahitabbaa, sati upa.t.thapetabbaa, haasamuppaadetabba.m `sabbakilese ~naa.nanaaraacena vijjhissaamii'ti. ida.m, mahaaraaja, issaasassa pa.thama.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, issaaso aa.laka.m pariharati va"nkajimhaku.tilanaaraacassa ujukara.naaya. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena imasmi.m kaaye satipa.t.thaanaaa.laka.m pariharitabba.m va"nkajimhaku.tilacittassa ujukara.naaya. ida.m, mahaaraaja, issaasassa dutiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, issaaso lakkhe upaaseti, evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^V0.0392^ea^ imasmi.m kaaye upaasitabba.m. katha.m mahaaraaja yoginaa yogaavacarena imasmi.m kaaye upaasitabba.m? aniccato upaasitabba.m, dukkhato upaasitabba.m, anattato upaasitabba.m, rogato...pe0... ga.n.dato...pe0... sallato...pe0... aghato...pe0... aabaadhato...pe0... parato...pe0... palokato...pe0... iitito...pe0... upaddavato...pe0... bhayato...pe0... upasaggato...pe0... calato...pe0... pabha"nguto...pe0... addhuvato...pe0... ataa.nato...pe0... ale.nato...pe0... asara.nato...pe0... rittato...pe0... tucchato...pe0... su~n~nato...pe0... aadiinavato...pe0... vipari.naamadhammato...pe0... asaarato ^a^P0.0419^ea^ ...pe0... aghamuulato...pe0... vadhakato...pe0... vibhavato...pe0... saasavato...pe0... sa"nkhatato...pe0... maaraamisato...pe0... jaatidhammato...pe0... jaraadhammato...pe0... byaadhidhammato...pe0... mara.nadhammato...pe0... sokadhammato...pe0... paridevadhammato...pe0... upaayaasadhammato...pe0... sa.mkilesadhammato...pe0... eva.m kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena ^a^M0.0406^ea^ imasmi.m kaaye upaasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, issaasassa tatiya.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, mahaaraaja, issaaso saaya.m paata.m upaasati. evameva kho, mahaaraaja, yoginaa yogaavacarena saaya.m paata.m aaramma.ne upaasitabba.m. ida.m, mahaaraaja, issaasassa catuttha.m a"nga.m gahetabba.m. bhaasitampeta.m, mahaaraaja, therena saariputtena dhammasenaapatinaa --
[21] ```yathaa issaasako naama, saaya.m paata.m upaasati.
[22] upaasana.m ari~ncanto {na ricchanto (sii0 ka0)}, labhate bhattavetana.m..
[21] ```tatheva buddhaputtopi, karoti kaayupaasana.m.
[22] kaayupaasana.m ari~ncanto, arahattamadhigacchatii'''ti..
[06] issaasa"ngapa~nho sattamo.
[06] kumbhavaggo sattamo {ito para.m raaja"ngapa~nhaadikaa a.t.thati.msa pa~nhaa vina.t.thaa, yehi taa di.t.thaa,
[03] tehi no aarocetabbaa puna muddaapanakaale pakkhipanatthaayaati (na, bu, sa)}.
[03] tassuddaana.m --
[21] kumbho ca kaa.laayaso ca, chatta.m khetta~nca agado.
[22] bhojanena ca issaaso, vutta.m daani viduuhiiti..
[06] opammakathaapa~nho ni.t.thito.
